story:
Our 2014-2015 NEO Indiegogo for World-Famed Scientist Dr. Patrick Flanagan™ SOLD OUT. 

Thanks to all you wonderful backers, the ingenuity of Dr. Flanagan ™, the tireless work of PhiSciences, assisted by BuzzBroz social media hosting this campaign all 5,000 were delivered by end of 2015.  

Please direct ALL delivery, technical and service related questions to help@phisciences.com or call the friendly PhiSci's Help Desk at 928-634-2668 between 9 am to 4 pm weekdays AZ time.

Looking for announcements on future NEO Neurophone and cool tools fro expanding consciousness? Join the Cool Tools From Science Greats Email List. 

SERVICE OR DELIVERY QUESTIONS?  EMAIL HELP@PHISCIENCES.COM

The NEO Neurophone is not a smart phone.  Rather, the brand new 2015 NEO Neurophone is famed inventor Dr. Patrick Flanagan's profound time-tested techno-meditation device that uses blissful ultrasonic waves to speed meditation, listen to music a whole new way and increase focus and learning.

 

NOW MEDITATION OUTSIDE THE BOX COMES IN A BOX

.

The Neurophone boasts a worldwide fan base of highly satisfied customers. Check out this little sampling from thousands of happy users.

 

About NEO Neurophone Inventor Dr. Flanagan

A science prodigy, Dr. Flanagan began inventing at age 8 and was only 13 when he invented the Neurophone, hoping to aid him in learning as he slept.  By age 17, Patrick was featured in the 1962 LIFE Magazine issue, dedicated to America's best and brightest, in a feature story titled "Whiz Kid, Hands Down". He has since appeared in TIME Magazine, major national talk shows, countless articles and has spoken before international audiences about the Neurophone and his other amazing inventions across the world. 

In 2013 and 2014, a whole new generation of fans have discovered Dr. Flanagan in a web series designed to inspire young people to follow his lead into science. The Doc has over 25 million views and counting for his hit web Flanagan on both Vimeo and YouTube produced by filmmaker Ken Sheetz of BuzzBroz, the doctor's host for this campaign. 

 

 

Disclaimers

These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure or prevent any disease. As with any other device, we recommend you consult your physician prior to use.

 

Last, BuzzBroz.com and its founder Ken Sheetz are honored to host the NEO Neurophone 2014/2015 hit campaign, raising $1.6 for R&D and startup manufacturing for PhiSciences. Note: We are not the maker of NEO so any questions as to refunds, delivery or product concerns or questions must be addressed to help@phisciences.com / tel 928-634-2668.

story:
Porquê um Ginásio do CDUP Rugby?

Num contexto actual, onde a modalidade é cada vez mais exigente a nível físico, é fundamental para o sucesso de um equipa de rugby a preparação de cada atleta. Actualmente, o CDUP, ao contrário da maioria dos clubes da Divisão de Honra - principal escalão nacional - não tem ginásio próprio, facto que tem condicionado a performance dos nossos atletas que à data utilizam ginásios externos. 

O grande objectivo do CDUP tem passado pela reconstrução do clube.  No ano passado, e após  anos de ausência, o clube regressou ao Estádio Universitário, com todos os escalões a treinar no mesmo espaço, 10 anos mais tarde. 
Este ano,  reforçou-se com dois preparadores físicos que trabalharão em conjunto os atletas de formação e competição, mas para que este trabalho dê frutos é imperativo que consigamos ter um local único onde todos possam  trabalhar a componente física.

É neste seguimento que surge então o projecto de construção de um ginásio, acessível a todos os atletas de rugby.

Contribuições Incríveis = Prémios Incríveis

Sabemos que contribuir para o futuro do CDUP já é prémio suficiente, mas não queríamos deixar de agradecer a vossa ajuda e por isso criámos uma lista de prémios para marcar de forma simbólica cada um dos patamares de contribuições:

Nota: Para além dos prémios pré-definidos, é ainda possível realizar uma doação sem contrapartida ou com um valor à vossa escolha. Para o poder fazer, só tem de escolher a opção "back it" do lado direito em baixo da barra de evolução do nosso objectivo.

  • 25 € - Um Príncipe no Engenheiro
  • 50 € - Um cachecol do CDUP
  • 75 € - Garrafa de vinho patrocinador do CDUP
  • 100€ - Garrafa de vinho premium patrocinador do CDUP
  • 150 € - Garrafa de whisky novo Glen Moray
  • 200 € - Garrafa de whisky velho Glen Moray
  • 250 € - Bola assinada pelos Capitães Seniores do CDUP + Garrafa de whisky velho Glen Moray
  • 300 € - Camisola assinada pela equipa Seniores do CDUP + Garrafa de whisky velho Glen Moray
  • >= 500 € - Placa no ginásio com o nome

Orçamento 

Este é um projecto de toda a comunidade CDUP e por isso queremos o vosso envolvimento e que percebam de que forma é que as vossas contribuições vão ser empregues. Para podermos construir o ginásio e por isso podermos evoluir a nossa preparação física, precisamos dos materiais que apresentamos em baixo:

Estrutura

  • 3 contentores - 22 334,34 €

Material de Ginásio

  • 1 unidade - PROFit BOX Duo (com barras para elevações, 4 apoios para barra,1 apoio de afundos) - 1 845,00 €
  • 6 unidades - Disco Olímpico Bumper Colorido 5 kg - 221,40 €
  • 6 unidades - Disco Olímpico Bumper Colorido 10 kg - 309,96 €
  • 6 unidades - Disco Olímpico Bumper Colorido 15 kg - 442,80 €
  • 6 unidades - Disco Olímpico Bumper Colorido 20 kg - 575,64 €
  • 6 unidades - Disco Olímpico Bumper Colorido 25 kg - 708,48 €
  • 1 unidade - Vertical Plate Tree - 387,45 €
  • 1 unidade - Olympic Bench - 517,83 €
  • 3 unidades - Multi-Purpose Bench - 970,47 €
  • 3 unidades - Barra olímpica cromada com rolamentos - 682,65 €
  • 1 unidade - Suporte para 9 barras olímpicas - 110,70 €
  • 1 unidade - Conjunto Halteres 2,5kg a 30 kg - 1 628,52 €
  • 1 unidade - Suporte Horizontal para Halteres - 585,48 €
  • 2 unidades - Kit de treino bastão com elástico tipo "Rip Trainer" - 147,60 €
  • 2 unidades - Kit Treino em Suspensão tipo “TRX” - 172,20 €
  • 2 unidades - Corda com 40mm de espessura e 10m de comprimento - 196,80 €
  • 6 unidades - Elástico forte - 118,08 €
  • 6 unidades - Elástico Extra Forte - 243,54 €

  • 2 unidades - Gym Ball - 19,68 €

Outras Formas para Ajudar

Nem todas as ajudas precisam obrigatoriamente de passar por uma contribuição monetária. Existem vários meios para ajudarem neste nosso projecto: 

  • Partilhe o crowdfunding com a sua família e amigos para que esta campanha chegue mais longe
  • Tem contactos de fornecedores dos materiais que queremos adquirir com o valor angariado neste crowdfunding? Entre em contato connosco porque estamos interessados em receber mais orçamentos para podermos tomar uma decisão ainda mais informada.
  • Tem uma empresa ou marca que quer patrocinar o nosso ginásio? Não estamos apenas à procura de contribuições a título individual, as contribuições/patrocínios de empresas também são muito bem vindos.

Obrigado a todos,

CDUP Rugby

story:
Amazing news! We reached $100,000 in funding! Every backer will receive an AUDIO FEEDBACK feature on our App for NO EXTRA COST! You'll be able to receive audible feedback for your most recent swing without having to look at your phone.

Practice your perfect tempo with our metronome feature! More good news! If we reach $150,000 in funding, every backer will receive a METRONOME feature on our App for NO EXTRA COST! You'll be able to dial in the tempo of your swing with real time audio guidance.

We don’t teach you to swing like other golfers. CTRL gives you 100% customized training that teaches you to replicate your best swing, every single time. Why? Because no one swings the same.

You can't expect golfers of all different builds to swing the same way and get the same results, but that’s exactly what other golf training aids do. They train everyone on one universal, “ideal” swing, and it doesn’t work.

Instead, CTRL adapts to your unique style and learns exactly what swings work best for you.

 

 

 

 

CTRL is the first of its kind—it’s a golf training tool that learns how you already swing and then gives you tips to improve your swing.

The training algorithm learns from the individual user and their typical swing and measures everything that can be improved, like backswing and downswing times.

The app also gives you feedback based on your ideal club path and club face.

You don’t need to learn just one type of swing, you need to perfect the many swings necessary to succeed in different situations! Whether you need to hit a fade around a tree or hit a draw out from any other obstruction on the golf course, CTRL’s software creates a catalogue of your unique swings.

Our motion sensors and advanced algorithm detect the slightest movements in your swing.

CTRL’s feedback is made to be understood by everyone—first-timers, regular golfers and pros.

We use simple graphics and plain English like “slow down your backswing” to help you pinpoint exactly what needs to be adjusted.

CTRL provides feedback on the 3 most important aspects of your golf swing: tempo, club face and club path.

These details determine where your ball will land by dissecting your tempo, consistency, what direction your ball takes off in, and how the ball curves in the air.

Track your consistency and improvement over time with data and charts that show per session stats, the difference between various sessions and your improvement with different swings and clubs.

CTRL is the easiest, most straightforward golf training tool on the market. We know that if a product takes more than 2 minutes to set up, you won’t use it. That’s why CTRL has just one sleeve and 2 pop-on sensors that work with every club and every swing.

Our signature “weightless” sleeve is made of a special fabric blend that conforms to the wearer’s body, but feels as though nothing is there. It never interferes with your movement and even has a cooling effect.

Our 2 hyper-sensitive motion sensors magnetically snap onto the sleeve and turn on with a simple double tap. Their tough nylon material withstands high temperatures and high G forces, meaning even the hottest days and most powerful swings have no effect on sensor performance.

This app sets a new precedent in the world of golf feedback tools. Our intelligent algorithms learn as you swing and use your feedback to catalogue what’s working best for you along the way. It works for both Android and iOS.

CTRL gives you control over your golf game in as little as 30 swings. It doesn’t matter if you play weekly or it’s your first time hitting the ball, our training algorithm flattens the learning curve so you advance with every swing.

  1. Complete a minimum of 30 good swings
  2. Give the app feedback on how the ball flew (fade, draw, straight, fat, thin, pull, push,)
  3. Save your best swings
  4. Enter the app’s feedback mode
  5. Apply the simple training tips
  6. Be amazed at your progress!

Every year, more than a billion dollars are spent on aids and golf lessons in the US alone. Despite this, golfers still aren’t getting the help they need because: 

CTRL is the solution you’ve been waiting for because it gives you step-by-step instructions that don’t require a coach’s interpretation. Every tip is easy to understand and implement, for even the newest golfer.

There’s no limit to how much practice time you can get in with CTRL because you’re not limited to practicing on the green or at the range. With CTRL, you just slip on your sleeve, swing and watch your play improve.

CTRL let’s you turn any place into a driving range. 

You don’t need to be outside, on a course or even have a ball! CTRL redefines the way we practice swings by eliminating the need to see where the ball goes. 

Once you have your swings locked in the app, you can practice anywhere, anytime, including your backyard, garage, basement or office!

No coach is needed to use CTRL, but integration with a coach can help you master your best swing even faster!

Your coach can change and tweak your swing during the lesson and then you can use the sleeve to lock in the motion they taught you. That way, you can be sure you’re practicing the proper swing when your coach isn’t around.

CTRL is a cost-effective value add if you’re losing customers due to them showing little improvement. When clients don’t practice (or practice incorrectly), they fall back into what's comfortable and show no improvement by their next lesson. Not with CTRL. 

CTRL locks in the swing your students learned and ensures they practice the right motion.

Every avid golfer knows there’s always room for improvement in your swings, especially as you advance to more challenging courses. CTRL’s hyper-sensitive sensors detect the tiny details that bring your swing from beginner to advanced!

Whether you’ve never played golf or you need to “feel your swing” after a long period of not playing, this high-tech tool is your answer.

Hitting a perfect shot is one of the best feelings in the world. It builds confidence and increases enjoyment that stays with you long after the game. But practice only makes perfect when the practice itself is a perfect fit for you. 

That’s why we created CTRL.

With CTRL’s highly-customized training, every golfer can experience the incredible rush of hitting an impossible shot, and know that those major milestones of breaking 90 or 80 aren’t out of reach! They can get more enjoyment out of golfing and all that comes out of it like friendships, business deals, exercise and fresh air.

It’s your game. We’re just here to help you perfect it.

There's nothing worse than showing up to the course and realizing you've left your secret weapon at home. Now you're simply guessing how to practice! Pick up an extra sensor on discount while you can and make sure you can practice your perfect every single time.

Stock up now on extra sleeves so you can always practice your perfect! Whether your main sleeve is in the wash when you want a day of practice, or just ripped on that loose screw on the golf cart, it’s best to assume you’ll want a backup, just in case.

Get an extra charging stand for your home, in the car, or via the USB port on the golf cart. With a full charge time < 1 hr, you'll never have to worry about being able to practice your perfect again. Everyone know losing chargers is a given over time, so saving on a backup now guarantees your CTRL will always be juiced up when you need it!

Let your loved ones know you're thinking of them this year with exclusive first access to the tool that's finally going to help them hit their golf goals! Send your giftee a special Christmas card to put under the tree to let them know their CTRL is on the way. Simply choose the add-on option at checkout and we'll handle the rest.

Our team will send you a survey once the campaign is over where you will be able to choose your size.

 

 

Ian Cash - CEO
Graduated from Texas A&M University’s Mechanical Engineering Program. Ian started this project in school, all the while working closely with the best entrepreneurs Texas A&M has to offer. After college he formed CTRL and began his first journey into the startup world. Ian’s drive to make the perfect training tool is second to none.

Nick Bockenfeld - Head of Business Development & PGA Class A Member 
Graduated from Sam Houston State University’s PGA Golf Management program. Nick is a Class A member of the PGA and a scratch golfer. Nick eats, sleeps and lives golf. When he isn’t working, playing golf, or watching his favorite teams, you can find him gaming.

Cesar Fuentes - Chief Product Officer 
Graduated from Texas A&M University’s Mechanical Engineering Program. Experience as a component engineering CO-OP with Trane- Ingersoll Rand, and as a peer teacher at Texas A&M. Cesar has an eye for detail and a focus on the user. Nothing will stand in his way on his journey to deliver a high-quality customer experience.

Nishant Barma - Chief Data Scientist 
Nishant has a masters in Computer Science from Texas A&M University. He has experience in developing smart watch applications at the Applied Cognitive Ergonomics Lab. Nishant is one of the quickest learners around, and is obsessed with finding unique and innovative ways to improve the learning process.

Ryan Buck - Chief Technology Officer
Former football student athlete and now a Computer Science graduate of Colorado School of Mines. Ryan is a great programmer and can adapt to succeed in any language he needs. His determination and discipline to solve complex problems rivals those of the greats.

Fariba Khoshghalbvash - Data Scientist
Fariba graduated from The University of Texas at Arlington with a masters degree in Computer Science and Engineering. She has experience in computer vision R&D at Atos Syntel Inc. She is always finding new and unique patterns in data that help athletes perform their best. Fariba is driven by a passion for progress, and doesn’t let anything get in the way of pushing technology to and past its limits.

Jacob Duenckel - Business Development Specialist
Jacob has a degree in Business Management from the University of Colorado Colorado Springs and is currently working on completing his MBA. He’s never met someone he doesn’t get along with, and his industry knowledge is best in class, giving the edge in all things golf related.

Alan Reid - Board Member
Former Vice President of Stimulation and Intervention at Forum Energy Technologies with 32 years of experience in the international and domestic marketplace for a Fortune 100 company. An expert in measuring growth through sound financial performance metrics. Enthusiastically seeks new challenges and implements process-based applications to develop the competency of the people he mentors. Formally educated in accountancy, with a background in both finance and operations in the international and domestic marketplace.

Chip Miller - Board Member
Highly successful executive with 32 years of international and multiple business segment experience in a Fortune 100 company. Successfully managed businesses ranging from less than $10 Million, to in excess of $3.5 Billion, through the highs and lows of the market; never failing to remain profitable. Expertise in strategy development and deployment, mergers and acquisitions, capitalization strategies, IP development and defense, company culture, as well as operational experience from field operations through executive leadership. Formally educated and financially astute, with a background in asset intensive and working capital businesses.

Management & Leadership Successes:

  • Vice President Scandinavia - Delivered double-digit profitability during Norway’s historic industry downturn.
  • Vice President Baroid - Delivered a change in vision and culture resulting in a 220-basis point margin improvement in 18 months with 15% CAGR in a commodity market.
  • Vice President Wireline - Delivered a new strategy, organizational design and focus on technology development, resulting in 20% CAGR and market share gains.
  • Global Operations Manager Sperry - Developed market leadership in deep water, unconventional, and HP/HT sectors through dedicated business development efforts.
  • Global Human Asset Manager Sperry - Transformed the HR function, delivering new, consistent global pay policies, innovative processes for the training and development of personnel.
  • Operational member of the Halliburton Corporate Benefits committee
  • Corporate Chairman for the Radiation and Explosives Safety Boards.
  • Board of Director, numerous company joint ventures

Let your loved ones know you're thinking of them this year with exclusive first access to the tool that's finally going to help them hit their golf goals! Send your giftee a special Christmas card to put under the tree to let them know their CTRL is on the way.

Simply choose the add-on option at checkout and the we'll handle the rest.

Complete a minimum of 30 good swings
Give the app feedback on how the ball flew (fade, draw, straight, fat, thin, pull, push,)
Save your best swings
Enter the app’s feedback mode
Apply the simple training tips
Be amazed at your progress!
Every year, more than a billion dollars are spent on aids and golf lessons in the US alone. Despite this, golfers still aren’t getting the help they need because: CTRL is the solution you’ve been waiting for because it gives you step-by-step instructions that don’t require a coach’s interpretation. Every tip is easy to understand and implement, for even the newest golfer.There’s no limit to how much practice time you can get in with CTRL because you’re not limited to practicing on the green or at the range. With CTRL, you just slip on your sleeve, swing and watch your play improve.CTRL let’s you turn any place into a driving range. You don’t need to be outside, on a course or even have a ball! CTRL redefines the way we practice swings by eliminating the need to see where the ball goes. Once you have your swings locked in the app, you can practice anywhere, anytime, including your backyard, garage, basement or office!No coach is needed to use CTRL, but integration with a coach can help you master your best swing even faster!Your coach can change and tweak your swing during the lesson and then you can use the sleeve to lock in the motion they taught you. That way, you can be sure you’re practicing the proper swing when your coach isn’t around.CTRL is a cost-effective value add if you’re losing customers due to them showing little improvement. When clients don’t practice (or practice incorrectly), they fall back into what's comfortable and show no improvement by their next lesson. Not with CTRL. CTRL locks in the swing your students learned and ensures they practice the right motion.Every avid golfer knows there’s always room for improvement in your swings, especially as you advance to more challenging courses. CTRL’s hyper-sensitive sensors detect the tiny details that bring your swing from beginner to advanced!Whether you’ve never played golf or you need to “feel your swing” after a long period of not playing, this high-tech tool is your answer.Hitting a perfect shot is one of the best feelings in the world. It builds confidence and increases enjoyment that stays with you long after the game. But practice only makes perfect when the practice itself is a perfect fit for you. That’s why we created CTRL.With CTRL’s highly-customized training, every golfer can experience the incredible rush of hitting an impossible shot, and know that those major milestones of breaking 90 or 80 aren’t out of reach! They can get more enjoyment out of golfing and all that comes out of it like friendships, business deals, exercise and fresh air.It’s your game. We’re just here to help you perfect it.There's nothing worse than showing up to the course and realizing you've left your secret weapon at home. Now you're simply guessing how to practice! Pick up an extra sensor on discount while you can and make sure you can practice your perfect every single time.Stock up now on extra sleeves so you can always practice your perfect! Whether your main sleeve is in the wash when you want a day of practice, or just ripped on that loose screw on the golf cart, it’s best to assume you’ll want a backup, just in case.Get an extra charging stand for your home, in the car, or via the USB port on the golf cart. With a full charge time < 1 hr, you'll never have to worry about being able to practice your perfect again. Everyone know losing chargers is a given over time, so saving on a backup now guarantees your CTRL will always be juiced up when you need it!Let your loved ones know you're thinking of them this year with exclusive first access to the tool that's finally going to help them hit their golf goals! Send your giftee a special Christmas card to put under the tree to let them know their CTRL is on the way. Simply choose the add-on option at checkout and we'll handle the rest.Our team will send you a survey once the campaign is over where you will be able to choose your size.  Ian Cash - CEOGraduated from Texas A&M University’s Mechanical Engineering Program. Ian started this project in school, all the while working closely with the best entrepreneurs Texas A&M has to offer. After college he formed CTRL and began his first journey into the startup world. Ian’s drive to make the perfect training tool is second to none.Nick Bockenfeld - Head of Business Development & PGA Class A Member Graduated from Sam Houston State University’s PGA Golf Management program. Nick is a Class A member of the PGA and a scratch golfer. Nick eats, sleeps and lives golf. When he isn’t working, playing golf, or watching his favorite teams, you can find him gaming.Cesar Fuentes - Chief Product Officer Graduated from Texas A&M University’s Mechanical Engineering Program. Experience as a component engineering CO-OP with Trane- Ingersoll Rand, and as a peer teacher at Texas A&M. Cesar has an eye for detail and a focus on the user. Nothing will stand in his way on his journey to deliver a high-quality customer experience.Nishant Barma - Chief Data Scientist Nishant has a masters in Computer Science from Texas A&M University. He has experience in developing smart watch applications at the Applied Cognitive Ergonomics Lab. Nishant is one of the quickest learners around, and is obsessed with finding unique and innovative ways to improve the learning process.Ryan Buck - Chief Technology OfficerFormer football student athlete and now a Computer Science graduate of Colorado School of Mines. Ryan is a great programmer and can adapt to succeed in any language he needs. His determination and discipline to solve complex problems rivals those of the greats.Fariba Khoshghalbvash - Data ScientistFariba graduated from The University of Texas at Arlington with a masters degree in Computer Science and Engineering. She has experience in computer vision R&D at Atos Syntel Inc. She is always finding new and unique patterns in data that help athletes perform their best. Fariba is driven by a passion for progress, and doesn’t let anything get in the way of pushing technology to and past its limits.Jacob Duenckel - Business Development SpecialistJacob has a degree in Business Management from the University of Colorado Colorado Springs and is currently working on completing his MBA. He’s never met someone he doesn’t get along with, and his industry knowledge is best in class, giving the edge in all things golf related.Alan Reid - Board MemberFormer Vice President of Stimulation and Intervention at Forum Energy Technologies with 32 years of experience in the international and domestic marketplace for a Fortune 100 company. An expert in measuring growth through sound financial performance metrics. Enthusiastically seeks new challenges and implements process-based applications to develop the competency of the people he mentors. Formally educated in accountancy, with a background in both finance and operations in the international and domestic marketplace.Chip Miller - Board MemberHighly successful executive with 32 years of international and multiple business segment experience in a Fortune 100 company. Successfully managed businesses ranging from less than $10 Million, to in excess of $3.5 Billion, through the highs and lows of the market; never failing to remain profitable. Expertise in strategy development and deployment, mergers and acquisitions, capitalization strategies, IP development and defense, company culture, as well as operational experience from field operations through executive leadership. Formally educated and financially astute, with a background in asset intensive and working capital businesses.Management & Leadership Successes:
Vice President Scandinavia - Delivered double-digit profitability during Norway’s historic industry downturn.
Vice President Baroid - Delivered a change in vision and culture resulting in a 220-basis point margin improvement in 18 months with 15% CAGR in a commodity market.
Vice President Wireline - Delivered a new strategy, organizational design and focus on technology development, resulting in 20% CAGR and market share gains.
Global Operations Manager Sperry - Developed market leadership in deep water, unconventional, and HP/HT sectors through dedicated business development efforts.
Global Human Asset Manager Sperry - Transformed the HR function, delivering new, consistent global pay policies, innovative processes for the training and development of personnel.
Operational member of the Halliburton Corporate Benefits committee
Corporate Chairman for the Radiation and Explosives Safety Boards.
Board of Director, numerous company joint ventures
Let your loved ones know you're thinking of them this year with exclusive first access to the tool that's finally going to help them hit their golf goals! Send your giftee a special Christmas card to put under the tree to let them know their CTRL is on the way.Simply choose the add-on option at checkout and the we'll handle the rest.

story:
Check what TechBrotherPro say about NANO Pro

 

 

NANO Pro provides 3 intensity levels, from warm-up, enhance to high intensity; from beginner to professional. It is compact but includes all the professional capabilities to meet everyone’s needs.

 

With high-powered torque of up to 600mN.m, 40lb force and a high-speed impact of 3500rpm, NANO Pro can precisely stroke into the hard-to-reach 8mm deep muscle group and effectively breaks up the lactic acid in the muscle for quick pain relief and fast recovery time after exercise. Offer you a very comfortable and pleasant experience!

Traditional massage guns are bulky, heavy, make them hard to be grasped with one hand. Also they take up much space and not easy to carry around. It’s time for innovation and reform. NOW, the emergence of Merach NANO Pro perfectly solves all the problems. NANO Pro is small, portable and can be easily operated with one hand. Professional no longer awkward anymore!

 

The unique ergonomic design of NANO Pro provides you the highest quality and most comfortable massage experience. 

 

Equipped with an embedded brushless motor and unique internal structure optimization technology, NANO Pro has a super low noise level of only 40dB at the 3500 rpm maximum speed, which is almost silent.

 

Merach NANO Pro Noise Level Test

 

 

The large battery capacity of 2500mah has a working time of 7-12.5 hours (the higher the speed, the faster the power consumption). With daily use of 15 mins on average, you can use NANO Pro for a month on one single charge. 

 

Supports USB-C power delivery - the fastest and most popular charging technology, NANO Pro can be fully charged in less than 2 hours.

 

Comes with 4 interchangeable massage heads to target all muscle groups and customize your massage, which can help you to relax all muscle tissues and obtain the safest and most comfortable protection. 

 

The ultimate compact body of NANO Pro requires extremely demanding requirements in the manufacturing process. Whether it is the body shell or the main internal components, aluminum alloy precision machining manufacturing technology and integrated molding fuselage are applied. Compared with the traditional engineering plastics and stainless steel materials, aluminum alloy is high strength and lightweight with a much better thermal conductivity and exhibits good corrosion resistance. For maximum comfort and portability, both sides of the NANO Pro’s handles have soft silicone padding to assist with gripping, slip-resistant and anti-knock. 

Suitable for Your Whole Body

 

Take it Anytime Anywhere

 

 

 

Comparison

 

 

The Differences Between NANO and NANO Pro

 

 

 

Merach is a brand specialized in researching, producing and selling household fitness equipment. Products include household elliptical machines, household spinning machines, household treadmills, household rowing machines and other household fitness equipment.

 

MERACH  at HONOR IFA 2020

 

MERACH sponsors the NBA's official games

 

MERACH is Featured in Times Square at May 24, 2019

story:
Hey guys,

we are  „Girls Only“ the first and worldwide full female racing team in motorsports.

Four professionell female drivers and a full female crew of around 15 members. Engineers, mechanics, tyre manager - this is unique in the world of motorsport.

We demonstrate performance in all situations – not only on the track. Doing something with passion is our motivation.  Beeing the first one, being the fastest one and doing the best job – that is our passion.

Two years ago, we launched the Girls-Only project, to make a difference.

We aimed to show the world of motorsports what girls are capable of achieving. 
With success: Today, we have a great track record, a large fan base and many supporters.

Running a Volkswagen Golf GTI TCR in the NLS (formerly VLN Series) we demonstrated the performance of women in the world of racing and inspire girls in Germany and Europe to get out of their comfort zone and exceed their own expectations on team performance and individual success.

Two years ago, we launched the Girls-Only project, to make a difference.

We want more!  And we know: We can do more!

For this reason, it‘s time for the next step.

We want to get international, inspire the girls around the world and draw an unparalleld footprint for girls in the world of motorsports.

We will take a great step forward by competing with highly professional international female drivers all over the world.

Stagnation is Regression! Even if this sounds trite, this little sentence embodies the trigger for our endeavours and the reason for our ambitions to further develop and reach the next level.

We are hungry for success and are longing for more! Resting on the laurels of our past success, is not part of our DNA! We seek for challenges and grow with the seize of the obstacles, that block our way to success. We have the potential. Weh ave the know-how, now it’s time to take the next step. We owe it to our fans and supporters.

We want to offer women a professionally oriented platform in motor sports to develop in a competitive environment and to enable them to achieve top performance in the 2021.

To take the next step and build on our success in an international environment and inspire girls around the globe, we need:

  • Intensive personal and technical training of the entire all-female racing crew
  • Investments in racing equipment and cars
  • Elaborated road trials
  • Build international relations and launch global campaigns
  • Acquisition of new partners and sponsors

After the successful years in a TCR racing car, we plan to acquire an Audi R8 LMS GT4 for the endurance racing series and the 24h hours race at Nürburgring, the world's hardest endurance race!

We will take a great step forward by competing with highly professional international female drivers all over the world. For this endeavour, we are planning to use an impressive car: „Le Mans Prototype, Class LMP3“.

Audi R8 LMS GT4

Le Mans Prototype, Class LMP3

Progress is always bound to effort and costs. Especially these days, we need the financial support of our sponsors, our valuable fan base and great partners to continue delivering an impressive racing experience, inspiring performance and exclusive moments.

Be part of Girls-Only! Support us by choosing perks that suit your needs.

HOT UPDATE: Be a driver. Drive a racing car yourself!

This is an exclusive opportunity for all of you, who support our crowdfunding!
One of you will be able to drive a real racing car !

Among all backers of our crowdfunding campaign, we will draw the winner! 

Have you ever driven a real racing car? Our coaches will give you instructions and you will be able to drive a few rounds by yourself!   

Don't miss this unique opportunity to bfeel the street vibes under your feet.

Support us, choose a perk or donate and you'll automatically take part in the draw!

If you like, what you see, but you can't contribute – there are other ways to get involved:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign
  • Follow our social media channels (see below)
  • Get in touch to partner with us, sponsor us or discuss about your individual B2B plans
  • Or donate via PayPal (see below)

story:
What is MATIV? 

 

MATIV is the world’s first interactive multi-fitness smart mat. Nearly 40,000 sensors on the mat track each independent movement to provide accurate analysis and feedback while you follow the numerous range of exercise videos on the app. Various interactive features such as instructor’s voice feedback, burned calories display and encouragement tools offer you the experience of working out with a personal coach even at home. In short, MATIV helps you keep to a healthy habit of regularly working out whatever the situation or environment. 

 

 

Monitor Your Workout in Real-time

 

Embedded with 40,000 sensors and AI algorithm, MATIV distinguishes between nearly 300 movements and analyzes workout performance in real-time. This key feature of MATIV accurately monitors your training to identify appropriate situations to integrate its support features into your session.Rather than the systematic voice feedback that most standard exercise applications offer, MATIV’s voice response provides support in accordance with your specific performance at the optimum point, just as if a personal trainer is right beside you. For instance, when it detects you panting it could respond with, “You’re almost there, don’t give up!”, to help you push through until the end, or when you reach the top rank during a workout, “Well done! You’ve reached first place!”, could stimulate you to maintain the input.

 

 

On MATIV, amount of calories burned can be checked real-time during a workout, and detailed analysis of your performance against previous workouts or your friends’ performance can also be examined afterwards. The mass data collected is simulated through visual records such as graphs that lets you easily digest the analyzed information, keeping you motivated.

 

 

Check out how MATIV works!

 

 

How Does It Work?

 

When you exercise with MATIV, movements made on top of the mat is recognized through its pressure sensors. Also, linear and rotational motion is detected on the band.

The smart mat tracks the motion of your feet. As shown in the picture below, its 40,000 sensors accurately detect your feet’s position, gap and balance. The smart band tracks the arm’s motion. The 6-axis IMU sensor detects the range of motion including the speed and angle of each movement.

 

 

MATIV’s AI algorithm collects and analyzes the data from the smart mat and band at 20Hz. Through such analysis, MATIV can determine 300 different exercise movements such as jumping jacks, squats, lunges and planks in real-time.

 

 

The number of sets as well as its calorie consumption can also be determined. Such specific data collection and presentation can help you boost your form precision, strength and stamina, helping you reach your goals.

 

The interactive workout mat on its own is sufficient to analyze your exercise data. However, for an even more accurate recognition of your movement, we recommend pairing it with our smart band to measure your arm motion as well as your footwork.

 

 

Convenient & Affordable Connected Fitness

 

Existing interactive home gym systems such as Peloton, Mirror and Tonal are large, heavy and take up a lot of space. Once you set them up, it’s hard to move them elsewhere and their high price range ($1,800-3,000) can be a costly investment for beginners.

 

 

MATIV on the other hand can easily be set up anywhere you like – at home, outdoors or on the road – and stored in minimal space. You can utilize the space under your bed or that awkward corner that doesn’t fit anything else. On top of this, MATIV is sold at 15% of the cost of conventional interactive workout equipment providing amazing value for money. It is cheap, efficient and easy – just as our workouts should be!

 

 

Various on Demand Classes

MATIV offers a range of workout videos that are fun to follow, whatever your level of ability. Various exercises such as HIIT, Bootcamp, cardio and Pilates can be selected and tailored to fit to your personal capacity.

 

 

Each week, new fitness videos will be added to the platform, allowing you with greater options to explore your potential with new exercises such as dance or kickboxing. Your participation will also help MATIV’s community expand and repay you with even more exciting content.

 

 

MATIV’s instructors are waiting to motivate your active energy.

 

 

 

What's in the Box?

 

 

 

How to Use

 

 

 

 

 

 Timeline

story:
Meet the 1/4 lb bracelet that sits at the intersection of fashion and fitness. Versatile, durable, and stylish, these bracelets are as much a lifestyle accessory as they are a workout tool to be worn all day.

 

 

 

We created Cali Weights to be jewelry first and a fitness tool second.

While other fitness-focused “wearables” look like gym equipment from the 80’s, we recognized that the benefits of weighted jewelry will only happen when you actually wear it.

That’s why we designed Cali Weights to look great with any outfit and in any situation!

 

 

Each Cali Weights bracelet weighs 1/4 lb. While this light-weight may seem easy for some, these kinds of micro-movements have a big impact over time.

 

Cali Weights come beautifully packaged in a 100% recyclable case. Each package contains 4 bands, 2 colors. Choose your combo at checkout!

Purposefully designed to help you look and feel your best.

Cali Weights are comfortable, easy to wear, and fashionable. You’ll love wearing your bracelets throughout the day, and your body will too!

 

 

COVID-19 has affected our daily lives and limited us from engaging in our typical activities, such as going to the office or hitting the gym. But that shouldn’t stop us from staying active or feeling fashionable.

 

 

 

team@caliweights.com

 

As both of us quickly found out early in our entrepreneurial careers, finding time to exercise, take care of yourself, and making sure you look great isn't always easy.

We all know it's important to do. We would try our best to take a quick jog in the morning and prioritize our well-being on the weekends, but but fitness and self-care often took a backseat.

With experience in fashion and marketing, we knew there had to be a solution for those who wanted to look great, feel good, and stay active, while also balancing a busy schedule.

Our first fitness company, TELK FITNESS, focuses on heavy weights for bodybuilders. This time, we wanted to create a fashionable product for people interested in sculpting without dedicating too much time inside a gym

 


Our first company, TELK FITNESS, focused on heavy weights for body builders. Indiegogo is an international platform that has been around for over a decade, and has allowed thousands of product creators to bring their inventions to the world. 

We wanted Cali Weights to get as much love and attention as possible with the global community Indiegogo offers.

We have a final prototype and manufacturer lined up, and now all we need is your support to help us get us over the final step. Indiegogo will allow us to get the support and reach we need to reach fitness enthusiests all over the world.

 

Lucky for our backers, our Cali Weights are proven already through a production pilot, this means we've already done a small initial run!

We first 3D printed our CAD models until we got the design just right, and then we built numerous production quality prototypes and tried them around the house and with friends and family to perfect the design.

Now we're ready for you to help us get them out and in use to show the world how much happier your life can be with a set (or 3!) of Cali Weights. 

 

Don't keep Cali Weights all to yourself, share the love with your friends!
story_txt:
Meet the 1/4 lb bracelet that sits at the intersection of fashion and fitness. Versatile, durable, and stylish, these bracelets are as much a lifestyle accessory as they are a workout tool to be worn all day.
 

 

 

We created Cali Weights to be jewelry first and a fitness tool second. 
While other fitness-focused “wearables” look like gym equipment from the 80’s, we recognized that the benefits of weighted jewelry will only happen when you actually wear it.
That’s why we designed Cali Weights to look great with any outfit and in any situation!
 


 
Each Cali Weights bracelet weighs 1/4 lb. While this light-weight may seem easy for some, these kinds of micro-movements have a big impact over time.
 

Cali Weights come beautifully packaged in a 100% recyclable case. Each package contains 4 bands, 2 colors. Choose your combo at checkout!

Purposefully designed to help you look and feel your best. 
Cali Weights are comfortable, easy to wear, and fashionable. You’ll love wearing your bracelets throughout the day, and your body will too!
 

 
COVID-19 has affected our daily lives and limited us from engaging in our typical activities, such as going to the office or hitting the gym. But that shouldn’t stop us from staying active or feeling fashionable.

 

 

 
team@caliweights.com
 

As both of us quickly found out early in our entrepreneurial careers, finding time to exercise, take care of yourself, and making sure you look great isn't always easy.
We all know it's important to do. We would try our best to take a quick jog in the morning and prioritize our well-being on the weekends, but but fitness and self-care often took a backseat.
With experience in fashion and marketing, we knew there had to be a solution for those who wanted to look great, feel good, and stay active, while also balancing a busy schedule.
Our first fitness company, TELK FITNESS, focuses on heavy weights for bodybuilders. This time, we wanted to create a fashionable product for people interested in sculpting without dedicating too much time inside a gym
 

Our first company, TELK FITNESS, focused on heavy weights for body builders. Indiegogo is an international platform that has been around for over a decade, and has allowed thousands of product creators to bring their inventions to the world. We wanted Cali Weights to get as much love and attention as possible with the global community Indiegogo offers.
We have a final prototype and manufacturer lined up, and now all we need is your support to help us get us over the final step. Indiegogo will allow us to get the support and reach we need to reach fitness enthusiests all over the world.

 

Lucky for our backers, our Cali Weights are proven already through a production pilot, this means we've already done a small initial run!
We first 3D printed our CAD models until we got the design just right, and then we built numerous production quality prototypes and tried them around the house and with friends and family to perfect the design.
Now we're ready for you to help us get them out and in use to show the world how much happier your life can be with a set (or 3!) of Cali Weights. 
 


Don't keep Cali Weights all to yourself, share the love with your friends!

story:
RPM Meter Lab Testing Copper Gym = 5600 rpm

Copper:

  • is known to offer protections from bacteria
  • it also may include skin benefits
  • may help increase circulation

You get a Touch of Copper with each Copper Gym Massage head to warm up your muscles prior to your workout to help reduce injury. The copper is positioned directly over the source of the stiffness or pain.

 

Feel the Copper Gym work Instantaneously

 

 

 

COPPER GYM HELPS MUSCLES RECOVER FASTER

The Secret Is Rapid Vibrations That Massage Your Muscles To Help Ease And Soothe Trigger Points, Knots, Stress And Other Discomfort.

 

You won’t want to put it down

 

HELPS LOOSEN, RELEASE, RELAX & EASE SORE, ACHY, TIGHT MUSCLES!  

Just point it where it hurts and watch it go to work

 

Simple and easy to use yourself or hand it off to the ultimate friend for those hard to reach areas.

 

SPECS

Copper Gym Massage Gun is USB and battery operated, whisper quiet, ultra-lightweight and super portable

 

 

Warranty & Disclaimer Notices:

Damage caused by failure to follow the instructions, human factors, force maneuver, etc. is not covered by warranty. Maintenance cost will be charged for product out of warranty.

These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

This is not a weight loss system. Skinology USA Inc™ does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Copper Gym due to many factors that can influence health and weight loss. Individual results may vary.

If you have the following conditions, please consult with your physician before using the unit.

  • Pregnant women or individuals who have undergone surgery and have inflamed or unhealed wounds.
  • Person who currently has an acute disease; has a history of heart problems; or has bone fractures that not healed completely; and other abnormal health conditions.
  • While using this unit, if you start to feel dizzy, lightheaded or uncomfortable, please stop the unit at once and consult your physician.

Do not continue use until you have the permission of your doctor.

In the process of the preparation of this page, we sought to make the content correct and complete. However, there is no guarantee that there are no errors or omissions in the page. The information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this page is for educational purposes only. We reserve the right to change specifications of the products mentioned in this page at any time without prior declaration. No part of this page shall be reproduced, transmitted, transcribed or stored in a searchable system or translated into any other languages without the written authorization of our company. The company is not responsible for the loss caused by non-standard or wrong operation.

THIS UNIT IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.

Copper Gym is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, illness, or medical condition. No individual result should be considered typical or guaranteed.

*Product model, shape, design and color may vary

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

Risks and challenges

Our biggest challenge is to ensure that the quality meets customer expectations. We've worked day and night to make sure the Copper Gym™ feels like the best massage you ever got. We also try to ensure that this device will last for years to come. We are all ready to start manufacturing and together we can help to improve pain for millions. Make Copper Gym™ the last massage gun you buy.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

We hope to source products with the utmost responsibility to the environment to protect our planet.

story:
We're a team of designers, developers and cyclists that spent two years creating a cycling computer that's 100% reliable. Our patented Absolute Positioning technology (APT) makes sure your routes never need re-calculating, your measured results are far more reliable and most importantly: we make sure you see these results in real-time. Because the APT is accurate within a range of 2 meters, it also makes an external speed sensor redundant. 

 

 

 

By fusing GNSS (the catch-all term for GPS, Glonass, Galileo and others) with a combination of sensors inside our cycling computer it’s able to track your position more often and more accurately. The sensors check your location 20 times a second. That’s 20 times faster than relying on GNSS alone. This means that even if you’re racing at high speeds the margin of error remains very small; within 2 meters. And if you lose satellite connection our dead-reckoning algorithm will keep calculating your position using just the sensors. Whether you’re cycling through a tunnel, a forrest or near open water.  

We call this APT: Absolute Positioning Technology.

 

 

Omroep Gelderland (the Netherlands) did a report on the Absolute Cycling One prototype (which is bigger than the final product will be) during the Rush Hour pro race. The developers at Inspiro made sure that we could track the data of 5 racers in real-time. You can view the results of one of the racers on the bottom of the crowdfunding page. 

 

 

Our Absolute Positioning Technology (APT) makes an external speed sensor redundant. The internal sensors fuses GNSS data to measure your speed and location 20 times more often than other cycling computers. Using this data in a smart cycling-specific algorithm the Absolute Cycling One is able to calculate your speed with a very high accuracy. Other cycling computers also measure speed but they only rely on GNSS data, meaning their calculations are only done once a second and therefore are usually very inaccurate. This results in most cyclists connecting external speed sensors to their bike, costing extra money, weighing more and making it less aerodynamic. 

 

 

Compatibility chart

All the current integrations and future updates! 

 

The Absolute Cycling One is fully customisable to fit your needs. Zoom in on your most important statistics and remove the ones you don't want to see. Simply tell the One what kind of training you're going for and it will show you what you need to know when you need to know it the most. 

Watch the video below to see the Absolute Cycling One prototype up close. Harm talks about the current prototype size, switching between the different screen types and what will be in store for you in the future. Remember, the size of the device will end up being smaller than in the video. 

 

Together with sport/medical doctor Guido Vroemen (known for his work for team Roompot Charles) we created a special interface for pro training workouts. We collected data from pro riders, adventure cyclists and weekend warriors to decide which data was most important for a proper training. Together with our user experience developers at Eight Media we created an interface that presents this data in a clear and concise way. Even when you’re racing at high speeds. 

 

During a ride you only have a split second to look down. You want to be able to quickly glance over the most important data. That’s why we choose 3″ full colour display with an 800×480 resolution and a proper anti-glare screen & anti-reflection screen. The high resolution makes it easy to distinguish data on your screen. It also makes the Mapbox maps look amazing and crystal clear. 

The full colour display makes it a lot easier to differentiate between data. With our custom designed training screens you can even tell from a quick glance whether your power, heart rate, or cadence is still on track. If it is, good, the screen will show a big green bar. If it's not you'll end up in the red zone. It's as easy as that. 

You're in control

When you’re racing at full speed with sweaty hands you don’t want want to use a touchscreen. That’s why the Absolute Cycling One doesn’t have a touchscreen. Just three sturdy buttons with a solid click. The left button will select the previous screen, the right button will select the next screen. Use the middle button to zoom in, click it again to zoom back out. Check the video below to see our prototype in action. 

 

Upload your favourite routes and setup your training schedules using your phone. Our User Experience developers made sure that setting up your ride is extremely easy and a matter of seconds. And after the setup process, you can leave your phone at home! Our app is available for both iPhone and Android. 

How it works

Say you're at work, you look outside and you know you want to get One more ride in before sunset when you get home. All you have to do is select your favourite route or workout in the app on your phone and plan it. The Absolute Cycling One doesn't have to be connected just yet. When you get home you put on your cycling gear, grab the One from its wireless charger and click it in the mount on your favourite bike. When you turn it on, your planned routes will get uploaded from your phone to the One. All you have to do is select them and start cycling. The Hot Start GPS (more info below) feature will make sure you don't have to wait until it found a satellite fix. Just enjoy your ride. 

 

Upload your favourite GPX and TCX routes to the Absolute Cycling One using our app. Because of our Absolute Positioning Technology there are no re-calibrations necessary when traversing your route. No more error messages mid-ride. Simply start the app, select or plan your routes and send them to the One. No need to wait for maps to load, just hop on your ride and start cycling! We're currently using Mapbox for our rendered maps. 

Hot start GPS

When you turn off your cycling computer after your ride it will remember your current location. When you turn it back on again, and if the Absolute Cycling One is still in the same location, it won't have to search for a GNSS signal. All you have to do is hop back on your bike and it will instantly start tracking your location. We call this feature Hot Start GPS and it'll make navigating through the start of your routes a lot smoother. 

Sound design

The Absolute Cycling One has a minimal built in sound indicator that you can turn on or off for your turn by turn navigation. It has auto-pause and auto-start functionality in case you're at a traffic light, when you start or stop an interval and of course, when you turn it on or off. 

 

 

 

Next generation processor

The Absolute Cycling One uses a next generation Ultra low-power processor that can easily display full color graphics and custom rendered maps without draining the battery before your ride is finished. This processor matches high speed processors used in high-end smartphones reducing load-time significantly. 

Power optimised software

We invested a lot of time and resources in our custom made software for our cycling computer. Our engineers and developers work hand-in-hand to create a system that gets the most out of our processor and other hardware without draining the battery.

Perfectly matched battery

Because we’re working with custom hardware and software we had the opportunity to select the perfect battery for our cycling computer. We’ve selected a battery size that gives the computer a battery life of 20 hours without making concessions on weight, size and aerodynamics. This removes the need to bring an extra power-bank to long distance rides. 

 

No more broken or missing cables! After your ride you can simply place the Absolute Cycling One on the charging dock (included with all the Indiegogo perks) and it’ll start charging. Because it has a 20 hour battery life it’ll never run out during the ride, which we also felt was an important part of the user experience. Nothing is as frustrating as losing all your data at the end of an amazing ride. Since the One handles everything over Bluetooth, WiFi or ANT+, it doesn’t have any usb-jacks, making it a lot more durable and waterproof. The Absolute Cycling One will be shipped with a wireless charging dock included in the box. 

 

 

The Absolute Cycling One uses Bluetooth and ANT+ to connect your favourite sensors. Simply add the sensors using our app. Adding and controlling the sensors is a matter of seconds using our app. And because of our strong Bluetooth antenna you'll never loose connection with a sensor during your ride. If for some reason it does disconnect our software will instantly try to reconnect, even during harsh conditions. 

 

The designers at Valeur Designers spent a lot of time making sure the Absolute Cycling One is as aerodynamic as possible. Because we have an out-front-mount it minimises air resistance and the thin and sleek design makes sure there's no excessive drag. We made sure the connection between the One and the mounting bracket was as tight as possible, as if it was made from a single piece of aluminium. This reduces air resistance even more. 

 

We made sure the Absolute Cycling One will fit on any handlebar. Every unit will have a mounting bracket included that will fit any handlebar with a 31.8mm diameter. Of course, we don’t want to leave the people using aero and TT handlebars hanging. We’ll also create a small disc that fits inside all the ‘special’ mounts like the K-edge or Close The Gap CC type mounts. This disc will be included with every purchase and pre-order of the Absolute Cycling One. 

 

 

Currently Indiegogo only accepts payment through creditcard and Apple pay. If you'd like to pre-order the Absolute Cycling One using a different payment methode, please send an email to invoice@absolutecycling.com with the perk you would like to choose from and total amount and we'll send you an invoice.

For our Absolute Fans we designed a branded cycling shirt together with Vedette Incognito. The cycling shirt is made from a lightweight (125g/m2) "Cooltech Polyester". This Italian fabric quickly absorbs and disperses transpiration from your body keeping you and your shirt dry during your rides. The extra long Lycra sleeves are made from extra elastic fibre meaning it'll fit around your arms perfectly. The Asteria Lycra material dries quickly and breathes naturally. Below the arms is a 4-way stretch mesh for extra cooling. This fabric is double-woven and extremely light (90 g/m2). The shirt is a slim-fit making it extra aerodynamic. On the back are three open pockets and one extra pocket with a YKK zipper. 

 

All cycling computers use GNSS (the catch-all term for GPS, Glonass, Galileo and others). Once every second (1hz) these cycling computers will try to capture multiple satellite signals and use them to locate its position. The problem here is that the computer needs to be in visible contact with the sky to make it accurate. This means that you may lose connection when cycling through a forest, a tunnel or near open waters. 

 

Current Situation (GNSS)

Every 3 seconds regular cycling computers take an average of your last location and use them to predict where you’re going. This usually results in unrealistic real-time tracking of your current location. You’re probably trying to push yourself to the limits, going as fast as you can, quickly turning these small tracking errors into a difference of multiple meters. This is why most cyclists connect external speed sensors to increase their accuracy. Unfortunately this adds weight, ruins aerodynamics and requires setup and calibration. 

What our technology does differently

By combining GNSS with a combination of sensors inside our cycling computer it’s able to track your position more often and more accurately. The sensors check your location 20 times a second. That’s 20 times faster than relying on GNSS alone. This means that even if you’re racing at high speeds the margin of error remains very small; within 2 meters. And if you lose satellite connection our dead-reckoning algorithm will keep calculating your position using just the sensors. Whether you’re cycling through a tunnel, a forrest or near open water.  

We call this APT: Absolute Positioning Technology.

 

 

For our proof of concept we did a testrun using an extremely accurate RTK measuring tool. It can track your location with an accuracy <1cm and will keep on working for a very long time after losing satellite connection.  You might be wondering: “why don’t you just implement that technology in the Absolute Cycling One?” Excellent question! The technology used for this test is extremely expensive (about €250.000) but more importantly; it would make your ride look something like this:

 

In this graph you see the €250.000 reference compared to the tracking done by a different expensive GPS-only measuring device. It uses Internet to increase its accuracy. The average mean margin of error is about 0.8 meters making it very accurate. You can see where the device lost satellite connection because it simply stopped measuring that part of the route. Another downside is that this technology requires a constant connection with the internet and it’s far too expensive to implement in a cycling computer. 

In this graph you see how the competitors accuracy compares to the reference created by the extremely expensive but accurate RTK measuring device. The competitors technology calculates a route based on measured GPS locations. Since it lost connection with a satellite a couple of times, these measurements are off by about 5 meters. That’s quite a distance, especially when you’re cycling at high speeds! Next up is our own Absolute Positioning Technology:

As you can see in this final graph, our Absolute Positioning Technology is off by about 0.75 meters. That’s less than the GPS technology that requires constant connection to the internet. More notable is the fact that it never skips a part of the route. Even if it loses satellite connection it uses its internal sensors to calculate your speed and location (amongst other data). Since it doesn’t need an internet connection it stays reliable, even in rural or harsh outdoor terrain. Our genius developers at Inspiro are working very hard to increase the accuracy even more before the crowdfunding campaign launches. 

 

During the Rush Hour pro race in Nijmegen (the Netherlands) we mounted the Absolute Cycling One prototype on the handlebars of five racers. Our goal was to measure speed using our Absolute Positioning Technology while also measuring heart rate and power using external sensors. In the visualisations below you'll see the Rush Hour route and the test results of one of our racers. 

 

 

The founder: Harm Giesen

Harm Giesen is an industrial product designer with a passion for cycling. He’s been working on the Absolute Cycling APT technology since 2015. Recently he joined forces with Maarten Tjallingii, Henk Berg, Remko Berg, John Vader and many more talented individuals who all share the same passion for cycling and will help bring the smartest cycling computer to life. 

 

Our designers: Valeur Designers

In the early development stages, Harm (the founder of Absolute Cycling) felt that a cycling computer should not only work perfectly, it should also look and feel amazing. You have to want to add it to your bike. Knowing Harm couldn’t do this alone, he made a bold move and contacted the designers known for their work for Bang & Olufsen: Valeur Designers. One phone call and a plane ticket later he was in their studio in Denmark. It turned out one of their lead-designers -Jens-Christian Møller- is an avid cyclist so he was eager to jump on board. 

 

Our developers: Inspiro

Inspiro specialises in ’embedded system engineering’ and the ‘internet of things’. They create the hardware and software for a broad range of companies, including Toyota. Currently a piece of their technology is installed in a satellite ‘floating’ behind the moon looking for evidence of the Big Bang. Not only are they the perfect partner for Absolute Cycling, they’re also incredibly inspiring to work with. 

 

 

In closing

Thank you so much for your attention and interest! The entire Absolute Cycling team is working incredibly hard to make the smartest cycling computer in the world a reality and we'd love for you to be a part of this amazing ride. Scroll up and select the perk you want. If you still have any questions check the FAQ to see if we've already answered them. If not, feel free to ask them through the Indiegogo support system or contact us on Facebook or Instagram.
