Next generation processor
The Absolute Cycling One uses a next generation Ultra low-power processor that can easily display full color graphics and custom rendered maps without draining the battery before your ride is finished. This processor matches high speed processors used in high-end smartphones reducing load-time significantly. 
Power optimised software
We invested a lot of time and resources in our custom made software for our cycling computer. Our engineers and developers work hand-in-hand to create a system that gets the most out of our processor and other hardware without draining the battery.
Perfectly matched battery
Because we’re working with custom hardware and software we had the opportunity to select the perfect battery for our cycling computer. We’ve selected a battery size that gives the computer a battery life of 20 hours without making concessions on weight, size and aerodynamics. This removes the need to bring an extra power-bank to long distance rides. 
 

No more broken or missing cables! After your ride you can simply place the Absolute Cycling One on the charging dock (included with all the Indiegogo perks) and it’ll start charging. Because it has a 20 hour battery life it’ll never run out during the ride, which we also felt was an important part of the user experience. Nothing is as frustrating as losing all your data at the end of an amazing ride. Since the One handles everything over Bluetooth, WiFi or ANT+, it doesn’t have any usb-jacks, making it a lot more durable and waterproof. The Absolute Cycling One will be shipped with a wireless charging dock included in the box. 
 

 

The Absolute Cycling One uses Bluetooth and ANT+ to connect your favourite sensors. Simply add the sensors using our app. Adding and controlling the sensors is a matter of seconds using our app. And because of our strong Bluetooth antenna you'll never loose connection with a sensor during your ride. If for some reason it does disconnect our software will instantly try to reconnect, even during harsh conditions. 

 

The designers at Valeur Designers spent a lot of time making sure the Absolute Cycling One is as aerodynamic as possible. Because we have an out-front-mount it minimises air resistance and the thin and sleek design makes sure there's no excessive drag. We made sure the connection between the One and the mounting bracket was as tight as possible, as if it was made from a single piece of aluminium. This reduces air resistance even more. 

 

We made sure the Absolute Cycling One will fit on any handlebar. Every unit will have a mounting bracket included that will fit any handlebar with a 31.8mm diameter. Of course, we don’t want to leave the people using aero and TT handlebars hanging. We’ll also create a small disc that fits inside all the ‘special’ mounts like the K-edge or Close The Gap CC type mounts. This disc will be included with every purchase and pre-order of the Absolute Cycling One. 


 

 

Currently Indiegogo only accepts payment through creditcard and Apple pay. If you'd like to pre-order the Absolute Cycling One using a different payment methode, please send an email to invoice@absolutecycling.com with the perk you would like to choose from and total amount and we'll send you an invoice.


For our Absolute Fans we designed a branded cycling shirt together with Vedette Incognito. The cycling shirt is made from a lightweight (125g/m2) "Cooltech Polyester". This Italian fabric quickly absorbs and disperses transpiration from your body keeping you and your shirt dry during your rides. The extra long Lycra sleeves are made from extra elastic fibre meaning it'll fit around your arms perfectly. The Asteria Lycra material dries quickly and breathes naturally. Below the arms is a 4-way stretch mesh for extra cooling. This fabric is double-woven and extremely light (90 g/m2). The shirt is a slim-fit making it extra aerodynamic. On the back are three open pockets and one extra pocket with a YKK zipper. 
 

All cycling computers use GNSS (the catch-all term for GPS, Glonass, Galileo and others). Once every second (1hz) these cycling computers will try to capture multiple satellite signals and use them to locate its position. The problem here is that the computer needs to be in visible contact with the sky to make it accurate. This means that you may lose connection when cycling through a forest, a tunnel or near open waters. 

 
Current Situation (GNSS)
Every 3 seconds regular cycling computers take an average of your last location and use them to predict where you’re going. This usually results in unrealistic real-time tracking of your current location. You’re probably trying to push yourself to the limits, going as fast as you can, quickly turning these small tracking errors into a difference of multiple meters. This is why most cyclists connect external speed sensors to increase their accuracy. Unfortunately this adds weight, ruins aerodynamics and requires setup and calibration. 
What our technology does differently
By combining GNSS with a combination of sensors inside our cycling computer it’s able to track your position more often and more accurately. The sensors check your location 20 times a second. That’s 20 times faster than relying on GNSS alone. This means that even if you’re racing at high speeds the margin of error remains very small; within 2 meters. And if you lose satellite connection our dead-reckoning algorithm will keep calculating your position using just the sensors. Whether you’re cycling through a tunnel, a forrest or near open water.  
We call this APT: Absolute Positioning Technology.
 

 

For our proof of concept we did a testrun using an extremely accurate RTK measuring tool. It can track your location with an accuracy <1cm and will keep on working for a very long time after losing satellite connection.  You might be wondering: “why don’t you just implement that technology in the Absolute Cycling One?” Excellent question! The technology used for this test is extremely expensive (about €250.000) but more importantly; it would make your ride look something like this:

 

In this graph you see the €250.000 reference compared to the tracking done by a different expensive GPS-only measuring device. It uses Internet to increase its accuracy. The average mean margin of error is about 0.8 meters making it very accurate. You can see where the device lost satellite connection because it simply stopped measuring that part of the route. Another downside is that this technology requires a constant connection with the internet and it’s far too expensive to implement in a cycling computer. 

In this graph you see how the competitors accuracy compares to the reference created by the extremely expensive but accurate RTK measuring device. The competitors technology calculates a route based on measured GPS locations. Since it lost connection with a satellite a couple of times, these measurements are off by about 5 meters. That’s quite a distance, especially when you’re cycling at high speeds! Next up is our own Absolute Positioning Technology:

As you can see in this final graph, our Absolute Positioning Technology is off by about 0.75 meters. That’s less than the GPS technology that requires constant connection to the internet. More notable is the fact that it never skips a part of the route. Even if it loses satellite connection it uses its internal sensors to calculate your speed and location (amongst other data). Since it doesn’t need an internet connection it stays reliable, even in rural or harsh outdoor terrain. Our genius developers at Inspiro are working very hard to increase the accuracy even more before the crowdfunding campaign launches. 

 

During the Rush Hour pro race in Nijmegen (the Netherlands) we mounted the Absolute Cycling One prototype on the handlebars of five racers. Our goal was to measure speed using our Absolute Positioning Technology while also measuring heart rate and power using external sensors. In the visualisations below you'll see the Rush Hour route and the test results of one of our racers. 


 


 
The founder: Harm Giesen
Harm Giesen is an industrial product designer with a passion for cycling. He’s been working on the Absolute Cycling APT technology since 2015. Recently he joined forces with Maarten Tjallingii, Henk Berg, Remko Berg, John Vader and many more talented individuals who all share the same passion for cycling and will help bring the smartest cycling computer to life. 

 
Our designers: Valeur Designers
In the early development stages, Harm (the founder of Absolute Cycling) felt that a cycling computer should not only work perfectly, it should also look and feel amazing. You have to want to add it to your bike. Knowing Harm couldn’t do this alone, he made a bold move and contacted the designers known for their work for Bang & Olufsen: Valeur Designers. One phone call and a plane ticket later he was in their studio in Denmark. It turned out one of their lead-designers -Jens-Christian Møller- is an avid cyclist so he was eager to jump on board. 

 
Our developers: Inspiro
Inspiro specialises in ’embedded system engineering’ and the ‘internet of things’. They create the hardware and software for a broad range of companies, including Toyota. Currently a piece of their technology is installed in a satellite ‘floating’ behind the moon looking for evidence of the Big Bang. Not only are they the perfect partner for Absolute Cycling, they’re also incredibly inspiring to work with. 

 


 
In closing
Thank you so much for your attention and interest! The entire Absolute Cycling team is working incredibly hard to make the smartest cycling computer in the world a reality and we'd love for you to be a part of this amazing ride. Scroll up and select the perk you want. If you still have any questions check the FAQ to see if we've already answered them. If not, feel free to ask them through the Indiegogo support system or contact us on Facebook or Instagram.

story:
Your bathroom is a dirty place.

Your toilet is a breeding ground for bacteria, and every time you flush, toilet particles are projected EVERYWHERE.

 

 

Studies have found that with each flush, potentially infectious microbes are launched onto countertops, walls, sinks and more. 

 

 

A study at the University of Manchester found toothbrushes to be home to horrific diseases like staphylococcus and E. coli.

Microbes can even travel through plumbing and pipes. According to these reports, viruses have been known to spread through fecal matter.

 

 

 

Ultraviolet (UV) light is lethal to germs acting like silver bullets to these tiny monsters.

Why? UV light scrambles the DNA deep within microbes like bacteria, killing them almost instantly. It’s quick. It’s easy. It’s clean. And, best of all, this superpower now comes built into your toothbrush.

 

 

After each use, Lumio kills 99.9% of germs using UV light technology.

 

 

A single touch of a button and your brush head will be sparkling clean, thanks to the miracle of science.

 

 

The best part? You don’t even have to think about it. We designed Lumio for people as lazy as we are. Lumio self-cleans automatically once retracted. Speaking of which…

 

 

Lumio is the ultimate travel toothbrush because of its snazzy retractable head. Now it’s easy to keep your brush head clean and protected! Lumio is an electric toothbrush made for those on the move.

 

 

No more ziplock bags. No more bulky toothbrush cases. 

 

 

Travelling is now light and simple.

 

 

No need to fret over toiletry bags or cases. Just toss it in your bag before you head out and you’re good to go.

 

 

Built for modern travellers, with speed and convenience in mind. Stay clean on the go. 

 

 

 

We'll just say it: we love Apple's product design. That's why we created Lumio with a fully anodized aluminum shell - just like the iPhone and Macbook Pro.

 

 

With its clean, minimalist aesthetics, Lumio will feel right at home alongside the necessities of your modern lifestyle.

 

 

Lumio's high-quality aluminum build means it's bash-proof and dent-resistant, but also as light as other leading electronic toothbrushes.

 

 

Lumio is like a handsome viking bodyguard - rugged yet beautiful and ready to follow you anywhere, on any adventure.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

That means Lumio can be safely submerged under water at a depth of 1 meter for 30 minutes and be completely undamaged. We're not sure why you'd do that, but we thought we'd give you the option anyway.

 

 

 

Lumio's battery lasts up to 2 weeks without needing to be recharged, making it perfect for travellers. It also comes charged right out of the box so you can get started living your new, cleaner life right away.

 

 

Additionally, Lumio's charger is small and discrete, so it will take up less space on your countertop compared to other toothbrush chargers.

 

 

 

Lumio cleans using ultra-sonic cleaning technology, meaning you’ll get that icy white smile every time you use it. Each bristle vibrates at an ultrasonic frequency, destroying plaque like a hot knife through butter. 

 

 

Lumio is a modern, first-class electric toothbrush with 3 cleaning modes that automatically turn off after 2 minutes:

  • Clean Mode | A soft and steady vibration for daily cleaning (280 Hertz, with 33,600 vibrations/min)
  • Whitening Mode | The vibration will alternate between fast and slow speed, polishing those pearly whites (250-300 Hertz, with 33,000 vibrations/min)
  • Deep Clean Mode | A fast vibration to use when there’s something stuck in your teeth (300 Hertz, with 36,000 vibrations/min)

 

 

Lumio brush heads are made with industry leading DuPont nylon bristles. We have placed each bristle in a way that optimizes both ultrasonic cleaning and the UV self-clean function - meaning both your smile and your brush will be clean & germ free! 

Whereas other toothbrush companies charge upwards of $20 for a pack of 3 and provide only 1 brush head with the toothbrush - we include 3 brush heads with Lumio.

Not only that, but extra packs of brush heads are available for as low as $2.08 per head.

 

 

In the future, we’ll have the brush heads available on Amazon, but for a higher price…so stock up now!

 

 

 

 

Crowd Pop Marketing is a global crowdfunding agency, working with the world's brightest project

 

Risks and challenges

Rebeo is a product design company with 12 years of experience. We specialize in fancy electric toothbrush designs – you can see some of our novelty toothbrushes in museum gift shops and tourist spots around the world!

 

We have already made the production moulds and have the equipment to mass-produce Lumio. We've also started making a few! We will be airmailing Lumio brushes directly from the factory to reduce shipping time for backers. All in all, we expect smooth sailing!

 

We understand that every project comes with its risks and challenges and are committed to being fully transparent. We are aware of the current COVID-19 pandemic and a potential impact may be lower capacity on freight planes due to fewer planes flying from our factory area. However, we've taken current capacity into account and we still think a late May delivery will be possible.

 

Long-lasting design

Lumio is designed with durability and longevity in mind. Made with high-quality aluminum, Lumio is bash-proof, dent-resistant and ready for a long-term relationship with you.

story:
NECKAIR is an ultra compact, foldable and powerful neck warmer and massager that instantly relieves neck pain and stiffness and effectively improves neck muscle comfort. Neck pain is a prevalent burden affecting 30% to 50% of adults in the general population in any given year. 

 

 

The neck problems can be so insidious that could develop into a life-long chronic if not taken seriously which greatly impacts life quality and work efficiency.  

TENS (Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation) delivers pulses to the neck muscles that travel the same pathway as the pain to the brain to block it out, acting as a great alternative to pain relievers.

 

EMS (Electrical Muscle Stimulation) contracts the neck muscles to build muscle strength for recovery. NECKAIR combines two functions to give a refreshing massage around your neck like your personal masseuse. 

 

The stimulation intensity is adjustable on a scale from 1 to 10, providing the perfect amount of relief to various neck problems, or to different people in your family. 

 

NECKAIR incorporates far infrared warmers in the electrodes to provide heat (42~45°C or 108~113°F) to your neck by promoting blood flow and circulation. It relieves soreness, stiffness, tension and fatigue in your neck or even a headache.

The built-in magnets in NECKAIR increase microcirculatory blood flow, oxygenation & the removal of accumulated pain-producing wastes to alleviate neck spasms, pain and promote wellness. 

NECKAIR is very easy to use. Simply wear it around your neck and make sure the contact between the electrodes and the back of your neck are well made, hit the power-on button and you can feel it working and your neck more comfortable after only a few minutes.

 

Dial up/down the stimulation intensity or turn on/off the heating by pressing the buttons on the remote control. It is programmed to shut down automatically after 15min of serving for an optimal effect.

NECKAIR features flexible material which makes it pack down small for easy storage in your pocket, bag, drawer, glove box and suitcase, so you can give yourself a soothing and relaxing neck massage wherever you are, whether at home, work, school or on a flight or the road. 

 

NECKAIR is made of top-grade medical silicone which has a smooth texture and silky touch, very cozy and safe to wear around your neck, and it is anti-smudge which will remain clean after extensive use.

*Nano self-adhesive conductive fiber itself is not replaceable, so unlike other similar products, the top part of NeckAir’s massaging heads, the massaging sheets, can be easily replaced after about 3 to 6 months’ of use (vary based on usage frequency). There is an extra set of replaceable massaging sheets included in the package, so one NeckAir should be enough to use for at least half to one year. 

 

COLOR OPTION

The product is sleek and curved to accent elegance. The mix of ergonomics and streamlined appearance improves comfort and reduces pressure on the neck.

 

People’s physical health is confronted with more and more challenges and concerns under the growing life pace and work pressure. People's cervical discomfort increases due to the extensive use of mobile devices. COFO is committed to the development, manufacture and marketing of this product aimed to solve this problem for people through technology, innovation and design. COFO neck massager works by combining EMS and TENS to simulate nerve stimulation to conduct the movement of neck muscles. We have innovatively developed a fiber gel conductive membrane, which is installed at the position of the two massage heads of the product to reduce the tingling sensation and to effectively improve comfort during use, and can be easily replaced by users. 

 

Graphene sheets are integrated in the massage heads which emit infrared and heat at a constant temperature of 42°C to boost blood flow and enhance metabolism. The appearance of the product is ergonomically designed to perfectly fit the curvature of the neck. It is extremely compact and light (only 100g) for a minimal wearing load and maximum comfort. The product is composed of three parts connected by flexible medical-grade silicone which can be folded and packed into a gift bag to carry around with great ease. The remote control is attached to the bag to remain safe.  

This campaign is promoted byOTO1TECH.

Featured onBackerPlanet - IDEAL PLANET FOR CROWDFUNDING ENTHUSIASTS

story:
Get a professional-level massage in the comfort of your home. 

The TheraCopper™ Massage Gun brings you deep muscle release like never before thanks to a powerful motor and five different Professional massage heads. The Multiple Massage heads allow you to target your muscles and get you back to work, back on the court and back to enjoying your life!

 

 

 

 

Proprietary Advanced Copper Cold Head

  • for targeted cooling on your aches and pains
  • to help reduce inflammation
  • so you recover faster

 

With 4 Different Power levels, you choose the strength of massage that you like. You have complete control of the Advanced Piston like technology which delivers an impressive (3200) 32 hundred deep impact percussion pulses.  And with a stall force of 55 pounds you get intense massage therapy for unmatched soreness relief.​

 

The TheraCopper™ Massage Gun is compact and cordless. Small enough to fit in your pocket Making it ideal for travel yet while still strong enough to give you unmatched Muscle Recovery and Relief anywhere.  It’s so unique and innovative it’s patented!

 

The TheraCopper™ Massage Gun is great for working all areas of the muscle groups!

  •  Pre-workout warm up to get the muscles warm and ready for action
  • Loosen up tight, tense muscles before and after your workout, release knots, relax trigger points and helps ease stiffness and strains
  • Also including massage heads ideal for working around your spine and for targeted cooling on your aches and pains to help reduce inflammation so you recover faster

 

The TheraCopper™ Massage Gun is like no other Percussion Massage Gun you’ve ever

seen. It’s made with Copper -. More Than several known studies have shown coppers advantages.

The TheraCopper™ Massage Gun is designed for professionals but made for you to use at your own convenience. Going to a professional massage therapist is expensive and takes up valuable time. With the Thera Copper you have your own personal massager at hand whenever you need it.​ ​

 

 

Warranty & Disclaimer Notices:

Damage caused by failure to follow the instructions, human factors, force Force majeure, etc. is not covered by warranty. Maintenance cost will be charged for product out of warranty.

These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

This is not a weight loss system. Gym Trim Inc™ does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the TheraCopper Massage Gun due to many factors that can influence health and weight loss. Individual results may vary.

If you have the following conditions, please consult with your physician before using the unit.

Pregnant women or individuals who have undergone surgery and have inflamed or unhealed wounds.

Person who currently has an acute disease; has a history of heart problems; or has bone fractures that not healed completely; and other abnormal health conditions.

While using this unit, if you start to feel dizzy, lightheaded or uncomfortable, please stop the unit at once and consult your physician.

Do not continue use until you have the permission of your doctor.

THIS UNIT IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.

TheraCopper Massage Gun is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, illness, or medical condition. No individual result should be considered typical or guaranteed. TheraCopper Massage Gun unit consists of copper coating only.  Warm-Up Technology does not include any heating element.

*Product model, shape, design and color may vary

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

More Than several known studies have shown coppers advantages.The TheraCopper™ Massage Gun is designed for professionals but made for you to use at your own convenience. Going to a professional massage therapist is expensive and takes up valuable time. With the Thera Copper you have your own personal massager at hand whenever you need it.​ ​  Warranty & Disclaimer Notices:Damage caused by failure to follow the instructions, human factors, force Force majeure, etc. is not covered by warranty. Maintenance cost will be charged for product out of warranty.These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease.This is not a weight loss system. Gym Trim Inc™ does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the TheraCopper Massage Gun due to many factors that can influence health and weight loss. Individual results may vary.If you have the following conditions, please consult with your physician before using the unit.Pregnant women or individuals who have undergone surgery and have inflamed or unhealed wounds.Person who currently has an acute disease; has a history of heart problems; or has bone fractures that not healed completely; and other abnormal health conditions.While using this unit, if you start to feel dizzy, lightheaded or uncomfortable, please stop the unit at once and consult your physician.Do not continue use until you have the permission of your doctor.THIS UNIT IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.TheraCopper Massage Gun is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, illness, or medical condition. No individual result should be considered typical or guaranteed. TheraCopper Massage Gun unit consists of copper coating only.  Warm-Up Technology does not include any heating element.*Product model, shape, design and color may varyBacker is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story:
STOIC™ uses the power of uneven terrain to:

 

✅ Strengthen, Stretch and Massage your Feet

✅ Let your toes spread naturally

✅ Increase the range of motion in your feet and ankles.

 

The Result:

 

You’ll build stronger, pain-free feet simply by standing on STOIC.

 

 

 

 

The Problem

For millions of years, our ancestors were barefoot. People had wide toes, solid arches, and extremely strong feet that could handle any obstacle nature provided.

Unfortunately for us modern humans, wearing shoes our entire lives has basically been like putting our feet in a cast every day. Wearing shoes alters the structure and function of the foot resulting in a weakened appendage that is almost unrecognizable compared to the robust, anti-fragile feet of our ancestors.

Although standing desks have exploded in popularity and have a ton of health benefits, people are still wearing shoes all day and at worst standing on the smooth, hard floor or at best an unnaturally flat anti-fatigue mat.  This is bad.

 

 

Standing on Stoic is like taking your feet to the gym.

 

 

Barefoot is better.

When barefoot, the 26 bones, 30 joints and more than 100 muscles, tendons and ligaments are free to move. The movement builds strength, mobility, flexibility and range of motion making you a more robust human. Honor your DNA and stand on Stoic.

 

 

Do your feet a favor.

Before shoes, our ancestors were barefoot for 2 million years. Their daily lives were spent walking, running, squatting, kneeling and standing on highly varied, uneven terrain. People had wide toes, solid arches, and extremely strong feet that could handle any obstacle nature provided.

 

 

 

Our feet have it rough. 

Not only do they have to carry us around all day, but they also get shoved unnaturally into shoes, boots, and other modern forms of footwear that may look sweet, but come at a cost.  Massage improves circulation, stimulates muscles, reduces tension, and often eases pain.

 

Benefits:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Use STOIC wherever you work

 

 

 

Rewards

OPTION 1

 

 

OPTION 2

 

 

 

 

Timeline

Shipping

We have partnered with Shopify to handle all of our shipping and fulfillment. We fulfilled our previous campaign using Shopify and we considered it a huge success with packages going to dozens of countries with very few returned packages and minimal shipment errors.  During that campaign, we subsidized over $100,000 in backer shipping charges to help pitch in, and we are going to do help again this campaign. 

We will offer discounted shipping below our quoted shipping rate to all of our backers. We will not make any profit on shipping charges, and will in fact end up eating much of the true cost.

Shipping will be charged after our Indiegogo campaign successfully ends in our post-campaign pledge manager called BackerKit. Using BackerKit, you will be able to confirm your rewards, confirm your address, and finalize your order. We have included shipping estimates in the chart below. Please note that these are estimates and the actual costs of shipping could change based on many circumstances. 

If you purchase multiple Stoic's then you will receive an even bigger discount off of shipping. 

Shipping cost remains the same across reward levels because Shopify's pricing tiers encompass the difference in weight between reward levels.

Hey, we're monkii.

This is our 4th Indiegogo campaign!

We love launching new products here because we get passionate feedback from backers who believe in what we are doing. This helps us manufacture the best product possible.

Back this project now and let's bring Stoic to life! 

 

100% BOOTSTRAPPED | NO INVESTORS

We are regular 30-somethings with responsibilities, have-tos, bills, and experience the “suck” that life can produce daily.

However, this is where the monkii state-of-mind comes into play.

Even though we are stuck inside for most of the day we decided that it doesn't have to suck. By incorporating a curious mindset, the willingness to try new things, and the weirdness to step to our own beat, we discovered that not only can you thrive during your workday, but you can be more prepared and inspired for your next adventure. 

We’re proud to call ourselves monkiis, and hope you will too.

story:
An ultra compact, no-frills design gives you that same pro workout at home that you’re used to getting at the gym.

 

 

 

 

In less than one minute, you can pull Breakaway from your closet and adjust it to your height and resistance for a ride at any time.

 

 

 

Breakaway was built for ease, and connects to all your favorite workout programs like Zwift and TrainerRoad via bluetooth for phones, tablets, and watches.



Upgrade with the added Power Meter to track your power output (watts) and to
connect to cycling’s top training apps like Zwift and Trainerroad.

 

Breakaway is made from the same materials as the bikes professional cyclists use for a whisper-quiet ride.

 

Storable in closets or under beds, this is the perfect exercise bike for those in apartments and condos with limited space. At just 16x23x8in and weighing around 35 lbs when folded, Breakaway is conveniently sized to fit in any studio apartment, office, closet, or workout space. Get a full sized workout, pack it down in seconds and store it next to your sneakers.

 

 

Folds down for easy car or plane travel—forget hotel gyms and bulky gear!

 

 
 

 

 

Power meters measure how much effort a cyclist is putting in during a ride, race, or workout, express it in watts, and then display the results immediately.

The vast majority of training plans and advice you will find online will use power as the foundation for structured workouts. Measuring your power gives you accurate and consistent targets to hit during a ride so you can train effectively. This allows you to improve specific aspects of your fitness and reliably get results.

The power meter will allow you to track your power output (watts), and give you the ability to connect to power-based training apps such as Trainerroad and Zwift. 

 

Ships Worldwide!

 

 

If you’re new to cycling, you don’t know what you’re missing. Cycling has numerous positive effects that make it one of the most convenient and effective workouts around.

Sounds too good to be true, right? It’s not. Cycling helps improve your strength, boost heart health, and even regulate your emotions.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Like what you're seeing? Want to help? Just 30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the community. Click on one of the buttons below and tag your family, friends, or coworkers who needs this! The more people who know about us, the larger our community will become! And the larger the community, the better we'll be able to make the product!

We can't do this without you.

 

         

 

More than $50,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support

story:
Introducing Bolde: the most durable, stylish, and hygienic protein shaker ever. We're shaking up the shaker game one bottle at a time. 

Maximize your training and bring Bolde Bottle to life by Selecting a Perk.

 

 

Ever wonder what’s causing that awful smell in your shaker? It’s bacteria crawling all over the inside of your bottle. That’s why we designed Bolde Bottle to be the world's first shaker using 100% hygienic kitchen grade stainless steel in the lid, mixer, and bottle. Stainless steel prevents the build up of bacteria on its surface, is easy to clean, and will not absorb or retain foul odors.

 

Odor Proof. We tried every material we could think of. Nothing matches the bulletproof protection of stainless steel. 

Tired of the loud mixer ball? Bolde Bottle smoothly and effortlessly blends your drinks without the annoying rattle. Our patent pending removable silent system mixer has no moving parts, is easy to clean, and best of all: no sound.

 

Keep your drinks ice cold in and out of the gym. That sweaty condensation on the outside of your bottle won't be an issue now either. Bolde’s double walled vacuum insulation holds up to 20oz (591 ml) and ensures your drink stays cool and enjoyable for up to 15 hours.

Your workout schedule can vary and getting fuel when you need it is the most important part of a strong recovery. Bolde Bottle comes with an attachable compartment great for protein, supplements, snacks or anything else you need. Holds 2 heaping scoops (160cc) of protein. 

A food grade silicone cap provides you with an extra tight seal to ensure your shaker stays closed and your drink stays in your bottle. The easy open flip cap makes opening with one hand a breeze. 

Bolde Bottle's visual indicator lets you know exactly when your cap hits the closed position. Eliminate any accidental spills caused by half shut bottles. 

Traditional shakers require your hands to touch the spout in order to open the cap. The same hands that touched the gym equipment everyone else is using. Bolde’s Spout Shield Technology ensures no unwanted germs or anything else come in contact with your drinking spout. 

We embrace a buy it once, buy it for life mindset that maximizes quality to reduce waste.

 

Bolde Bottle is constructed with only the highest quality materials, making it the last shaker you'll ever need.

 

Bolde Bottle's lid, mixer, and body are constructed with 18/8 Pro Grade Stainless Steel. Comprised of 18% chromium and 8% nickel, it offers superior durability, corrosion resistance, and sanitary qualities. More importantly, and unlike plastic containers, no chemicals will leach into your drink. These qualities make it the preferred choice for professional kitchens all over the world.

Our snap cap seal is made of 100% food grade silicone. Silicone is made up of carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, and silicon, a durable quartz derivative found in sand.

By utilizing elements trusted by Mother Nature, Bolde is doing its part to shape an environmentally conscious future.

 

Top Tier Hygiene.

Bolde prevents the build up up bacteria, which keeps your shaker odor free. All materials are 100% BPA free, food grade certified, and will never affect the taste of your drink.  In addition to the materials used, features like Spout Shield Technology guard against unwanted germs coming in contact with your mouthpiece. We’re proud to say, Bolde Bottle is the most hygienic shaker ever built.

Over the years we’ve come to think of bottles as utilities with a single purpose. Such as a bottle for water or a shaker for mixing supplements. Bolde Bottle challenges the status quo by redefining what your shaker is capable of. 

We believe superior functionality shouldn't come at the expense of flawless aesthetics. We spent years refining our design and know that Bolde Bottle strikes the perfect balance of performance and style. With a minimalist look and feel, Bolde draws its inspiration from modern design. Every line and contour of the Bolde bottle is carefully crafted. 

Each element of the Bolde Bottle is custom designed.  There are no "out of the box" parts. Ready to pre-order? Select a Perk and upgrade your old protein shaker.

story:
Greetings! I'm HIBIKI, an experienced female rope performer who has traveled around the world.

 About me:

 Over the last 18 years, I have visited more than 10 countries around the world giving bondage shows.

 I also host bondage workshops, I am a model at photoshoots and go to fashion shows.

 I have been interviewed by many magazines, and all of these thrilling experiences motivated me to improve as an entertainer.

 Back in Japan, I've been running two companies of my own for 16 years. I help produce shows for other performers, I run a bar showcasing bondage and burlesque shows in Nagoya, and of course I also perform at various other shows around Japan

 My life was really shining, before Corona came along...

 Now, taking advantage of my qualifications as a yoga instructor and NLP trainer, I recently devised a unique mix of rope and yoga which I'm excited to share with you!

 

 

My goal:

 I want to share with the world my new form of "tied yoga" that combines traditional Japanese rope tying, yoga, and pressure points.

 Corona has spread all over the world, and our lifestyle has changed dramatically.

 Always wearing a stuffy mask, always afraid to go out, and always wary of the risk of infection when interacting with loved ones.

 The development of vaccinations and the birth of new mutant strains are always cat-and-mouse and we don’t know when it will end.

 So, what should we do???

 It is important to improve your autoimmunity and protect yourself.

 This "tied yoga" creates pressure on the knees and soles of the feet with Japanese rope bondage and is most effective in a short time.

 I have started this yoga class in Japan and I want people all over the world to know about this new type of yoga. Please watch my video to learn more about this technique!

 By participating in the campaign, you can help me to create an environment where we can provide workshops to people from various countries.

 Above all, I want people to know more about rope bondage, a hidden traditional technique in Japan that is also beneficial to health.

 

 What We Need & What You Get

 The financial goal is 1,000,000 yen, which is about $10,000 (USD)
 

 How this money will be used:

 Prepare Japanese rope suitable for tied yoga for 50 people 400,000 yen ($4,000)

 Production of video teaching materials 300,000 yen ($3,000)

 Preparing a studio space 300,000 yen ($3,000)

 

 If we don't reach our goal, we will do as much as we can with the money we collect.

 

 Benefits

 $ 10 a personal "THANK YOU!" email

 $ 30 Baku Yoga rope tying video

 $ 100 Baku Yoga Beginner tying video and video lesson for beginners

 $ 300 Baku Yoga Kit: Includes a tying video, lesson video for beginners and 4 dedicated ropes

 $ 1000 group lesson (in Japan) 

 $ 10,000 Private lessons and shows (domestic and international * transportation costs will be charged separately)


 

 Impact

 'Kaatsu' (pressure) training was popular in Japan in the past.

 However, although the effect was outstanding, it was a little tricky, adjusting with special equipment and having to go to a special gym.

 

 With "Baku Yoga", if you have a rope, you don't need any other special equipment.

 Also, since it is fixed with a rope, there is no need to choose a fixed size - it can be fitted to people of any size.

 In addition, you can easily make fine adjustments by changing the position of the acupoints or loosening them a little according to your needs.

 There are more than 100 ways to be tied according to your physical condition on the day and any individual symptoms.

 

 ・ By making knots on the soles of your feet, you can get the effect of reflexology while doing yoga.

 ・ The moment you untie the rope under pressure, blood flow improves at once, and abnormalities in cell, nerve, and hormone balance are improved.

 ・ Metabolism increases and weight loss becomes easier.  (Participating 6 times can reduce the average abdominal circumference by 5 cm)

 ・ Skin age is rejuvenated and skin troubles are improved. Everyone who tried “Baku Yoga” reported that their skin improved and saw less acne after a week.

 ・ By adjusting the autonomic nerves, 90% of people were released from insomnia troubles and their immunity improved.

 

 In an era when you have to fight an invisible virus, learn Baku Yoga and boost your immunity as much as possible.

 I really appreciate your understanding and support.

 I hope that as many people as possible will be interested in this new yoga and that it will be transmitted from Japan around the world!

story:
Breeze is an easy-breathing anti-pollution mask that filters out over 99% of particles from the air you breathe. It is equipped with inherently sanitizing gold and silver galvanic filters, face cooling technology, exhaled air filtration, and "clear sound" valves for phone calls. It’s comfortable, reusable, washable, and long-lasting.

Silver has been used for millennia as a natural sterilizer. But it is the positively charged silver ions (Ag+) that possess the sanitizing effect! Pure 24K gold in Breeze triggers a galvanic reaction and an intensive emission of silver ions.

We thoughtfully designed breathe out valves for Breeze. They are windproof and shaped to direct the sound of your voice directly to your phone in case you need to take a call while wearing a face mask.

Breeze mask is created with "human engineering" in mind. We implemented zero-pressure ear-saving adjustable straps and an ergonomic nose arch. 

Breeze valves are equipped with N95/99 exhalation filters, paired with gold / silver reusable galvanic filters. Breeze gives the same filtration for exhaled and inhaled air while ensuring more comfortable breathing than the valve-less masks.

Travel ban may be lifted soon, but wearing face masks became a new normal. While Breeze is not a medical device, it is  designed to filter air more effectively than most existing masks that are used in everyday life. 

All silver and gold filters in Breeze are washable and made to last. The outside shell is also washable and made from very durable polyester and polyamide  blend. 

 Breeze is compatible with widely available and inexpensive standard N95 filters.

The name “Artech” combines “art” and “technology”. We are a diverse international group of people with the same passion: we'd like our essential things to be effective, nice looking and different. In Artech we’ve joined our skills in physics, chemistry, art, product engineering, industrial design, and mass production for creating exactly such things. We are working on several new products but made Breeze the priority since face masks are becoming as normal as shoes or a backpack in a rapidly changing world. Hence Breeze, the first face-cooling mask with galvanic gold and silver filters and an elegant magnetic eye shield. We are aiming at expending the product line soon, but today our focus is on the Breeze mask. 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.

story:
The focus of the design is to enable anyone, regardless of their physical strength and medical training, to quickly and easily, with no training, help a choking child or person.


Built from the best, most advanced materials, and tested by the strictest quality standards, lifewand is a top-quality device that should be available for use in any kitchen household, kindergarten or any other place where kids are at risk.

*patent not yet pending in the US

 

lifewand was built by a team of biomedical engineers, and it’s FDA registered.

You can see our FDA registration at the official FDA website: https://www.accessdata.fda.gov/scripts/cdrh/cfdocs/cfRL/rl.cfm?rid=225951

lifewand uses a spring-powered piston, to generate a powerful, but a harmless vacuum, that extracts any object that is lodged in the child’s throat.

Designed to be used by anyone, you don't have to be a paramedic to operate.

All you have to do is press lifewand against your child's mouth and nose. lifewand will do the rest.     

2 Simple Steps To Save a life:

  1. Press lifewand against the child’s mouth and nose
  2. lifewand will take care of the rest and remove the obstruction

Watch Our Demo Videos:

 

   

Choking is real and it's killing thousands every year!

This is why you must have a lifewand device

 
  • Length closed: 23.7 cm / 9.3 inch
  • Length extended: 29.7 cm / 11.6 inch
  • Minimum width: 4.39 cm / 1.7 inch
  • Maximum width: 4.9 cm / 1.9 inch
  • Weight: 350 grams / 12.3 ounces

​      

 

A choking event happens when you least expect it. In the panic and confusion, you need to know that your lifewand is nearby and ready to use.

With every lifewand, you receive a quick release stand which you can hang on any wall.

We want to make sure that in the case of choking, you don't have to think about it. Just reach out and grab lifewand.

lifewand was elegantly designed so that you can literally hang it anywhere. The quiet, soft-colored design of the stand and device, makes it unobtrusive so that it can easily fit in a kitchen, children’s room or public spaces like kindergartens and schools.

 

  • Doctor Judith Horowitz - Pediatrics & Adolescent Medic: “A device like lifewand in any household, can help save many lives”

 

  • Alona Assouline Polak: “I’ve been waiting for something like this for a long time. This is by far my biggest fear. Got one for me and one for my kid’s kindergarten.”

 

  • Adi Cohen - Paramedic: “In every case of choking I've handled, if, by the time I got there, they didn’t pull out the lodged object by themselves, it was too late to save the person.”

 

  • Gale Hoover - Daycare center manager: “Every kindergarten needs such a device”.

 

  • Lidor Beck: “As a combat medic, I think this device should be in every home and a public place. Better safe than sorry…”

 

 

 

 

 

 

The lifewand kit includes:

  • The device
  • Quick-release stand
  • Simple user guide

 

 

From medical device engineers to high-tech entrepreneurs, we have assembled an amazing team with the right knowledge, experience, and passion to create this groundbreaking product.

Limor Kuznits 

A veteran Bio-Medical engineer, with an extensive background in clinical studies, Limor has the perfect skill set needed to create a safe, made for home, life-saving medical device.

 

Nimo Rotem

Experienced Engineer with tens of patents under his belt and decades of hardware development, Nimo is the mind behind the space-age design of the lifewand.

 

Dr. Judith Horwitz Glassenberg

Dr. Judith Horwitz Glassenberg brings in her professional medical point of view as an advisor to Extralife.

 

Yaron Leifenberg

With a 25-year track record of creating successful tech-based, international companies, Yaron is one of the founding members of Extralife and the inventor of the lifewand device.

 

 

Hi! Nice to meet you. My name is Limor, and I'm a mother of two beautiful young kids. 

When I first became a mom, I was shocked to learn that choking was a leading cause of death for kids under 14 in the US. Thousands of kids choke to death every year.

I couldn’t sleep at night.

Listen to this:

In a choking event, there is really no time.

After 3 minutes, lasting brain damage becomes likely.

After 5 minutes, death becomes imminent!

Emergency services response time is 7 minutes.

They can almost never be there on time.

I just couldn't live with that!

Being a veteran medical-device engineer myself, I decided to find a solution to this horrible phenomena and try and prevent these needless deaths.

I’ve assembled a team of super talented engineers and medical experts to come up with lifewand!

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make lifewand a reality. Help us spread the word on Facebook, Twitter and anywhere else you can think of!

It is our intention to make lifewand available worldwide. As with all medical devices,

lifewand will be subject to local regulation and requirements.

 

 

We stand behind our product. The lifewand anti-choking device comes with a lifetime warranty. If we can't fix or repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the product, no questions asked.

Indiegogo recently updated their refund policy.  The Indiegogo policy states:

Effective Tuesday, September 1, 2015, contributors may request a refund from Indiegogo, before the end of a fixed or flexible funding campaign they have contributed to. For campaigns that have entered the InDemand program, contributors may request a refund from Indiegogo within 10 days of the contribution.

Contributions are eligible for a refund by Indiegogo, unless:

 (a) the contribution funds have already been transferred to the Campaign Owner,

(b) the Perk associated with the contribution has been fulfilled, or

(c) Indiegogo determines that there has been an abuse of these Terms of Use or refund policy.

To request a refund, please contact the Customer Happiness team, and they will process your request within one business day. Refunds will be issued based on the payment method used to make a contribution and may take three to five business days to appear on your statement.

Please be advised that contributions to Lifewand are not refundable beyond the policy stated above (within 10 days of contribution). After this period, Indiegogo takes out their fees, the remaining funds are transferred to us (without your credit card/payment information), and we begin putting those funds to good use.  By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to funding the development of the lifewand device and not making a direct purchase. We appreciate your support, and we are hard at work developing the Lifewand prototype.

 

Here are the questions we get asked a lot:

Question: Is lifewand dangerous?

Answer: lifewand generates the same vacuum as a manual pump used by paramedics, is FDA registered and is not considered dangerous.

 

Question: Where can I see your FDA registration?

Answer: You can see our FDA registration at the official FDA website: https://www.accessdata.fda.gov/scripts/cdrh/cfdocs/cfRL/rl.cfm?rid=225951.

 

Question: What does FDA Registered mean?

Answer: It means it is approved for sale in the US and that the manufacturing process and all the tests are strictly examined by the FDA.

 

Question: Can lifewand be used on adults as well?

Answer: lifewand can be used on children and adults. Before we ship your lifewand to you, you will be able to choose a small mask (kids 1-6) a medium mask (kids 6-13) or a large mask (14 and up).

 

Question: Can lifewand be used on babies?

Answer: lifewand can be used on children of 1 year old and upwards.

 

Question: Is the mask interchangeable?

 

Answer: Right now the masks are not interchangeable. There are 3 sizes you will be able to choose from before we ship lifewand to you.

 

Question: Is the lifewand is multi-use?

Answer: Yes

 

Question: Are there any studies done for the effectiveness of this product?

Answer: The device creates a vacuum that was tested in clinical trials and was found to be safe and effective. The device is ready and is registered by the FDA. However, in order for us to mass produce under a strict quality system required by the FDA, we initiated a crowdfunding campaign. 

 

Question: Why do I need this product when I can perform a Heimlich maneuver?

Answer: Heimlich maneuver can be a great solution. The problems with it are, that it not only requires training, and correct execution you have to remember when panicked (that can result in real damage if not done right), but also can be less than effective in situations where the choking person is bigger than you or is in a position that doesn't allow the right access.

lifewand was designed to be used by anyone, and in any situation. You don't have to be a paramedic to operate it. You can even use it on yourself! All you have to do is press lifewand against your child's mouth and nose and lifewand will do the rest. A pressure-sensitive mechanism activates lifewand as soon as it’s pressed against a child’s mouth and nose to create a powerful vacuum, that with swift action, pulls out any obstruction that may be lodged in the kid’s throat.

 

Question: Can your company guarantee that I will receive either a lifewand or a full refund?

Answer: We are determined to achieve our goal of bringing lifewand to the world. In the event that this campaign does not achieve its target, we will supplement the required amount from the company’s investors and additional investors in order that every campaign purchaser will receive the devices purchased even if takes more time. We believe that providing such an important solution to this terrible problem is worth the time and money.

 

Question: When will I receive my lifewand?

Answer: Depending on your place in line, the speed of the funding, and subject to the strictest quality assurance and production standards, we hope to get lifewand to you in within a couple of months after this campaign is over.

 

Or email us any at hello@lifewand.com


We are determined to achieve our goal of bringing lifewand to the world. In the event that this campaign does not achieve its target, we'll supplement the required amount from the company’s investors and additional investors in order that every campaign purchaser will receive the devices purchased even if it takes more time. We believe that providing such an important solution to this terrible problem is worth the time and money. We will update you if anything changes.

Keep your loved ones safe, and help us save as many lives as possible!

story:
Strong back and abs for life

Did you know that 95% of all lower back pain can be prevented with correct exercise of the abdominal- and back muscles?
Have you ever thought, that it would be great to stand up from your sofa or office chair and do some exercise for the good of your back and abs, but there is no easy method to do it right there, in couple of minutes?

That's precisely what The SpineGym has been designed to deliver. SpineGym allows you to perform an efficient exercise at home or office, whenever you want.

 SpineGym has an immediate effect on your posture, you will feel it already after your first exercise.  A good posture greatly affects your mood and your ability with everyday tasks. 

  • Enhance your posture, get rid of back pain and get that nice flat belly we all dream of.
  • Stronger abdominal- and back muscles already after two weeks of training. We have the research-backed data to prove it.
  • Exercise is done in normal clothing, no sweating, no difficult positions.
  • Standing exercises with small and safe movements makes SpineGym suitable also for the elderly or those suffering from back pain. 
  • The six-pack bonus: Heavy trainers know the efficiency of standing crunches. In SpineGym you do the same move, but with the waist support, the effect on your six-pack is much greater.


Why is SpineGym training better than other methods? 

Pilates is effective, but it can take years to master. 
Gym training can result in using only the superficial muscles.
Exercise balls and "planking" may reach the core, but they can also be harmful to your back and joints, plus they are done in the wrong position: We use our core muscles in the standing position, not when lying or seated. That's why we should also train them while standing up.



 How does it work?

With the poles behind your shoulders and the belt in front of you, arch your back against the tension of the poles. This is a great boost for your back muscles, similar, but much more efficient than the traditional back raise, done lying face down on the floor.

Adding a rowing motion of your arms, gives a good stretch and pump to the whole upper back, neck,- and shoulder area.

Twist your torso to ignite the rotator muscles.

Place yourself with the poles in front of your shoulders and the belt behind your back. Crunch forward to ignite the deep abs and to tense the six-pack. Adding a bit of twist to the movement activates the oblique abdominals too.

Do 20-30 reps of each movement and that's it! You have thoroughly trained your abs and back + activated the complete posture chain from your calves up to your neck and it didn't take even 5 minutes!

The carbon composite poles create always the right resistance for your moves. No uncomfortable positions, no sweating, no gym gear.


Office job & healthy back, impossible? 

A few minutes training with SpineGym, even with a cup of coffee in your hand is enough to boost your muscles and posture. Experience of use of SpineGym at workplaces shows, that over 70% of the work-absences caused by back problems can be avoided with regular use of SpineGym.


Tech Specs


SpineGym can be assembled and disassembled in less than a minute, without tools. It weighs only 5,1 kg (11,2 lbs).
Comes with a robust carrying bag and an illustrated user's manual.
3 year full warranty.


Research backed results

We have spent the last few years optimizing SpineGym and its training method. It has been thoroughly tested by the Faculty of Sport and Health Sciences of University of Jyväskylä, Finland: a world-famous research center.

Test on sedentary workers (age 35-60 years): 20 person test group of regular, sedentary workers, were given 2 weeks’ training with SpineGym, exercising only for 5 minutes per working day. These were the results based on EMG measurements before and after the 2-week period:

  • an average 80% improvement in back muscle activation
  • an average 141% improvement in abdominal muscle activation
  • significant improvements in posture
  • significant improvements in abdominal muscle strength
  • 90% of users found the training method from efficient to very efficient.
 
Test 2. SpineGym test on users of 70-90 years of age:

Test group performed 4-5 minutes of SpineGym exercises 3 times a week. Test duration 2 months. Average of the final test results:

  • Standing balance: 74% improvement
  • Walking speed: 41% improvement
  • Muscle strength and coordination (chair stand test): 58% improvement

Most of the improvement was achieved already after the first month of exercise.


Field tested reliability

SpineGym has been used and tested by the most demanding professional users we could find, and in the most challenging of environments on a daily basis. SpineGym has now passed all the practical tests we could think of, performing flawlessly in its stunning simplicity! Institutions such as the Finnish Army and Air Force, the Finnish Olympic Team, the National Ballets of Finland and Denmark are some of its happy users, just to give you an idea!

Will SpineGym change my bad posture? What appears as lazy or unbalanced posture is usually a lack of muscle coordination and balance. This core muscle imbalance is the key reason for more than 70% of back problems. 

SpineGym training quickly balances this coordination. It activates the whole posture chain, resulting in an improved posture.

I'm an active trainer with a strong back, can I benefit from SpineGym?SpineGym has proven to be a must-have tool even for top athletes. Think of the National Ballet of Finland ballerinas, probably not the weakest backs and cores? Yet, they start their rehearsals by warming up with SpineGyms. For the training aficionado and top athlete, SpineGym is a great tool to enhance core stability and midriff speed and strength. Runners, cyclists, golfers, dancers, hockey players, wherever good core balance and reaction is needed, SpineGym comes in.


Can an older person use SpineGym? The new version of SpineGym is designed to be safe and easy to use for everyone, young and old equally. In fact it has been tested by people up to over 90 years old with extremely good results. 

SpineGym really is for everyone!

  “You can feel the effect straight away. I would say excellent for older people who are not good with floor exercises. Hits the spot straight away, a good core workout for just a few minutes each day. I like it very much.” 
 Personal Trainer, UK


Excellent for prenatal

 

"Many great innovations are born from the idea of a person simply trying to solve a personal problem. For SpineGym, this all began with Fredrik Serlachius and the prolapsed disc in his back. He was not satisfied with the painful and inefficient exercises that were indicated for his sore back. So Fredrik began to experiment with different techniques, with the idea of finding an efficient physical exercise system that could be performed simply, while standing up. 

Fredrik had a strong hunch and he knew he was onto something especially thanks to his experience as a sports masseur. He was also a successful sportsman who had been 3 times junior national boxing champion in Finland. 

Finally, the idea and core insight of SpineGym became clear to him. However, Fredrik first needed to test a prototype system for his idea. So he asked his wife to secure two angling rods to the sides of his body, using duct tape around his waist and ankles! Before her  bemused gaze, he then performed a series of thrusting movements with his pelvis. Eureka! There it was! He knew he had found his system! SpineGym was born! Thanks to his invention, Fredrik was soon joined in developing a finished product by back specialists and researchers from the Finnish Institute of Occupational Health, respected at a European level. That’s when I jumped on board, too!


Timo and Fredrik examining one of the early prototypes made by Fredrik. Fortunately, the broomstick handles of this early model were discarded somewhere along the way!

I'm an industrial designer and I was invited to join the development team, in light of my 20 years’ experience in designing sports equipment and medical appliances. That’s in fact why the simplicity and efficiency of SpineGym immediately made a very good impression upon me. 

I had experienced a spinal disc problem myself during my university years and have suffered from a weak lower back ever since. I took a SpineGym prototype home with me and started to train with it for a few minutes in the evenings. I was not to become fully aware of SpineGym’s real power until two weeks later when I was working at a trade fair. That day, I was suddenly struck by the realization that I had been on my feet all day long without even noticing the effort. Before I had started with the exercises, I would only last a couple of 2 hours before having to sit down to rest my poorly, aching back! That was all the proof I needed to make me into the proud SpineGym man that I am today!

No sooner did we get SpineGym into production and out on the market that it became a must-have-product for groundbreaking physiotherapists across Northern Europe. You can imagine that not before long, those professionals and researchers started to talk about the need to get a SpineGym out to everyday consumers for their independent, unsupervised use. These health professionals saw the huge potential impact: getting and keeping many people in good health with a system practical and easy to use whether in the home or the workplace.

But before taking our product to a larger audience we had to improve on the first version that had been developed for use under the instruction and supervision of health professionals.

So, back to the drawing board we went! We wanted to keep the praised exercise method untouched and its main features identical. It had to be simple, 100% reliable and absolutely safe. We also set ourselves a new goal: a device that could be assembled and disassembled in less than a minute without using any tools and easy to carry around. After trying a few variants and prototypes, considering a series of different materials and producing an endless stream of design sketches, our new model was finally born.

We even took it one further step by offering two different versions to choose from: a standard model with modern styling and another one with a more classic Scandinavian look. We perfected both versions down to every possible detail, aiming to satisfy even the most demanding of customers."


Patented innovation. 

Further evidence of the uniqueness of the SpineGym device and its training method comes from the world-wide patents that it has been granted.


Why Become a SpineGym Backer?

With your help, we now aim to make SpineGym available to anyone! To cover initial production cost we need a minimum number of orders. With potential users being everyday people like you and me, we can start to talk about production quantities that enable us to keep the price accessible even for this product, far more evolved and robust than its highly acclaimed predecessor. In fact, we trust SpineGym so much that we have given it a full 3-year warranty.
story_txt:
Strong back and abs for life
Did you know that 95% of all lower back pain can be prevented with correct exercise of the abdominal- and back muscles?Have you ever thought, that it would be great to stand up from your sofa or office chair and do some exercise for the good of your back and abs, but there is no easy method to do it right there, in couple of minutes?
That's precisely what The SpineGym has been designed to deliver. SpineGym allows you to perform an efficient exercise at home or office, whenever you want.





 SpineGym has an immediate effect on your posture, you will feel it already after your first exercise.  A good posture greatly affects your mood and your ability with everyday tasks. 





Enhance your posture, get rid of back pain and get that nice flat belly we all dream of.

Stronger abdominal- and back muscles already after two weeks of training. We have the research-backed data to prove it.
Exercise is done in normal clothing, no sweating, no difficult positions.
Standing exercises with small and safe movements makes SpineGym suitable also for the elderly or those suffering from back pain. 
The six-pack bonus: Heavy trainers know the efficiency of standing crunches. In SpineGym you do the same move, but with the waist support, the effect on your six-pack is much greater.












Why is SpineGym training better than other methods? 
Pilates is effective, but it can take years to master. Gym training can result in using only the superficial muscles. Exercise balls and "planking" may reach the core, but they can also be harmful to your back and joints, plus they are done in the wrong position: We use our core muscles in the standing position, not when lying or seated. That's why we should also train them while standing up.






















 How does it work?






With the poles behind your shoulders and the belt in front of you, arch your back against the tension of the poles. This is a great boost for your back muscles, similar, but much more efficient than the traditional back raise, done lying face down on the floor.
Adding a rowing motion of your arms, gives a good stretch and pump to the whole upper back, neck,- and shoulder area.
Twist your torso to ignite the rotator muscles.
Place yourself with the poles in front of your shoulders and the belt behind your back. Crunch forward to ignite the deep abs and to tense the six-pack. Adding a bit of twist to the movement activates the oblique abdominals too.
Do 20-30 reps of each movement and that's it! 
You have thoroughly trained your abs and back + activated the complete posture chain from your calves up to your neck and it didn't take even 5 minutes!
The carbon composite poles create always the right resistance for your moves. No uncomfortable positions, no sweating, no gym gear.

















Office job & healthy back, impossible? 
A few minutes training with SpineGym, even with a cup of coffee in your hand is enough to boost your muscles and posture. Experience of use of SpineGym at workplaces shows, that over 70% of the work-absences caused by back problems can be avoided with regular use of SpineGym.



























Tech Specs











SpineGym can be assembled and disassembled in less than a minute, without tools. It weighs only 5,1 kg (11,2 lbs). Comes with a robust carrying bag and an illustrated user's manual.3 year full warranty.














































Research backed results
We have spent the last few years optimizing SpineGym and its training
method. It has been thoroughly tested by the Faculty of Sport and
Health Sciences of University of Jyväskylä, Finland: a world-famous
research center.





Test on sedentary workers (age 35-60 years): 20 person test group of regular, sedentary workers, were given 2 weeks’ training with SpineGym, exercising only for 5
minutes per working day. These were the results based on EMG
measurements before and after the 2-week period:

an average 80% improvement in back muscle activation

an average 141% improvement in abdominal muscle activation

significant improvements in posture

significant improvements in abdominal muscle strength

90% of users found the training method from efficient to very efficient.







 
Test 2. SpineGym test on users of 70-90 years of age:
Test group performed 4-5 minutes of SpineGym exercises 3 times a week. Test duration 2 months. Average of the final test results:

Standing balance: 74% improvement
Walking speed: 41% improvement
Muscle strength and coordination (chair stand test): 58% improvement

Most of the improvement was achieved already after the first month of exercise.






Field tested reliability





SpineGym has been used and tested by the most demanding professional users we could find, and in the most challenging of environments on a daily basis. SpineGym has now passed all the practical tests we could think of, performing flawlessly in its stunning simplicity! Institutions such as the Finnish Army and Air Force, the Finnish Olympic Team, the National Ballets of Finland and Denmark are some of its happy users, just to give you an idea!






Will SpineGym change my bad posture? What appears as lazy or unbalanced posture is usually a lack of muscle coordination and balance. This core muscle imbalance is the key reason for more than 70% of back problems. 
SpineGym training quickly balances this coordination. It activates the whole posture chain, resulting in an improved posture. 
I'm an active trainer with a strong back, can I benefit from SpineGym?SpineGym has proven to be a must-have tool even for top athletes. Think of the National Ballet of Finland ballerinas, probably not the weakest backs and cores? Yet, they start their rehearsals by warming up with SpineGyms. For the training aficionado and top athlete, SpineGym is a great tool to enhance core stability and midriff speed and strength. Runners, cyclists, golfers, dancers, hockey players, wherever good core balance and reaction is needed, SpineGym comes in.











Can an older person use SpineGym? The new version of SpineGym is designed to be safe and easy to use for everyone, young and old equally. In fact it has been tested by people up to over 90 years old with extremely good results. 
SpineGym really is for everyone!
 
“You can feel the effect straight away. I would say excellent for older people who are not good with floor exercises. Hits the spot straight away, a good core workout for just a few minutes each day. I like it very much.”  Personal Trainer, UK

Excellent for prenatal






Perks
Get Your Project Funded Today!

story:
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE  

We know you’ll love Snore Circle as much as we do. In fact, if for any reason you’re not completely satisfied, just return within 30 days of receiving in the mail and we’ll issue a full refund of your contribution.

 

Snore Circle in the Media

 

Snore Circle Eye Mask at a Glance​

 

Quiet Sleep Anytime, Anywhere

Snore Circle Eye Mask is ultra compact and lightweight, only weighing 32g so you can take it with you wherever you go. No more worrying if you're disturbing other people. Sleep comfortably and quietly. 

 

Smart Recognition Technology

With the advanced bone conduction and sound recognition technologies, Snore Circle Eye Mask can precisely identify snoring sound and then it will begin to work - by giving out vibrations at 36 levels for physical intervention. 

 

Super Comfortable

Snore Circle Eye Mask is made of ecological soft high-density sponge for the best comfort and fit so you can sleep comfortably and snore-free.

 

Easy to Use

When you turn it on, Snore Circle will automatically enter the preset working mode, so it is even easier for everyone, even the elderly, to use. 

 

Snore Circle App

Download the Snore Circle App and use it to see your snoring data and sleep data. Our software will surprise you!

Even before you get your Snore Circle device, you can already download the app and use it to analyze your snoring for free. 

 

Compare with Other Snoring Devices​

 

Technical Specs

 

Compare to Previous Versions of Snore Circle

 

What Our Previous Customers and Backers Say

 

Project Timeline

 

The Snore Circle Technology

 

About 1 billion people around the world are suffering from snoring, but there is not a better solution to it. The rapid development of the hardware technology provides sound support for the making of the Snore Circle device. 

There are many causes for snoring, but it is mainly caused by the narrowing of airway due to the relaxed tissue at the back of the throat, through which the air flows, causing the vocal cord to vibrate, hence the snore happens. At the time of snoring, people are usually in the light sleep state. 

With the advanced bone conduction and sound recognition technologies, Snore Circle can precisely identify snores, and then it will begin to work, that is, to give out vibrations of 36 levels from weak to strong (settings via the app) for physical intervention.

At this stage, the vagus nerve of your brain will function to help tighten your throat muscles and expand the airway to make you breath smoothly, so that you stop snoring or lessen the frequency of snoring without disturbing your sleep. When the snoring stops, you enter into deep sleep, and have a good sleep. Snore Circle is in a dormant state during the absence of snoring and you will feel as if it was not there. 

 

Snore Circle Eye Mask in the Works

 

 

 

Meet the Team

 

VVFLY Electronics Co,. LTD  is focused on people's sleep quality. We assembled an experienced software and hardware development dream team with a goal to create an ultra first class hardware and software smart snore stopping device for people to effectively solve the snoring problems. 

Our purpose is to dare to innovate, pursue perfection, and strive for excellence. The first 3 generations of Snore Circle devices are widely recognized by the market and now we're on our 4th generation Snore Circle with more intelligent operations and a better user experience. 

 

Help Us Spread the Word

 

Risks and challenges

Our company was established in 2014. We spent 2 years to do research and development on our first generation product. In the early time, snoring recognition technology met a lot of problems and challenges. But through constant research and testing, we finally found the way to accurately identify the snoring sound, and a solution to not disturb sleep, while allowing users to stop snoring. It took us a lot of time, money, and a lot of experiments to complete.

Now we have our fourth generation Snore Circle device. After three generations, we already have more than 200,000 customers. We now have a wealth of experience to ensure product quality, and we have perfect quality control system. We can assure you that our products will make you satisfied!
