story:
NOTE: On mobile, tap “READ THE STORY”

 

What's a reflex bag? 

A reflex bag is an adjustable punching bag that helps users (amateurs or champions) train their reflexes. 

 

What's a cobra reflex bag?

Reflex bags have springs positioned near their base (bottom), Cobra reflex bags - ours, have springs positioned near its punching bag (middle)  for a realistic training experience. 

  • You'll dodge punches
  • You'll time punches better
  • You'll counterpunch with precision
  • You'll be untouchable

 

Canelo Alvarez WBA, IBF, WBC Boxing Champion

Your personal sparring partner. 

Train where you want, when you want. 

 

Commando is releasing the hottest and most technologically innovative punching bags to hit the boxing and combat sports worlds in decades! Harness razor sharp punching accuracy, pinpoint precision and amazing speed with this incredible training bag.  Fully adjustable alloy and steel tubular construction are manufactured for all body types.  Enjoy the automotive grade steel spring that delivers lightning fast action and blazing speed training for every warrior from beginner to world champion. Gain the vital edge required to win by honing and perfecting punching speed, accuracy, and timing!  

 

Reflex Bag

 

Commando Cobra Reflex Bag 

 

Watch This

 

 

  • Grade 9” high-tension stainless steel spring
  • Infused inflatable 8” target ball
  • Adjustable body from 5' to 7' high
  • 12” Diameter square base
  • 5.5 Kg or 13 lbs total weight

 

 

 

Save hundreds of dollars training from home

You'll be unstoppable

 

Train from the comfort of your home

 

5-minute assembly

 

Get Fit Your Way

 

Noise-friendly punching bag so you can train whenever you please without disturbing your family, colleagues, or neighbors

 

 

Supervised manufacturing

“I was shocked by the speed and power with which the punching bag reacted back. It almost broke my defense (laughing) But, being serious, this is how an opponent would fight back in the ring or on the street,“ says Simone Coleman, 7 years of boxing experience.

 

Portable and compact design

She won't need your help

 

We wanted to give the underdogs hope, we wanted to make any warrior - no matter what size, a device to train like professionals from home. 

This bag isn't like a conventional 'reflex bag' for a reason: we wanted to design and refine a punching bag for the average joe & jane that would provide realistic training. 

Instead of using the cheapest materials and the most conventional way to build a punching bag, we did things differently. We first explored the reflex bag design - reverse engineered it. This took months to find a design that was stable and could hold-up against powerful punches. 

“After a while, training with a [common] reflex bag becomes predictable and boring,” Shawn Edwards, an amateur boxer.

The Commando team took valuable feedback from seasoned boxers and made it our mission to innovate your training experience. Our ultimate goal was to provide & merge an adequate workout with training that prepares ANYONE for a real situation. 

A special thank you to Top Notch Training in Fort Lauderdale, FL.

 

Who Else Would Like This Bag?

Share

 

 

Product Warranty

Here at Commando, we stand behind all of our products. The Commando Cobra Bag comes with a lifetime warranty. If we can't fix or repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the product, no questions asked.

Return policy

We offer a 100 day no risk return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 100 days of receiving your order, simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked. But don't worry, we know you are going to love it!

Customs & duties information

Commando cannot mark orders as gifts. This is illegal, so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

As many of you know, our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.

For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from USPS, FedEx, DHL, or your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs. Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.

Shipping procedure

Within 24 hours of your order being shipped, you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. We use a shared post shipping method to have your order delivered at an affordable price. Your order will ship out from our shipping facility with a major shipping company, such as USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL, etc.

Your order will be handled by USPS, UPS, FedEx, or DHL up to the entry of your country. Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. U.S Domestic shipments will take 3-7 business days.

Shipping policy

If our shipping carrier attempts a delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge was functional design. We've spent months fine-tuning our design based on great feedback. We've watched videos of user's complaints about our competitor's bags, read thousands of reviews and from this research, produced a great product.

And, with anything great, there's a price: manufacturing and harnessing the manpower to develop even 100 units can be tough. Successfully launching this campaign and being fully funded would fix many hiccups. So, please, help us to get you more cobra bags!

Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs. Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.
Shipping procedure
Within 24 hours of your order being shipped, you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. We use a shared post shipping method to have your order delivered at an affordable price. Your order will ship out from our shipping facility with a major shipping company, such as USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL, etc.
Your order will be handled by USPS, UPS, FedEx, or DHL up to the entry of your country. Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. U.S Domestic shipments will take 3-7 business days.
Shipping policy
If our shipping carrier attempts a delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. 

Risks & Challenges
Our biggest challenge was functional design. We've spent months fine-tuning our design based on great feedback. We've watched videos of user's complaints about our competitor's bags, read thousands of reviews and from this research, produced a great product.
And, with anything great, there's a price: manufacturing and harnessing the manpower to develop even 100 units can be tough. Successfully launching this campaign and being fully funded would fix many hiccups. So, please, help us to get you more cobra bags!

story:
Say goodbye to sit ups and crunches. SpiderCore is the ultimate ergonomic, portable exercise equipment that trains your entire body through the power of your core-- with minimal stress to your neck and back.

SpiderCore’s patented ergonomic-shape fits your palms and knees so you can glide comfortably across surfaces. Although the training is geared towards your core, along the way, you’ll find that your arms, back, and legs will all be pushed to their limits.

By having the sliders in the palms and under your knees, you’re able to unlock a wide variety of exercises that give you the benefits of swimming but on land.

With just 12 minutes a day, you’ll discover stability and strength in your core that you’ve never experienced before.

 

You can use SpiderCore no matter what age or fitness level you’re at. Our creator, Dr. Kenneth Chang, used SpiderCore to rehabilitate himself from 2 back surgeries when he was 50 years old and now is in the best shape of his life by using SpiderCore every day (we’re both shocked and impressed at how shredded he is too!).

 

Improve posture and reduce lower back pain
Poor posture from sitting at the computer all day leads to neck and lower back strain. But a strong, stable core reduces lower back pain and improves your posture, and SpiderCore lets you get in a full-body workout in the comfort of your home. So whether you work from home, livestream all day, or just love binging on Youtube, you can easily get your stretch and sweat on! 

Shred your core like never before
Apart from helping you look shredded in the latest #MotivationMonday photos, working out the core is important to maintaining balance and overall stability. No matter what you’re training for, having a strong core is fundamental to your success.

The unique exercises designed for the SpiderCore sliders make it clear how your muscles are all connected to the abdominal and back muscles.

Instead of spending time doing sets on sets of sit-ups and bicycle crunches, all athletes who add just twelve minutes of SpiderCore into their workout routines will see it pay dividends in hitting goals in other areas of training. If you want to compete with the best (or start looking like Dr. Ken), start with SpiderCore intermediate and advanced training programs. 

 

Add on low-impact exercises to strengthen your back and core

The SpiderCore sliders were originally designed to recover from the negative effects of back surgery. Back injuries/surgeries and pregnancy can cause deterioration of muscles in the back and core. And physical therapy may not be enough depending on the level of damage. SpiderCore exercises are designed to have little to no impact on your neck and spine, and because the exercises are similar to swimming, you’re able to slowly stretch, build muscle, and strengthen your body without causing strain to your spine or joints. A strong core leads to a strong back.


SpiderCore is for everyone interested in seeing a dramatic improvement in their everyday quality of life. Whether it be preventing back pain from sitting for hours at a time or taking your game to the next level, SpiderCore brings functionality and strength to your life in a new way.

 

 

SpiderCore sliders work as hard as you do. Because of how many repetitions you’ll be doing on the SpiderCore sliders, the goal was to create a product that was lightweight, durable, and long-lasting.

So, each slider is equipped with a strong, durable plastic that won’t break on you—no matter what you put it through. On top of the plastic, we’ve opted for a durable foam that is basically indestructible (just like your core will be). Dr. Ken’s still using his set from 12 years ago!

Our sliders are one-size-fits-all and have two versions: one version for carpet and one for non-carpeted surfaces.

Things to Note:

The final shipped product will be a sleek, dark gray, not the prototype blue.

You can choose from the regular slider, which is for carpeted surfaces, or the non-carpeted version which features a fabric cover so you can use it on hardwood, vinyl, tile, etc.

According to a study by Georgetown University’s Health Policy Institute, nearly 65 million Americans have reported experiencing recent back pain, and back pain is the sixth most costly condition in America. A common remedy for back pain is doing some kind of core exercise, but a quick Google search of all the core exercises is overwhelming—which core exercises are the most effective? 

Enter SpiderCore.

Working out your core is simple and effective with our included training program. SpiderCore allows you to get a full-body workout with exercises designed to target the core in every movement. Gone are the days when you had to deal with the monotony of hundreds of crunches for barely visible results - spend just twelve minutes a day with SpiderCore and let the results speak for themselves!

 

Comfortable, ergonomic sliders

SpiderCore was developed by Dr. Ken Chang after a tennis accident left him in need of two back surgeries. The designs for the sliders are simple but effective - the palm sliders have grooves for your fingers to rest on to ensure that you are staying in control while doing the exercises. The knee sliders are made to ergonomically retain your knees while they move around during your workout. 

Natural, low-impact exercises

The exercises are inspired by the natural movements of strong animals like cheetahs and dolphins. When they move, they flex their spine and their core in a fluid and dynamic motion. This allows them to run with strength and agility and is extremely similar to how swimmers move in the water.

There are no machines, weights, bands, or strain to your back. SpiderCore is designed so that you have full control over the intensity of the workouts. And you can personalize the workouts to match your level of fitness and your exercise goals. 

All the exercises are multifunctional and cross functional. That means you’re working out multiple muscle groups with each exercise and you perform cardio, stretching, and strength training at once.

It’s total body engagement that makes you functionally fit and more agile because you’re using your core to stretch your back naturally, safely, and comfortably.

You'll get access to over 40+ SpiderCore training videos for free on Youtube that will guide you through beginner, intermediate, and advanced workouts.

 

We recognize that not everyone can just jump on an ab wheel and start training. (In fact, some of us have tried to do exactly this and failed!) This is why SpiderCore includes videos to guide you on your journey, with 36 exercise videos demonstrating proper posture and six 12-minute workouts you can follow along!

1st Level - Beginner

  • These movements are focused on mobility and stretch out your back. 

2nd Level - Intermediate

  • Intermediate involves pushups so it’s coordination, mobility, and strength training

3rd Level - Advanced

  • Once you’ve made it past intermediate, you can now consider your core advanced! 

We also plan to have different programs for you to advance through. These include:

  • Early 2022 - SpiderCore’s 28-Day Challenge
  • Mid 2022- Flexibility, Strength Training, Rehabilitation and other focused workouts

And as we grow, we’ll continue to add and update our exercises on YouTube.

You’ll also get complete access to our online training programs as well as our support team if you have any questions. Eventually, we also want to create a Facebook group for everyone to be able to support one another and show off their progress!

The funds from our Indiegogo campaign will go towards product development, manufacturing, marketing, and shipping. The prototypes are ready to go, and we’re finalizing the packaging, add-ons, and workout videos.

We are hopeful that we can get your SpiderCore sliders to you by the end of 2021, making them the perfect way to work off the holiday meals and start a New Year’s resolution you’ll finally be able to keep. 

The final SpiderCore product will be a sleek, dark gray and not the blue prototype color. We’re hoping to have more colors to choose from by 2022!

DISLAIMER

Please consult with a physician or other healthcare professional before using this product. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any disease or condition.

Contact Information

For any questions, licensing, or media inquiries, please email hello@spidercore.com.

story:
A good night’s sleep is more important now than ever. Studies show that getting enough sleep is key to building a strong immune system that can fight off infection. Yet new research shows that night after night, over 1/3 of American adults are not getting the sleep they need. Keeping a healthy sleep schedule can be tricky, especially in 2020.

Amazfit ZenBuds are lightweight, noise-masking earbuds designed to help you get to sleep easily, the natural way. No pills, hours of meditating, or clunky white noise machines. Just comfortable, lightweight earbuds that lull your ears to sleep. And then keep you that way all night long. Using natural sounds engineered to help trigger the sleep cycle, Amazfit ZenBuds help mask outside noises that can keep you awake at night. With their skin-soft eartips, they help block outside noises like snoring dogs from disturbing you. Their snug fit helps prevent from falling out while you’re sleeping. Even if you toss and turn.

 

Weighing 1.78g* each side, Amazfit ZenBuds provide such a feathery lightweight and are so comfy that you’d sleep feeling that they barely exist.

*Each earpiece only weighs 1.78g when fitted with the medium bud.

The eartips contribute to an elastic and stretchable texture. You won’t feel pressed or stuffed in your ears over the night. Their softness and flexibility make their replacement and cleaning so much more convenient. Simply stretch upon removal of the tips.

The fin of the eartips securely embraces your ear ridge. Feel free to roll over, switch sides, or hog all the blankets for yourself. Don’t worry, they will still be there in the morning.

Most people don’t realize this. But the average person has one ear slightly larger than the other. Amazfit ZenBuds come with four sizes of skin-soft silicone ear tips, designed to fit snugly in your ear and stay in place all night. So you can mix and match based on your ear size. The silicone eartips are thermal and sweat-proof, without causing pressure or discomfort. Make sure the right fit for your ears, where there's no probing effect in your ear canal and no worries about sticking in too deeply or falling out.

They say silence is golden. But when a room is too quiet, everything can keep you awake at night. Old school earplugs try to fix this by plugging up your ear and blocking outside noise. But those rubbery eartips cannot block out so much, and always fall out when you stir. Research shows that when it comes to sleep, masking those sounds with natural, soothing white noise is far better than simply trying to block it out.

Amazfit ZenBuds do both.

The "umbrella" structure of the earbuds fits perfectly across your ear ridge, effectively lowering the noise level from external surroundings as well as soothing you to a better sleep state. Meanwhile, with the snug, comfortable ear tips, Amazfit ZenBuds are great at keeping out noise from the party next door or your bedmate rustling the sheets.

But that’s only half the battle. The ZenBuds’ real magic comes from its massive library of sleep-inducing sounds, engineered to mask the unwanted noises that can keep you awake. So you can drift easily off to sleep. And stay there all night. They use a wide library of natural, sleep-inducing sounds to create soothing white noise that helps cancel out distracting sounds that can interrupt sleep. From bubbling brooks to serene forests.

From chirping birds to ocean waves, these earbuds use curated sounds that trigger the sleep cycle and make sure you sleep easy, all night long. And receivers from trusted audio brand Knowles make sure you’re getting the best quality acoustics as you drift off to dreamland.

Amazfit ZenBuds also come with a breathing exercise designed to help you relax and calm your mind after a busy day. So you can fall asleep easier, and sleep deeper when it’s time to rest.

 

A fully charged pair of Amazfit ZenBuds can last for 12 hours* when using PLAYBACK DURATION mode. That includes using sleep and heart-rate monitoring all night long. So you get the best of both worlds — three hours of sounds engineered to help you sleep. And sleep insights that give you easy-to-use data on your sleep patterns. Or if you prefer to have them serenade you all night, switch to UNLIMITED DURATION for a full 8 hours of sleep-inducing sounds. That’s the recommended target for a good night’s sleep. So you can wake up well-rested and in the zone. Ready to be at your best. Looking for even longer sleep with Amazfit ZenBuds? The charging case can provide the earbuds with extra continuous playing time of about 56 hours*.

*The above data is estimated battery time. Actual results may vary with each use.

 

Set the Amazfit ZenBuds up in UNLIMITED DURATION so they can serenade you all night. Or switch to SMART PLAYBACK and they’ll pause playing automatically once they detect that you’ve fallen asleep.

  1. UNLIMITED DURATION — Choose your sound, and let the Amazfit ZenBuds go all night, serenading you with sleep-inducing sounds engineered to help you sleep through the whole night.

  2. PLAYBACK DURATION — You choose how long they play for - whether it’s 30 minutes, one hour, or four. Set your preference, and let the Amazfit ZenBuds carry you into a night of deep rest timed just the way you like it.

  3. SMART PLAYBACK* — Once they detect that you’ve reached a deep level of sleep, they will automatically pause playing. This helps continue your sleep cycle in the most natural way possible.

 

Every night when you sleep, your body creates a flurry of data about your health. When collected by the Amazfit ZenBuds, that data can be used to create a clear picture of your sleep patterns. The sleep earbuds monitor your heart rate, sleep positions, and the quality of your sleep. You’ll wake up each morning to insights that can help you create better habits. So you can get more out of your nights. And more out of your days.

Everyone’s morning is different. And so is everyone’s alarm. Your custom Amazfit ZenBuds alarm goes off inside your ear, so it won’t disturb anyone else around you. And sound blocking eartips mean you won’t wake up to someone else’s alarm before you’re ready. Whether you’re sharing your bed, or catching some extra shut eye on the train to work. Wake up when you want to.

Designed to block out distracting noises, Amazfit ZenBuds are your ideal partner in productivity. The earbuds help you use your time better and with the Pomodoro Timer (PT), allowing you to stay super focused for 25 minute stretches. Take a short break, and they will help you get right back in the zone by blocking out sound and playing the right sounds to keep you on track. Work smarter, not longer.

The earbuds will make sure you won’t miss an incoming call in the midst of your “zen-zone”. They know when to interrupt, like your personal assistant.

 

 

 

 

  • Huami is a healthcare services technology company and world-leading maker of smart wearables.
  • Huami's mission is to "connect health with technology." Through an integrated strategy, Huami deploys chips, smart wearable devices, and health cloud services to construct a global health ecosystem. Powered by artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms and big data analytics, Huami provides 24/7 health monitoring services through smart wearable technology to help users lead healthier lives.
  • Huami has built a complete health and fitness ecosystem, including smart wristbands, smartwatches, sports headphones, treadmills, weight and body fat scales, shoes, clothing, and other accessories.

Huami is on its way to build the global healthcare ecosystem by continually extending its scope of expertise and trying new things. Amazfit, Huami’s self-brand, is launching the new Amazfit ZenBuds to signify its first footprint in the field of “Health & Lifestyle” as it combines health monitoring with enhancing the users’ life experience. Our goal is to help with the users’ night routine by using noise-masking techniques. And just like our previously launched project, Amazfit X Smartwatch where we had an open-minded discussion with the Indiegogo community, we want to establish a continual relationship with the connections we’ve built so far. We believe that with your feedback, we will somehow become one step closer in assisting you to achieve enhanced nights of sleep. 

We are ready for production, as verified by Indiegogo. With over 100 million units shipped to its happy owners globally, we stand behind our products and supply chain with confidence and ensure 100% guaranteed delivery. The shipment will start in September.

 

Amazfit ZenBuds products have entered the mass production stage. As a global leader of health-cloud services innovators, we honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with the customers and we promise guaranteed delivery as an official team. You will always have our back!

 

 

 

 

* M-size silicone plugs are attached to the earbuds when shipped.

* The automatic pause function needs to be turned on in the APP.

* Only the official sounds provided in the "Music Library" in the APP can be downloaded in the earbuds.

* The volume of the earbuds needs to be controlled from the APP.

* Heart rate monitoring only while sleeping.

* The product images and screen contents on the pages above are for the purpose of illustration only. The actual product (including but not limited to appearance, color, size) and screen display contents (including but not limited to background, UI, and pictures) may be slightly different, so the actual product shall prevail.

* The data on the pages above are theoretical values. All data, unless otherwise specified, is provided by internal laboratories or suppliers, and is obtained under specific test conditions. Actual use may vary slightly due to individual product differences, software versions, use conditions, and environmental factors, so actual usage data shall prevail.

* To provide the most accurate product information, specifications, and product characteristics, our company may adjust and revise the text descriptions, images, and other content on the pages above at any time to match actual product performance, specifications, indexes, parts and other information. Because of real-time changes in product batches and production and supply factors, we will not specifically notify you in the event of the modifications and necessary adjustments described above.

Whether you’re sharing your bed, or catching some extra shut eye on the train to work. Wake up when you want to.Designed to block out distracting noises, Amazfit ZenBuds are your ideal partner in productivity. The earbuds help you use your time better and with the Pomodoro Timer (PT), allowing you to stay super focused for 25 minute stretches. Take a short break, and they will help you get right back in the zone by blocking out sound and playing the right sounds to keep you on track. Work smarter, not longer.The earbuds will make sure you won’t miss an incoming call in the midst of your “zen-zone”. They know when to interrupt, like your personal assistant. 
 






 


 
Huami is a healthcare services technology company and world-leading maker of smart wearables.
Huami's mission is to "connect health with technology." Through an integrated strategy, Huami deploys chips, smart wearable devices, and health cloud services to construct a global health ecosystem. Powered by artificial intelligence (AI) algorithms and big data analytics, Huami provides 24/7 health monitoring services through smart wearable technology to help users lead healthier lives.
Huami has built a complete health and fitness ecosystem, including smart wristbands, smartwatches, sports headphones, treadmills, weight and body fat scales, shoes, clothing, and other accessories.
Huami is on its way to build the global healthcare ecosystem by continually extending its scope of expertise and trying new things. Amazfit, Huami’s self-brand, is launching the new Amazfit ZenBuds to signify its first footprint in the field of “Health & Lifestyle” as it combines health monitoring with enhancing the users’ life experience. Our goal is to help with the users’ night routine by using noise-masking techniques. And just like our previously launched project, Amazfit X Smartwatch where we had an open-minded discussion with the Indiegogo community, we want to establish a continual relationship with the connections we’ve built so far. We believe that with your feedback, we will somehow become one step closer in assisting you to achieve enhanced nights of sleep. We are ready for production, as verified by Indiegogo. With over 100 million units shipped to its happy owners globally, we stand behind our products and supply chain with confidence and ensure 100% guaranteed delivery. The shipment will start in September. Amazfit ZenBuds products have entered the mass production stage. As a global leader of health-cloud services innovators, we honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with the customers and we promise guaranteed delivery as an official team. You will always have our back!    * M-size silicone plugs are attached to the earbuds when shipped.* The automatic pause function needs to be turned on in the APP.* Only the official sounds provided in the "Music Library" in the APP can be downloaded in the earbuds.* The volume of the earbuds needs to be controlled from the APP.* Heart rate monitoring only while sleeping.* The product images and screen contents on the pages above are for the purpose of illustration only. The actual product (including but not limited to appearance, color, size) and screen display contents (including but not limited to background, UI, and pictures) may be slightly different, so the actual product shall prevail.* The data on the pages above are theoretical values. All data, unless otherwise specified, is provided by internal laboratories or suppliers, and is obtained under specific test conditions. Actual use may vary slightly due to individual product differences, software versions, use conditions, and environmental factors, so actual usage data shall prevail.* To provide the most accurate product information, specifications, and product characteristics, our company may adjust and revise the text descriptions, images, and other content on the pages above at any time to match actual product performance, specifications, indexes, parts and other information. Because of real-time changes in product batches and production and supply factors, we will not specifically notify you in the event of the modifications and necessary adjustments described above.

story:
What's happening now the campaign ends?
Thanks to our backers' support, the campaign will be listed on the INDIEGOGO “in demand” section. You can continue to support Airdog by placing orders with substantial discounts!

Airdog’s patented TPA® technology is the latest evolution in Air purifiers. It generates a high voltage electric field to electrify particulates and destroy harmful particles when they pass through that electrified ionic field. 

This Space-age Technology allows X3 to actively collect particles 6 times smaller than other air purifiers!

Airdog ensures that clean air is the norm rather than a luxury. Its 3 layers of Washable Filters value equates to zero dollars in running cost while eliminating up to 99.9% of Harmful Particles, 99.9% of PM 2.5, and 99% of Chemical Toxins in the air it cleans. 

Review Video by Air Purifier First, click to watch the full video
 

 

 
 
 

Purifiers, at both ends of the price spectrum, all have high maintenance fees, generally costing over $500 on average every year. Whereas Airdog comes in at an impressive $0 Running Cost while being even more effective!

HEPA Filters dispose of the tiniest particles down to PM 0.3, whereas Airdog’s TPA®️ next-generation filter is 600% greater in the particles that it can filter.

 

Airdog’s patented TPA® technology is the latest evolution in Air purifiers. It generates a high voltage electric field so that when harmful particles pass through that electrified ionic field, they are instantly destroyed. Any remnants are then absorbed by the collection plate.

The latest futuristic Graphene Material, which is applied in space technology, is at the heart of X3 and right at the leading edge of filtration technology.

The Graphene Material enables the Collecting Plate to be superconductive, making X3 the most effective filtration system on the market while being 200% lighter! This is a first for air purifiers!

TPA® creates an Ionic Field that zaps all harmful particles down to 0.0146µm (6 times smaller than other air purifiers). These zapped wastes then stick to the collecting plates like magnets.

X3 not only captures, but actually eliminates harmful particles, and with Airdog X3 we’ve achieved a filtration rate of 99.99% harmful particles, 99.99% PM 2.5, 99.0% formaldehyde & VOCs, with the remaining particles being securely contained. 


The ionic field acts as a powerful magnet, attracting harmful particles, common allergens such as pollen, pet dander, and dust, and filtering them down to 0.0146 microns (6x smaller than other air purifiers’ filters).

The most vital and expensive components of other air purifiers are the air filters and in order to remain effective, you need to replace these regularly which, in traditional purifiers can get very costly.  Airdog X3 is equipped with the World's First Washable Filter that is easy to wash and fast to dry. 

It is even dishwasher safe!

The space-age properties of the Graphene material makes X3 completely durable that perform consistently time after time.   

The X3 has little downtime even after washing the filters, the Graphene infused filter is Fast-drying that will dry within 20 minutes!

Data from professional, independent testing institutions

 

TPA®️ Filters purify a much wider range than the traditional HEPA filter - from particles down to 0.0146 microns to PM 2.5 (cigarette, exhaust, dust, pet danders), and bigger particles (pollen, pet hair). 

  

AirdogX3's TPA®️ filter works perfectly, even after thousands of hours of use as its CCM is rated as highly as P4. CCM is the measurement of effectiveness, that describes how much dirt a filter is able to collect.

Over the lifetime of the unit, X3 will save over $500/year of the replacement cost of filters. Meanwhile, the X3 filter merely needs to be washed for it to continue operating effectively for thousands of hours at a maintained 99% effectiveness. 

 

Also powerful are the unit’s revolutionary turbine rotation fans that suck the dirt and blow out clean air in huge volume, even though the unit itself is far quieter and smaller. Once again Airdog X3 shows off its enhanced performance!

Airdog’s advanced “3D Circulated Purification” fans are designed to distribute clean air to every corner of the room powerfully and consistently.

The super-compact, strong design of the fans makes the unit suitable for a space of 100-200 ft². In fact, it can even clean a 300 ft² living room in just 20 minutes!

Although Airdog X3 has a super-strong airflow system, it is super quiet! Apart from feeling the benefits of fresher air, you won’t even know it’s there.

Check out the Sleep Mode to improve the quality of your sleep. It works at CADR 100 with almost no noise (UNDER 30 dB)!

Airdog X3 quietly takes care of you and your home, cleaning and purifying with its intelligent and intuitive space-age technology, all at the push of a button.  Airdog X3's ambient light reminds you of the air quality whilst quietly getting on with purifying the air around you.

Household chemicals, airborne harmful particles, and pollutants – all of which make us sneeze, irritate our airways, our skin, and sometimes cause more serious health conditions. Airdog X3 is filtering every harmful particle and micro allergen out of the air, taking them away from you and your loved ones. It also smells better as the high-tech filters remove annoying odors as well and it is just one button!

The complex process of air purification is made simple with the Airdog X3 user-friendly controls that operate digitally and remotely.

Whilst gently and consistently improving the air in your home or office, Airdog X3  keeps you informed of the status of the air around you throughout the entire day. Its smart data-storage function records important information so that you can control your environment with precision, adjusting it to suit your requirements.

It also acts as a night light with a body motion sensor so Airdog X3 will automatically turn lights off when you go to bed and turn lights on when you leave the bed to help you see in the dark. 

 

Be one of the first to bring Airdog X3 home. 

 

 

  1. Height: 520 mm (20.5")
  2. Width: 260 mm (12")
  3. Rated Power: 27W
  4. Voltage: 13V
  5. Weight: 11 lbs
  6. CADR: 200 m3/hr 
  7. Odor & VOC Filter: 1kg (2lb) of Granular Activated Carbon (GAC)
  8. Filter Life: Forever
  9. Connectivity: Wifi, Bluetooth, Over-The-Air Updates, iOS App, Android App.

 

 

Airdog X3 is the latest example of leading-edge technology from Silicon Valley Air Expert Inc. - a leading air purifier company. Founded by a group of technology experts and entrepreneurs from Silicon Valley, we are dedicated to developing innovative air purification solutions based on ionic wind technology.

Our Airdog air purifiers combine high-performance waste elimination with revolutionary disposable filter cartridges that are powerful and inexpensive. Airdog is silent, energy-efficient, and easy to use. It offers you clean air and is a green solution to purifying the air in your home.

 

Airdog was awarded by the German Design in 2017 and Korean Good Design.

 

Airdog cares about the air you breathe. We can’t control all the pollutants you encounter, in the likes of food, drinks, and household products, but we do know air! We want to draw your attention to:

 

  1. The emission from large vehicles - fossil fuels has become the world's largest respiratory health risk. 
  2. The global flu pandemic is airborne and a new health risk.
  3. Polluted air in our communities means that more than 80,000 families cannot breathe clean air on a daily basis.

We can’t control all our environments however we simply can’t ignore the quality of air in our homes. Smoking, odor, harmful particles, mold, dander, chemicals all compromise our health. It’s time to pay attention and act! And now it’s easy with the worry-free air purifier that will keep the air you breathe clean and pure. Take control with Airdog X3!

Airdog represents an unbeatable combination - unrivaled performance, design, and technology, at a family-affordable price.  Created by Silicon Valley Air Expert Inc., this is innovation at its best which puts an end to expensive disposable filter cartridges. ​

The worry-free air purifier will keep you healthy. You need Airdog X3!

story:
Braindex is a device that uses an Extremely Low-Frequency Electromagnetic Field (ELF-EMF) to stimulate and synchronize your brainwave for boosting overall health. Combined with AI technology, Braindex will learn your personal daily habits and help you sleep better, achieve peak mental performance, naturally enter a relaxed state of mind and get protection against the potentially chronic illness.

 

 

 

More quick notes

Stretch Goals 

As the campaign hits certain funding goals, new stretch goals will be unlocked for you to purchase. So share with your friends to keep the new releases coming!

#1.$40K USD: FREE Exclusive Braindex Product Case 

The exclusive premium product case will make an easier everyday carry for your Braindex. Every backer will get one FREE Braindex product case once we reach $40K USD goal. 

#2 $60K USD: Unlock Black 

After we received 216 votes from Braindex backers, Black accounts for over 40% votes and it will be unlocked when we hit $60K USD. Thank you for all your help!

 

#3. $100K USD: Braindex App

When we reach $ 100K USD, Braindex App will be available to jumpstart your healthy lifestyle in unique ways: 1. Easy wireless Bluetooth control in your room. 2. Customize your daily stimulation program pattern as you want.   3. Analyzing and track your daily habits. 4. Feedback submission.

 

 

Make a BIG difference in your quality of sleep

Each state of sleep (awake, light sleep, deep sleep, etc.) involves the unique brainwave patterns within our brains.

By emitting extremely low frequencies associated with deep sleep, Braindex encourages your brain to replicate Delta brainwave rhythms, leading to better quality sleep. 

 

Be more productive at work

Mid-range beta waves dominate our concentration, by stimulating the same frequency, Braindex helps you achieve peak mental performance and stay sharp when you need it.

 

Relaxing your mind easily

It's easy to feel a bit overwhelmed, especially these days. Braindex sends out Low beta brainwave frequency to help you calm down and enter a relaxed state of mind.

 

Say goodbye to your stress

Life can be stressful at times. Braindex can also deliver Gamma brainwave frequencies, proven to mitigate stress and mental pressure.

 

Prevent chronic illness

Schumann Resonances (SmRS/SR) is called “earth’s heartbeat”, it plays an important role in regulating human’s circadian rhythms and lowering blood pressure.

Braindex SmRS stimulation program is linked to inhibiting PC9 and B16F10 cancer cell proliferation, helping to protect against fatal illnesses. 

 

Your AI-Powered health hub

Powered by AI, Braindex learns and predicts your personal habits accurately, and delivers the best healthy routine in Auto mode.

Braindex automatically keeps tracking you remotely in real-time and delivers the right stimulation program that you want.

 

Braindex is an advanced form of brainwave entrainment, the process of encouraging your brainwaves by replicating and synchronizing the rhythm from external stimulations.

Braindex relies on extremely low electromagnetic field frequencies that travel through your extensive neural network to change and optimize your natural brainwave frequencies. The persistent rhythm of Braindex syncs with your own rhythmic brainwaves, assisting your brain in entering your preferred state of mind. 

 

Part of Tier I public research on Brainwave Stimulation Technology.

 

Brainwave Entrainment isn't new! In fact, it’s been proven effective in laboratory settings for nearly a century now.

Scientists have studied and learned that the brain can naturally synchronize its brainwave frequencies with the rhythm of periodic external stimulations.

- N. Cherry, "Schumann Resonances, a plausible biophysical mechanism for the human health effects of Solar/Geomagnetic Activity", Natural Hazards, vol. 26, no. 1, pp. 279-331, 2002

- Wang, X. M., Fang, C., Hong-Qiang, Y. U., & Peng, Z, "Resonance effects on human brain based on magnetic stimulation of extremely low frequency “, J. Tianjin University, vol. 44, pp. 823-828, 2011.

 

 

In the past 2 years, we’ve helped hundreds of beta users make a healthier lifestyle change in their lives.

 

 

 

 
 
 
 

 

Click HERE to get the Press kit 

 

 

Braindex detects the electromagnetic environment automatically within 5 meters, and it offers 5 types of brainwave stimulation programs to fit your needs.

How to use it?

With its LED touch control panel, choose any stimulation program you want with just a simple tap.

 

What’s in the box

 

Ken, the founder of Braindex, is an expert in machine learning with a PhD in medical and human-related mechanical engineering. He suffered from poor health and mental state. This led him and his team to create Braindex in Kanazawa, Japan, 2018.

During his 2 years of research and development, prototype version 1.0 and 2.0 were tested and improved upon countless times. Behind all the complicated cutting-edge brain science is a portable device that offers a balance between functional performance, ergonomics, and aesthetics.

In early 2020, Braindex received amazing and valuable feedback from over 100 beta users worldwide. This built and progressed the confidence in the Braindex team, and now they're ready to introduce Braindex to the world.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Question: When will you ship the Braindex? 

Answer: Braindex will be shipped immediately in July, 2020 after the mass production. We will keep everyone updated about the latest situation. 

Question: Is Braindex Free Shipping Worldwide? 

Answer: Yes, Braindex is Free Shipping Worldwide. 

Question: How long is Braindex under warranty? 

Answer: 2-year warranty after receipt. 

Question: What's the return policy? 

Answer:  Braindex can be returned and exchanged freely within 60 days of purchase. 

Question: How long does shipping take? 

Answer: 7-15 days worldwide. 

Question: Is Braindex safe? Will it cause any side-effects?

Answer: Braindex works remotely in a non-invasive way, there is no need to wear it on your head all night long. It strictly complies with IEEE EMF exposure standards, no high-frequency or high-intensity electromagnetic field will be generated. All of which will prevent your body from any harmful effect, Braindex 's technology is even safer than PEMF. According to feedback from beta users in Japan, United States, etc.,  No side effects complaints was received. 

Question: What technology does Braindex use?

Answer: Braindex uses innovative technology that combining APEMF weak electromagnetic field brainwave stimulation technology, frequency sweeping, and AI. It will learn your daily habits and produces precise electromagnetic fields that you need. Please check more details on our website: https://braindex.jp/pages/background-and-research

Question: Does Braindex collect or upload user data?

Answer: Braindex will not collect or share any user's data illegally from hardware and possible software now and the future. We take care of user's data security and protect their privacy. 

Question: How can I use Braindex?

Answer: Braindex is your best companion in your living room, bedroom as well as your office. 

Question: How long will it take until I feel the effects?

Answer: We put user's safe in the first place, the APEMF technology works in a more natural and smart way to prevent any side effects generated by rapid and strong stimulation like other products on the market. From our beta users' data, it takes around 14 days when people feel healthier and better.

Question: What is the Auto mode?

Answer: Auto mode detects the environment automatically and chooses the best stimulation pattern for boosting your overall health based on your personal habits.

Question: Why is Braindex so cheap?

Answer: Braindex Team consists of passionate brain science experts and we focus on offering an affordable solution for people's health. This campaign aims to get feedback from our users and marketing purposes only. We've got part of the venture capital to ensure the success shipment before the campaign live. 

Question: Is Braindex good for medical use?

Answer: Braindex aims to create a healthier, proper indoor electromagnetic field environment to help people live better. But it can NOT be used as a medical device for disease treatment. 

Question: Are there any other colors available？

Answer: Braindex is available in White only at the current stage, more colors will be available in the future. 

Question: Is it rechargeable?

Answer: Braindex is ready to use after being connected to a power source (5V) via type-c cable, the wireless version will coming out in the future.

 

Risks & Challenges

Although we have got part of venture capital before the campaign to ensure the success shipment. But there are still some possible hurdles that we may need to overcome as a company. We are currently working hard with our partners to consolidate production plans and coordinate third-party vendors. Despite spending the last 2 years building an efficient supply chain, we may run into component delays or unexpected shortages. Therefore, the speed and price of shipping may affect the number of units we are able to deliver to each country. If this occurs then we will keep the community informed while doing our best to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

Part of Tier I public research on Brainwave Stimulation Technology.
 
Brainwave Entrainment isn't new! In fact, it’s been proven effective in laboratory settings for nearly a century now.

Scientists have studied and learned that the brain can naturally synchronize its brainwave frequencies with the rhythm of periodic external stimulations.

- N. Cherry, "Schumann Resonances, a plausible biophysical mechanism for the human health effects of Solar/Geomagnetic Activity", Natural Hazards, vol. 26, no. 1, pp. 279-331, 2002
- Wang, X. M., Fang, C., Hong-Qiang, Y. U., & Peng, Z, "Resonance effects on human brain based on magnetic stimulation of extremely low frequency “, J. Tianjin University, vol. 44, pp. 823-828, 2011.
 

 
In the past 2 years, we’ve helped hundreds of beta users make a healthier lifestyle change in their lives.


 

 
 


 
 


 
 


 


Click HERE to get the Press kit 
 



 
Braindex detects the electromagnetic environment automatically within 5 meters, and it offers 5 types of brainwave stimulation programs to fit your needs.

How to use it?
With its LED touch control panel, choose any stimulation program you want with just a simple tap.
 
What’s in the box









 


Ken, the founder of Braindex, is an expert in machine learning with a PhD in medical and human-related mechanical engineering. He suffered from poor health and mental state. This led him and his team to create Braindex in Kanazawa, Japan, 2018.
During his 2 years of research and development, prototype version 1.0 and 2.0 were tested and improved upon countless times. Behind all the complicated cutting-edge brain science is a portable device that offers a balance between functional performance, ergonomics, and aesthetics.
In early 2020, Braindex received amazing and valuable feedback from over 100 beta users worldwide. This built and progressed the confidence in the Braindex team, and now they're ready to introduce Braindex to the world.


 




 


 




 

 

 
Question: When will you ship the Braindex? 
Answer: Braindex will be shipped immediately in July, 2020 after the mass production. We will keep everyone updated about the latest situation. 
Question: Is Braindex Free Shipping Worldwide? 
Answer: Yes, Braindex is Free Shipping Worldwide. 
Question: How long is Braindex under warranty? 
Answer: 2-year warranty after receipt. 
Question: What's the return policy? 
Answer:  Braindex can be returned and exchanged freely within 60 days of purchase. 
Question: How long does shipping take? 
Answer: 7-15 days worldwide. 
Question: Is Braindex safe? Will it cause any side-effects?
Answer: Braindex works remotely in a non-invasive way, there is no need to wear it on your head all night long. It strictly complies with IEEE EMF exposure standards, no high-frequency or high-intensity electromagnetic field will be generated. All of which will prevent your body from any harmful effect, Braindex 's technology is even safer than PEMF. According to feedback from beta users in Japan, United States, etc.,  No side effects complaints was received. 
Question: What technology does Braindex use?
Answer: Braindex uses innovative technology that combining APEMF weak electromagnetic field brainwave stimulation technology, frequency sweeping, and AI. It will learn your daily habits and produces precise electromagnetic fields that you need. Please check more details on our website: https://braindex.jp/pages/background-and-research
Question: Does Braindex collect or upload user data?
Answer: Braindex will not collect or share any user's data illegally from hardware and possible software now and the future. We take care of user's data security and protect their privacy. 
Question: How can I use Braindex?
Answer: Braindex is your best companion in your living room, bedroom as well as your office. 
Question: How long will it take until I feel the effects?
Answer: We put user's safe in the first place, the APEMF technology works in a more natural and smart way to prevent any side effects generated by rapid and strong stimulation like other products on the market. From our beta users' data, it takes around 14 days when people feel healthier and better.
Question: What is the Auto mode?
Answer: Auto mode detects the environment automatically and chooses the best stimulation pattern for boosting your overall health based on your personal habits.
Question: Why is Braindex so cheap?
Answer: Braindex Team consists of passionate brain science experts and we focus on offering an affordable solution for people's health. This campaign aims to get feedback from our users and marketing purposes only. We've got part of the venture capital to ensure the success shipment before the campaign live. 
Question: Is Braindex good for medical use?
Answer: Braindex aims to create a healthier, proper indoor electromagnetic field environment to help people live better. But it can NOT be used as a medical device for disease treatment. 
Question: Are there any other colors available？
Answer: Braindex is available in White only at the current stage, more colors will be available in the future. 
Question: Is it rechargeable?
Answer: Braindex is ready to use after being connected to a power source (5V) via type-c cable, the wireless version will coming out in the future.
 
Risks & Challenges
Although we have got part of venture capital before the campaign to ensure the success shipment. But there are still some possible hurdles that we may need to overcome as a company. We are currently working hard with our partners to consolidate production plans and coordinate third-party vendors. Despite spending the last 2 years building an efficient supply chain, we may run into component delays or unexpected shortages. Therefore, the speed and price of shipping may affect the number of units we are able to deliver to each country. If this occurs then we will keep the community informed while doing our best to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

story:
Introducing the Prosage™ Thermo Copper 6 in 1

Our 3rd Generation Prosage Thermo Copper is the only 6 in 1 percussion massage gun with Warm up Technology, Hot & Cold Therapy, MicroCurrent and now are you ready for this – the benefits of Copper. Get deep muscle warm-up technology and a professional athlete level massage for full body recovery and relief.

 

The Prosage Thermo Copper 6 in 1 is a powerful percussion Massager with our  

• Patented Theralite Warm up Technology. Advanced Copper Head Therapy with unique copper benefits.

• Our proprietary Heat Therapy Head for deep muscle penetration

• And the Cold Therapy Head for soreness and inflammation.

• MicrocurrentTek for pain recovery and restoration

• And it even comes with our newest Extension Handle so you can reach anywhere on your body.

AS SEEN ON ET & THE TALK 

 

2 MicroCurrent Tek pads connected to the controller give you an opportunity to sit down and relax while electronic pulses stimulate your muscles. 
 

Prosage Thermo Copper is designed for professionals but made for you to use at your own convenience. Going to a professional massage therapist is expensive and takes up valuable time. With the Prosage Thermo Copper, you have your own personal massager at hand whenever you need it.

There's Only One Prosage Thermo Copper

 

Reduce Stiffness, Relieve Pain, Increase Mobility

Warranty & Disclaimer Notices:

Damage caused by failure to follow the instructions, human factors, force majeure, etc. is not covered by warranty. Maintenance cost will be charged for product out of warranty.

These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

This is not a weight loss system. Evertone Inc™ does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Prosage Thermo Copper due to many factors that can influence health and weight loss. Individual results may vary.

If you have the following conditions, please consult with your physician before using the unit.

  • Pregnant women or individuals who have undergone surgery and have inflamed or unhealed wounds.
  • Person who currently has an acute disease; has a history of heart problems; or has bone fractures that not healed completely; and other abnormal health conditions.
  • While using this unit, if you start to feel dizzy, lightheaded or uncomfortable, please stop the unit at once and consult your physician.

Do not continue use until you have the permission of your doctor.

THIS UNIT IS NOT A MEDICAL DEVICE.

Prosage Thermo Copper is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, illness, or medical condition. No individual result should be considered typical or guaranteed.

*Product model, shape, design and color may vary

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story:
丨繁體中文丨日本語丨Deutsch丨

Thank you to all your contributions to this campaign, we are grateful to have you accompany us along the way. Your enthusiasm and support are the motivation to push us forward and make the product better every day! Thank you all for the continuous support, now we are finally approaching the fulfillment stage, you will be able to receive your BP Doctor smartwatch soon!

Despite hypertension being identified as a leading risk factor for stroke, heart attacks, kidney failure and even dementia, it can be difficult for patients to keep up with the need to constantly monitor their hypertension and adjust their medication accordingly. Therefore, constantly monitoring blood pressure via wearable devices is becoming a trend nowadays.

So we created BP Doctor, a true wearable blood pressure monitoring solution in the form of a smartwatch. With the patented inflatable cuff design, powerful algorithm and high accuracy sensor, BP Doctor is capable of making tracking and managing your personal health easier than ever before.

Using the BP Doctor is simple, quick, and definitely less painful than whatever the nurse does to you. It's the most convenient monitor that you simply wear on your wrist and you are always ready to go.

To test you just press a button, hold your hand over your heart, and the cuff will automatically inflate and deflate on its own. When it’s done, you can see a reading of your blood pressure on the screen. If it’s in a healthy range, you’ll see a green circle. If your blood pressure is too high, the border will turn red.

(1) To compare with traditional upper-arm oscillometric machines, BP Doctor has advantages in its size, portability, convenience, data volume, and monitoring frequency that traditional sphygmomanometer cannot assimilate.

(2) And the other “wearable blood pressure smartwatch” on the market tend to provide an estimate of blood pressure through pulse readings (which is not accurate), but BP Doctor takes a more traditional, and accurate route - by miniaturizing the components for traditional oscillometric measurement, using an inflatable cuff within the watch band to take an accurate blood pressure reading. And that makes BP Doctor unique and pioneer in the industry.

The design of BP Doctor involved more than 30 new patents relating to its miniaturised pumps, valves and chips, some of which are no larger than a grain of rice. By miniaturizing the components for traditional oscillometric measurement, BP Doctor is capable of using an inflatable cuff within the watch band to take an accurate blood pressure reading just like a regular upper-arm oscillometric machine found in a doctor's surgery.

Underneath the strap is a cuff that inflates to measure systolic and diastolic pressure via the oscillometric method. Basically, it’s the same technique used at your doctor’s office where they strap and inflate a cuff on your arm, except much smaller. 

Basically, BP Doctor has no difference in measuring method and data accuracy compared to the traditional upper-arm medical blood pressure monitor. Except it's much smaller, convenient and comprehensive in use.


Video of BP Doctor's built-in tech and how to use

In this video, we wanted to demonstrate how to use a BP Doctor to measure blood pressure. Also, we made a few comparisons with the traditional oscillometric monitor that is frequently used by clinics and hospitals. You can see the high-resolution results below if it's hard for you to recognize the vital sign reading in the video.


Result of the first measurement
                                      BP Doctor    vs    Omron    
Systolic Pressure -       130                        128
Diastolic Pressure -       73                          73
Heart Rate -                     63                          63

In the first test, we measured the sample's blood pressure and heart rate in a calm state (which is what we recommended) so you can see the difference between each result are just slightly different.

 

Result of the second measurement
                                      BP Doctor    vs    Omron    
Systolic Pressure -       145                        144
Diastolic Pressure -       74                          69
Heart Rate -                     83                          81

In the second test, Jonathan did some squats and push-ups to raise his heart rate (which reflects in results), so there is a small fluctuation in the data. but overall it's still very accurate.

In Conclusion - in both active and calm states, BP Doctor can measure blood pressure and heart rate accurately. However, we do recommend taking a blood pressure test under a calm state and follow the instruction carefully to hold the device up over heart, approximately five centimeters from your chest.When you consider that blood pressure fluctuates throughout the day, a single point of reading in a doctor's office or pharmacy doesn’t really reflect your overall health. Providing a way for people with hypertension to continuously, easily and accurately monitor how their lifestyle affects their readings, can impact so many lives. Instead of merely checking, we keep monitoring.

The data is then synced to our app, which gives you insightful reporting, including high pressure, low pressure, and pulse. You can store your data to track trends, and understand at what times your blood pressure rises or falls. This enables you to develop a treatment plan or check the treatment plan based on the current trend.

Our APP also providing a way for people can easily and accurately monitor how their lifestyle affects their readings may change the rules of the game. Also it gives you the ability and information to change your heart health, your lifestyle, and your future. We're powering the movement with a comprehensive range of monitors.


 

Heart Rate Variability (HRV) is the time difference between each successive heartbeat, also known as "R-R intervals variation". To put it simply, everyone's heartbeat rhythm changes with physical conditions, not as regular as a beat machine. For example, a person's resting heartbeat is about 60 beats per minute, but the interval between beats is actually different (ie, this time is 0.9 seconds apart, and then the next time can be 1.1 seconds apart, instead of a full second every time). By analyzing the differences when the heart beats each time and having timely access to health information, HRV can be used for stress recovery. Studies have shown that heart rate variability can detect coronary heart disease, hypertension, and heart failure. In particular, the prognosis of cardiovascular disease will continue and should be monitored. Controlling the changes in the heart may prevent the recurrence of deterioration.

BP Doctor can estimate whether a person is under the risk of having sinus heart rate, arrhythmias or risk of other heart diseases from its heart rate variability (HRV) analysis through multiple dimensions for your health improvement and performance optimization.

Wake up in the morning and review your HRV score with your BP Doctor smartwatch. Read the full details of the heart health index in the app. Determine your body’s readiness for fitness and optimize your fitness training intensity.

Please Note: HRV analysis will only take place at night (from midnight to 7 am) to ensure data accuracy. 

Please note that HRV Add-on ($50) only available for the perk of BP Doctor PRO. 

In recent years, clinicians have become increasingly interested in measuring heart rate variability (HRV) for a variety of purposes. An elegant method to assess HRV is through Lorenz Plot Analysis — a two-dimensional scatter plot of successive intervals verses immediately preceding RR intervals.


Read the SCIENCE BEHIND BP Doctor's Lorenz Plot Analysis

Part of the HRV analysis is a review of your daily heart rate. With a high accuracy sensor and advanced algorithms, BP Doctor is able to provide a comprehensive risk analysis of your heart health.  


 

We spend approximately 1/3 of our lifetime in bed. Thus, It's significantly important for us to understand our night’s sleep.

By measuring the length of your sleep, the quality of your sleep, and heart rate during sleep, BP Doctor works to maximize your recovery.

Wake up refreshed and rejuvenated by getting a great night's sleep. BP Doctor gently wakes you up gently with its adjustable vibration alarm in the morning.

Understanding all the ways you move throughout the day is an essential part of living a healthy lifestyle. BP Doctor helps you to achieve your daily fitness goals with a variety of metrics, such as heart rate zones, regeneration status, goals and many more...
 

To make your training effective, you should aim to get your heart rate up to a certain level during exercise—and keep it there. These ranges are commonly known as heart rate zones, and they have different potential benefits for your workout, whether you are measuring heart rates (bpm), distance, steps, or calories burned. BP Doctor can smartly identify your resting heart rate and maximum heart rate through your daily activities and assist your workouts based on your instant heart rate.  

Monitoring your oxygen levels while working out can help you make adjustments to your intensity or exercises, allowing you to equalize oxygen flow throughout your workout session. Likewise, BP Doctor can monitor your oxygen level regardless of your workout environment.

BP Doctor recognizes when you’re running and automatically starts the pace count, track your time spend to optimize your running workout.  All you have to do is switch to run mode and lace-up.

Every move takes you forward. BP Doctor helps you to better track your daily activity. Using a verity of features, it helps you to create goals, track workout, optimize your efforts and stay motivated.

In addition to providing a comprehensive set of health and fitness functions, BP Doctor also comes with useful tools to improve your everyday life.


YAN HE INTELLIGENT TECHNOLOGY is composed of former Mindray, Withings, Misfit employees, and professionals from wearable wellness industries. We are motivated to redefine wearable wellness by providing an affordable & data-driven solution for everyone. The goal of our BP Doctor Smartwatch is to provide a wearable device that is convenient, non-invasive and productive enough to keep our wellness and health on track and to ultimately reduce the cost of medical service. And that’s exactly what we did! We created a comprehensive & proactive health monitor that analyzes the most important vital metric (heart health) long-term. BP Doctor is only the first step. With the help of the backer community and our dedication, we will be moving toward our goal step by step.
