story:
ToothShower is the world’s first complete oral care solution for the shower that does away with the need for flossing. It’s easy to use and will fit right into your morning routine. Powered by the water in your shower, ToothShower cleans 100% of teeth surfaces, every nook and cranny of your teeth, not just 60% like the average brushing. Toothbrushing misses between your teeth where gum disease can start.

 

 

 

 

Let’s face it: no one likes to floss. In an age of so much tech advancements making our lives easier, it’s crazy to think that we’re still rubbing a string in between our teeth to clean them. But gum disease effects over half of Adult Americans, according to the Center for Disease Control. Cleaning between your teeth, where your toothbrush is missing, needs to be a top priority.

Plus, flossing isn't even proven to be the best way to clean between your teeth. There has to be a better way, especially since recent research states many people use floss incorrectly or not at all. The American Dental Association recommends cleaning between your teeth at least once a day as an important part of overall oral health.   

ToothShower is different. It’s an all-in-one oral care device that will revolutionize tooth care forever. 

 

ToothShower uses the water pressure in your shower as a power source, so there are no plugs to trip over or batteries to charge. And because you’re already in the shower, there’s never any mess to clean up after.

 

ToothShower has three different attachments for optimum oral care: an irrigating dual-headed toothbrush, an irrigating tip, and an irrigating gum massager.  

 

The dual-headed toothbrush hits both the front and back and sides of your teeth simultaneously, so you won't miss cleaning the tongue side of your teeth.  With silicone bristles on the back of the brush head you can clean the chewing surfaces of your teeth. Go ahead and use the silicone bristles to brush your tongue too!

 

 

The irrigating tip flushes water between your teeth like a water flosser (only without the mess to clean-up). This works especially well for braces and to pinpoint spots that your toothbrush can’t reach.

 

 

Finally, the irrigating gum massager works with seven jets of water to stimulate important blood flow in your gums and remove debris from between your teeth. 

 

 This is a huge part of preventing and even healing gum disease. 

Just hold the massager up to your gum tissue and move from side to side. Our innovative, irrigating gum massager will save you time by flushing between all of your teeth in less than 10 seconds.  Use it in place of the irrigating tip or in conjunction.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Here's a short video going through the installation process

Shower-powered is what we are, no loud motors to wake others up in the morning. This All-in-One Oral Hygiene Innovation lacks nothing.

Use the dial to turn the device on and choose a comfortable pressure setting.

 

Whether you like warmer or colder water, you get to choose the water temperature that matches your personal comfort level by using your showers temperature dial.

 

 

Countertop Water flossers can be messy to use because water and bacteria get everywhere!  They tend to end up back under the countertop and never to see the light of day again. 

 

Don’t worry about where the water goes since you are already in the shower! Flush the debris from your teeth right down the drain. The convenient location enables new healthy habits to start.

 

ToothShower complies with the FDA guidelines and contains food grade and non-toxic materials. 

 

 

 

With ToothShower, you can add in your own mouthwash or tooth whitener for an even fresher feeling. Heal those bleeding, puffy gums by flushing out the food and bacteria. Then direct an anti-bacterial rinse directly to the inflamed areas. So when you leave the shower sparkling clean, your teeth will be too!

 

 

 

 

 

Our team has worked hard for over 2 years to perfect our product. With your support, we will be able to move forward with our tooling and place a bulk first order.  This in turn will bring ToothShower to life and change the future of oral hygiene one shower at a time.

 

 

Lisa Guenst has been a dental hygienist for over 25 years, so she’s seen it all. She would explain to her patients why their gums were bleeding but soon realized they didn't have an easy and enjoyable method for 100% cleaning. So she decided if no one else was going to fix it, she would. She developed the prototype for ToothShower with the help of industrial designers and mechanical engineers, the results have been phenomenal. Just take a look at what some early users have had to say about ToothShower. The reviews speak for themselves.
story_txt: ToothShower is the world’s first complete oral care solution for the shower that does away with the need for flossing. It’s easy to use and will fit right into your morning routine. Powered by the water in your shower, ToothShower cleans 100% of teeth surfaces, every nook and cranny of your teeth, not just 60% like the average brushing. Toothbrushing misses between your teeth where gum disease can start.    Let’s face it: no one likes to floss. In an age of so much tech advancements making our lives easier, it’s crazy to think that we’re still rubbing a string in between our teeth to clean them. But gum disease effects over half of Adult Americans, according to the Center for Disease Control. Cleaning between your teeth, where your toothbrush is missing, needs to be a top priority.Plus, flossing isn't even proven to be the best way to clean between your teeth. There has to be a better way, especially since recent research states many people use floss incorrectly or not at all. The American Dental Association recommends cleaning between your teeth at least once a day as an important part of overall oral health.   ToothShower is different. It’s an all-in-one oral care device that will revolutionize tooth care forever.  ToothShower uses the water pressure in your shower as a power source, so there are no plugs to trip over or batteries to charge. And because you’re already in the shower, there’s never any mess to clean up after. ToothShower has three different attachments for optimum oral care: an irrigating dual-headed toothbrush, an irrigating tip, and an irrigating gum massager.   The dual-headed toothbrush hits both the front and back and sides of your teeth simultaneously, so you won't miss cleaning the tongue side of your teeth.  With silicone bristles on the back of the brush head you can clean the chewing surfaces of your teeth. Go ahead and use the silicone bristles to brush your tongue too!  The irrigating tip flushes water between your teeth like a water flosser (only without the mess to clean-up). This works especially well for braces and to pinpoint spots that your toothbrush can’t reach.  Finally, the irrigating gum massager works with seven jets of water to stimulate important blood flow in your gums and remove debris from between your teeth.   This is a huge part of preventing and even healing gum disease. Just hold the massager up to your gum tissue and move from side to side. Our innovative, irrigating gum massager will save you time by flushing between all of your teeth in less than 10 seconds.  Use it in place of the irrigating tip or in conjunction.        Here's a short video going through the installation processShower-powered is what we are, no loud motors to wake others up in the morning. This All-in-One Oral Hygiene Innovation lacks nothing.Use the dial to turn the device on and choose a comfortable pressure setting. Whether you like warmer or colder water, you get to choose the water temperature that matches your personal comfort level by using your showers temperature dial.  Countertop Water flossers can be messy to use because water and bacteria get everywhere!  They tend to end up back under the countertop and never to see the light of day again.  Don’t worry about where the water goes since you are already in the shower! Flush the debris from your teeth right down the drain. The convenient location enables new healthy habits to start. ToothShower complies with the FDA guidelines and contains food grade and non-toxic materials.    With ToothShower, you can add in your own mouthwash or tooth whitener for an even fresher feeling. Heal those bleeding, puffy gums by flushing out the food and bacteria. Then direct an anti-bacterial rinse directly to the inflamed areas. So when you leave the shower sparkling clean, your teeth will be too!     Our team has worked hard for over 2 years to perfect our product. With your support, we will be able to move forward with our tooling and place a bulk first order.  This in turn will bring ToothShower to life and change the future of oral hygiene one shower at a time.  Lisa Guenst has been a dental hygienist for over 25 years, so she’s seen it all. She would explain to her patients why their gums were bleeding but soon realized they didn't have an easy and enjoyable method for 100% cleaning. So she decided if no one else was going to fix it, she would. She developed the prototype for ToothShower with the help of industrial designers and mechanical engineers, the results have been phenomenal. Just take a look at what some early users have had to say about ToothShower. The reviews speak for themselves.

story:
About

 

Unico™ smartbrush is the Oral Hygiene device  that can perform toothbrushing in just 3 seconds. 

 

 

 

 

Brushing your teeth is a long and boring task. Dentists recommend brushing teeth after each meal and dedicating at least 3 minutes to it each time. It follows that through the course of your life you should spend more than 200 full days brushing your teeth! Your time is precious and should not be wasted! With Unico™ this will no longer be the case! The solution is given in simple mathematical operations: according to dentists, the time we have to spent on tooth-brushing is 180 seconds --> 5.62 seconds for each of the thirty-two teeth we have --> 1.87 seconds for each of the three exposed surfaces of each tooth.

Thanks to its design, Unico ™ is able to clean all the exposed tooth surfaces at the same time, the result is that your mouth will be clean in just 1.87 seconds! We brought the total time up to 3 seconds just to give you an even more effective cleansing and to give you the time to at least quickly do your hair or spray on some perfume while you are using it.

 

 

With traditional toothbrushes, both manual and electric, the quality does not depend much on the type of toothbrush, as we have been accustomed to thinking over the years by media, but rather on the way it is performed and the time that you dedicate to it. The mouth unit is ergonomic and allow you to reach the exposed surfaces of the teeth and the interstices between one tooth and the next one without damaging the enamel of the teeth and the gums.

 

 

Although the energy required in manual tooth-brushing is not high, it is still a very, very boring action to accomplish. The electric toothbrush solves only partially the problem since it is necessary to hold it and shake it in all directions to reach each exposed surface of each tooth. With Unico™ The problem is solved, the Power Unit is small and lightweight. In this way it will be light enough to be held in the mouth with a slight pressure without using your hands.

 

 

From a technical standpoint, Unico™ Power Unit will mounts an electric motor suitably sized to give the many brushes the right scrubbing power. The ultimate generation rechargeable battery is made of lithium ion, it NEVER has to be replaced. Moreover, during its use, it guarantees reduced noise levels compared to a traditional electric toothbrush!

 

 

Thanks to the antibacterial silicone material with the right flexibility, the mouth unit of Unico™ fits comfortably into all the dental arches of both men and women.

Large size – for people over 170 cm (over 5ft 7in)

Medium size - for people from 155 cm to 170 cm (from 5ft 1in to 5ft 7in)

Small size - for people from 140 cm to 154 cm (from 4ft 7in to 5ft)

Extra Small size – for children from 125 cm to 139 cm (from 4ft 1in to 4ft 6in)

 

 

 

We are currently used to rinsing our toothbrushes under the water before replacing it. This is also a harmful habit since water does not disinfect, on the contrary, it favors the proliferation of bacteria and molds. That is why we have designed Unico™ with UV rays. This way you will always be sure that you are placing a clean unit in your mouth.

 

Unico™ Power Unit is rechargeable. The Dock Station is powered by a wall outlet with the latest generation USB wires.

 

 

 

Colors available:

- black

- white

 

 

To close the circle, let's now talk about maintenance. As we said earlier, with Unico™ you will have oral hygiene 60 times faster than with a traditional toothbrush. This means that every single bristle of the mouth unit is used 60 times less than one toothbrush and will therefore last 60 times longer. Dentists recommend to change the toothbrush after 3 months, so you can imagine how durable our product is in comparison. The last of your thoughts will be buying a new one! 

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

 

Is evening, and you are completely relaxed on the sofa watching a movie. The movie ends, you are sleepy and you just want to go bed...but before...you have to brush your teeth.

We do not know if it is so for you, but for us that feeling is terribly annoying, so we invented Unico™.

Looking at the Unico™ timeline, you will definitely realize that, on the contrary to most other kickstarter projects, the idea of running a prototype has been long overdue. This is because in 2007, at the time of the invention, we was just penniless teenagers without a dedicated budget for the development of our idea. At that time, 3D printing was not so widespread, as there were no crowd funding platforms, which truly complicated the pathway to the realization and the marketing of a new product. In addition, moving from the idea of a device so innovative to its realization also involved possessing the knowledge to make it works,  Once we had achieved our economic independence, we decided to invest in Unico™ in a serious way. 

Thank you very much!

 

The images of the product are purely indicative. During the development phases the type of motion of the brushes, the materials, the colors, the accessories and the functionalities can vary without actually changing the main function of the product, which is the simplification and speeding up of tooth washing.

story:
By

 

The first Yoga mat infused with Biocrystal®, a powder of 16 different crystals combined with Gold and Silver.

In our search of implementing Yoga in society and supporting consciousness of body, mind and soul, our team found the Biocrystal® technology; a powder of 16 different crystals selected for their strong relaxing properties: a blend of natural crystals, scientifically measured to provide a strong anti-stress effect.

Benefits for the Body

The Biocrystal® in the Yoga mat gives vibrations to the cells in your body which:

  • Reduces Muscle Tension
  • Calms your Heartbeat
  • Slows down Rapid Breathing
  • Increases Oxygen Level
  • Reduced Fatigue
  • Improves your Body Energy Flow.
  • Decrease Impact of EMF (electromagnetic field)

This has a positive effect on releasing and allowing a natural flow of energy through the body.

 

Benefits for the Mind

The Biocrystal® in the Yoga mat:

  • Reduces level of Stress
  • Provides Fast Relaxation
  • Gives more Mental Clarity
  • Assures Better Focus
  • Gives a More Peaceful Mind

Which will enable you to observe your mind & senses better and deepen your meditation.

 

Benefits for a Conscious Yoga

  • More Relaxation
  • Favorable Mind Mode
  • Improve your Yoga Practice and Meditation
  • Gives more Awareness of Body, Mind and Soul 
  • Overall Consciousness Improvement

 

Overall Benefits for your Life

  • Increased Productive and Efficiency
  • Reduce Anxiety and Stress
  • Improved Mood 
  • Become more Aware and Conscious 
  • Overall Joy and Wellbeing
  • Improved Health and Immune system.

 

 

The 16 different crystals inside the mat

 

 

 

The mat is Designed for YOU to Be YOU.

Our team of Yogi’s designed a yoga mat you can personalize; with our 4 different crystal gem options in lotus petal shape. The lotus is the symbol for growth, transformation and development. It is the flower of rebirth and spiritual enlightenment. Which one fits you the most: Amethyst, Onyx, Lapis lazuli or Rose Quarts?

 

         

 

For Who, What, How and When?

Our mat is perfect for all kinds of Yoga practice and meditation sessions;  is high performing, has an unrivalled grip, even in really sweaty conditions.

Made in the EU, by Yogi's for Yogi's. 

    High end Features:

    • 2,5 kg; 185 x 65 cm; 6 mm Thick.
    • Developed by Yogi's.
    • Durable & Sustainable.
    • Natural Grip.
    • Easy-Care.
    • Made with a Unique Sealed-Cell Surface which Prevents Moisture from Entering the Mat; Keeping it Clean and in Good Condition.
    • Perfect Cushioning and Joint-Gentle.
    • The Mat Lies Flat, Due to the Particularly Compact Foam Backing
    • Non-Slip, Cushioning and Insulating.
    • High Performance.
    • Especially Odor Neutral.
    • Hygienic and Skin-Friendly.

     

    Sustainability:

    • Made to Be, Made to Last.
    • Earth Friendly.
    • 100 % Polyester Carrier with Chlorine-Free Foam Top and Phthalate-Free Foam Bottom.
    • Phthalate-Free - According to the EU directive 2005/84/EC.
    • Free from Pollutants.
    • Production Without the use of Solvents.
    • Emissions-Free Manufacturing. 
    • 100% Latex Free.
    • Certified Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX®.

     

    The  Yoga mat Overview:

    Yoga mat enriched with Biocrystal® is energizing, provides ,comfort is durable & sustainable and has a low carbon footprint. Keeps you safe from harmful substances. Supports our planet & your Yoga and contributes to a more conscious world.

    Premium materials, superior performance and unique characteristics for an elevated practice.

    It is releasing, relaxing, restful, recovering, reenergizing. Just step on the Yoga mat and you are set up to experience a conscious, effortless Yoga practice.

     

     

    Scientifically Proven to Work

     

    A unique product that uses the best well-known properties of crystals in the Biocrystal® formula. It is 100% natural and highly efficient.

    Tested parameters; depth and rhythm of respiration, heart rate and muscle tension showed a confirmed effect of reducing stress levels.

    Delivered by nature, powered by technology, and approved by science.

    Biocrystal® has obtained the Certificate of Energy Influence on Human Organism.

    Natural Effect of Crystals on your Yoga Practice & Meditation

    There is no better source of energy than nature. And right from nature, from the depth of the earth crust came crystals; a well-known source of energy which is easily transmitted to the human body.

    This smart and all-natural innovation helps you to unlock your energy potential and empowers it.

    Indian wisdom of Ayurveda teaches us that crystals work in tandem with your chakra's to bring harmony and a higher awareness to your life.

    How it Happened, our Founders Story.

    My name is Radha and I am an initiated Bhakti Yogi for 30 years now, together with Simon, who is a certified Yoga teacher we started the  Yoga mat project. We worked on innovated products; like the public Internet terminal and the voice respond app for banking, but always searching to implement Yoga and Yoga philosophy in our daily life and society.

     

    So we started a concept for Body, Mind and Soul, promoting, creating and supporting consciousness through the fashion and lifestyle brand , by use of material, design, symbols, text, affirmations and functionality and resources and energies from nature, as means to express and support our mission; Love Your Body, Open Your Mind and Be Your Soul.  We worked with conscious fashion pioneers, award-winning artist and designer Mandali Mendrilla. Since founding Atelier Mendrilla™ in 1995, Mandali has been pioneering Earth friendly and sustainable clothing.

    supports; being your higher self, contributing to a more conscious world and enjoying the qualities of your soul: YOUBBeautiful, YOUBEternal, YOUBLove, YOUBBliss, YOUBHappy, YOUBWise, YOUBPerfect, YOUBGold, YOUBGlorious, YOUBPure.

    We came up with a Yoga mat with crystals idea and we found Biocrystal® company and discovered we had a common mission and goals. We are happy we are partners for the Yoga branch.

    Implementing Crystals in a High-end Yoga mat

    Together with our manufacture here in Europe we developed a production process that impregnates the Biocrystal® powder into a High-end Yoga mat, using Yogi developed grip design, the latest durable & sustainable materials and production techniques.

     

    We made the exclusive lotus shape designed gem by Mandali Mendrilla ; 4 different crystal gems for you to personalize your mat with Rose quarts, Amethyst, Onyx or Lapis lazuli.

     

     

    We have certificated, proven to work prototypes. Our production partners here in Europe and our gem specialist, from Jaipur India are ready and will produce our first production run of 500 Yoga mats in June 2021 and with the service of our fulfillment partner, we can bring this unique Yoga mat to you.

     

    The Impact

    The impact of this innovation will be great for your Yoga experience and consciousness and will enhance your meditation, to rise the Yogi inside you, contributing to a more aware and conscious world.

    Back this project to spread more consciousness around the world!

    Support our Project, be the First to Experience the Relaxing Yoga mat

    We like to share our Yoga with the world. For that we turn to you. Please join us on our mission and support our project. Just pick one of our perks and choose your favorite crystal.

    Thank you for supporting our creations. Thank you for your commitment to a higher consciousness by means of .

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Do you like the Yoga project? Please support by sharing on your social media or wherever you can. You can also use the kickbooster.me and receive a referral fee as appreciation for sharing and spreading the word, click the ambassador logo below and check it out!

     

     

    Risks & Challenges

    The world has become a challenge, we try to support Yogi’s by offering this body and mind calming Yoga mat as an extra tool for Yogi’s to have a relaxing Yoga experience in their home or outside in nature. Yoga schools have a hard time, but there are many online Yoga practice available,  The Biocrystal® Yoga Mat, can ease and motivate self-practice and/or online Yoga classes . To stay aware, healthy, built resistance and improve your immune system, living your best life and by all means  keeping your Yoga alive.  

    Stretch Goals

    With your help, our mission will launch and we promise you more products; as the campaign hits certain funding goals, new products will be available. So share with your friends to keep the new releases coming; Bolster, Eye pillows and Meditation seat, all  designed and infused with Biocrystal®

    What Did Research & Tests Say?

    Biocrystal® technology has a tested and proven relaxing effect on users. All tested physiological parameters (depth and rhythm of respiration, heart rate, muscle tension, skin conductivity,) showed a confirmed effect of reducing stress levels.

    Tests and research of Biocrystal® showed strong influence towards improving body energy flow. Affecting to the movement of energy through the body, Biocrystal® technology creates unique and distinctive significant benefits.

    Scientifically Proven Benefits:

    • Reduce Level of Stress
    • Provide Faster Relaxation
    • Reduce Muscle Tension
    • Increase Oxygen Level
    • Reduced Fatigue
    • Improved Body Energy Flow
    • Better Focus and Deeper Meditation
    • Helps Improve Your Sleep Quality
    • Decrease Impact of EMF (electromagnetic field)

     

    Biocrystal® has obtained the Certificate of Energy Influence on Human Organism.

    How we tested

    When it comes to testing and confirming the effectiveness of Biocrystal ® powder, we were looking for the right method that will unequivocally ensure that Biocrystal ® powder has a strong relaxing effect on the user leading to stress reduction and mitigation of stress. The results of the measurements performed during the testing, undoubtedly show the ability of Biocrystal ® to further and faster relax, reduce muscle tension, increase oxygen absorption, and therefore act to reduce stress.

    Muscle activity

    Difference between BF and CF for muscle activity can be seen after 10 minutes of measurements. Its values in this period were lower for BF as they were more constant than those for CF, which gradually increased until 21:00 minutes when the difference between them was the greatest. Lower values for muscle activity typically mean higher relaxation.

    Skin conductance

    Difference between BF and CF is not so clear for the skin conductance, but statistical analysis nevertheless showed significant differences after 16 minutes of the measurements. Values for BF are generally lower in this period of measurements than those for CF, and this indicates higher relaxation for BF

    Heart rate

    Values for heart rate become lower for BF compared to CF after 8 minutes of measurements. Lower values for heart rate usually correlate with higher relaxation or with lower physical activity. Therefore, this goes in harmony with lower muscle activity by further indicating a higher relaxation.

    Temperature

    It increased much faster and achieved higher values for CF compared to BF. The BF demonstrated strong EMF protective effect.

    Respiration rate

    Difference between BF and CF was biggest in the middle of the measurements as it gradually decreased after 12 minutes towards the end. Higher respiration rate on the beginning is correlated with higher metabolic activity. It seems that BF induced some internal response in testees that increased oxygen consumption.

    Prim. Dr. Jadranko Jelić

    Specialist surgeon and specialist in internal medicine

    “The results of the research I conducted on effect of Biocrystal® show that, without any doubt, Biocrystal® users experience the greatest changes in bio potential as soon as 10 minutes after the beginning of use. The results have proven that all users experienced positive changes in the general state of the organism in that period and that the average improvement is 34.6%."

     & Biocrystal®​ In the Media:

     

    Shipping Details

    We are glad to be able to share with the world, with shipping available to more than 150 countries worldwide. To give an shipping cost indication for one Yoga mat, for the EU and surrounding counties it's variates from € 7,-- to € 21,-- If you live outside the EU; for the US, Canada and Australia it is € 33,-- For other countries fee's you can check for the most updated shipping rate for your country, by beginning the oder process and inputting your shipping info. There are a handful of special regions (remote islands etc.) with unique handling rates. If that's the case, we may reach out after we produced the Yoga mat to collect any additional fees that apply. Note: There's an additional shipping fee for orders to Hawaii and Alaska. If you order from Hawaii or Alaska, we'll email you with payment instructions when the campaign ends for the additional fee.

    Who is Responsible for any Additional Taxes, Duties or VAT?

    Depending on your country, in some instances you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information. It is 0% in the EU and US but varies internationally.

Overall Joy and Wellbeing
Improved Health and Immune system.

 
 
The 16 different crystals inside the mat
 

 

 
The mat is Designed for YOU to Be YOU. 
Our team of Yogi’s designed a yoga mat you can personalize; with our 4 different crystal gem options in lotus petal shape. The lotus is the symbol for growth, transformation and development. It is the flower of rebirth and spiritual enlightenment. Which one fits you the most: Amethyst, Onyx, Lapis lazuli or Rose Quarts?

 
         
 
For Who, What, How and When?
Our mat is perfect for all kinds of Yoga practice and meditation sessions;  is high performing, has an unrivalled grip, even in really sweaty conditions.
Made in the EU, by Yogi's for Yogi's. 

High end Features:

2,5 kg; 185 x 65 cm; 6 mm Thick.
Developed by Yogi's.
Durable & Sustainable.
Natural Grip.
Easy-Care.
Made with a Unique Sealed-Cell Surface which Prevents Moisture from Entering the Mat; Keeping it Clean and in Good Condition.
Perfect Cushioning and Joint-Gentle.
The Mat Lies Flat, Due to the Particularly Compact Foam Backing
Non-Slip, Cushioning and Insulating.
High Performance.
Especially Odor Neutral.
Hygienic and Skin-Friendly.

 
Sustainability:

Made to Be, Made to Last.
Earth Friendly.
100 % Polyester Carrier with Chlorine-Free Foam Top and Phthalate-Free Foam Bottom.
Phthalate-Free - According to the EU directive 2005/84/EC.
Free from Pollutants.
Production Without the use of Solvents.
Emissions-Free Manufacturing. 
100% Latex Free.
Certified Standard 100 by OEKO-TEX®.

 
The  Yoga mat Overview:
Yoga mat enriched with Biocrystal® is energizing, provides ,comfort is durable & sustainable and has a low carbon footprint. Keeps you safe from harmful substances. Supports our planet & your Yoga and contributes to a more conscious world.
Premium materials, superior performance and unique characteristics for an elevated practice.
It is releasing, relaxing, restful, recovering, reenergizing. Just step on the  Yoga mat and you are set up to experience a conscious, effortless Yoga practice.

 
 
Scientifically Proven to Work

 
A unique product that uses the best well-known properties of crystals in the Biocrystal® formula. It is 100% natural and highly efficient.
Tested parameters; depth and rhythm of respiration, heart rate and muscle tension showed a confirmed effect of reducing stress levels.
Delivered by nature, powered by technology, and approved by science.
Biocrystal® has obtained the Certificate of Energy Influence on Human Organism.
Natural Effect of Crystals on your Yoga Practice & Meditation
There is no better source of energy than nature. And right from nature, from the depth of the earth crust came crystals; a well-known source of energy which is easily transmitted to the human body.
This smart and all-natural innovation helps you to unlock your energy potential and empowers it.
Indian wisdom of Ayurveda teaches us that crystals work in tandem with your chakra's to bring harmony and a higher awareness to your life.
How it Happened, our Founders Story.
My name is Radha and I am an initiated Bhakti Yogi for 30 years now, together with Simon, who is a certified Yoga teacher we started the  Yoga mat project. We worked on innovated products; like the public Internet terminal and the voice respond app for banking, but always searching to implement Yoga and Yoga philosophy in our daily life and society.

 
So we started a concept for Body, Mind and Soul, promoting, creating and supporting consciousness through the fashion and lifestyle brand , by use of material, design, symbols, text, affirmations and functionality and resources and energies from nature, as means to express and support our mission; Love Your Body, Open Your Mind and Be Your Soul.  We worked with conscious fashion pioneers, award-winning artist and designer Mandali Mendrilla. Since founding Atelier Mendrilla™ in 1995, Mandali has been pioneering Earth friendly and sustainable clothing.
 supports; being your higher self, contributing to a more conscious world and enjoying the qualities of your soul: YOUBBeautiful, YOUBEternal, YOUBLove, YOUBBliss, YOUBHappy, YOUBWise, YOUBPerfect, YOUBGold, YOUBGlorious, YOUBPure.

We came up with a Yoga mat with crystals idea and we found Biocrystal® company and discovered we had a common mission and goals. We are happy we are partners for the Yoga branch.
Implementing Crystals in a High-end Yoga mat
Together with our manufacture here in Europe we developed a production process that impregnates the Biocrystal® powder into a High-end Yoga mat, using Yogi developed grip design, the latest durable & sustainable materials and production techniques.

 
We made the exclusive  lotus shape designed gem by Mandali Mendrilla ; 4 different crystal gems for you to personalize your mat with Rose quarts, Amethyst, Onyx or Lapis lazuli.

 
 
We have certificated, proven to work prototypes. Our production partners here in Europe and our gem specialist, from Jaipur India are ready and will produce our first production run of 500 Yoga mats in June 2021 and with the service of our fulfillment partner, we can bring this unique Yoga mat to you.
 

The Impact
The impact of this innovation will be great for your Yoga experience and consciousness and will enhance your meditation, to rise the Yogi inside you, contributing to a more aware and conscious world.
Back this project to spread more consciousness around the world!
Support our Project, be the First to Experience the Relaxing Yoga mat 
We like to share our Yoga with the world. For that we turn to you. Please join us on our mission and support our project. Just pick one of our perks and choose your favorite crystal.
Thank you for supporting our creations. Thank you for your commitment to a higher consciousness by means of .
Other Ways You Can Help
Do you like the  Yoga project? Please support by sharing on your social media or wherever you can. You can also use the kickbooster.me and receive a referral fee as appreciation for sharing and spreading the word, click the ambassador logo below and check it out!
 

 
Risks & Challenges
The world has become a challenge, we try to support Yogi’s by offering this body and mind calming Yoga mat as an extra tool for Yogi’s to have a relaxing Yoga experience in their home or outside in nature. Yoga schools have a hard time, but there are many online Yoga practice available,  The Biocrystal® Yoga Mat, can ease and motivate self-practice and/or online Yoga classes . To stay aware, healthy, built resistance and improve your immune system, living your best life and by all means  keeping your Yoga alive.  
Stretch Goals
With your help, our mission will launch and we promise you more  products; as the campaign hits certain funding goals, new products will be available. So share with your friends to keep the new releases coming; Bolster, Eye pillows and Meditation seat, all  designed and infused with Biocrystal®
What Did Research & Tests Say?
Biocrystal® technology has a tested and proven relaxing effect on users. All tested physiological parameters (depth and rhythm of respiration, heart rate, muscle tension, skin conductivity,) showed a confirmed effect of reducing stress levels.
Tests and research of Biocrystal® showed strong influence towards improving body energy flow. Affecting to the movement of energy through the body, Biocrystal® technology creates unique and distinctive significant benefits.
Scientifically Proven Benefits:

Reduce Level of Stress
Provide Faster Relaxation
Reduce Muscle Tension
Increase Oxygen Level
Reduced Fatigue
Improved Body Energy Flow
Better Focus and Deeper Meditation
Helps Improve Your Sleep Quality
Decrease Impact of EMF (electromagnetic field)

 
Biocrystal® has obtained the Certificate of Energy Influence on Human Organism.
How we tested
When it comes to testing and confirming the effectiveness of Biocrystal ® powder, we were looking for the right method that will unequivocally ensure that Biocrystal ® powder has a strong relaxing effect on the user leading to stress reduction and mitigation of stress. The results of the measurements performed during the testing, undoubtedly show the ability of Biocrystal ® to further and faster relax, reduce muscle tension, increase oxygen absorption, and therefore act to reduce stress.
Muscle activity
Difference between BF and CF for muscle activity can be seen after 10 minutes of measurements. Its values in this period were lower for BF as they were more constant than those for CF, which gradually increased until 21:00 minutes when the difference between them was the greatest. Lower values for muscle activity typically mean higher relaxation.
Skin conductance
Difference between BF and CF is not so clear for the skin conductance, but statistical analysis nevertheless showed significant differences after 16 minutes of the measurements. Values for BF are generally lower in this period of measurements than those for CF, and this indicates higher relaxation for BF
Heart rate
Values for heart rate become lower for BF compared to CF after 8 minutes of measurements. Lower values for heart rate usually correlate with higher relaxation or with lower physical activity. Therefore, this goes in harmony with lower muscle activity by further indicating a higher relaxation.
Temperature
It increased much faster and achieved higher values for CF compared to BF. The BF demonstrated strong EMF protective effect.
Respiration rate
Difference between BF and CF was biggest in the middle of the measurements as it gradually decreased after 12 minutes towards the end. Higher respiration rate on the beginning is correlated with higher metabolic activity. It seems that BF induced some internal response in testees that increased oxygen consumption.
Prim. Dr. Jadranko Jelić

Specialist surgeon and specialist in internal medicine
“The results of the research I conducted on effect of Biocrystal® show that, without any doubt, Biocrystal® users experience the greatest changes in bio potential as soon as 10 minutes after the beginning of use. The results have proven that all users experienced positive changes in the general state of the organism in that period and that the average improvement is 34.6%."
 & Biocrystal®​ In the Media:



 
Shipping Details
We are glad to be able to share  with the world, with shipping available to more than 150 countries worldwide. To give an shipping cost indication for one Yoga mat, for the EU and surrounding counties it's variates from € 7,-- to € 21,-- If you live outside the EU; for the US, Canada and Australia it is € 33,-- For other countries fee's you can check for the most updated shipping rate for your country, by beginning the oder process and inputting your shipping info. There are a handful of special regions (remote islands etc.) with unique handling rates. If that's the case, we may reach out after we produced the Yoga mat to collect any additional fees that apply. Note: There's an additional shipping fee for orders to Hawaii and Alaska. If you order from Hawaii or Alaska, we'll email you with payment instructions when the campaign ends for the additional fee.
Who is Responsible for any Additional Taxes, Duties or VAT?
Depending on your country, in some instances you may be responsible for paying duty, taxes or other applicable fees before you can receive your package. These policies are set locally, so please check with the relevant sources where you live for the most accurate information. It is 0% in the EU and US but varies internationally.

story:
We know what you pumped last summer!

And we’re here to change that with a revolution in SUPing: self-inflating boards for the best paddling experience on earth. While everyone else is busy pumping, SipaBoards Air models have already entered production. We have the hottest entry-level board on the water in the SipaBoards NEO for the unbeatable price of price 640 USD. For more experienced paddlers there are also 3 other awesome models. Early shipping will be in spring 2017. Spread the word around the world: pumping is so last year!!!

But don't just take our word for it, look for yourself at what others have said:
 

    
                                                                    

 

Scroll down to learn more about:

 

The Innovation

The SipaBoards Air is a world-class SUP with a revolutionary innovation: self-inflation right before your eyes. The compressor unit, which doubles as a standard fin box, is built in right where the inflation valve on a normal SUP would be. The rechargeable battery slides in and out, and then with a wave of your hand your board pumps up to the perfect pressure every time. Let us do the hard work for you - while you get ready for your session, stretch out, or simply enjoy the view.  

So toss your clunky old hand-pump away and hit the water in style: with your SipaBoards Air. 

Why Is This Revolutionary? 

SUP works out your whole body, especially core muscles and your cardiovascular system, and it's tons of fun to go paddling with friends in the great outdoors. Now wonder that paddleboarding is one of the fastest-growing sports in the world.

Pumping, though, in a word: SUCKS! The SipaBoards air saves you the time and energy you’d rather be spending on the water. 

That's all the benefits of inflatable SUP (iSUP) technology with none of the downsides. 

 

The Cast of Characters 

 

 

You can get your SipaBoards Air in 4 beautiful varieties so your SUP experience is a true expression of your goals and desires as a paddleboarder. All models are made of the same ultra-durable drop-stitch technology: dual layer on the premium boards and single layer on the Neo, with reinforced rail sides. Of course they all feature SipaBoards’ patented, fully-integrated SipaAir compressor. The only difference between them is size, shape, and volume, depending entirely on your interests and paddling style:

 

The SipaBoards Neo is a fun and stylish entry-level board for lighter paddlers (up to 225lbs), with the absolute best deal on the market. It has a narrower shape and slimmer profile, making for a straighter line in the water with tons of maneuverability. The Neo is a world-class quality for every pocket.

Our All-Rounder is for paddlers of all ages and ability levels, as it's sturdy as a ship. Families and those who are into SUP for the fun of it will love this model, which works as well as a SUP as it does as a mobile diving board - endless summer fun.

The Cruiser is a faster model, based on the same shape as the original SipaBoards Drive line, for the adventurer who wants to get out on the water in minutes and keep paddling for hours. You will enjoy its straight lines and sleek shape, which cut through the chop and take you wherever your body powers you. 

Our Balance model is in perfect harmony and comes outfitted with an anchor and dedicated hook rings. You will take this board to find your favorite hidden spot and enjoy a moment of serenity, relying on its stability to support you as you do yoga or train your core muscles. 

All boards feature a 12-month warranty.

What's in the Box? 

 Tech Specs

 

 

 

 

Features

 

 

Self-Inflation 

The heart of every SipaBoards Air is the SipaAir compressor, powered by a removable and rechargeable battery that slides right into its slot.  

App 

The compressor is connected to our existing SipaApp via Bluetooth technology. It can display a pressure gauge on the paddleboarder’s smartphone, and you can also track your paddling sessions. We’re still developing the compressor’s smart functions and we are hoping to introduce an anti-theft alarm and board finder.

 

 

 

 

Simply activate the switch to start self-inflation. Our switch is magnetic so that the SipaAir compressor stays waterproof, with no external contacts. 

 

 

Board Bag 

Our awesome board bag not only your SipaBoard, but also a collapsible paddle and fin, as well as whatever else you need for your session. Toss it on your back and off you’ll go.

 

 

The board bag feels so comfortable on your shoulders that you can even throw it on your back when biking to your favorite body of water. 

 

 

Safety Leash

One more innovation will ease your few steps into the surf. Our safety leash has a dual purpose: to keep you and your board together on the water, but also as a shoulder strap for easy transport.

 

 

All our features are designed to streamline and speed up the pre-paddling process, to remove anything that would stop you from paddling, and to make paddleboarding exactly what it was meant to be: pure fun. Get out on the water faster, longer, and more often. 

Paddle

Don't have a paddle? Want one? Just add $150 to your perk. Our three-piece carbon-fiber paddle is light as a feather, sturdy as a rock, and fits right into the board bag. 

 

 

Timeline

Boards are already in production and will ship in August.

 

Development 

We came out in 2015 with a SUP that set the industry on fire, even winning the Red Dot Best of the Best award! You can check it out here. The SipaBoards Air is just a natural evolution of the R&D we've been up to for over 2 years now.

Check out a collage of pictures from our first year of testing and touring. 

Our solution is (obviously) water-tight, salt-water friendly, lightweight but extremely durable, easily rechargeable, and most of all - fun: a high-power compressor built right into your SUP with an integrated finbox. Killing all the birds with one stone!

When demoed our innovation at trade fairs like ISPO and Paddle Expo, the response was humbled amazement, as people shouted that we are, without a doubt, the future of inflatable stand up paddleboards (iSUP). 

 

We gained a ton of experience setting up production from our first crowdfunding campaign last year. Our product is made of hundreds of pieces developed in-house. Naturally we went through all sorts of teething problems to deliver an awesome product to our backers. We mastered tooling, molds, the manufacturing process, assembly, packaging, and shipping logistics.

Now that the boards from our second round of crowdsourcing are in production, we can't wait to send you your board.

So be one of the first people in the world to get your hands on a SipaBoards Air - the self-inflating iSUP of the future.

SipaBoards Team 

The team of paddlers, designers, developers, and outdoor enthusiasts that brought you the first generation of SipaBoards is back. Our new innovation is the next step in our mission to bring SUP to as many people as possible. As lovers of physical activity and the outdoors, our goal is not necessarily to make SUPing easier, but to make it easier to SUP.

Sebastjan Sitar - Founder, product development
Saša Droljc - Founder, logistics 
Žiga Božič - Product research and development
Uroš Brojan - Product design and business development
Jaro Jelovac - Industrial and graphic design
Andrej Podbevšek - Visuals, content development
Josh Rocchio - Copywriting, Social Media
Marja Feldin - Marketing and Sales
Matej Praprotnik - Social media
Nina Čavž - Media, PR
Domen Sitar - Manufacturing
Nicola Conte - Sales
Rok Jarc - Mobile development
Miha Kerle - Web development

Special thanks to Samo Vidic, Uroš Podlogar, and Marko Ocepek for awesome photography; Luka Leskovšek for polishing our video; Tadej Droljc and Mirko Medved for sound editing; Joe Steiner for taking care our boards are top notch, and of course our families for all their support.

story:
As parents we want the best for our kids, right? We knew a balance bike was the best way to teach balance skills and the fastest way to pedal freedom. ​

You may have bought bikes in the past only to realise that they grew out of it super fast! 

As an engineer and keen cyclist, I knew a better solution was possible. 

Meet MonkeyCycle!

The Modular bike that grows with your child.

 

 

The Different Bike Kits That Grow With Your Child | 8 In 1 Kits

What we have built is a bike that lasts as your child grows through the different kits, you can use a kit to change the bike from  9 months all the way up to 6 years old.

 

A Kids Bike Built With Quality That Lasts 

As a parent I wanted to build something that only saved money but also built a product that lasted. I've spent a lot of attention to every detail of the project. 

 

 

The Story Of Monkeycycle

We bought a high-end balance bike from Germany, but sadly it was too heavy for our kid. ​ The lack of brakes in our hilly neighbourhood bothered us. Also, he grew out of it super fast. ​As an engineer and keen cyclist, I knew a better solution was possible.

We researched and asked parents and kids what they wanted from a bike/ride on toy and took notes, market research came next, it seemed no one was making anything like what we had in mind. Design started in 2015 and we have finally got to the stage of being able to launch to market.

story:
Are you ready to cut the cord? Your phone, your headphones, and even your vacuum cleaner have been freed from the tyranny of clunky cords, making your life so much better. Cordless is the future! And the cordless revolution is now. So why are we still drying our hair with the same outdated technology that our grandmothers used back in the day? 

Because there was never battery powerful enough to get the job done. Until now...

AER’s mission is to provide you freedom, flexibility, and improve your hair health.  After 8 years of development, we are prepared to blow you away with a cordless hair dryer so innovative, that we beat Dyson to it. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Break the old blow-dry mold and Be Free with AER! With 13 built-in sensors, the AER hair dryer’s artificial intelligence system learns how you like to dry your hair and optimizes the heat and fan speed for a healthy blow dry. AER is also the only hair dryer with a DC ionizer. Frizz, be gone!

The AER dryer is designed to team-up with our smartphone app, which unlocks expert tips to help you make the most of your AER drying experience and keep your locks healthy and beautiful. Continual connectivity enables your AER dryer to keep getting smarter, tailoring the drying experience perfectly to your preferences. Get ready to turn some heads!


 

 



Meet AER: the world’s first cordless, artificially intelligent hairdryer. Gone are the days of blasting your locks with too much heat, causing stress and damage. AER hair dryers can seamlessly go from corded to cordless. They use less heat to tend to your tresses, helping to optimize health and shine, while the AI technology adjusts to your styling preferences, you can transform your look easily and quickly. The AER hair dryer’s ergonomic and lightweight design also provides the flexibility modern life demands, meaning you can blow dry your hair from any room in the house, and wherever you go. Cut loose. Be free.


AER’s production planning has NOT been impacted by the pandemic. We are on track to deliver AER hair dryers in November 2020. In time for the holidays!

What Comes In The Box:

  • AER Dryer
  • Quick Charge Base
  • Narrow Concentrator
  • Wide Concentrator
  • Diffuser
  • 9ft Cloth Braided Travel Charging Cord

 

 

 

Imagine how many days a year you use your hair dryer, that's a lot of power!

For every 100 standard dryers replaced with an AER hair dryer, we remove the energy equivalent of 4.5 car emissions from the road annually.

That’s because we reinvented the hair dryer from the inside out. A standard hair dryer operates at 1500 watts. Due to AER’s technology, you get a fast hair dry with healthier results  at just 500 watts!

Help us support the environment by reaching our goal of 10,000 dryers. That’s equivalent to removing 450 car emissions from the road annually.

Next stop, one million, equivalent of 45,000 car emissions removed from the road annually. Are you with us?

Our journey began in 2012. As lifelong entrepreneurs, we identified an opportunity to revolutionize and advance the hair care industry, which had largely been static for the past 100 years. With a mission to change this, AER was born.

AER is a global technology company with an aim to disrupt and reinvent hair care tools and to seamlessly bridge the gap between beauty and technology. Our goal is to create smart, innovative, battery operated products that are both high performing and eco-friendly, while also freeing consumers from the hassle of cords. Of course, this means continually engaging with cutting-edge engineering and innovative talent.

We assembled a top team of experts, including electrical and mechanical engineers, scientists, marketing executives and brand developers to build the world’s first fully functional and patented SmartDry™ AI cordless hairdryer. AER is a modern workforce, having been fully remote long before it was commonplace. Much like the cordless products AER creates, AER is not tethered to a single location, which allowed us to comprise a team of the most brilliant minds from around the globe. Uninhibited by location, commutes, or office overhead – all resources go directly to creating this innovative and revolutionary product.

Privately held and remotely “headquartered” in Milwaukee, WI, AER believes in putting the power of beautiful, healthy hair in everyone’s hands, with stunning, technologically advanced products that take self-care to the next level.

AER will unleash its hero product, the AER dryer, in 2020, followed by other cordless hair care tools. Let’s be free.
story_txt:
Are you ready to cut the cord? Your phone, your headphones, and even your vacuum cleaner have been freed from the tyranny of clunky cords, making your life so much better. Cordless is the future! And the cordless revolution is now. So why are we still drying our hair with the same outdated technology that our grandmothers used back in the day? Because there was never battery powerful enough to get the job done. Until now...AER’s mission is to provide you freedom, flexibility, and improve your hair health.  After 8 years of development, we are prepared to blow you away with a cordless hair dryer so innovative, that we beat Dyson to it.       Break the old blow-dry mold and Be Free with AER! With 13 built-in sensors, the AER hair dryer’s artificial intelligence system learns how you like to dry your hair and optimizes the heat and fan speed for a healthy blow dry. AER is also the only hair dryer with a DC ionizer. Frizz, be gone!The AER dryer is designed to team-up with our smartphone app, which unlocks expert tips to help you make the most of your AER drying experience and keep your locks healthy and beautiful. Continual connectivity enables your AER dryer to keep getting smarter, tailoring the drying experience perfectly to your preferences. Get ready to turn some heads!  Meet AER: the world’s first cordless, artificially intelligent hairdryer. Gone are the days of blasting your locks with too much heat, causing stress and damage. AER hair dryers can seamlessly go from corded to cordless. They use less heat to tend to your tresses, helping to optimize health and shine, while the AI technology adjusts to your styling preferences, you can transform your look easily and quickly. The AER hair dryer’s ergonomic and lightweight design also provides the flexibility modern life demands, meaning you can blow dry your hair from any room in the house, and wherever you go. Cut loose. Be free.AER’s production planning has NOT been impacted by the pandemic. We are on track to deliver AER hair dryers in November 2020. In time for the holidays!What Comes In The Box:

story:
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

We know you’ll love Snore Circle as much as we do. In fact, if for any reason you’re not completely satisfied, just return within 30 days and we’ll issue a full refund of your contribution.

 

IN THE PRESS

 

 

"So you are tired of snoring and disturbing your partner at night? With Snore Circle, you can deal with it." – Cool Wearable
 
"Those looking for a snoring solution will find the 'Snore Circle' to be one of the more advanced options out there when it comes to eliminating the nighttime annoyance." – TRENDHUNTER
 
"To use the device, put it on your ear, turn it on, and you are set." – Gadgetify 
 
"If you are like me, then you will want to try Snore Circle, as I am pretty loud when sleeping." – TECH Malak
 
"Its portable design makes it a nice travel gadget for snorers." – Gadgetsin
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We are proud to have our fulfillment plan certified by Floship, a leading crowdfunding fulfillment provider. 

We have calculated the optimal means of shipping Snore Circle to all markets in a fast and cost effective manner.

For proof of certification into the fulfillment plan please click here.

Risks and Challenges

We've developed, launched, and delivered a successful Snore Circle Version 1.0 and 2.0. Based on the feedback from our existing customers - we believe that the Indiegogo platform is well suited to provide us with input and feedback for the third generation Snore Circle. We've answered all the improvements in our new design from the first and second generation, and are looking toward Indiegogo to help us create the perfect Snore Circle. With that in mind, some specifications may still change later in the campaign.

We estimate deliveries to begin in October/November 2016 and we will do our best to meet this deadline. If we encounter any delays, we will always make sure that we share this news with you.

 

FAQ

Q: How long does it take to charge the battery? How long does the battery last when fully charged?

A: It takes about 2 hours to fully charge the battery, and when fully charged, the battery can last for 2 nights. We recommended charging it every day.

Q: How does SnoreCircle work?

A: Snoring is mainly caused by the vibration in the soft palate as a result of the relaxation that occurs in your throat muscles that keep the airway unobstructed. Our SnoreCircle precisely detects and identifies snoring sounds with the bone conduction and sound recognition technologies, and then intervenes physically with micro sounds and micro vibrations at 54 levels. When the intervention is successful, the soft tissue at the back of the throat will contract and tighten to open the airway wider, so that you breathe smoothly, and thus stop or diminish snoring.

Q: When will be the delivery?

A: In two weeks after the crowdfunding campaign ends, so when everything goes well, we will have the perks delivered in late October or early November. 

Q: Is SnoreCircle harmful to the human body?

A: SnoreCircle does no harm to the human body because it is worn only during sleep time, it works automatically upon startup without the need to turn on Bluetooth, and it is made of ecologically sound silicon.

Q. How long is the warranty period?

A: 1 year.

Q. Where can I download the App?

A: iPhone users can go to the App Store and search for SnoreCircle. Android users can go to the Google play and search for SnoreCircle.

Q: Is it noisy? Could it wake me up?

A: It may take about 3 days for a small part of customers to adapt to SnoreCircle, and during this process, they may be woken up very occasionally. After this short period has elapsed, however, the customer will enjoy a good night sleep and feel refreshed in the morning.

Q: Is it a must for SnoreCircle to work with the app?

A: You can use SnoreCircle alone, which can work and store data on its own. To view the data, you need to download the SnoreCircle App and bind your product via Bluetooth for data synchronization.

Q: Can the SnoreCircle App run on all sorts of mobile phones?

A: iPhone 4S or later versions can download and run the app. Android 4.3 or later versions with the support of Bluetooth 4.0 can download and run the app.

Q: My question is not here. Who can I contact?

A: Send us a message at crowdfund@vvfly.cn and one of our Support Staff will assist you.

story:
TUWAN will help you stop snoring for good. After years of development, Tuwan’s advanced technology can detect your snores at a rate of over 90% (above the industry standard). Plus, it doesn’t require you to wear anything on your face whatsoever.
The Tuwan pillow pad goes under your pillow, and the pad itself is completely electricity and radiation-free.  Its smart app also helps you track and measure your progress. TUWAN aims to offer you the pure snore-free sleep that you and your partner has been waiting for.



 


(10,000+ hrs of real sleep data collected)

(Reduced Snoring Volume with TUWAN)



 


 


(TUWAN compares with other common solutions)
 

Snoring is caused by an obstruction of breath in your airway while you’re asleep. Especially when sleeping on your back, your muscles relax, and the soft tissue in your throat drops into your airway. The obstructed airflow makes a vibration that causes you to snore.
 

 

 



 

Your Tuwan pad is connected to a small electronic device called the “Bedsider” which you’ll keep on your bedside table. It can accurately detect over 90% of your snores during the night.
 


 

The Bedsider effectively detects your snores using its sophisticated patented algorithm. After detection, it signals the anti-snoring pad, which very precisely turns your head to the side by activating a silent pump that inflates and deflates 4 air bags inside the pad under your pillow.




This gentle and precise movement stimulates the soft tissue obstructing your breath, enlarging your airway and reducing your snoring. Your snores stop, and you and your partner both sleep more soundly!

 


(Click to see Tuwan Work Principle Video )
 



Because Tuwan’s smart technology exists inside the Bedsider, there is no electricity or radiation coming from the pad itself, making it ultra-safe.


The pad inflates quietly at only 35 db, about the level of a whisper, because your uninterrupted sleep is our highest priority.

 


All you need to do is insert your TUWAN anti-snore pillow pad into your favorite pillow and enjoy snore-free sleep for you and your partner!

(Cllick for TUWAN Official Setup Guide)

 



 

Through Tuwan’s app, you can check your personal, real-time snore analytics through daily, weekly, and monthly reports to track the progress and improvement of your sleep. The app also allows you to manually adjust your pad’s inflation height, record your snores as an FYI, and more.
 



Your weekly/monthly snore analytics

 



Record your snore 
 

Adjust your pad’s sensitivity



Sleep is the foundation for our everyday life. We spent years on the development of this product, focusing on five key areas: true effectiveness, comfort, safety, low noise levels, and an app that will allow users to see their progress in action. We’re so excited to bring this fantastic product to market to serve the 90 million people impacted by the negative effects of snoring. 
We need your help to make this happen!

 


 

This is our 3rd generation of the TUWAN anti-snore pad, which has had many amazing upgrades. In this latest model, we were able to reduce the pad to a travel-friendly size, and bring the noise level down to a whisper.

 


Over thousands of tests, we’ve significantly upgraded our patented snore detection technology, which can easily distinguish the noise from your TV or a conversation from your snores. Because Tuwan has a high accuracy rate 90%, it’s a fierce competitor for other products on the market.

 

 


 

 


Tuwan Anti-snore Pad owns 28 patents and CE/FCC Certifications.

 

 



 

TUWAN is a snoring prevention device. It is suitable for individuals suffering from obstructive snoring and sleep apnea. If you or your partner deal with constant snoring, TUWAN can play a significant role in enhancing your sleep continuity, and in turn your daytime performance. TUWAN is not 100% effective for everyone.

 

 

For details on our warranty and terms of service, please refer to www.tuwan21.com. For additional technical questions, please contact service@tuwan21.com.

 

---

FAQ - About the Device

Q: Does the smart anti-snoring product need to be plugged in all the time while using?

A: Yes, the device should always be plugged in during work. However, electricity just goes to the bedsider, the product’s in-bed sub-unit (the pad or pillow) is completely free of charges or radiation. Please feel free to use.

 Q: Anti-snoring actions are conducted by air bag inflation/deflation, would the air bags burst?

A: No, air bags won’t burst in normal use. Single air bag’s maximum pressure endurance is 150KPA which means it could load 3 normally weighted adults to sit on it. Moreover, there is a control in the circuit to avoid pumping all the time.

Q: I just started using my new product, have not gotten used to it yet. When I was sleeping, the air bag inflated up, pushed my head and waked me up, what should I do?

A: Some people are sleep-sensitive, it may take some time for them to get used to the product.

Please go to “Settings” --> “Anti-snoring Action” -> “Sensitivity Adjustment”, switch it to a lower sensitivity level, in order to reduce the maximum height of air inflation.

Q: What is the difference between this smart anti-snoring pad/pillow and other products in the market?

A: Firstly, different from most similar category of products in the market, the in-bed sub-unit of this product - the pad or pillow - is free of charges or radiation, that means this product is safe enough for use.

Secondly, air pressure sensoring technology was utilized by this product, which accurately detects the user’s head position, in order to offer targeting and accurate anti-snoring actions for the user. Also, this could avoid embedding electronic components into the pad or the pillow.

Q：What should I do if I felt my pillow raised up too high?

A: Please change the setting in the app: “Settings” -> “Anti-snoring Settings” -> “Inflatable Height Adjustment”, choose a lower inflatable height. Also, in “Sensitivity Adjustment”, you could choose a lower sensitivity level.

Q：Why does the smart anti-snoring pillow inflate up when there is no snoring sound?

A: Snore detection of the smart anti-snoring pillow is based on algorithm, some rhythmic sounds or vibrations may be wrongly recognized, but this won’t affect much. You may also low down its sound sensitivity level to reduce the possibility of wrong detection.

Q: Sometimes, I can hear a slight short “clicking” sound coming out from the bedsider, what is it?

A: The pad or the pillow processes air pressure detecting frequently, which lasts for 0.2 seconds each time. Some sleep-sensitive users may feel about it. This is not of quality problem which won’t affect your use.

--- 
FAQ - App Use

Q: How do I connect a device?

A: Please download and install the Anti-snore Solution app to your mobile phone, turn on Bluetooth of your mobile phone, follow the instructions to connect to the device.

After your app is connected to the device, all data will be synchronized from the device and be generated into a report. If the device is unplugged and turned on again, you will need to re-connect the app.

Q: Is it possible to use the smart anti-snoring product without connecting to the app?

A: The product can be used even if not connected with the app. When snores are detected, the air bag anti-snoring actions will be triggered, however, if the device is not connected with the app, no report is going to be generated on the app.

Q: While using the product, could I turn off Bluetooth, power off the mobile phone or put it far away from the bedsider?

A: No problem, the app does not affect the device even if the Bluetooth is off, even if your mobile phone is turned off or be placed away from the device. Just please note, in that case, the data might not be presented onto the report immediately. No data report shows up until you turn on Bluetooth, open the app and have it connected with the device again.

Q: What should I do if the app does not synchronize data?

A: After using, if you find there is no data in the report or you are not able to refresh data, firstly, please check and make sure the Bluetooth is turned on and the app is well connected with the device. Please try to terminate the app and open it again. It will take some time to synchronize data. During the process of synchronization, do not operate your mobile phone. After this, the data will be presented in the report.

Q: What does it mean for “Anti-snoring Action On/Off”?

A: When”Anti-snoring Action” is switched off (Inactive), the device just monitors snoring and records the data without offering any anti-snoring actions; when it is switched on (Active), anti-snoring actions will be offered when snores are detected. The user could compare the results from both modes to judge the effectiveness to him/her.

---

FAQ - Functions & Operation

Q: How does smart anti-snoring product stop snoring?

A: Air inflation/deflation of the smart anti-snoring product gently turns the user's head aside, relieves air way obstruction, so that to reduce snoring.

At present, except for using respiratory machine or accepting surgery treatment, changing sleeping position is the most effective way to treat snoring.

Q: Is the smart anti-snoring product effective for all snorers?

A: The smart anti-snoring product is effective for most obstructive snoring, but it may be not so effective in improving central type or mixed type of snoring.

Q: Is it possible for the Smart Anti-snoring products to distinguish snores from husband and wife?

A: The Smart Anti-snoring product features snore detection, but it may not be able to distinguish snores from two people who are very close from each other. We suggest that you could adjust the device’s sensitivity to “Low” level and put the device closer to the person whom you want it to work for.

Q: Is it ok for children, old people or pregnant women to use the product?

A: Children or pregnant women are not recommended to use the product.

People over 80 years old are not recommended to use the product.

Q: Does the smart anti-snoring pillow produce big noises? Will the noise affect the sleep of my bed partner?

A: The current noise volume is 35dB. which is lower than general ambient noise and much less than the noise generated by air conditioning or air cleaner. Please make sure the environmental noise no more than 40dB in your room.

 

Founded in 2015, Tuwan was developed by a leading team of experts specializing in health, mobile, intelligent hardware, and medical equipment. We are committed to raising awareness around the negative effects of snoring and sleep apnea on your quality of life, and to creating the technology to help people tackle this important issue long term.

Some sleep-sensitive users may feel about it. This is not of quality problem which won’t affect your use.--- FAQ - App UseQ: How do I connect a device?A: Please download and install the Anti-snore Solution app to your mobile phone, turn on Bluetooth of your mobile phone, follow the instructions to connect to the device.After your app is connected to the device, all data will be synchronized from the device and be generated into a report. If the device is unplugged and turned on again, you will need to re-connect the app.Q: Is it possible to use the smart anti-snoring product without connecting to the app?A: The product can be used even if not connected with the app. When snores are detected, the air bag anti-snoring actions will be triggered, however, if the device is not connected with the app, no report is going to be generated on the app.Q: While using the product, could I turn off Bluetooth, power off the mobile phone or put it far away from the bedsider?A: No problem, the app does not affect the device even if the Bluetooth is off, even if your mobile phone is turned off or be placed away from the device. Just please note, in that case, the data might not be presented onto the report immediately. No data report shows up until you turn on Bluetooth, open the app and have it connected with the device again.Q: What should I do if the app does not synchronize data?A: After using, if you find there is no data in the report or you are not able to refresh data, firstly, please check and make sure the Bluetooth is turned on and the app is well connected with the device. Please try to terminate the app and open it again. It will take some time to synchronize data. During the process of synchronization, do not operate your mobile phone. After this, the data will be presented in the report.Q: What does it mean for “Anti-snoring Action On/Off”?A: When”Anti-snoring Action” is switched off (Inactive), the device just monitors snoring and records the data without offering any anti-snoring actions; when it is switched on (Active), anti-snoring actions will be offered when snores are detected. The user could compare the results from both modes to judge the effectiveness to him/her.---FAQ - Functions & OperationQ: How does smart anti-snoring product stop snoring?A: Air inflation/deflation of the smart anti-snoring product gently turns the user's head aside, relieves air way obstruction, so that to reduce snoring.At present, except for using respiratory machine or accepting surgery treatment, changing sleeping position is the most effective way to treat snoring.Q: Is the smart anti-snoring product effective for all snorers?A: The smart anti-snoring product is effective for most obstructive snoring, but it may be not so effective in improving central type or mixed type of snoring.Q: Is it possible for the Smart Anti-snoring products to distinguish snores from husband and wife?A: The Smart Anti-snoring product features snore detection, but it may not be able to distinguish snores from two people who are very close from each other. We suggest that you could adjust the device’s sensitivity to “Low” level and put the device closer to the person whom you want it to work for.Q: Is it ok for children, old people or pregnant women to use the product?A: Children or pregnant women are not recommended to use the product.People over 80 years old are not recommended to use the product.Q: Does the smart anti-snoring pillow produce big noises? Will the noise affect the sleep of my bed partner?A: The current noise volume is 35dB. which is lower than general ambient noise and much less than the noise generated by air conditioning or air cleaner. Please make sure the environmental noise no more than 40dB in your room. Founded in 2015, Tuwan was developed by a leading team of experts specializing in health, mobile, intelligent hardware, and medical equipment. We are committed to raising awareness around the negative effects of snoring and sleep apnea on your quality of life, and to creating the technology to help people tackle this important issue long term.

story:
REGLO is a multipurpose glove created to preserve the hands during activity and promote better hand health.

REGLO is the first tool of its kind that gently stretches the hand, concentrating on the carpal tunnel, the most delicate area of the hand.

No matter what you’re doing!

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
Watch this animated explainer to understand how Carpal Tunnel Syndrome affects your hands and how REGLO gloves help with maintaining your hand health and recovering faster.
 
 

 

 

The first action of REGLO is the "Relief".

It is simple and quick to experiment, and is a very important result for most people, as it produces a more serene general condition for everyday life.​

However, in the last three years, by monitoring and testing REGLO on hundreds of people, we have also verified other important results in the medium term.
 
Using the glove during a night's rest, with the hand in a relaxed horizontal position, creates a gentle but lasting action over several consecutive hours, applying a healthy light  decompression of the carpal tunnel.​

This leads to improving the circulation of the various fluids and therefore the flow of nutrients and the disposal of toxins, with the result of promoting a faster and complete physiological recovery process.

 

That’s way REGLO is called

THE RECOVERY GLOVE

 

 

 
 
Watch the video below to have an in-depth look on the REGLO glove:
 


 

 

The surface in contact with the skin of REGLO has been treated with a bacteriostatic product based on Silver chloride, an extremely safe and long-lasting substance.

The bacteriostatic treatment has numerous advantages for this glove, including:

  1. The freshness and hygiene of the fabrics even with washing at low temperatures.
  2. Reduction of cleaning costs.
  3. Increased useful life of the glove.

 

How does it work?

In the presence of humidity, the Silver ions are activated and generate a sequence of events that lead to the death of the bacterium:

  • Attack and destabilisation of the cell membrane.
  • Blocking of breathing and the passage of nutrients into the bacterium.
  • Alteration of the division mechanism and therefore blocking of reproduction.

 

 

 

 

REGLO is a multipurpose glove created to protect the skin and hands during physical and non-physical activities.

REGLO helps promote healthy stretching to the carpal tunnel - an effective hand exercise for people who use their hands a lot. 
There's not one type of REGLO user.

Active, health-conscious individuals who can benefit include but are not limited to:​

  • Gym-goers (workouts, gymnastics, weights)
  • Cyclists
  • Tennis players
  • Golfers
  • Software programmers
  • Bloggers
  • Gamers
  • Musicians (piano, guitar, drums, violin, etc.)
  • Drivers
  • DIY crafters
  • Cooks
  • Gardeners
  • Teachers
  • Hairdressers

 

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

“My partner and I are motorcyclists, we travel about 20 – 30 thousand kilometers every year and we are subject to great strain on fingers, hands, and wrists. We are happy to have found a valid help to the inflammations of these joints.”

- Mark Sullivan.

 

“I had been suffering with wrist pain due to work. An Orthopedist told me that I would have to undergo surgery, which concerned me due to the risks involved. That’s when I started looking for an alternative fix, something without risk. I soon found out about REGLO. Thankfully I didn’t have to change jobs, because after trying out these gloves I felt much better, even while I’m working.”​

- John Monk.

 

“A friend of mine recommended REGLO gloves to me when I was suffering with symptoms of Carpal Tunnel Syndrome, which were particularly bad whenever trying to go to sleep. I got back to sleep well from the first night wearing these gloves. I felt much better!” 

– Jessica Clarke.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

In 2016, we set off on a journey to deliver relief and eliminate discomfort from peoples' lives.

This journey wasn't easy but our passion drove us to achieve what we have achieved today.

A journey that would revolutionize the way you work with your hands.

We wanted to contrive a glove that would be equipped with state-of-the-art patented technology combined with top of the line specialized materials and the REGLO was born.

 

 

The REGLO is designed to maintain the well-being of your hands naturally.

We get it; you probably don't put hand stretching at the top of your to-do list but you'll be surprised just how much it can help with daily activities in and outside the gym.

We believe happiness and health are directly correlated. Our goal is to share our values through our work, innovations and provide our customers with a product that can help improve their quality of life.
