story:
***NEW UPDATED PERKS*** 

Introducing Calibrex X1: Data-Powered Weightlifting

Athletes Don't Do Random Workouts. Neither Should You!

 

AS SEEN ON

Get Pro-Level Metrics In Real Time

If you're an athlete looking to improve your performance in the gym: X1 is for you.

Calibrex X1 corrects your form and keeps track of every single rep, set and exercise performed while using a barbell. 

Our pocket-sized devices and app were designed to provide everything you would get from an expert personal trainer:

 

• Immediate feedback on the quality of your lifts.

• Real-time audio cues to help you push harder.

• World-class workout tracker that helps you find the perfect program for your individual goals.

 

Incredibly easy to use 

 

Just connect, magnets snap each device on both ends of the barbell and that’s it! 

 

Calibrex learns your movement habits and keeps track of your form at any given moment. One of our biggest features is the “beep” sound, which detects discrepancies in the balance of the two sides. If one side is lower than the other one, your headphones will play a sound from the corresponding side that needs adjustment. The app generates informative graphic representations from the user’s collected movement data, which they can share with friends, personal trainers, chiropractors and other experts who understand the phenomenon of the body and why it is so important for both of our sides to be equally strengthened and conditioned.

 

REAL-TIME FEEDBACK

Form: We track the balance of the bar and give you audio cues through your headphones when it's not level.

 

Velocity: We show you how fast your last reps were. If you're going as heavy as you can, the only way to track intensity is through speed.

 

Reps: No need to record how many reps & sets you've done, we have you covered. Week after week, keep up with your workouts - pencil-free.

 

Rest: How much time do you need to recover? Stop checking your texts and get that pump! We keep you honest about your downtime.

 

 

For GYM owners

If you have a gym with more than 5 Personal Trainers, contact us for a larger bundle and save $$$.

 

 

 

 

 

Beta Testing:​

 

 

Latest Feature!!!

 

 

 

Affiliate Links:

story:
Meet TUSHÉ, the modern wet wipe technology. Sophisticated, simple to use, sustainable, and more sanitary than dry toilet paper – we are upgrading your bathroom experience. With its premium engineered components and modern minimalist appearance, TUSHÉ is a product for anyone and everyone. The result is a refreshing, hygienic experience that can be used inside the comfort of your home.

 

 

 

 

 

 

TUSHÉ is truly the best solution for wet wipes. Our touchless technology dispenses a luxurious foam onto your toilet paper, giving you an eco-friendly, natural, and flushable way to clean your tushie. Developed for the healthy, hygiene-conscious, and eco-responsible lifestyle, TUSHÉ increases personal cleanliness and reduce the environmental burden of outdated wet wipes.    

We have reinvented the wet wipe into something that is more sustainable and hygienic for you as well as our planet. It is our mission to positively impact the environment while also enhancing people’s lifestyles.

 

 

 


What's wrong with using a wet wipe?

Most wet wipes are made of Polyester, a form of plastic that sheds fibers as it slowly degrades into smaller particles, polluting our land, rivers, and oceans. 

Other wet wipes are made from "regenerated cellulose," which includes materials like Tencel, Viscos, Rayo, and Lyocell. While these products are marketed as "eco-friendly," the truth is that we still don't fully understand how these processed materials do or don't biodegrade in the natural environment.

All wet wipes are made of cloth-like materials, compared to toilet paper they are significantly thicker. Toilet paper will quickly break down in your septic system which means it won't be left in landfills or enter our oceans.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WE CAN DO BETTER! WE ARE CHANGING OUR BOTTLES:

Our mission is to reduce plastic waste by eliminating single-use plastic wet wipes. Due to the large minimum order quantities, we are financially limited as a small business to pursue more eco-friendly options for our packaging. While our bottles are 100% recyclable plastic, our next step will be developing and transitioning to more innovative, environmentally-friendly alternatives. 

 

 

Stop flushing your money down the toilet!

Looking at the graph above, we are wiping out the competition in all categories. There is no other wet wipe on the market that is eco-friendly, natural, flushable, and offers more bang for your buck than TUSHÉ.

 

 

Every starter kit includes a dispenser, cleansing foam, wall attachment, and USB charging cable. After the campaign ends, you'll receive a survey that allows you to add more bottles of our cleansing foam to your order.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our TUSHÉ dispensers are designed to be compact and versatile. Dispensers can be placed anywhere in the bathroom of your choosing. Our favorite location? Right next to the toilet paper for easier access. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  • Customs, Duty, and VAT charges: in some cases, international backers will be required to pay additional fees. As these are beyond our control, it will be the backer's responsibility to cover these fees once they have received the selected reward. Any questions regarding this additional charge should be addressed directly with the backer's customs office.
     

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

At TUSHÉ, we are a team of dreamers and entrepreneurs focused on making the world a better place. Our mission is to reduce and replace single-use plastic wet wipes. We can sh*t on wet wipes but it doesn't mean that they should be sh*tting on our planet! With your help, we can wipe the world clean! Touché ;)

 

 


 

For the last two years, our team has worked to bring you the perfect TUSHÉ. Our goal was to deliver a simple design that is visually appealing in any bathroom. We are so appreciative of our incredible production team for their help throughout the entire process. In addition to avoiding any harmful ingredients, we have implemented countless butt-wiping tests to ensure that our formula is 100% safe for daily use. We are excited to share TUSHÉ to the world and replace the outdated wet wipe FOREVER!

We are excited to share TUSHÉ to the world and replace the outdated wet wipe FOREVER!

story:
Featured in:


Nutrio makes your life easier and better. It combines all food tracking devices in one. With its capability to automatically detect and track the food you place on it, Nutrio will save you time and a lot of work. The tracked information, such as food and weight, is transferred directly to your smartphone without you having to do anything. You cook and Nutrio takes care of the rest!


The smart way to achieve your goals. Nutrio recognizes all fresh as well as packaged foods. You don't need to add any additional information. Place the ingredient on the chopping board, Nutrio recognizes and weighs the food at the same time. In a flash you see the actual calories and other nutritional values. All at the touch of a button.


Nutrio offers you the greatest possible convenience when cooking. Our advanced design allows you to cut and process food as well as take the board directly to the cooker without any effort. As a perfect companion for the kitchen, Nutrio is also very easy to clean. On top you have the option of using different wooden boards or other materials in different styles on your Nutrio.

Aurora Lighthouse is the perfect companion for your Nutrio board. Designed to work perfectly with Nutrio, but also as a stand-alone solution to make your life easier.

As a PRO member you will benefit from these incredible features:

Nutrio is much more than a smart chopping board. It's your personal health assistant. Our technology makes it possible to automate food tracking. It's never been easier to reach your individual nutrition goals.

Configure your Nutrio with one or more chopping boards and choose between different types of wood for each one.


 


How does Nutrio actually work? Nutrio consists of different sensors to detect everything you eat, no matter if it is packaged or unpackaged. That even includes your personal kitchen containers. Through its visual and NFC sensors Nutrio collects data about the food you placed on it. As an IoT device Nutrio is connected to our server systems and transmits the collected data. On the server the data is put through our AI systems and delivers the results back to your Nutrio. Of course, all this is happening in no time. All communication between Nutrio and the server is encrypted. Your data will always be safe. As soon as you save your food to a meal the app will be updated at the same time.


Hi, we are Philo and Jonathan. We are enthusiastic engineers and tech nerds, but also personal trainers and competitive athletes. Doesn't fit together? We think so. Because that's our superpower!

As athletes, we always want to progress and achieve new personal goals. But sport is only half the battle. Without the right nutrition, nothing works. However, the usual food tracking methods were far too time-consuming and complicated for us.

That's when our tinkerer's heart awoke. Because we have always wanted to invent something that would use technology in a meaningful way for people. After much trial and error, sweat and sleepless nights, Aurora Nutrio saw the light of day in 2020.

Nutrio is the world's first chopping board that automatically recognizes your food and tracks it in an app - without an extra step, without you having to manually enter or calculate anything. This gives you the knowledge you need to make good decisions about your nutrition. You get the perfect overview - for more safety, freedom and relaxation when eating. It doesn't matter if you are a competitive athlete or hobby athlete, or if you have a disease-related need (such as diabetes or intolerances):

We believe that with our simple food tracking system we simplify the everyday life of millions of people and enable them to achieve their goals - to live a better and healthier life. And when people do well, the world does better. We call it the food tracking revolution. Are you in?



Follow us on social media:



Our partners:

story:
This medical band is meant to hold medicine and specifically Nitro.  If it isn’t needed for that purpose the 3 container part can be removed to make one big container.  This takes away the need for carrying around the whole Nitro bottle around and possibly forgetting it and not having it in case of a medical emergency.  Also this makes it easy to carry other pills too and not carrying the whole bottle for just one or two pills.  

    This bracelet makes the access to possible life saving medicine extremely quick instead of searching for what pocket you may have it in or wondering where it is at all.  

    We’re asking for funds to get this bracelet‘s specifications researched and an injection mold made for the manufacturing process.  Once the mold is made it can be mass produced.  The packaging and assembly will be done at a fulfillment center.  Some of the funds will be used for advertising and website design.

   Our main goal is for the medicine band to be in all hospitals for cardiac patients that have to carry Nitro plus we'd like to also have it everywhere pharmaceuticals are sold since there is nothing out there like this for people that only want to carry necessary medicines.

Our only hurdle is the financial type.  Once we get past that we can get this into store, pharmacies, hospitals, online and just about anywhere medicine and medicine containers are sold.  We have this patented and The market is enormous and ever growing.  Everyone knows someone that could use this.

story:
Introducing the patent pending Flashe Gaming Glove - Four Key Components To Improve Your Performance



Gaming Sleeve
 

The flashe Gaming Glove always come with a standard Gaming Sleeve.

Compression sleeves have been used for a long time in many sports. The reason for this is that studies show that compression sleeves help with blood circulation, body temperature, reduced muscle stress and faster recovery. Better blood circulation and body temperature means that you can perform at your peak more frequently, and for longer periods of time; and reduced muscle stress and faster recovery means that you can have a long and healthy gaming career.​

Flashe Gaming Group have developed Gaming Sleeves to improve longevity in gaming, and to increase performance. With all the benefits that the Flashe Gaming Sleeve provides, we believe that our gaming sleeve will be a key component to Esports and the every day gamer. ​
 

Design Gaming Sleeve - Better Quality and Beautiful Design
 

The Flashe Gaming Glove always come with a standard black Gaming Sleeve. However, if you want to really stand out, with better quality and beautiful design, then the Design Gaming Sleeve is something for you. 
 

The Design Gaming Sleeve is made of polyester, which is the superior fiber when it comes to compression in general. The extra benefits of this fiber includes; better breathability, ability to regulate moisture, sweat wicking capabilities and extra comfort. The standard Gaming Sleeve is made of nylon, which also is a great material for compression sleeves, but not as good as the polyester fiber.

 

Engineered and designed in Sweden, we have developed six different Design Gaming Sleeves to match all the different colors of the Gaming Glove. ​
 

The Flashe Esport Pro Edition
 

We have developed the Flashe Esport Pro Edition for the hardcore gamers, that want the best of the best. The Esport PRO Edition has all the exclusive materials for gamers that want premium quality; carbon fiber attachments and joints, embroidered name, and exclusive, even higher quality teflon on the underside.

Red


Green

Blue

White

Original Edition

 

Red

Green

Blue

White

 

Office Edition
 

The demand for a design that would fit the office grew bigger and bigger, and we started working hard to make it a reality. Finally; we came up with four different designs, perfect for the every day office job.

White

Black

Reduced Friction For Faster and Easier Movement
 

It's been known for a long time in the gaming community that the discomfort you encounter with your underarm and wrist against the mousepad is a big problem. Many people in their early 20's suffer from injuries related to using a computer mouse, and perform worse because of the high friction, lack of stability, and the injuries that arise.

With the Flashe Gaming Glove you never have to worry about this problem again. The underside is completely covered with teflon, the same friction reducing material that you usually find on the underside of your computer mouse. This means that you can finally become one with your mouse and move it faster, easier and with more precision than ever before.


 

Optimal Angle Towards The Mouse
 

Today’s typical use of a computer mouse does not provide you with a healthy angle for the wrist. This leads to poor mouse movement and in turn injuries. 



While looking for ways to solve this problem, we started researching, and observing studies to see what the optimal angle towards a gaming mouse is. Studies show that part of the reason that leads to injuries related to a computer mouse is the angle towards the mouse, and that we should strive to keep a straight arm in relation to the computer mouse. 

To ensure that people using the Flashe Gaming Glove achieves the correct incline towards the mouse, we decided to embedd an incline into the Gaming Glove. The result became an optimal angle towards the mouse, at all times.


 

Rotation Support For Perfect Precision
 

Never before has something similar to this been presented. Our rotation support will most likely change the way we think and operate with a computer mouse worldwide, not only in gaming, but in general computer usage. 

In gaming, precision is extremely important. With the present technology there is no tool to assist precision while playing computer games - until now. 

The rotation support ensures that your link between the Flashe Gaming Glove and the computer mouse is not lost; for a smoother movement, and to allow you to become one with your mouse. Besides that, the rotation support provides you with a controlled movement for perfect precision, and once again, reduced friction, while rotating the mouse.


 

Combined; The Four Key Components Conclude Into The World's First Performance Enhancing Gaming Glove
 


 

Perks

Early Birds (Limited Available)

$25 - One Designed Gaming Sleeve

$50 - 2x Designed Gaming Sleeve

$59 - One Flashe Gaming Glove with a standard Gaming Sleeve

$79 - One Flashe Gaming Glove with a standard Gaming Sleeve + One Designed Gaming Sleeve

Indiegogo prices (10% discount)

$35 - One Designed Gaming Sleeve

$79 - One Flashe Gaming Glove with a standard Gaming Sleeve

Esport Edition

$149 - One Flashe Gaming Glove Esport Pro Edition, Kickstarter special

$299 - 2x Flashe Gaming Gloves Esport Pro Edition, with embroidered team name, and 2x Design Gaming Sleeves.

Diamond Coaching Edition

$999 - One Flashe Gaming Glove Esport PRO Edition with a Designed Gaming Sleeve, and 5x online coaching sessions.

Timeline
 

 

How everything started
 

For as long as he can remember, Oskar "Dodde" Ödmark have played video games. While always trying to improve his gameplay, he started to realise that a key element to improved gameplay is precise mouse movement, and not getting injured. In 2014, he suffered from a shoulder injury related to movement with a computer mouse and took a break from gaming, with rehab training for almost 2 years. 
 

Oskar played games like Counter-Strike: Global Offensive and World of Warcraft, but his most prominent game was League of Legends. In 2016 he started playing it again, and found himself, like a lot of people, being stuck in silver/gold rank for a long time. Once again, he felt the discomfort of his underarm and his wrist against the mousepad, and performed bad, while also feeling the shoulder injury coming back. In September 2016 he stopped playing and continued his studies in mechanical engineering, but didn't give up his dream to play games at a very high level. 
 

After taking another break from gaming, Oskar started to look for a solution to solve the problems he was encountering. In February 2017 the idea was born, and combined with his studies, Oskar developed the first ever Flashe Gaming Glove. 

He instantly noticed improvements in his gameplay, and within 3 months he climbed from silver/gold to diamond rank in League of Legends (top 0,6%).

After struggling for so many years with high friction and unstable movement, he finally became one with the mouse and started moving it with less effort and with a controlled movement. For the first time in many years, he didn't feel the stress on his shoulder that he usually would after long hours in front of the computer. Oskar knew that this was something that could potentially help millions of people around the globe, so he started creating CAD-designs for additional testing. After months of late hours after school, he finally came up with designs that highlighted the technical functions of the Flashe Gaming Glove. 

Illustration used in patent application

Following this, he started collaborating with AWA-patent in Linköping regarding a patent application for the world's first, performance enhancing, gaming glove. In February 2018, a patent application was filed for the Flashe Gaming Glove.
 

After the patent application, Oskar started assembling a Team in order to make the Flashe Gaming Glove a reality. A team that possessed the will to work hard and to do everything in their power to achieve their goals - he found the best of the best.After the patent application, Oskar started assembling a Team in order to make the Flashe Gaming Glove a reality. A team that possessed the will to work hard and to do everything in their power to achieve their goals - he found the best of the best.​


 

Finally, Oskar wanted to develop the Flashe Gaming Glove even further, to ensure the best possible quality and performance. He then collaborated with Prodelox in Linköping, and after months of hard work and prototype testing with Prodelox and his fantastic team, they developed what we now come to know as the World's First Performance Enhancing Gaming Glove - The Flashe Gaming Glove.​
 


Risks & Challenges


Making hardware is almost always a difficult process. Since the Flashe Gaming Glove is the first of it's kind, and since there is nothing similar to it on the market, it could potentially lead to delays in manufacturing. However, we are confident about the capability of the product and possess deep knowledge of all the fundamental components of the Flashe Gaming Glove. 

We've done everything we can to set ourselves up to be ready and on time to solve unanticipated delays. If something does come up, we will be forthright and transparent about it.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
 

  • We appreciate every help we can get! Tell your friends and family about us, don't forget to use the Indiegogo sharing tool!

story:
The FootCore MAX is a home therapy device that helps bring true health and strength to your feet, the foundation of your muscular-skeletal system.

 

 

 

 

Your feet are the foundation for movement, posture, and biomechanics. The Arch of your foot is vital to healthy movement and needs to be strong and active.

 

 

The FootCore MAX takes a natural and intuitive approach to improve foot health. Its benefits are based on rigorous clinical research studies and now you can practice the most up-to-date treatments in your own home for a fraction of the price of expensive doctors or interventions.

 

 

How to Contribute?

Indegogo is a crowdfunding platform where anyone can chip in a little money to help support an idea or product. 

Click "Support" on the right side of the page to contribute. 

Supporters will receive their own FootCore MAX after the campaign ends.

Project Timeline

 

How Has The FootCore MAX Helped People?

 

 

Based on 100+ Clinical Lab Studies

The FootCore MAX brings an approach that has been validated over and over in research labs into your home.

 

 

 

 

 

The Importance of Intrinsic Muscles

Intrinsic muscles are responsible for:

 

Intrinsic muscles are like the motor oil of the body. They keep your joints aligned and moving smoothly. When intrinsic muscles inside the arch of the foot become weak or inactive, it causes the foot to become misshapen and painful. Since the foot is the foundation of the leg, problems can spread all the way up to your back.

The intrinsic muscles of the foot are incredibly hard to isolate and activate until now. The FootCore MAX exercises your foot without overworking damaged joints or tissue and isolates exactly the right muscles so you don't have to worry if you are using it correctly.

 

 

 

Benefits of Active Intrinsic Muscles

 

 

 

The Foot Can Be Strengthened

 

 

 Many people including medical professionals mistakenly believe that there is nothing we can do to change the structure and shape of our foot but that is simply not true. The foot has over 100 bones and 28 muscles. You can transform them into powerful shock absorbers and springs.

The arch of your foot is designed to bend and flex as it transfers the weight and force of your body to the ground. This bending and flexing are controlled by intrinsic muscles.

 

If your FootCore is weak or inactive, your arch cannot absorb the shock of the ground hitting your foot which causes damage all over your foot and your lower body witch can lead to painful inflammation and soreness.

 

 

Your Feet Need Strength, Not Support

Current Solutions Can be Helpful in the Short-Term

Solutions like orthotics, special shoes, taping, and braces can be helpful for a limited amount of time. But in the long-term, they will enable the weakness of the foot because the intrinsic muscles become dependent on the support and become weaker. The true solution to foot pain is to strengthen the natural design of the foot.

 

Traditional approaches to foot pain are also expensive, time-consuming, and confusing for most people to really try. The FootCore MAX only takes a few minutes a day, doesn't wear out, or needs refitting, and you don't have to keep going back to the doctor to get results.

 

 

The Power of the FootCore MAX

The FootCore MAX directly addresses the problem of foot pain and intrinsic muscle weakness by re-teaching your foot how to flex and bend as you move. It isolates exactly the right muscles and guides and encourages you to regain control over your feet. It works because it activates your body's natural design.

 

A Convenient and Elegant Solution

The FootCore MAX was designed to be as easy to use as possible. Some of its best features are:

  • Non-slip medical-grade silicone heel cup
  • Traction paddles
  • Horizontal guidelines
  • Low-profile for easy transportation and storage
  • Modern and Minimalist Esthetic

 

The FootCore MAX is light and fits in a small bag for easy transport.

 

 

The low profile of the FootCore MAX means it is easy to store.

 

 

The Work Done By Scientists

Scientists have been worried that our conventional approaches to foot pain are not very effective. Over the course of over a hundred clinical experiments, researchers have conclusively shown that strengthening the foot's intrinsic muscles can reduce pain, treat many illnesses, and reshape and transform the foot.

 

See the real studies on our website

bodycoretech.com

story:
Do you want to be a part of the newest way to get fit AND get a great reward in the process?

Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym needs you to help "Make Fitness Mobile". By donating to our Indiegogo Crowdfund Campaign, you will be able to tell people that you helped start this innovative new way to get fit in our area! Many people that we speak to LOVE the idea and can see the advantages of having the gym come to their home however, some cannot. To those who are wondering why we want to Make Fitness Mobile, here are a few points :

  • Privacy, Safety and Security - We pull up to your home, you come out and work out for 50 minutes in our state of the art mini gym. Exercise privately while not worrying about people staring at you, bothering you or touching everything you are touching without it being cleaned first.
  • Convenience - We come to you! We will pull up in front of your home (or close by if we can't fit) which saves you time! No more sitting in traffic to get to the gym only to find it packed with people, nowhere to park and people on every machine adding more time away from home.
  • Opportunity - Help start a fitness revolution by helping us create opportunity for more people to get into better shape so they can live longer, healthier lives. People have to juggle multiple things these days and unfortunately most of the time, we put "taking care of our health" last on the list. Life is precious, our families are precious, we have to take care of our bodies to be around for our family as long as possible.

Seems like everything is going mobile these days for many different reasons however, the idea of starting Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym came to Travis Hancock out of a combination of life experience and the motivation to help people get into better shape so they can live longer and feel better as he does. In early 2020 Travis learned he had a heart condition that would have taken him down had he not been in shape. I am sad to say that we have already lost some friends in our early forties due to heart problems, these lives cut short to soon! We have ONE body, we have to take care of it and want to bring that opportunity to as many people as possible!

Because our Mobile Gym is a new idea around our area, it has been a bit difficult to get traditional funding...this is where you come in! 

Hancock Fitness needs a small boost of capital to go with the 40% of funds we currently have so we are reaching out to the Community for support! We need the following: 

  • Down payments on the truck and trailer, our goal is $10,000 for the truck, $9,000 on the trailer, the generator and cooling system with installation will take up the remaining amount.
  • If you can donate $5, $10, $50 or $100 to help us start a fitness revolution, we have some super perks for you! We are also taking donations from our local community businesses that want to help bring this exciting, innovative way of getting fit to our community, for your business sponsorship, we will list your business on our "Founding Business Supporter" plaque and shout out 2 businesses a month on our social media for the first year! We want to partner with as many people and businesses as we can, to help as many people as we can to help each other out!
  • We strive to be different and we are especially excited about our $50 donation perk...for this amount, you will receive an Insulated Water Bottle called an ORB by Asobu with the Hancock Fitness logo on it. If you haven't seen it posted...you have GOT TO CHECK IT OUT! (personally tested and love it)
  • If for some reason we do not reach our goal, we will look at extending the campaign a bit longer or generating funds another way but we have faith in our community and in God to provide just what we need to kick this fitness revolution off and we want EVERYONE to be a part of it!

The Impact You Can Provide

To many people have busy schedules and feel like it is impossible to get to the gym, to have time to put their health first so, Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym is going to Strive To Help You, Be A Better You, by cutting out the time it takes to get a 50 minute workout in 3x a week:

  • By bringing the gym to you, you will be saving the time, energy and gas it takes to actually "go to the gym" 12 times a month.
  • Travis Hancock, Certified Personal Trainer, is already training clients and ready to offer personal training if you aren't sure about your fitness level and where to start, we will bring the gym to you for personal training for only the training fee.
  • Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym also plans to be set up in a central location in Joplin and Carthage 3 days a week so, you can also come to us. With a different price structure for this service we extend this exciting opportunity to even more people.

Risks & Challenges

Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym is a new kind of gym, nobody is set up to do this around our area, we are prepared to take on the risk and face any challenge as it comes along. We have already had to develop different ways to generate capital since we are considered a "Risk" with this new idea of mobile fitness. Other ways we are qualified to take this new innovative idea on are:

  • Owner, Jennifer Hancock, has over 20 years of experience in a business office becoming proficient technology, accounting, human resources, payroll, customer service, sales and personal life experience (she also has the drive and commitment to make this thing happen).
  • Travis Hancock has spent the last 4 years learning different ways to get fit and has become a Certified Personal Trainer, he also has the CDL license required to bring the gym to you from previous driving positions, is very knowledgeable about how you can get fit even if  you have been out of a gym for a long time. Personal Training IS optional (encouragement is free).

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't donate at this time? That doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Even if you can't donate to our campaign right now please know that you are still extremely important to us and just a share of our campaign on your social media is very much appreciated
  • Indiegogo has the share tools you need to help us spread the word
story_txt:
Do you want to be a part of the newest way to get fit AND get a great reward in the process?
Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym needs you to help "Make Fitness Mobile". By donating to our Indiegogo Crowdfund Campaign, you will be able to tell people that you helped start this innovative new way to get fit in our area! Many people that we speak to LOVE the idea and can see the advantages of having the gym come to their home however, some cannot. To those who are wondering why we want to Make Fitness Mobile, here are a few points :

Privacy, Safety and Security - We pull up to your home, you come out and work out for 50 minutes in our state of the art mini gym. Exercise privately while not worrying about people staring at you, bothering you or touching everything you are touching without it being cleaned first.
Convenience - We come to you! We will pull up in front of your home (or close by if we can't fit) which saves you time! No more sitting in traffic to get to the gym only to find it packed with people, nowhere to park and people on every machine adding more time away from home.
Opportunity - Help start a fitness revolution by helping us create opportunity for more people to get into better shape so they can live longer, healthier lives. People have to juggle multiple things these days and unfortunately most of the time, we put "taking care of our health" last on the list. Life is precious, our families are precious, we have to take care of our bodies to be around for our family as long as possible.

Seems like everything is going mobile these days for many different reasons however, the idea of starting Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym came to Travis Hancock out of a combination of life experience and the motivation to help people get into better shape so they can live longer and feel better as he does. In early 2020 Travis learned he had a heart condition that would have taken him down had he not been in shape. I am sad to say that we have already lost some friends in our early forties due to heart problems, these lives cut short to soon! We have ONE body, we have to take care of it and want to bring that opportunity to as many people as possible!

Because our Mobile Gym is a new idea around our area, it has been a bit difficult to get traditional funding...this is where you come in! 
Hancock Fitness needs a small boost of capital to go with the 40% of funds we currently have so we are reaching out to the Community for support! We need the following: 

Down payments on the truck and trailer, our goal is $10,000 for the truck, $9,000 on the trailer, the generator and cooling system with installation will take up the remaining amount.
If you can donate $5, $10, $50 or $100 to help us start a fitness revolution, we have some super perks for you! We are also taking donations from our local community businesses that want to help bring this exciting, innovative way of getting fit to our community, for your business sponsorship, we will list your business on our "Founding Business Supporter" plaque and shout out 2 businesses a month on our social media for the first year! We want to partner with as many people and businesses as we can, to help as many people as we can to help each other out!
We strive to be different and we are especially excited about our $50 donation perk...for this amount, you will receive an Insulated Water Bottle called an ORB by Asobu with the Hancock Fitness logo on it. If you haven't seen it posted...you have GOT TO CHECK IT OUT! (personally tested and love it)
If for some reason we do not reach our goal, we will look at extending the campaign a bit longer or generating funds another way but we have faith in our community and in God to provide just what we need to kick this fitness revolution off and we want EVERYONE to be a part of it!


The Impact You Can Provide
To many people have busy schedules and feel like it is impossible to get to the gym, to have time to put their health first so, Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym is going to Strive To Help You, Be A Better You, by cutting out the time it takes to get a 50 minute workout in 3x a week:

By bringing the gym to you, you will be saving the time, energy and gas it takes to actually "go to the gym" 12 times a month.
Travis Hancock, Certified Personal Trainer, is already training clients and ready to offer personal training if you aren't sure about your fitness level and where to start, we will bring the gym to you for personal training for only the training fee.
Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym also plans to be set up in a central location in Joplin and Carthage 3 days a week so, you can also come to us. With a different price structure for this service we extend this exciting opportunity to even more people.


Risks & Challenges
Hancock Fitness & Mobile Gym is a new kind of gym, nobody is set up to do this around our area, we are prepared to take on the risk and face any challenge as it comes along. We have already had to develop different ways to generate capital since we are considered a "Risk" with this new idea of mobile fitness. Other ways we are qualified to take this new innovative idea on are:

Owner, Jennifer Hancock, has over 20 years of experience in a business office becoming proficient technology, accounting, human resources, payroll, customer service, sales and personal life experience (she also has the drive and commitment to make this thing happen).
Travis Hancock has spent the last 4 years learning different ways to get fit and has become a Certified Personal Trainer, he also has the CDL license required to bring the gym to you from previous driving positions, is very knowledgeable about how you can get fit even if  you have been out of a gym for a long time. Personal Training IS optional (encouragement is free).


Other Ways You Can Help
Can't donate at this time? That doesn't mean you can't help:

Even if you can't donate to our campaign right now please know that you are still extremely important to us and just a share of our campaign on your social media is very much appreciated
Indiegogo has the share tools you need to help us spread the word

story:
The Fat Freezer Platinum freezes your fat away for a more sculpted you

 


 

 

 

 

For full article - Click Here -

 

Another UNBOXING video... enjoy!

 

* The Fat Freezer Platinum is a home-use device which is not the same as the spa or clinics. The Fat Freezer uses a different cooling system and functions from traditional cool sculpting and other beauty clinics.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

For more information about Cory Group - Click Here -

 

 

 

Disclaimer

 

Freeze N Fit Inc does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use Fat Freezer System due to many factors that can influence health and weight loss.

Individual results may vary. 
We make no warranties or guarantees that you will lose a specific amount of weight for a particular period of time. 
No individual result should be considered typical or guaranteed. 
This product has not been evaluated by the FDA. 
Fat Freezer System is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease, illness, or medical condition.
This is not a weight loss system.
 
BETTER RESULTS CAN BE ACHIEVED IN CONJUNCTION WITH DAILY EXERCISES AND THE DIET PLAN 
 
*The results of Fat Freezing may be temporary.

 

 

Precautions/Warnings

If you have any of the below conditions, you may not be an appropriate candidate for the Fat Freezer procedure.

If you are pregnant
Known sensitivity to colds such as cold urticaria or Raynaud’s disease, pernio, or Chilblains.
Known sensitivity or allergy to isopropyl alcohol, propylene glycol, fructose and glycerin
Impaired peripheral circulation in the area to be treated
Nerve pain such as post-herpetic neuralgia or diabetic neuropathy
Impaired skin sensation
Open or infected wounds
Bleeding disorders or simultaneous use of blood thinners
Recent surgery or scar tissue in the area to be treated
Hernia in or adjacent to the treatment site
Skin conditions such as eczema, dermatitis, or rashes in the area to be treated
Active implanted device such as pacemaker or defibrillator
Chronic pain
Anxiety disorder
Heart Condition

*You should inform your physician of your entire medical history. You should not have the treatment if you are seeking treatment for obesity as the Fat Freezer is not a treatment a weight loss solution for obesity. You should not have treatment if you have one of the below conditions:

Cryoglobulinemia, a condition in which an abnormal level of cryoglobulins (proteins which thicken in cold temperatures) are present in the blood.
Paroxysmal cold hemoglobinuria, a blood disorder in which a change from cold to warm temperatures leads to red blood cell death.
Cold agglutinin disease, an autoimmune disease in which exposure of blood to cold temperatures leads to red blood cell death.  

Unit comes ready for 110V - 220V.

It is the customer's responsibility to release and pay any custom's or duties fees for products delivered internationally if applied. 

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story:
Hi, I'm Anna, one of the co-founders of AIO. It all started back in 2018, when I first learned about the global threat of polluted air. Wearing masks wasn't a big thing in Europe at the time, but we still wanted to develop a functional and stylish alternative to single use products. What we missed most about existing solutions was comfortability and space while breathing, as well as a subtle and positively appealing look. What we come up with is AIO. Let me introduce you to the future of sustainable masks.*


After 2 years of development we're thrilled to offer a mask without compromise. Made from high quality materials in Germany, your safety is our priority. 

Our AIO Filter Pads offer protection against a multitude of hazardous air pollutants.


In order to ensure the highest product quality AIO is entirely being produced in Germany with a strong focus on sustainability from materials to production and every step in between.
 



 

Don't you look great?

When creating AIO an appealing design was paramount.

 

 

 

Our organically shaped mask sits comfortably on the face and is complimenting it beautifully as opposed to obstructing the view.

 

While the mask itself is a clear body we have opted for a palette of simplistic yet stunning colors for the silicone frame, clips, filter cartridge and the remaining peripherals.

 

What We Need & What You Get



In order to kick-off mass production, we need a tool for the injection moulding process, which is very complex and expensive to produce. We have found the perfect partner for our project in Germany and all blueprints are set. With the required capital we would be able to manufacture and ship all ordered masks within three months right to your door.

We want to be 100% transparent about our costs and pricing, that's why we share with you the following cost breakdown:

Are you ready for the best part? Only during this Indiegogo campaign our mask is available at an irresistible price. Choose your desired perk and contribute to a healthier tomorrow. 

*AIO is a community mask and not a medical device.

story:
SpoonTEK is a product coming from a father-son duo who have worked with the food industry since 1999 on products like the award-winning "spoon-in-the-lid" packaging innovation brought to market by General Mills and Häagen Dazs. Widely known for launching groundbreaking consumer products, they are now aiming to give consumers a taste-altering way to eat foods like yogurt, ice cream, soup, and many other edibles with SpoonTEK.

The built-in ion sensory technology mildly excites the taste buds on your tongue like they’ve never been stimulated before! The immediate results are enhanced flavor, heightened taste, and improved aftertaste. 

SpoonTEK Works Great With:

SpoonTEK science combines the power of advanced electronics with tongue sensory and the brain for an amazing eating experience. It’s not just any spoon—it’s the only spoon you will need to take your taste to the next level. With SpoonTEK, the possibilities are endless!

SpoonTEK Overview

The human tongue can process five flavors at once: sweet, salty, sour, bitter, and savory. The taste receptors within the taste buds activate while eating so the senses take over. Ultimately, the brain determines the final perception of flavor and taste.

  • Human perception of taste is largely influenced by other sensory systems, past experiences, and our hunger for food.

  • SpoonTEK uses mild electric current to excite the taste buds on your tongue, like they’ve never been stimulated before! 

  • SpoonTEK science combines the power of advanced electronics with tongue sensory and the brain for a one-of-a-kind eating experience.

How Does it Work?

SpoonTEK uses a new ion sensory technology, a first for eating utensils that combines electric stimulation and tongue sensory. This emerging technology mildly excites the taste buds on your tongue for better eating experience. You feel the difference in taste immediately!  To accomplish this task, we use two electrodes (one on the handle and one in the spoon bowl), advanced circuitry, complex wiring between all connections, and a proprietary method for hermetically sealing in the electronics.  SpoonTEK is a high quality product built for performance and benefit.

The original tongue map that defines specific flavor regions has been disproved by scientists in recent years. Now, the consensus is that all parts of the tongue can detect all flavors. SpoonTEK and Tongue Sensory, a match made in heaven!

SpoonWORKS

You hold SpoonTEK normally with your finger making contact with the electrode on the handle. Food makes contact with the electrode in the spoon bowl. Time to eat! An LED light on the handle will glow to indicate that the SpoonTEK system is working and delivering a mild electric current that passes through the food you are eating. You won’t feel it, but your taste buds will feel it. Try SpoonTEK for new taste experiences, new recipes for a healthier diet with less sugar & salt, and a new appreciation for tongue sensory. Say goodbye to after-taste, say good-bye to bland boring foods, and say hello to your new best friend…SpoonTEK!

SpoonTEK’s design is elegant, lightweight, made with high quality, food safe materials, and simple to use. 

SpoonForThought

As we go through life, we experience so many things for the first time. But eating, that’s not an experience, it’s the first thing we did when we were born and what we do every day to survive. Taste plays a big role in our lives. What might taste salty to some, might taste sweet to others. Some love spicy and some love sour. Everyone is different. And for the first time, with NO chemicals added, SpoonTEK will give you another “first" experience of a lifetime. A relationship with your tongue that will make you say “wow” and “this is amazing”. With SpoonTEK, the possibilities are endless! 

Subscriber Testimonials

 
 
 
 
 

As Featured On:

SpoonTEK is very honored to be one of 10 finalists at the 2020 Smart Kitchen Summit "Startup Showcase”, the longest running and most well known food tech startup competition.  Our spoon works best on yogurt, ice cream, soup, healthy foods with less sugar & salt, and just about anything you eat with a spoon. SpoonTEK creates a new level of tongue sensory that no one has ever experienced, and, with this technology, the possibilities for taste innovation are endless.
 

Specs and Tech Details:

 

Watch the Promo Video

 

SpoonTEK is Washable by Hand

 

Get your SpoonTEK - Shipping December 2020

Please note: Once the campaign is over we'll send out surveys to select your color.

SpoonTEK Comes in 3 Colors:

 

Our SpoonTEK Manufacturing Partner - ISO-9001 & ISO-13485 Certified

 

Stretch Goal!

If we reach $100,000 we'll make available the following colors: description needed: Matte Aqua, Matte White, Matte Plum

 

 

Meet the Founders

Cameron Davidov

Cameron Davidov has worked in the organic food industry since graduating from business school at Tulane University. He is a New York City based entrepreneur with a passion for solving one of life’s unsolved mysteries...how to enhance taste and improve after-taste through an eating utensil. Along with his father, Ken, a lifelong product developer, Cameron is introducing his first product, SpoonTEK, to the world. SpoonTEK is a mind-blowing technological innovation that will change the world of taste forever and will instantly give consumers a superior eating experience.

Cameron Davidov has always been fascinated by taste and how to improve the everyday foods that did not appeal to him. Like most people, Cameron couldn’t get past the bitter and sour tastes of many foods, especially yogurt, which was a breakfast staple in his childhood home. He spent a lot of time in the kitchen, concocting recipes for meals that agreed with his discernible palette. 

Raised in a family of product developers, Cameron’s father and grandfather taught him the fundamentals and importance of building high quality consumer products. It was when Cameron started using a high-tech toothbrush developed by his father, Ken, that he had his eureka moment. He thought about whether a similar technology could be used with an eating utensil to improve and enhance tastes. After developing a handmade prototype, and testing it with countless foods and yogurts, Cameron realized there was a novel way to heighten flavor, minimize after-taste and make food products with reduced sugar & sodium taste better…introducing SpoonTEK.

Ken Davidov

Ken Davidov has worked as a product developer, inventor and entrepreneur for over 35 years. He graduated from business school at Tulane University. Proficient in new product development, mass scale production, and importing, Ken is excited about the over 800 products he has already brought to market and his new emerging technologies, including SpoonTEK. Ken is passionate about design, technology, and building strong business and personal relationships to last a lifetime. He is a partner in 3 different tech companies specializing in groundbreaking innovations focusing on the "electric" human body, and owns & licenses several patents for consumer products. In addition to his technology companies, Ken has delivered custom products to many major food brands including Ragu, Domino's, Chick-fil-A, Lipton, Baskin Robbins and Hostess. He licensed the revolutionary "Spoon-in-the-Lid" packaging innovation to General Mills and Haagen Dazs and was awarded the Business Week "Product of the Year".

 

 

Our manufacturing partner pulling SpoonTEK from our new injection mold.

Hello SpoonTEK supporters! 

We are so excited that you are considering purchasing SpoonTEK, the world's first commercial eating utensil that "instantly" alters and improves taste, flavor and after-taste. Think about this -- you've gone your entire life eating food, seasoning food, liking food, disliking food and talking about food day in and day out. However, you've probably never considered how the combination of your tongue and your brain impacts the taste and flavor of every bite you take and every meal you eat. TODAY, SpoonTEK changes the game!  

Our team is extremely experienced in developing, shipping and marketing groundbreaking products for the past 35 years. Our goal has always been to create products that have a strong benefit to consumers. Over the past 10 years, we have been focused on technologies that combine the human body with a mild electric current to deliver improved wellness to consumers. By improving the taste of healthier foods that have less sugar and less salt, SpoonTEK checks all of the boxes, and is exactly the type of product we want to build and introduce to consumers. 

SpoonTEK's sleek beautiful spoon design is lightweight, comfortable to hold and very easy operate.  There are no on/off switches, you just pick up SpoonTEK,  make contact with the silver acti-strip on the handle and start eating. From the first bite, you will immediately notice a difference in taste.  You can try SpoonTEK  with any food you normally eat with a spoon. It works best with yogurt, ice cream, soup, healthy foods that contain less sugar & less salt, and with any food  that has a sour, bitter, lingering after-taste. By exciting the tastebuds, SpoonTEK will allow you to experience new levels of taste you have never experienced or perceived before. We can't wait for you to experiment with foods that "you find" improve taste and after-taste. 

Since we are just finishing making the injection molds, your support of SpoonTEK will allow us to produce, market and distribute this incredible innovation to the world,  beginning in December 2020. Get ready to experience the phenomena of taste sensory and to be one the first people in the world to try SpoonTEK. Thank you so much for your support! 

With SpoonTEK, the possibilities are endless!   

Refund Policy 

Cancel for free at anytime within the next 30 days. We recommend early backers to reserve VIP spots before they are all gone, as cancellations will always remain an option if you change your mind.  All units come with a warranty. This campaign is a pre-order for SpoonTEK so the funds raised through Indiegogo will be used to manufacture the product for our backers. In accordance with the Indiegogo terms of use, we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defective once the Indiegogo campaign is over.

Warranty

SpoonTEK comes with a standard 60-day warranty that will be determined by type of use and maintenance. There will be no returns if a package has been opened or the packaging seal has been broken. Due to the unique & challenging manufacturing processes of our product, the management team may offer a one time replacement. 

Risks and Challenges

Like all new projects, there are always risks and challenges. We know from experience it takes a lot of planning, hard work and perseverance to successfully launch a new product.

The team is confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate risks such as shipment delays, product defects or supplier reliability. Over the past year we have been prototyping, testing and refining to make sure the final product we deliver to our backers far exceeds expectations. The team at SpoonTEK will update you regularly on progress. If there are any issues, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way!

As Featured On:


SpoonTEK is very honored to be one of 10 finalists at the 2020 Smart Kitchen Summit "Startup Showcase”, the longest running and most well known food tech startup competition.  Our spoon works best on yogurt, ice cream, soup, healthy foods with less sugar & salt, and just about anything you eat with a spoon. SpoonTEK creates a new level of tongue sensory that no one has ever experienced, and, with this technology, the possibilities for taste innovation are endless.
 
Specs and Tech Details: Watch the Promo Video SpoonTEK is Washable by Hand Get your SpoonTEK - Shipping December 2020Please note: Once the campaign is over we'll send out surveys to select your color.SpoonTEK Comes in 3 Colors: Our SpoonTEK Manufacturing Partner - ISO-9001 & ISO-13485 Certified Stretch Goal!If we reach $100,000 we'll make available the following colors: description needed: Matte Aqua, Matte White, Matte Plum  Meet the FoundersCameron DavidovCameron Davidov has worked in the organic food industry since graduating from business school at Tulane University. He is a New York City based entrepreneur with a passion for solving one of life’s unsolved mysteries...how to enhance taste and improve after-taste through an eating utensil. Along with his father, Ken, a lifelong product developer, Cameron is introducing his first product, SpoonTEK, to the world. SpoonTEK is a mind-blowing technological innovation that will change the world of taste forever and will instantly give consumers a superior eating experience.Cameron Davidov has always been fascinated by taste and how to improve the everyday foods that did not appeal to him. Like most people, Cameron couldn’t get past the bitter and sour tastes of many foods, especially yogurt, which was a breakfast staple in his childhood home. He spent a lot of time in the kitchen, concocting recipes for meals that agreed with his discernible palette. Raised in a family of product developers, Cameron’s father and grandfather taught him the fundamentals and importance of building high quality consumer products. It was when Cameron started using a high-tech toothbrush developed by his father, Ken, that he had his eureka moment. He thought about whether a similar technology could be used with an eating utensil to improve and enhance tastes. After developing a handmade prototype, and testing it with countless foods and yogurts, Cameron realized there was a novel way to heighten flavor, minimize after-taste and make food products with reduced sugar & sodium taste better…introducing SpoonTEK.Ken DavidovKen Davidov has worked as a product developer, inventor and entrepreneur for over 35 years. He graduated from business school at Tulane University. Proficient in new product development, mass scale production, and importing, Ken is excited about the over 800 products he has already brought to market and his new emerging technologies, including SpoonTEK. Ken is passionate about design, technology, and building strong business and personal relationships to last a lifetime. He is a partner in 3 different tech companies specializing in groundbreaking innovations focusing on the "electric" human body, and owns & licenses several patents for consumer products. In addition to his technology companies, Ken has delivered custom products to many major food brands including Ragu, Domino's, Chick-fil-A, Lipton, Baskin Robbins and Hostess. He licensed the revolutionary "Spoon-in-the-Lid" packaging innovation to General Mills and Haagen Dazs and was awarded the Business Week "Product of the Year".  Our manufacturing partner pulling SpoonTEK from our new injection mold.Hello SpoonTEK supporters! We are so excited that you are considering purchasing SpoonTEK, the world's first commercial eating utensil that "instantly" alters and improves taste, flavor and after-taste. Think about this -- you've gone your entire life eating food, seasoning food, liking food, disliking food and talking about food day in and day out. However, you've probably never considered how the combination of your tongue and your brain impacts the taste and flavor of every bite you take and every meal you eat. TODAY, SpoonTEK changes the game!  Our team is extremely experienced in developing, shipping and marketing groundbreaking products for the past 35 years. Our goal has always been to create products that have a strong benefit to consumers. Over the past 10 years, we have been focused on technologies that combine the human body with a mild electric current to deliver improved wellness to consumers. By improving the taste of healthier foods that have less sugar and less salt, SpoonTEK checks all of the boxes, and is exactly the type of product we want to build and introduce to consumers. SpoonTEK's sleek beautiful spoon design is lightweight, comfortable to hold and very easy operate.  There are no on/off switches, you just pick up SpoonTEK,  make contact with the silver acti-strip on the handle and start eating. From the first bite, you will immediately notice a difference in taste.  You can try SpoonTEK  with any food you normally eat with a spoon. It works best with yogurt, ice cream, soup, healthy foods that contain less sugar & less salt, and with any food  that has a sour, bitter, lingering after-taste. By exciting the tastebuds, SpoonTEK will allow you to experience new levels of taste you have never experienced or perceived before. We can't wait for you to experiment with foods that "you find" improve taste and after-taste. Since we are just finishing making the injection molds, your support of SpoonTEK will allow us to produce, market and distribute this incredible innovation to the world,  beginning in December 2020. Get ready to experience the phenomena of taste sensory and to be one the first people in the world to try SpoonTEK. Thank you so much for your support! With SpoonTEK, the possibilities are endless!   
Refund Policy Cancel for free at anytime within the next 30 days. We recommend early backers to reserve VIP spots before they are all gone, as cancellations will always remain an option if you change your mind.  All units come with a warranty. This campaign is a pre-order for SpoonTEK so the funds raised through Indiegogo will be used to manufacture the product for our backers. In accordance with the Indiegogo terms of use, we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defective once the Indiegogo campaign is over.WarrantySpoonTEK comes with a standard 60-day warranty that will be determined by type of use and maintenance. There will be no returns if a package has been opened or the packaging seal has been broken. Due to the unique & challenging manufacturing processes of our product, the management team may offer a one time replacement. Risks and ChallengesLike all new projects, there are always risks and challenges. We know from experience it takes a lot of planning, hard work and perseverance to successfully launch a new product.The team is confident we have taken the right steps to mitigate risks such as shipment delays, product defects or supplier reliability. Over the past year we have been prototyping, testing and refining to make sure the final product we deliver to our backers far exceeds expectations. The team at SpoonTEK will update you regularly on progress. If there are any issues, we promise to communicate with you every step of the way!

story:
Full Body Relief & Recovery Massage Wrap

The Accusage Thermo features 7 unique technologies in one multi-functional support wrap. 

Tourmaline - The high intensity compression fabric is galvanized with self-heating tourmaline which helps utilize your own body heat and maximize it to promote recovery. As you move and generate heat, you activate the advanced tourmaline technology.

Electro-Tek Microcurrent – The Accusage Thermo utilizes the Electro-tek microcurrent that gently stimulates and massages the muscles to help promote recovery and maximize muscle output. You can actually see it working.

Cold therapy - The Accusage Thermo replaces the need for bulky hot water bags and uncomfortable ice packs. Each Wrap is equipped with our INSTAHEAT Hot/Cold gel pack.  Just Click the button inside to instantly activate the HEAT function to warm up your sore, tired muscles.  Or place in the freezer to get lasting COLD therapy to help reduce Muscle Inflammation and swelling.

 

Heat Therapy - The heat provided by the hot packs has several important benefits. These may include:

  • Relaxes and loosens tight and sore muscles

  • Helps increase range of motion to promote rejuvenation of the muscles

  • Heat Therapy pouch directly targets your problem areas

Magnetic therapy - 2 built in magnets included in wrap.

Graphene - Made with our newest tech, Graphene Max. This incredible material is super lightweight and super strong. Graphene Max enhances the Microcurrent EMS ElectroTek with supercharged conductivity which helps active more of your muscle fibers to maximize your recovery. 

Copper - The Accusage Thermo is infused with copper materials. The properties of copper  are antimicrobial and antibacterial. Copper in our wrap helps to eliminate body odor that a typical wrap might hold. It is comfortable, moisture wicking and also regulates heat.

1 Wrap - 10 Body Parts

The Accusage Thermo full body wrap features a 2 fastener system that attaches to anywhere on your body. This includes the back, shoulder, hip, legs, arms, knee and feet. This hybrid wrap replaces the need for multiple wraps that only secures to one part of your body. Fastener straps can also be adjusted for heavy or mild compression.

 

 

 

Perks

 

 

DISCLAIMERS

“These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease”.

The information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this website is for educational purposes only. The content is not intended in any way as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health care provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regime, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because something you have read on this website.

Evertone, Inc does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Accusage Thermo System due to many factors that can influence health and or weight loss.

Individual results may vary.

The Accusage Thermo is not a weight loss system

We make no warranties or guarantees that you will lose a specific amount of weight for a particular period of time.

No individual results should be considered typical or guaranteed. 

Risks and challenges

Evertone is a leading health and fitness company with over 20 years of experience. Rest assured that no matter what happens, we'll have your back.

story:
We're back with InDemand!

 

Build Your Care Routine with ZeroT

We all have a routine around things we care about. A routine for skincare, working out, and before going to bed. But have you ever thought about having one to prevent hair loss?

 

ZeroT Cap makes building a routine for hair care easy and effective. Because the health of our hair should  be as important to maintain as all our other daily routines.

 

 

Hair loss isn't just about genetics. More than ever, we're all experiencing faster and greater hair problems thanks to some choices we voluntarily make. Styling, for one. But also our diet and stress levels play a large factor.

 

We need to start taking better care of our hair NOW while we still have a full head of it. Because trying to reverse what’s already gone is a lost cause.

 

Like we always say,

too late is too late.

Compared to other hair growth hats/helmets out in the market, ZeroT Cap offers a comfortable and cost-effective solution. Make sure you grab those Early Birds while they last!

 

 

ZeroT Cap offers an extensive hair care with its two types of light: Red and Blue.

  •  Red Light: helps grow healthier and fuller hair follicles
  •  Blue Light: cleans the scalp's surface of unwanted oils
 

Unlike most hair growth helmets or combs that only offer red light, ZeroT goes the extra mile by offering two different types of care.

 

 

 

ZeroT’s Red Light (650nm) reaches deep into your scalp to increase blood flow by stimulating the cell’s mitochondria to produce more ATP energy. This push for microcirculation allows for more nutrients to reach your hair follicles, resulting in fuller and thicker hair.

 

Its Blue Light (405nm) targets the surface of your scalp to clear bad oils and reduce inflammation. As the lights destroy porphyrins, this helps reduce acne and dandruff.

The Red Light reaches deep below the surface of your scalp to hit the cells of your hair's roots.

 

Step 1: Hair thins and eventually falls due to lack of nutrient supply
Step 2: Red light stimulates blood flow to reach deep into hair follicles
Step 3: Hair follicles receive sufficient nutrients again and appear fuller in form

 


 

That is why only 20 minutes is needed in a day for the lights to effectively target below the hair follicles!

 

ZeroT’s lights are specifically placed to target the areas most prone to hair thinning and hair loss. They follow along the M-shaped hairline and crown of your head.

 

 

 

The biggest cause of scalp infection is germs. Your scalp is highly sensitive to heat, humidity, or pollution.

 

ZeroT’s Blue Light provides extra care to ensure your scalp remains clean and clear. This treatment is especially helpful for people with oily skin types, since it prevents excess oil from building up.

 

 

 

To test the effects of Blue Light, we measured the level of cleanliness on a scalp before and after a single 20-minute session of ZeroT.

 

Although ZeroT was designed to see results over a long period of use, you can already see a clear difference in Relative Light Unit (RLU) before and after a single 20-minute session.

 

As comparison, a clean hand is measured at 2,000 RLU.

 

 

ZeroT Cap offers 3 Light modes: Red Light, Blue Light, and Dual.

 

Depending on what specific hair problems you have, you can switch up the mode to fit your needs. Each mode is a 20-minute session and shuts off automatically after the time is up.

 

After choosing a mode, you can also choose between 3 levels of light intensity to build up your treatment as you desire. Start the first month with Level 1 and slowly work your way up!

 

 

 

Over the past 3 years, our team has become experts at building products for our head. They're all built in our headquarters in South Korea with the best quality materials.

 

Rest assured, we even test these LED sources on ourselves to ensure its safety. If you're interested in learning more about how LED lights are safe on the skin, you can click the banner below!

 

 

 

 

 

When comparing ZeroT to other hair growth products, its contactless method of care remains the safest option. Supplements like serums or vitamins include chemicals that cause unwanted side-effects or pollute toxins to the environment.

 

ZeroT, on the other hand, is non-invasive and safe on the skin and body.

 

 

 

The side of ZeroT’s cap is made of mesh, which allows free-flowing air to circulate through your hair and scalp. This also ensures you don’t feel any sense of overheating from the LED lights.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

ZeroT Cap derives from an advanced cell-stimulating technology called Low-level Light Therapy. Although first used to test plant growth, the same technology has been altered and applied in many different fields.

 

We were inspired by LED face masks to create a user-friendly treatment for the hair as well. That’s how ZeroT was born!

 

Curious to know more about how this technology originated? Click the banner below to see the full article!

 

 

 

 

 

Dr. Lee, a trusted dermatologist and alumni from the renown Seoul University, has been with us since ZeroT’s early development stages. He has helped us test and refine  ZeroT's technology.

 

In his words (translated from Korean), “ZeroT is an effective method of hair treatment that you can easily use every day. Especially because there aren’t that many treatment options readily available for women, I believe this product will be useful for a lot of people.”

 

ZeroT offers a wide array of benefits that aren't available in similar hair growth helmets currently on the market. Super stylish, convenient, and affordable. What more could you want?

 

 

 

 

ZeroT's essential technology is in the LED insert, which can be used under its own black outer cap. But we’re giving you the option to switch up the look.

 

Place the slim LED insert under other hats of your choice. Not just baseball caps but beanies, bucket hats, fedoras—you name it!

 

See these Seoul Fashion Week models rock the look!

 

 

 

Most hair growth hats on the market are hard, plastic helmets that aren’t subtle or sleek in any way. Meanwhile, ZeroT Cap’s flexible PCB design allows the cap to be giving yet supportive on your head.

 

 

ZeroT's adjustable and flexible strap makes it easy to size perfectly! You will also choose between a Medium or Large size when you claim your perk.

 

 

 

 

We love efficiency. And we’re sure you do too.

 

ZeroT makes it easy to multitask with its automatic shutoff feature after a 20-minute session. It’s also completely wireless so you’re free to roam about and carry on your business while ZeroT takes care of treating your hair.

 

Slip it on anywhere, anytime and no one else will notice you’re actually getting your daily hair care routine done!

 

 

The LED insert has a small opening in the back that allows you to charge through a USB-C type cable. A quick 2 hour charge will last you 2 weeks of daily use!

 

It’ll flash red during its charge and turn green once it’s fully charged.

 

 
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We all have different hair types and physical conditions. As a result, it’s hard to guarantee you’ll see definite results within a certain period of time. The results don’t just suddenly appear—they take patience and perseverance.

That’s why we’ve brought ZeroT to Indiegogo. We believe that as early adapters, the Indiegogo community will be most receptive to this innovative technology. We know it works. We just need others to see for themselves that it does!

The reason we developed ZeroT is to provide a way for hair care to be done easily and cost-efficiently at home. Compared to how common of a problem hair loss is, the access to its treatment is limited and pricey. So we came up with a solution to make hair care a fun and easy routine.

We aim to get FDA-tested, refine features, and conduct various experiments as we acknowledge ZeroT’s technology isn’t well known in the general public.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Altos Business Group is a product launch consulting agency that specializes in helping global tech startups launch their products in the United States. Contact Us: support@altosbusiness.com

Trend Adopter showcases the best new crowdfunding products from all around the world! Contact us: hello@trendadopter.com | Learn more at www.trendadopter.com
