story:
An ultraportable sling and resistance trainer for a full-body workout indoors or outdoors.

Train with over 100 exercises without having to go to a gym. FREESIXD is your portable full-body gym that allows you to work out at home, outdoors or when travelling! All with one device that fits in a small bag.

 

 


Meet FREESIXD, the latest innovation from the founders of Pullup & Dip, a world reknowned brand for calisthenics and bodyweight training equipment.

 

Scope of delivery of All-IN Kit

 

 


FREESIXD gives you 100% flexibility to work out anywhere and anytime you want. Skip the gym and train at home, in the park, backyard, on vacation, in a hotel room while travelling or anywhere else.



✅ Home: Save time and money and work out at home using the wall or door.


✅ Travel: Maintain your health during travelling and avoid the ill-equipped hotel gyms. 


✅ Outdoors: Enjoy a workout at your favourite location in the fresh air instead of a stuffy gym.

 


FREESIXD is much more than just a sling trainer. It's basically a portable, full-body gym in a bag. Check out the two main differences compared to other sling trainers below.

 

1) HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE - The attachment of FREESIXD is not only fixed at the top, but is stepless height-adjustable, so you can adjust the buckle to your desired height and train from all possible angles.


 

FREESIXD vs. sling trainers
 

2) FULL-BODY PORTABLE GYM - It's a combination of a sling trainer, resistance bands and an exercise bar which allows many more exercises and strength levels than a sling trainer.

 

 

 


FREESIXD is probably THE most versatile fitness device on the market. You can do over 100 exercises and it helps to build and tone muscle efficiently. Get stronger, fitter and lose weight without having to go to the gym.

Train with 100% flexibility at home, in the park or when travelling and save yourself time and money!


 

 


We are serious when we say FREESIXD replaces the gym and allows you to do an effective full-body workout. Train all muscle groups, get fit, strong and build the body you have always wanted.


 


 

 
 


FREESIXD offers you endless possibilities with over 100 different exercises for your upper and lower body, all in one device. It's basically a complete bodyweight training system that fits into a portable bag.

 

Check out just a few possible exercises
 

 

INDOORS

 

OUTDOORS
 


+  many more...


All FREESIXD backers will get free unlimited access to our downloadable exercise eBook plus video library of over 100 exercises.


 

 


FREESIXD is for:
 


...and for YOU! ;-)
 

Back us now and join our worldwide bodyweight training community!

 

 

Are you a personal trainer?


Then FREESIXD is just the right fit for you. You can attach several FREESIXD's on a tree and host awesome outdoor group workout sessions. Your clients will love you for it!

Outdoor group workout with FREESIXD

 



Tired of sling trainers that can only be attached to just one height above your head? We were too! That's why we developed a stepless adjustable buckle with integrated loop which can be moved up and down on the "superbelt", so you can attach the sling straps or resistance bands to any height from bottom to top for full flexibility.

 

✅ Stepless adjustable for all possible exercises and body sizes and pull or push exercises


✅ Extra durable aluminium and patented design 
 


Two clamps ensure maximum hold so that the buckle does not move during exercises.
 

Stepless adjustable buckle which can be moved on the superbelt


Training from all different angles and for every body size and exercise. Do rows with the high attachment, chest flies with the middle attachment or curls with the low attachment and enjoy full flexibility!
 


Protective padding on the backside prevents any damage to doors at home or while in a hotel so you can fully focus on your workout.

 

Adjust the resistance accordingly


Attach the resistance bands to the hook, pass them through the upper or lower D-hook of the super belt and adjust the resistance continuously by moving the buckle up or down (see also more detailed in the video below under "How to adjust the resistance")


 


The nylon superbelt is plugged in within seconds into the adapters on the wall, tree or door, tighten it by hand and you are ready to go. It enables you to move the buckle up and down for all different heights. Isn't that cool? ;-)

 

How it works:

1) Plug the metal plate into the upper adapter.

2) Plug the second metal plate into the lower adapter.

3) Tighten the belt and you are ready to train!



How to plug in the superbelt within seconds

 


Super durable steel adapter plates can be screwed to the wall (two plates) or attached to a tree or post (two plates) with the straps. Tighten the super belt between them and you have a fully height-adjustable sling and resistance trainer anywhere you want, indoors or outdoors!


We made them white so they are not so conspicious.

 

Wall Mount
 


 


 

Mounting of a wall adapter with four screws and dowels to the wall

 

Can FREESIXD be attached on a stud wall?


If you have only a stud wall in your house and still want to install FREESIXD on it, then you can use an additional wooden plate which you fix between two studs. On that plate you can then attach the wall adapters. (see below)
 

 

How to install FREESIXD on a stud wall


 

Outdoor Tree / Post Mount


For the outdoor installation you simply need the two padded outdoor adapters and tension straps to attach it to a tree or post. This allows you to train anywhere you want, in the backyard, park or even at the beach. Enjoy the beautiful weather and fresh air with an outdoor workout!
 

Outdoor adapters plus tension straps (2,0 m / 78 in each)

 

 

FREESIXD can also be installed on any round or square post.

 

'
 

How to install FREESIXD outdoors in less than two minutes.



 


Do not want to or can not screw into the wall or want to work out when travelling in a hotel?

No Problem! We thought of everything and developed a door attachment system which you can attach to any door within seconds.
 


 


 

 

How to install FREESIXD on a door in less than a minute.
 

 

Hint: if possible train from the side of the door where the door opens away from you or lock the door so it does not open.

 

Hotel door attachment


Video: How FREESIXD can be used on a door.
 


 


FREESIXD combines the benefits of a sling trainer and resistance bands, which make your workout an amazing and fun experience.
 

 

Two length adjustable sling straps for all different types of exercises. Use your bodyweight as resistance.
 

Total length: 4,0 m / 157 in)


How to change the difficulty by adjusting your body angle

 


Resistance bands


Included in all FREESIXD packages are four resistance bands in two different tension levels (blue & grey). Resistance bands help you do gym exercises - without needing a gym. They allow you to train every muscle group, are lightweight and thus super-portable and the chance of injury is less due to a lower amount of force on the joints as compared to weights.
 


Strength of resistance bands
 


The black band or even stronger bands can also be purchased separately after the campaign. FREESIXD is also compatible with other type of resistance bands like round tube bands.



How to adjust the resistance


There are two ways you can adjust the intensity of the exercises with FREESIXD and the bands.

1) TWIST THE BAR: If you use the bar for squats, deadlifts or triceps press, twist the bar and roll-up the band. The band gets shorter and thus the resistance increases.

Twist the bar and roll-up the resistance band for more resistance

 

2) ADJUST THE BUCKLE: This is best explained by watching the video below:
 

 



Two handles with anti-slip rubber coating ensure a perfect grip for all kinds of exercises.
 

 

 


The additional Trings are comparable to wooden gymnastic rings, but offer you three different grip positions.
 

 

 



With the pluggable bar you can expand your workout and perform exercises such as squats, deadlifts, lat pull-down, triceps press or bar curls. Its compact design fits perfectly into the portable bag.


Total Length: 128 cm (50 in)
 

 

Resistance band attachment for various exercises

„The more you turn, the more your muscles burn“


Roll-up the resistance band on the bar for more resistance


How to adjust the resistance by twisting the bar
 

Bar curls


Lat pull-downs with pluggable bar


Bar squats


 


Comfortable ankle straps allow you to attach the resistance bands to train your legs and glutes.
 

 

 


Everything fits neatly in a super-portable, lightweight bag. FREESIXD can be used anywhere you want!
 

 



 

The FREESIXD organizer also fits into standard carry-on luggage...


FREESIXD organizer in carry-on luggage


.. or you can also just carry the travel package for the door in a small drawstring bag.

 


On the wall at home


Simpy attach the two wall adapters with four screws each to any brick, concrete or stud wall (see instructions above) and you are ready to go!
 

 

Also attachable to any outdoor wall so you can work out in the fresh air!

 

 

On a door at home or in a hotel


You prefer the screwsless installation? We thought of you and developed a screwless door attachment system so you can train at home or in a hotel room when travelling.


 

 On a tree or post outdoors 

 

 



Pick a reward, become a backer, and help us bring this new product to life. To say thank you, we offer the lowest possible price and deliver to you before anyone else.


(The prices are fixed in EUR, which means that they may vary slightly in other currencies, depending on the exchange rate).


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 



FREESIXD is a product of our brand Pullup & Dip, located in Munich, Germany. What began in 2016 as a product name for the world's first portable pull-up and dip bar has become an international brand for calisthenics and bodyweight training equipment.
 


 


Our vision is to enable sport fans all around the world to train with 100% flexibility, anywhere and anytime. You don't need a gym to get or stay fit. That's how the idea of launching the world's first mobile pull-up and dip bar came about in 2016 . In the years that followed, several other products and in-house developments occured, such as our parallettes and push-up bars. 

Our vision from the beginning was to bring high quality and unique training accessories to the market to support athletes with great products for training in the long run. Now, 4 years later, we are proud to have supplied our equipment to well over 200,000 satisfied customers in over 70 countries worldwide.

Check out our newest customer compilation with training scenes from customers all around the world.

 
 
 

 


To offer you the best shipping price possible, we will be shipping FREESIXD not from one, not from two but from three warehouses worldwide. This will allow us to ship it to you fast and at a low cost.

Warehouse #1: Munich, Germany

Warehouse #2: Houston, USA

Warehouse #3: Shanghai, China


We are happy to offer free shipping within Germany and low cost shipping for the US and the whole of Europe.  The shipping rate to your country will be indicated on each reward when making a pledge for this campaign (when selecting a reward). All rewards will be shipped incl. tracking. 


Shipping times


Your order will be handled by DHL, USPS, UPS, DPD or FedEx depending on your country.  Delivery time takes between 1-3 business days (Germany), 3-7 business days (Europe + US) and 7-21 business days for other countries.
 




Customs & Duties, Shipping Policy,


Please note that you may be responsible for duties and taxes applicable to your country. As we are shipping the rewards all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo. For international backers outside of the US and the EU who are required to pay customs, you will receive an e-mail from the shipping provider or your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Once you make that payment to the customs office your order will be processed for final delivery. 


If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.




 




In February 2019 we had the first ideas of our own sling trainer and started with some first drawings. Then in March 2020 we finally produced the first prototypes with a 3D printer. Since then a lot has changed and improved.




FREESIXD prototypes of wall adapter, plug (of the bar), buckle, Trings




FREESIXD prototype development

 


 


 


 

 

 

 

  • Length of super belt: 2,5 m (98 in)
  • Length of sling straps: 4,0 m (157 in) (loop 2,0 m)
  • Length of tension straps: 2,0 m (78 in), max. tree circumference:  60 cm (23 in)
  • Length of door system (without superbelt): 2,5 m (98 in)
  • Wall screws & dowels: screws 8 x 80 mm (0,3 x 3,1 in) / dowel 12 x 60 mm (0,5 x 2,3 in)
  • Pluggable bar: Length 128 x 3 cm (50 x 1,2 in); weight 2,0 kg (4,4 lbs)
  • Dimensions of wall adapters: 120 x 95 x 40 mm (4,7 x 3,7 x 0,15 in)
  • Organizer dimensions & weight: 49 x 34 x 13 cm (19 x 13 x 5 in); 0,8 kg (1.7 lbs)
  • Weight of different kits: Wall & Door kit: 3,8 kg (8.3 lbs); Wall & Door kit + Trings: 4,5 kg (10 lbs); Wall & Door kit + Bar: 5,7 kg (12.5 lbs); Wall & Door + Tree/Post Kit: 5,4 kg (12 lbs); ALL IN kit: 7,8 kg (17 lbs)



Warranty:

We stand behind our product and offer you a 24 month warranty on all FREESIXD packages (except bands). If we can't fix or repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the product, no questions asked.

 

Need help? We're here for you.


If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at service@pullup-dip.com

 

Product designer: Marcus Wiedemann

Video creative producer: Matthias Ring

Motion Design: Dennis Götz

 

Risks & Challenges 

This is already our second crowdfunding project. In 2016 we successfully brought the world’s first portable Pullup & Dip bar to reality and shipped it to 227 happy backers from all around the world. Since then we shipped over 200,000 more orders so we know how product development, production and worldwide shipping works.

We learned a lot from our first campaign, so we are confident that this project will run even smoother than last time. We work with people who have already successfully developed our other products which we have been selling for four years and have a great team made up of a product designer, purchaser and fulfillment experts who do such work on a daily basis.
We are using our trusted partners and realistic timelines to make sure you get your FREESIXD as soon as possible.

The product is complete, tested and the molds for the buckle and bar are designed and ready to be made, we are just waiting for the funding. We have secured production quantities of long-lead parts and can go into production right after or even during the campaign. Our fulfillment structure has been active four years so far and we can ship it out as soon as it arrives in our warehouse.

However, it is important for backers to understand that sometimes timelines can change a bit due to travel restrictions, manufacturing delays or the current covid situation. We promise to be open and transparent to you and will keep you updated along the way.

We always stand behind our products which means we will make sure you get the best version of FREESIXD possible. We commit to you, our backer, to be completely transparent along the way. We are looking forward to delivering FREESIXD to backers from all around the world. Thanks for believing in us! Your Pullup & Dip Team behind FREESIXD.

If you have any questions, concerns or feedback, you can reach us at service@pullup-dip.com

An ultraportable sling and resistance trainer for a full-body workout indoors or outdoors.
Train with over 100 exercises without having to go to a gym. FREESIXD is your portable full-body gym that allows you to work out at home, outdoors or when travelling! All with one device that fits in a small bag.
 

 

Meet FREESIXD, the latest innovation from the founders of Pullup & Dip, a world reknowned brand for calisthenics and bodyweight training equipment.
 

Scope of delivery of All-IN Kit
 

 

FREESIXD gives you 100% flexibility to work out anywhere and anytime you want. Skip the gym and train at home, in the park, backyard, on vacation, in a hotel room while travelling or anywhere else.

✅ Home: Save time and money and work out at home using the wall or door.
✅ Travel: Maintain your health during travelling and avoid the ill-equipped hotel gyms. 
✅ Outdoors: Enjoy a workout at your favourite location in the fresh air instead of a stuffy gym.
 


FREESIXD is much more than just a sling trainer. It's basically a portable, full-body gym in a bag. Check out the two main differences compared to other sling trainers below. 1) HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE - The attachment of FREESIXD is not only fixed at the top, but is stepless height-adjustable, so you can adjust the buckle to your desired height and train from all possible angles.
  
FREESIXD vs. sling trainers 
2) FULL-BODY PORTABLE GYM - It's a combination of a sling trainer, resistance bands and an exercise bar which allows many more exercises and strength levels than a sling trainer.
 
 
 

FREESIXD is probably THE most versatile fitness device on the market. You can do over 100 exercises and it helps to build and tone muscle efficiently. Get stronger, fitter and lose weight without having to go to the gym.
Train with 100% flexibility at home, in the park or when travelling and save yourself time and money!

story:
*Caution­ - The eWave is currently an Investigational Device, Limited by Federal (or United States) Law to Investigational Use

At WearLinq, we set out to design the eWave with one focus. You. The eWave is an affordable, stretchable sensor that provides you with medical-grade ECG at all times. Making 24/7 recording, instant interpretation and in-app connection to physicians for arrhythmia diagnosis & management available for everyone. Live your life calm and conscious knowing the eWave will keep an eye on you or your loved one. Wherever you are and whatever you’re doing.

If you've ever experienced a heart scare you get reminded of how precious life is - enjoying time with friends and family, strolling through the city or taking a long walk through the forest. With eWave, we want to empower you to take care of your heart while living your life to the fullest.

Our stretchable technology makes the eWave the world’s smallest, lightest, and first stretchable ECG wearable. You can easily stick the eWave on your chest like a bandaid. Thanks to its skin-like softness and 5.4 grams of weight, you won’t even notice the eWave, it's like your "second skin". The patch can be replaced whenever the you want to, and each patch lasts at least 1 week. After clearance, the eWave will fall on your doormat with 25 patches. You'll be able to order more patches for $2 each online.

The eWave records a multi-lead ECG and transmits it in real time to your phone, where it’s interpreted with AI to detect typical irregular heart rhythms, including a normal heart rhythm, aFib, bradycardia, tachycardia et al. You'll be able to schedule same-week cardiologist e-visits with just one tap. If you already have a cardiologist you trust, you can also export your medical-grade recordings to PDFs and send to them.

What you've seen so far about arrhythmia is just the first step for us at WearLinq. We're intending to expand to other cardiovascular areas after our first clearance, making all of them part of our platform.

Arrhythmia describes an irregular heartbeat. With this condition, a person’s heart may beat too quickly, too slowly, too early, or with an irregular rhythm. Many heart arrhythmias are harmless. However, if they are highly irregular or result from a weak or damaged heart, arrhythmias can cause severe and potentially fatal symptoms and complications.

Episodes of arrhythmia are unpredictable and significantly increase the risk of stroke if untreated. They can happen once a day or once every few months. To have a basis for clinical decision-making, 24/7 medical-grade monitoring is required. Recording 30-second ECG snippets with smartwatches is like taking a snapshot out of a movie to try to understand the plot.

 

We’ve invested years in saving you time by maximizing the lifespan of the battery you only need to charge your eWave every three days when monitoring 24/7. Charging will only take about 1.5 hours. Fully charge your eWave on the go with our battery case which keeps the eWave charge for another 12 days.

    We’ve developed the technology behind the eWave at the world-leading lab on stretchable electronics at Stanford University, led by Professor Zhenan Bao. Over a period of 2 years, our team of Stanford engineering PhDs and cardiologists designed the eWave piece by piece. We’re currently backed by Silicon Valley investors on our mission to empower people to live healthier.

     

    We invite everyone to join us on this mission right here on Indiegogo. Contribute to our campaign and receive the eWave as one of the first after our clearance. To get the chance to receive the eWave early and help us with the validation of the product for the FDA clearance, read more about our study here. You’ll have the chance to shape the user experience and our future together with us!

    Below are some pictures of our product before and after assembly.

    (How the eWave is made)

     

    (Left Battery, PCBA, Case of the eWave. Right Fully Assembled eWaves)

    (Printing the Stretchable patch by our manufacturer)

story:
Message from the Founder

Hi Potential Backers, 

This is James Paul Pilande an Architect and Director of ARID Builders Pte Ltd a Commercial Interior Design firm and developer of the LumenAire. 

In February of this year at the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic, myself and the LumenAire team which includes Sheldon Ruiz, Alex Deng, Nick Benlota and Rene Tierra hatched a plan to design and develop a novel pendant light fixture with an integrated UVC Air purifier function, it is a patent-pending device in partnership with Philips TUV and supported by Enterprise Singapore. 

Our objective is to provide the world with a Singapore product that is safe and effective in improving (IAQ) Indoor Air Quality to prevent individuals from acquiring or spreading airborne pathogens which include the dreaded coronavirus that causes COVID-19.  

The rationale for using a pendant light is it is a perfect fixture for a UVGi (Ultraviolet Germicidal Irradiation) device due to its elongated body profile that will provide an extended amount of UVC intensity and exposure time to destroy the nucleic acid in the microorganisms DNA disrupting their ability to perform vital cellular functions that cause infections and disease. 

 
In partnership with PHILIPS as an OEM for UV lamps and drivers, the LumenAire is safe to use in occupied space because the UVC Light is shielded, which means it is enclosed in an Irradiation Chamber, therefore avoiding contact with the eyes and skin. It is hidden from sight so air disinfection is always being performed even without noticing it.
Our product is focused is to provide a much improved indoor air quality in which standard air purifiers equipped with HEPA filters cannot achieve. At present these devices can only filter dust, smoke, odor, dander, and other smaller particles but not airborne pathogens. 

To know more about how it works, you can watch our short Youtube webinar about UVGi Air Disinfection.  

 

Campaign Theme "Product with a Purpose" 

Our tagline "Prevention is Better than Cure" signifies our dedication to helping prevent the spread of the coronavirus causing COVID-19 pandemic.

The LumenAire team believes that good indoor air quality is the key to controlling the spread of the coronavirus and with your donations & backing, we want to provide selected nursing homes, small community clinics, and childcare centers with the much-needed protection by installing our products to these facilities and provide a pre and post (IAQ) Indoor Air Quality audit conducted by an independent agency to monitor the effectivity of the device to create public awareness about the air disinfecting capabilities of UV light. 

 

"As Architects, we cannot make ventilators, masks, or even formulate a vaccine. Hence we aim to fight this pandemic the best way we know-how." 

Your backing will come a long way!

With your support, we can fund the following activities,

  1. To employ a team to negotiate, coordinate, and implement the roll-out of the LumenAire in selected nursing homes, small community clinics, and childcare centers in Singapore.
  2. To produce the quantity of LumenAire products required in our pledge. (32 nos. pendant light purifiers and 30 nos. troffer light purifiers)
  3. To Pay for contractors to install the LumenAire in these facilities.
  4. To hire and conduct an independent IAQ audit using a third-party agency on selected facilities. (one per facility)
  5. Lastly, to manufacture 100 nos. pendant light purifiers necessary to fulfill the discounted pre-selling pledge. 

Testing & Certification   

To make sure that our product is safe and effective, the first batch of our pendant light will be tested in a TUV-SUD facility in the first week of July 2020. Our test fees are supported by Enterprise Singapore EDG grant. 

We will be certifying the product for the following test.

Electrical Safety testing; https://www.tuvsud.com/en-sg/services/testing/electrical-safety-testing

CADR value testing; https://www.tuvsud.com/en-sg/services/testing/clean-air-delivery-rate-cadr-testing

Microbiology testing; https://www.tuvsud.com/en-sg/services/testing/microbiology-testing

We expect a smooth certification process before the end of July.  Our scheduled fulfillment date will start on August 15, 2020. 

Follow us on Facebook & Instagram and you can download our Product Data Sheet for more information.

Thank you,

James Paul Pilande, Managing Director

story:
Hey there,

My name is Taylor McKinney and my company is called Beauty & Beast Performance LLC.  It is a program committed to strengthening the bodies and minds of girls and women, making them exceptional in sport and everyday health and fitness. I created this program because I saw a lack of proper athletic training being offered for female athletes as well as a rise in obesity in women. I currently hold the title of Strength and Conditioning Coach at Cedar Valley College and I’ve seen first-hand how the lack of weight room training being available, has affected my athletes. Many of them have never been in a weight room or have trained in a professionally led environment and when questioned as to why, the responses are almost always "because it was for the boys".  They then come to me, already in college, untrained and with under lying injuries that could have been prevented if someone cared enough to pay attention. In the world we live in today, especially in the fitness/athlete industry, women are rarely thought of first or equally, well at Beauty & Beast Performance I want to help change that. Not only will we be a gym for the general population to help them get healthy and fit, but we will also provide strength and conditioning programs, specifically for female athletes. This will provide female athletes with tailored plans to help increase their athletic abilities making them more marketable to high-school, college, and professional coaches. To some individuals an athletic scholarship is the only opportunity they have to get to college and now they will have a facility in their community to help them achieve that.   

Where is my money going?

I want to assure you that all proceeds will be going directly toward my business. I am not just asking for a handout without putting in some work on my end. The land that you see in this video is fully owned by me and that is where the building will be built. Also, the building materials have  been bought and paid in full as well. Your funds will be helping with contractors to finish the building process, as well as equipment.

Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!

I just want to thank you so much for taking the time to read this. If you are able to contribute any and all donations will help and be appreciated.

story:
INTRODUCING POWER GUM.

Designed specifically to increase your performance and overall health, POWER GUM is a sugar free supplement that includes caffeine, Vitamin D, Vitamin B3 (Niacin), Vitamin B6, and Vitamin B12. Whether you're gaming, exercising, studying, working, or anywhere in-between, POWER GUM will give you the boost you need - and taste great while doing so.

WHY GUM?

Chewing gum delivers energy and nutrients faster than other methods through sublingual and buccal absorption. Our gum format also ensures that you can get your boost on the go, without having to carry around clunky shakers, powders, or buy overpriced coffee or energy drinks. Research also suggests that the physical act of chewing gum activates the brain and boosts mental focus.

THE FORMULA.

Studies have shown that around 40% of Americans are lacking Vitamin D or various B vitamins, so to us, pairing Vitamin D, Vitamin B3 (Niacin), Vitamin B6, Vitamin B12, and a functional dose of caffeine was a no-brainer. On top of that, each piece of POWER GUM is dosed so that should you choose, you can safely chew multiple pieces per day, based off of the FDA's recommended daily values.

ABOUT THE CREATOR.

Having an applied sciences undergraduate degree and multiple years working as a full-time online content creator, POWER GUM creator Matt Morse (StaysafeTV) knows the importance of having a clean-burning and hard-hitting energy source that combines functionality, well-being, and performance. It was this concept that drove the development of POWER GUM, which utilizes a rapid-delivery chewable gum format and a vitamin infused caffeine formula to provide energy and mental clarity whenever you need it, wherever you need it.

 

NUTRITION INFORMATION:

story:
Help Us Reach $100,000 To Bring this Concept to LIFE!


Help us reach our goal for us to begin creating our shaver, whitener and anti-aging skincare kit! Once we reach our goal of $100,000 USD we will begin our production stage right away. The kit is completely compatible with the ICLO and the heads are interchangeable. At our goal the shaver will be up for rewards at 50% OFF!

 

We are looking to start production on January 2021, a head with a compatible
Gillette razor blade will also be added. ( 3D Concept of the developing model) 

 

The Iclo is the world’s first interchangeable all-purpose 3 in 1 care product which will save your nightly routine for some extra time to yourself. The Kit comes with 3 interchangeable heads which hold its own unique purpose. With all the products in one place you don’t need to worry about finding each one on a busy day. 

 

The following images are a functioning Mock Up Model. Final model product may vary.

1

The Toothbrush: Start your routine with the electronic toothbrush with up to supersonic speeds of 44,000 movements per minute. Above the standard of most devices, the Iclo will guarantee you fresh and healthier teeth. The toothbrush also come with a blue LED whitening feature which turns on while brushing your teeth to insure you of whiter teeth! Optimal time usage of 3 min for the best results.

Leading Quality and Durability - The electric toothbrush head is made of genuine US Dupont steel caps for hygienic storage to maintain a dust-free toothbrush head.



 

Charcoal Toothbrush - The charcoal brush is used in the toothbrush for brighter teeth. The fade in the charcoal will indicate when to change your brush.  Recommended to replace approximately every three months.

 

Blue LED Whitener- the Iclo toothbrush is completely LED whitening functional so you can do it all at once! To use simply change the mode to "B" and turn on your device. 


Iclo comes with four toothbrush heads, and each toothbrush head has a color band, so a family of four can use it together or you can use it alone for up to one year.

2

The Cleanser: Switch on the cleansing brush for a deep-pore wash. Much more effective than using your hands the cleanser will reach deep in your skin to rid of dry skin. A soothing massage to go along with your routine to start your day. Optimal time usage of 3 min. 


The soft non-toxic silicon base is safe and effective on your skin. Creating foams twice as much as washing with your hands, the cleansing brush gently washes and massages your face with ease. The more pressure on you face just gently apply cleansing foam on the brush and rotate gently on your skin.

3

The Peeler: Finish off your routine with the peeler, to remove blackheads, whiteheads and acne. Use  professional skincare products right at your home! The peeler easily takes out acne with one push leading to a clear skin. With the supersonic speed to go along with the peeler, the process is fast and soothing all while clearing your skin. Optimal time usage of 3 min for the best results.

 

Switch onto the peeler to finish your routine! The peeler vibrates at a speed of 44,000 times per minute while thoroughly extracting any black heads or excess skin from your face.  

Easy home care at a low cost. Exfoliation of dead skin cells, sebum, and various wastes, for better absorption of the nutrients of cosmetics into the skin.

(Use it for a short period of time, approximately 3 minutes and using it for a long time may cause pigmentation and dermatitis on the skin. It is more effective if you use a steam towel after you open the pores.)

4

Tooth Brush Mode Types:

Normal
- Movement at 44,000 Times per minute. For effective cleaning between teeth and gums.

Soft
- Movement at 32,000 Times per minute. For sensitive teeth use the soft mode for a 

Pulse
-Movement at 32,000 Times in first minute than 37,200 Times for the next minute. This speed changes every minute to strengthen your teeth while giving it an effective massage.

Recommended Usage Time: 3 min

Deep-Pore Cleansing Brush:

Movement at 33,000 Times per Minute. Cleanse your face without touching your hands with the deep-pore brush. With twice the amount of foam your skin will feel smoother instantly.  
Recommended Usage Time: 3 min

Aqua Peeler:

Movement at 44,000  Times per minute, removing  dry dead skin cells.

For smooth skin use the peeler to exfoliate your face for better application for skin care products. You will feel refreshed with a clearer skin. 

Recommended Usage Time: 3 min

 

5


 


UVC Sterilizer Dock: The base holds a feature of sterilizing function when not in use for extra assurance that your device will stay clean. The UVC is set on a timer just enough to turn off by itself so you won't need to worry about wasting electricity.  

Activate the UVC Sterilizer with a click of a button. The light will indicate that the UVC feature is working. After the process is complete the UVC light will automatically turn off.

6


Wireless Rechargeable Base: The ICLO is cordless and charges when placed on the base. Which is connected by a USB port universal to any type of chargers with a USB port. With one full charge the brush is able to last for up to 20 days, so you can take it on the go for short trips even without the charger!

 

7

The Iclo is IPX7 Waterproof approved so you don't have to worry about your device not functioning in the water. You can even take it with you while taking a shower! Just be careful that the charging dock USB port does not get wet!

 

-Caution-

When using the peeling function for the first time, please start once a week and manage it two to three times a week.

The principle is to release wastes from the pores by transmitting sonic vibrations to water particles attached to the skin surface.

It's not irritating, but it's too tight, so please refrain from overusing it.

 


With its slim design, the ICLO comes in matte black and pearl white. 

Match your style interior or even your personal preference. With two styles to choose from you can make your bathroom look cleaner more organized and best of all a simple device to quickly help you have better skin and teeth.

 

Pearl White

Matte Black

 

The I.Clo is the world’s first interchangeable all-purpose 3 in 1 care product which will save your nightly routine for some extra time to yourself.


Compact packing design to save space.

 

Simple design. Comes with detailed manual.

 

Component Description
1 x Supersonic Main Device
4 x  Charcoal Toothbrush Head
1 x  Silicon Brush
1 x Metal Peeler
1 x UVC LED Sterilization Charge Stand
1 x C Type USB Charging Cable
1 x Warranty and User's Guide

Black & White 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


 



 



Share our product!


 
           

 

 

Check Our FAQ For More Information

 

*Detailed operation and usage after purchasing the product can be provided on the website at www.iclocorp.com and points can be accumulated when signing up as a member.

The more pressure on you face just gently apply cleansing foam on the brush and rotate gently on your skin.3The Peeler: Finish off your routine with the peeler, to remove blackheads, whiteheads and acne. Use  professional skincare products right at your home! The peeler easily takes out acne with one push leading to a clear skin. With the supersonic speed to go along with the peeler, the process is fast and soothing all while clearing your skin. Optimal time usage of 3 min for the best results. Switch onto the peeler to finish your routine! The peeler vibrates at a speed of 44,000 times per minute while thoroughly extracting any black heads or excess skin from your face.  Easy home care at a low cost. Exfoliation of dead skin cells, sebum, and various wastes, for better absorption of the nutrients of cosmetics into the skin.(Use it for a short period of time, approximately 3 minutes and using it for a long time may cause pigmentation and dermatitis on the skin. It is more effective if you use a steam towel after you open the pores.)4


Tooth Brush Mode Types:
Normal- Movement at 44,000 Times per minute. For effective cleaning between teeth and gums.Soft- Movement at 32,000 Times per minute. For sensitive teeth use the soft mode for a Pulse-Movement at 32,000 Times in first minute than 37,200 Times for the next minute. This speed changes every minute to strengthen your teeth while giving it an effective massage.Recommended Usage Time: 3 minDeep-Pore Cleansing Brush:Movement at 33,000 Times per Minute. Cleanse your face without touching your hands with the deep-pore brush. With twice the amount of foam your skin will feel smoother instantly.  Recommended Usage Time: 3 min
Aqua Peeler:
Movement at 44,000  Times per minute, removing  dry dead skin cells.For smooth skin use the peeler to exfoliate your face for better application for skin care products. You will feel refreshed with a clearer skin. Recommended Usage Time: 3 min 5 UVC Sterilizer Dock: The base holds a feature of sterilizing function when not in use for extra assurance that your device will stay clean. The UVC is set on a timer just enough to turn off by itself so you won't need to worry about wasting electricity.  Activate the UVC Sterilizer with a click of a button. The light will indicate that the UVC feature is working. After the process is complete the UVC light will automatically turn off.6Wireless Rechargeable Base: The ICLO is cordless and charges when placed on the base. Which is connected by a USB port universal to any type of chargers with a USB port. With one full charge the brush is able to last for up to 20 days, so you can take it on the go for short trips even without the charger! 7The Iclo is IPX7 Waterproof approved so you don't have to worry about your device not functioning in the water. You can even take it with you while taking a shower! Just be careful that the charging dock USB port does not get wet! 
-Caution-
When using the peeling function for the first time, please start once a week and manage it two to three times a week.The principle is to release wastes from the pores by transmitting sonic vibrations to water particles attached to the skin surface.It's not irritating, but it's too tight, so please refrain from overusing it. 

With its slim design, the ICLO comes in matte black and pearl white. Match your style interior or even your personal preference. With two styles to choose from you can make your bathroom look cleaner more organized and best of all a simple device to quickly help you have better skin and teeth. 

Pearl WhiteMatte Black The I.Clo is the world’s first interchangeable all-purpose 3 in 1 care product which will save your nightly routine for some extra time to yourself.Compact packing design to save space. Simple design. Comes with detailed manual. Component Description1 x Supersonic Main Device4 x  Charcoal Toothbrush Head1 x  Silicon Brush1 x Metal Peeler1 x UVC LED Sterilization Charge Stand1 x C Type USB Charging Cable1 x Warranty and User's GuideBlack & White 

          

 
Share our product!


            
  Check Our FAQ For More Information *Detailed operation and usage after purchasing the product can be provided on the website at www.iclocorp.com and points can be accumulated when signing up as a member.

story:
me.mum is an innovative portable fertility monitor and app that can accurately predict women's fertile days by analyzing the levels of luteinizing hormone (LH) from saliva.

me.mum technology is built from scratch. It provides personalized insights into women's hormone profile and detects the most fertile days, which significantly increases the chance of conceiving.

After four years of development and two prototypes, we can finally share with you a reliable, simple to use solution for all women and couples who are planning a pregnancy or trying to conceive but experiencing difficulties. With me.mum you will do it easily and simply.


The best time to use me.mum is in the morning, but you can use it during the day too. Before using, do not eat or drink anything, except water, that way your saliva will be clean. 

 

The idea started when my partner and I tried to make a baby. Two years of expectations, disappointment and hopes pushed me towards four years of developing me.mum.  

Chances of getting pregnant are higher when women can identify their fertility window. me.mum combines the most popular methods of determining the fertile days: period calendar and measuring luteinizing hormone (LH) from saliva, instead of urine.

Every time it is used, machine learning technology learns more about its user and creates personalised data that can significantly increase the chance for conceiving. me.mum accuracy is already at an incredible 70 percent, while standard and single-use ovulation tests can be effective up to 80 percent. The goal is to increase me.mum percentage of fertility prediction to 95 percent. 

*me.mum is not a contraceptive method and we do not recommend using it for that purpose. 

me.mum app powered by machine learning technology interprets personalized woman's actual hormone variations on any given day. With that exact powerful information, women can know their precise fertile days and the best possible moment for conceiving. me.mum app is developed for Android and iOS operative systems. 

We grow together with me.mum community. Women who used the final product have already shared their experience. Positive and inspiring feedback means everything to us!

Luteinizing hormone drives the fertility process, stimulates the ovaries to release an egg and helps sustain the pregnancy once the fertilization occurs. Levels of the hormone are higher before ovulation. The best time to test its level is in the middle of the menstrual cycle.

 

Machine learning technology analyzes luteinizing hormone samples from saliva and determines a woman's ovulation. After the sample is taken it needs to be uploaded to me.mum app. Our technology will independently determine the stage of the sample. 

me.mum comes in the box with your personal code to me.mum app, instructions and a small bag for protecting the fertility monitor. 

Support us in launching a new method of predicting fertility and providing empowering information on women’s cycles and hormone levels.

story:
This campaign has ended.

Missed your chance?

 

You can still order your BIKEBOX at iamrunbox.com

Pre-Order Here

 

---

 

A cycling backpack.

A planet-friendly companion.

A personal statement.

 

The BIKEBOX is everything you need for a comfortable ride. Plus, you can personalize it the way you want. All of that with the lowest impact on the environment.

 

 

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

From our Ambassadors

 

Main Features

 

Packing System

 

 

 

 

  • Space Bag: add extra 12L capacity on the outside; 
  • Origami Organizer: designed to keep your shirts wrinkle-free on the go. Arrive in style with our newest hard-shell, waterproof garment bag; 
  • Packing Cubes: the optimal solution for storing and packing anything you can possibly think of - from toiletries to clothes.

 

Tech Specs

 

 

Rewards & Add-on Menu

 

 

Reviews

This is our 6th crowdfunding campaign. Throughout the years we have received amazing feedback from publications around the world.

Our run commuting backpack is RedBull’s #1 choice and now we set out to launch the perfect backpack for bike commuters.

 

How Indiegogo Works

 

 

About IAMRUNBOX

We design backpacks and accessories that are motion-friendly, functional, and sustainable. Our mission is to make it simple and easy for active people to fit sport in their busy lives. Our vision is to create products that promote an active and healthy lifestyle with the lowest carbon footprint possible.

 

Environmental commitments

We strongly believe in a future where everything that is produced will have a longer and healthier life cycle. So we are taking the first steps to enable a more sustainable choice for our customers.

 

We are committed to sustainable and ethical ways of production and consumption. Here are the most important guidelines and programs that we follow in order to make it happen.

Learn More

 

Materials

We strive for using materials that have a low impact on the environment. The BIKEBOX is made from toxin-free and recycled materials.

Learn More

 

CO2 emissions

In 2019 we managed to save 467353,8 kg CO2. Check how much emissions you can save by using our Backpack Pro to active commute.

Learn More

 

The Team

Connect with us

 

 

Project timeline

Risks and challenges

This is our 6th crowdfunding campaign, and getting products delivered on time is a priority for us. We have years of experience in manufacturing, quality control, and logistics, and have successfully produced and delivered similar products in the past. 

Still, we cannot guarantee that there will be no delays in delivery due to the COVID-19 situation. Just keep in mind: we are working hard and doing our best to keep our promise. Whatever challenges we face, our number one goal is to deliver high-quality products on time.

This is our 6th crowdfunding campaign, and getting products delivered on time is a priority for us. We have years of experience in manufacturing, quality control, and logistics, and have successfully produced and delivered similar products in the past.

story:
***WE'RE SHIPPING NOW!*** For more product reviews, please find TubShroom on Amazon. Thank you!



***Attention*** We're are now shipping. All new orders will ship within 24 hours. For most recent product reviews please visit TubShroom listing on Amazon. Thank you!!!
We face 99 problems and challenges every day. Cleaning  clogged drains, however, is no longer one of them. Thanks to our invention - TubShroom™. ( US and CANADA Patent Pending )

Invented By:

Elena Karnegie: 

  •  Registered Nurse. Full Time Night Shift Nurse LIJ Hospital, NY
  •  Mom of Two Beautiful Girls Ages 2 and 3. Julia and Katherine
  •  Reiki Master, Practitioner 
  •  Singing Bowl Therapy Instructor 
  •  Part Time Gardner

Here's how TubShroom™ handles weeks(!) worth volume of hair. The water keeps flowing freely while the hair is stored inside the unit until cleanup. 

You'll look forward to cleaning your strainer! It literally takes seconds. Even if you don't remove the hair right after you take a shower! Wet or dry, hair comes right off. 

 Here's what we've been dealing with before we created TubShroom™

 And this...



Now you too have a chance to own a perfect solution to clogged drains. 
Please share this project with friends to help bring TubShroom™ to life. Thank you!

Everyone in our family has long hair. Including our Turkish Angora cat Marusya and our German Shepherd Frosty. Hair clogged bathroom drains was an ongoing problem. Strainers that are currently available on the market left much to be desired, so we went to the drawing board. We challenged ourselves to create a Strainer that would catch every single hair, every single time we take a shower or bathe our animals.

Important part of the challenge was to create a strainer that would be esthetically appealing and most importantly very easy to clean and maintain.  After about 3 months of trial and little error, TubShroom™ was born. We tested the prototype for several weeks and were so impressed with it, that we crafted and handed out a bunch of them to our friends and family members. The feedback was amazing. 

We had TubShroom™ tested with all types of hair imaginable. Results were more than satisfactory every time. 

Works great with dog and cat hair. Bathing a shedding furry friend can yield a ton of hair, but TubShroom™ handles it with ease.




After several hours at a local Hardware store, we figured out what raw materials we needed in order to put together our first hand crafted prototype. 

Time to work on the 2D drawings. We worked with some of the best designers in the industry. This was an amazing experience in itself.


We are huge fans of the History channel "How it's made", as well as Discovery channel "Myth Busters" series. While working on this project, we felt extremely proud of ourselves. Getting this done meant a lot to us. While working with the CAD designer. I actually considered a career change. This is a very creative and, on many levels, satisfying job. It's an art. Thank you Harald Rehberger for your help and expertise. It was a great pleasure working with you!

Slowly but surely, TubShroom™ is looking more and more like what we had imagined. 


Prototypes Have Arrived!


Got it! At last, the TubShroom™ is ready for production.

Unlike traditional strainers that go over the drain, TubShroom™ is designed to go directly inside the drain opening. The hair is being wrapped around the mid-cylinder, while the water still flows freely through multiple holes strategically located throughout the unit.
One of the great benefits of this design is that you don't see the hair until you pull the TubShroom™ out for cleaning. Cleaning could not be easier. All of the hair is in one place nicely wrapped around the cylinder and all you have to do is simply swipe it right off the TubShroom™ with a piece of paper towel. All it takes is one effortless move to get rid off the entire bunch of hair. No pulling or untangling. The hair is just as easy to remove if it's already dry. Try doing it with other strainers!

Your hair looks good on your head. Not in your tub. 

Most, if not all other strainers are designed to go over the drain - resulting in hair build up as seen above. Untangling soapy hair from your strainer is probably the last thing you want to do after taking a nice shower. With TubShroom™ You'll never have to go through this unpleasant process again. 

TubShroom™ fits directly inside the drain opening. All drain pipes are standard size - 1.5" in diameter. No special installation is required. 

Please share this project with your friends and help us bring TubShroom™ to life. Thank you!

We want to Thank Everyone who made this project possible!

Our Family members. Thank you for believing in us and our project. You are our first backers. Getting this far would not be possible without your emotional and financial support.

Our great Fiends, Neighbors and Co-workers. Thank you for your support and encouragement.

Our CAD designer Mr. Harald Rehberger. Thank you Sir for your hard work, patience and talent. We hope to work with you on more projects in the future.

Our Graphic designer Bojan Stanojevic. Thank you for your vision, hard work and involvement. You are the face of our project.

And of course Kickstarter and IndieGoGo and our Backers. We thank every Backer from the bottom of our hearts. If we could meet every single one of you in person and thank you we would :)

Everyone else who directly or indirectly helped us achieve our goal!

Please share this project with your friends and help us bring TubShroom™ to life. Thank you for your support!

Risks and Challenges:

As is the case with any product, shipping and manufacturing delays are always a possibility. We are committed to adhering strictly to our timelines and getting the TubShroom™ produced on schedule. We gave ourselves a couple of weeks of extra time just in case there's an unexpected delay. Should everything go as planned we will actually deliver earlier than promised.

Throughout the research and development process, we’ve experimented with many different designs in order to develop the perfect strainer. After an extensive process, we have created a functional prototype to our design specifications, which will help expedite the production process once TubShroom™ reaches its funding goal.

Please share this project with your friends and help us bring TubShroom™ to life. Thank you!
We want to Thank Everyone who made this project possible!
Our Family members. Thank you for believing in us and our project. You are our first backers. Getting this far would not be possible without your emotional and financial support.
Our great Fiends, Neighbors and Co-workers. Thank you for your support and encouragement.
Our CAD designer Mr. Harald Rehberger. Thank you Sir for your hard work, patience and talent. We hope to work with you on more projects in the future.
Our Graphic designer Bojan Stanojevic. Thank you for your vision, hard work and involvement. You are the face of our project.
And of course Kickstarter and IndieGoGo and our Backers. We thank every Backer from the bottom of our hearts. If we could meet every single one of you in person and thank you we would :)
Everyone else who directly or indirectly helped us achieve our goal!
Please share this project with your friends and help us bring TubShroom™ to life. Thank you for your support!

Risks and Challenges:
  
As is the case with any product, shipping and manufacturing delays are always a possibility. We are committed to adhering strictly to our timelines and getting the TubShroom™ produced on schedule. We gave ourselves a couple of weeks of extra time just in case there's an unexpected delay. Should everything go as planned we will actually deliver earlier than promised.
Throughout the research and development process, we’ve experimented with many different designs in order to develop the perfect strainer. After an extensive process, we have created a functional prototype to our design specifications, which will help expedite the production process once TubShroom™ reaches its funding goal.

story:
Epilepsy seizure occurrence is unpredictable. Whether they are at home, at work, or during their leisure time, for patients as well as for caregivers, the fear of seizure happening is constantly there. Severe injuries can affect epilepsy sufferers if they are not assisted during a seizure. Therefore, we have created the finest epilepsy monitoring system that enables the detection of epilepsy seizures 24/7 and alerts caregivers thanks to a smart and connected wrist bracelet.

Epilert's bracelet is a smart epilepsy monitoring device. With its 5 biosensors and its Machine Learning Algorithms, Epilert’s bracelet is capable of finely detecting epilepsy seizures, and immediately alerting caregivers. 

  • Peace of mind for patients with epilepsy and caregivers regarding possible seizure occurrence.
  • Daily assistance for epilepsy patients through a special mobile app connected to the bracelet. 
  • Accurate monitoring of seizure records and daily habits for patients, caregivers, and doctors.

 

After years of R&D, Epilert team has developed a device with 5 biosensors gathered in one unique bracelet ready and able to track all unstable vital signs and abnormal neuronal activities. 

5 biosensors of high accuracy along with machine learning (EMU: Epilepsy monitoring unit) to finely detect and monitor epilepsy seizures.

  • EDA SENSOR
  • PPG SENSOR 
  • SKIN TEMPERATURE 
  • 3D ACCELEROMETER
  • 3D GYROSCOPE

       

When a seizure occurs, the 5 sensors included in Epilert’s device detect abnormal neuronal activities and unstable vital signs. Signals emitted by these sensors then are decrypted by an artificial intelligence system or EMU (epilepsy monitoring unit) that instantly allows detecting a seizure. All this process happens fast within seconds to immediately alert family or friends through an SMS and a phone call.

     

EPILERT’s bracelet offers to both patients and caregivers the freedom to fully live their own lives.

  • Caregivers are informed in real-time about patients’ health so they can mind their own business with no worries
  • Patients can feel safe and secure regarding seizure occurrence, wherever they are EPILERT’s bracelet will alert caregivers in case of seizure and send them patients’ localization

 

Our aim is to help patients with epilepsy to gain control over seizure occurrence and help physicians provide a better diagnosis and treatment with more data. EPILERT’s offers to patients the finest epilepsy monitoring system so they can make sure that:

  • Their medications are taken always at the same time which is crucial for the disease stability
  • Their stress level is under control by tracking heartbeats, temperature, neurological activities which is a good way to prevent seizures 
  • Their seizures record such as duration, frequency, and date, are well saved for a better understanding of their disease

 

Patients’ mobile app features: 

The biggest part of epilepsy treatment is adopting a balanced lifestyle. Therefore, we’ve created Epilert’s mobile app which is a great tool to help patients to manage every aspect of their daily life through one unique interface. The goal of Epilert’s app is to help patients to reduce their seizures occurrence through several functionalities: 

  • Medication intake reminder
  • Sleeping time monitoring
  • Seizure records and vital signs monitoring
  • Sport and physical activities planning
  • Diet planning
  • Tabaco and alcohol intake tracking
  • Special stressful events calendar 

Caregivers’ mobile app features: 

Caregivers' special mobile app enables them to be reassured about the patient’s health condition wherever they are. The mobile app gives them a real-time update of their vital signs and seizure records

Medical Doctors’ Dashboard features: 

At Epilert we believe that technology can contribute to enhance doctors’ diagnosis accuracy and help them to give the most adapted treatment by capturing specific data and ensuring a continuous feed of information about patients’ health condition. The reason why we’ve developed EPIDOC a full epilepsy monitoring dashboard through which doctors can visual a large set of data:

  • Vital signs (heartbeat and temperature)
  • Neuronal activities changes
  • Seizures records
  • Sleeping time
  • Medication intake

More accurate data in order to improve diagnosis and medical treatment 

Epilert enables physicians to have exact information about their patients’ seizures, vital signs and daily habits. Therefore, physicians would be able to establish a better diagnosis and medical treatment and adjust it over time thanks to a continuous real-time data update.

  • Clear data visualization
  • Better identification of seizures causes
  • Reduce error of diagnosis
  • Better and personalized medical treatment

“It currently takes far too long for many patients to get an accurate diagnosis and effective treatment”. Neurologist Professor Graeme Jackson "

“After my first seizure, getting a proper diagnosis was actually really hard. I went to multiple GPs and got different scans done" R.V suffered from seizures for years."

Source: https://www.abc.net.au/news/2020-07-29/epilepsy...

                     

At Epilert we aim to detect all kinds of seizures and even be able to predict them through artificial intelligence soon. At this stage Epilert’s bracelet can detect 3 types of seizures which are the most common ones:

  1. Tonic seizures: muscle stiffness, rigidity
  2. Clonic seizures: repetitive, jerking movements
  3. Tonic-clonic seizures: Unconsciousness, convulsions, muscle rigidity

      

Being able to detect all types of seizures is one of the reasons we’ve decided to launch this crowdfunding campaign. In fact, our ability to push further our R&D depends on financial challenges on one hand, and on the other hand, artificial intelligence systems need a large database of users to be more performant. The more patients use our bracelet, the more our artificial intelligence system will be able to detect more types of seizures like:

  1. Absence seizures
  2. Myoclonic seizures
  3. Atonic seizures                   

Refinement, comfort, and robustness, 3 criteria that have guided our passionate product design teamwork when creating Epilert’s bracelet design. After conducting a lot of research on design ergonomics and going through several trials, Epilert’s bracelet design emerged

  • Elegant and minimalist design
  • Robust and resistant materials
  • Adjustable belt to fit all sizes 
  • Light and convenient  
  • Easy magnetic closure

The perfect design to ensure a continuous sensor to skin contact

Epilert design is made to support the epilepsy detection system functioning by ensuring that all sensors are always in contact with the skin while ensuring a comfortable experience and good maintenance of the wrist.

  • An adjustable belt, +/- 40mm to be suitable to all sizes and genders
  • Magnetic closure to ensure good maintenance to the wrist
  • Curvy shapes of the sensors to enhance the contact surface with the skin

A personalized belt for kids

Kids can be very cruel to each other especially at early ages. In fact, children suffering from epilepsy can be victims of very mean mockeries from their peers. Therefore, we wanted to make Epilert a cool accessory for them so they can feel comfortable and happy to wear it

A bracelet that fits everyone, everywhere

Epilert’s bracelet is designed to fit kids as well as adults, men, and women.

Patients simply must wear it on their wrist, and they are always ready to go 

5 color options and two types of fabrics to be suitable for all occasions.

     

List of mechanical components of the bracelet     

      

Electromagnetic Safety Standards 

Epilert Bracelet was tested and certified for:

  • Electrostatic discharge Human body model and is compliant with IEC61000-4-2
  • RF radiated interference and is compliant with EC61000-4-3
  • Electrical fast transient/burst and is compliant with IEC61000-4-4
  • Surge and is compliant with IEC61000-4-5
  • RF Conducted interference is compliant with IEC61000-4-6
  • Voltage dips and is compliant with IEC 61000-4-11
  • Overvoltage and is compliant with IEC60601-1-2
  • General requirements for safety and is compliant with IEC 60601-1-1
  • Radiation Protection and is compliant with IEC 60601-1-3
  • Alarm systems/signals and is compliant with IEC 60601-1-8
  • Fire hazard testing and is compliant with IEC 60695-11-10
  • Primary Battery and is compliant with IEC 60086-1

                

 

 

Who are we?

Epilert is a growing start-up that designs and develops high-quality wearable devices for patients suffering from neurological disorders in order to support them in daily life and to ensure better and rapid access to medical care when needed.

Epilert’s first bracelet is dedicated to patients with epilepsy. Therefore, people suffering from epilepsy can have a real understanding of their disease and feel safe and secure regarding the unpredictable seizures’ occurrence.

Our story

Our story began in 2017 with a group of 3 talented friends from different academic backgrounds (engineering, economics, and medical studies) reunited by a strong willingness to help their friend’s little sister to live a fulfilled life despite her disease and to ensure peace of mind to her worried mom regarding her daughter’s unpredictable illness.

They decided to put in common their knowledge in order to find an effective solution enabling all the family to be constantly informed about their little girl’s health and to be immediately alerted when a seizure occurs without being on her back all day long. Therefore, she can enjoy life as any of her peers, and always feels surrounded and supported by her beloved ones.

Started then a long series of robust scientific research supervised by doctors, to design the finest epilepsy detection and monitoring device to be on market.

An initiative of a group of people united by friendship and animated by the desire to make life easier for millions of patients with epilepsy gave birth to a bigger ambition to shape tomorrow’s medical care through cutting-edge technologies.

The Great Team Behind Our Success

From concept to prototype 

This was a very challenging phase for everybody in the team. It took us almost 3 years full of scientific research supervised by doctors and hard work to design and create our high-quality wearable device. We’ve been lucky with our own fund availability and have utilized that to move successfully from a concept to a fully working prototype overcoming all the challenges.

They talk about us 

   

Amongst 332 startups tackling epilepsy in the world, we have been ranked amongst the top 5 by StartUs insights' innovation analysts. Read the article below for more details

https://www.startus-insights.com/innovators-gui...

 

Our Partners and Achievements

 

WHY CROWDFUNDING?

Working prototypes are now available and clinical trials are currently running for around 7 to 8 months 

  • We have decided to launch a campaign on Indiegogo for 3 main reasons:
  • A need for financial resources to fulfill all testing and FDA clearance requirements. 
  • This campaign is an indicator of demand for our device. We hope you will find it as fulfilling as we have opted to and use the opportunity to pre-order at highly discounted prices. 
  • Our aim to predict seizures before they happen depends on how large our database would be. The more patients use our bracelet, the more our artificial intelligence system will be able to recognize different types of seizures at the earliest possible.

You may also want to support us by making a donation. Or if you can't pre-order the bracelet or are not able to donate to our campaign, but still, find that our device can change someone’s life, then we would love to hear you make some noise about our campaign. Share our Indiegogo page on your social media, or blog. Talk about EPILERT around you. Ask them to visit our website epilert.io or visit our campaign page. 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX 

  • Epilert’s bracelet
  • A charger
  • A user manual 

  • A leaflet for doctors
story_txt:
Epilepsy seizure occurrence is unpredictable. Whether they are at home, at work, or during their leisure time, for patients as well as for caregivers, the fear of seizure happening is constantly there. Severe injuries can affect epilepsy sufferers if they are not assisted during a seizure. Therefore, we have created the finest epilepsy monitoring system that enables the detection of epilepsy seizures 24/7 and alerts caregivers thanks to a smart and connected wrist bracelet.Epilert's bracelet is a smart epilepsy monitoring device. With its 5 biosensors and its Machine Learning Algorithms, Epilert’s bracelet is capable of finely detecting epilepsy seizures, and immediately alerting caregivers. 
Peace of mind for patients with epilepsy and caregivers regarding possible seizure occurrence.
Daily assistance for epilepsy patients through a special mobile app connected to the bracelet. 
Accurate monitoring of seizure records and daily habits for patients, caregivers, and doctors.
 After years of R&D, Epilert team has developed a device with 5 biosensors gathered in one unique bracelet ready and able to track all unstable vital signs and abnormal neuronal activities. 5 biosensors of high accuracy along with machine learning (EMU: Epilepsy monitoring unit) to finely detect and monitor epilepsy seizures.
EDA SENSOR
PPG SENSOR 
SKIN TEMPERATURE 
3D ACCELEROMETER
3D GYROSCOPE
       When a seizure occurs, the 5 sensors included in Epilert’s device detect abnormal neuronal activities and unstable vital signs. Signals emitted by these sensors then are decrypted by an artificial intelligence system or EMU (epilepsy monitoring unit) that instantly allows detecting a seizure. All this process happens fast within seconds to immediately alert family or friends through an SMS and a phone call.     EPILERT’s bracelet offers to both patients and caregivers the freedom to fully live their own lives.
Caregivers are informed in real-time about patients’ health so they can mind their own business with no worries
Patients can feel safe and secure regarding seizure occurrence, wherever they are EPILERT’s bracelet will alert caregivers in case of seizure and send them patients’ localization
 Our aim is to help patients with epilepsy to gain control over seizure occurrence and help physicians provide a better diagnosis and treatment with more data. EPILERT’s offers to patients the finest epilepsy monitoring system so they can make sure that:
Their medications are taken always at the same time which is crucial for the disease stability

Their stress level is under control by tracking heartbeats, temperature, neurological activities which is a good way to prevent seizures 

Their seizures record such as duration, frequency, and date, are well saved for a better understanding of their disease

 
Patients’ mobile app features: The biggest part of epilepsy treatment is adopting a balanced lifestyle. Therefore, we’ve created Epilert’s mobile app which is a great tool to help patients to manage every aspect of their daily life through one unique interface. The goal of Epilert’s app is to help patients to reduce their seizures occurrence through several functionalities: 
Medication intake reminder
Sleeping time monitoring
Seizure records and vital signs monitoring
Sport and physical activities planning
Diet planning
Tabaco and alcohol intake tracking
Special stressful events calendar 
Caregivers’ mobile app features: Caregivers' special mobile app enables them to be reassured about the patient’s health condition wherever they are. The mobile app gives them a real-time update of their vital signs and seizure recordsMedical Doctors’ Dashboard features: At Epilert we believe that technology can contribute to enhance doctors’ diagnosis accuracy and help them to give the most adapted treatment by capturing specific data and ensuring a continuous feed of information about patients’ health condition. The reason why we’ve developed EPIDOC a full epilepsy monitoring dashboard through which doctors can visual a large set of data:
Vital signs (heartbeat and temperature)
Neuronal activities changes
Seizures records
Sleeping time
Medication intake
More accurate data in order to improve diagnosis and medical treatment Epilert enables physicians to have exact information about their patients’ seizures, vital signs and daily habits. Therefore, physicians would be able to establish a better diagnosis and medical treatment and adjust it over time thanks to a continuous real-time data update.
Clear data visualization
Better identification of seizures causes
Reduce error of diagnosis
Better and personalized medical treatment

story:
Manage Your Sleep in 3 Steps

It's hard to believe that you can now manage your sleep with technology, but it's true. SOLTEC℠ Sleep Management System promotes sleep, as easy as 1, 2, 3.

  1. Wear Z•TRACK™ to establish your baseline over your first two nights
  2. Plug Z•GEN in close to your feet. (within a few feet)
  3. Check your results in the SOLTEC•Z™ app

 

SOLTEC•SMS

The SOLTEC•SMS™ Sleep Management System is designed for nightly, home use. It has been verified to naturally guide users into deep Delta sleep.

SOLTEC•SMS is a closed loop system engineered to analyze and record your complete sleep data throughout the night. You initiate the process with the SOLTEC•Z app.

It's Simple

Your first two night's of data are all about you. Z•TRACK records how you sleep, so your protocols can be determined by the algorithms developed by our team of scientists, doctors and engineers through decades of research. On the third night, you are ready to use Z•GEN. Don't worry, the SOLTEC•Z™ app keeps you informed of your progress the entire way. It will prompt you to connect to your Z•GEN device after your baseline data has been established. This is where the magic begins.

Using the system is easy to incorporate into your nightly routine and it's the perfect way to start your day. Even if you already own a wearable device, our system gives you the perfect opportunity to recharge while Z•TRACK handles the heavy lifting of sleep lab quality analytics. Combine that with the proper frequencies delivered by Z•GEN and you're ready to greet the new day. View your results with SOLTEC•Z and measure your progress with trended information and thorough reports.

 

Why is Delta Sleep so Important?

 

Delta Sleep in a Nap Study?

Dr. Martin Scharf explains the significance of Delta sleep in a morning  study. SOLTEC℠ has reinvented sleep through discovery, literally changing the science of sleep. Breakthrough technology, based on established science with measurable, repeatable results requires a deep knowledge and understanding.

 

 

 

 

We put the Z•GEN™ Magnetic Conditioner to the test. What we discovered informs the algorithms that guide the system to work with each user.

 

 

What is truly significant here is that our Sleep Management System is doing what it says, managing your already established sleep stages while you use it.

 

 

Each user must have a system to experience the benefit of an individualized plan. It's personal and it's easy, simply pair your devices to begin and get ready to sleep. The SOLTEC•Z™ app makes pairing the system a snap.

 

Development History SOLTEC•SMS

Decades of research have lead to this, a sleep management system. Once unfathomable, SOLTEC℠ has unlocked the secret to sleep through technological innovation. Combining a breakthrough technology you place near your feet with the equivalent of a sleep lab on your wrist, our system identifies where and when your sleep needs help most. The Z•TRACK™ Analyst, providing the most accurate assessment of your sleep available in a wearable device, captures your baseline over the first two nights. On the third night, Z•TRACK instructs the Z•GEN™ Magnetic Conditioner to deliver the appropriate frequencies to help you fall asleep, stay asleep and experience deeper, rejuvenating sleep. We started from the ground up with this one by reinventing the process of sleep data collection and analysis.

 

Watch Our Evolution

 

Necessity, the Mother of Invention

Z•TRACK Communicates with Z•GEN throughout the entire night because your data is constantly received, analyzed and integrated into Z•TRACK's protocol decisions. We approached other wearable manufacturers to see if we could partner to create an app, using existing wearable device technology. Battery life, as well as other practical considerations, made it clear that we would need to develop our own wearable if we hoped to store, analyze and learn from the data in real time. As we developed the technology, we discovered new possibilities and integrated them into the system, necessitating changes, not only to Z•TRACK but to Z•GEN as well. 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Sleep is an important part of our lives. Studies have proven that getting sleep is a growing concern for many, and the numbers continue to grow. This is a great opportunity to own the SOLTEC•SMS Sleep Management System before we begin worldwide distribution.

Our greatest challenge is how we are going to wrap it all up, literally. We are developing two different packaging approaches and weighing their advantages against their disadvantages to determine which will serve consumer needs best. As a backer, you'll be among the first to know!

Other Ways You Can Help

Use the Indiegogo share tools to spread the word. Remember, sleep is essential and most of us need better quality sleep. The gift of knowledge can change a person's life, so help us get the message out there and bring better sleep to a tired world.
