story:
Unlock the Potential of the Concept2® Rower

We all love the Concept2 rowing machine, it's simply the best in the business for what it does.  But what if it could do more? 

I'm Brad Gresham, inventor and founder of Rowdaptor.  As a former Navy SEAL, I worked hard to squeeze every ounce of capability from my equipment in order to stay at the top of my game.  

My approach to the Concept2 rower was no different.  It's a fantastic machine, but I knew there had to be a way to get more out of it.  Rowdaptor does just that.  Rowdaptor turns the Concept2 rower into a complete home gym, allowing the user to focus that smooth, low-impact resistance and isolate specific muscle groups.  10 new exercises can be performed; no modifications are needed to the machine, and the normal rowing motion is not impeded in any way. 

Rowdaptor's design allows for rapid engagement and disengagement, facilitating quick transitions from normal rowing to any alternate exercise, and back to normal rowing.  This provides for some crazy, high-intensity intervals unlike anything you've ever felt.  The smooth, low-impact resistance of the Concept2 is a serious asset in this context.  With the resistance focused on the concentric contraction of the muscles, blood flow is maximized.  And because the machine's output (felt as resistance) is proportional to the effort you put into it, you get built-in drop sets every time you use it.  You can use it as a simple warm up by going easy on the effort being put into the machine, methodically increasing blood flow to targeted muscle groups.  OR...you can attack it and easily destroy yourself with a soul crushing workout.  Either way, there's no worrying with changing a thing about how the machine is set up; it's all about what you pour into it.  

Here's the list of 10 new exercises that Rowdaptor now allows you to perform on your Concept2 rower:

  1. Bicep curls
  2. Reverse bicep curls
  3. Upright rows/high pulls
  4. Single-arm rows
  5. Cross-body pulls
  6. Front shoulder raises 
  7. Lateral shoulder raises
  8. Goblet squats
  9. Overhead presses
  10. Single-arm overhead presses

Construction: 

Rowdaptor is, and always will be, made in the USA!!  The device is CNC machined from 6061 billet aluminum and uses alloy steel hardware throughout. The foot plate is CNC routed from 3/4" Baltic birch ply and coated with a durable, non-slip coating.  A nylon strap is attached to the foot plate, and includes an ultra-smooth Rollercam buckle.  The foot plate and strap assembly acts as a platform that connects to the rower to keep weight on the machine when the user is standing; that keeps everything on the ground when pulling vertically.  With very few moving parts, and nothing fancy to break off or malfunction, it's purpose-built for daily abuse.  Coming from someone who was paid to destroy things in pursuit of U.S. Government interests around the world, this thing is bomb-proof.  

What Your Support Means: 

Rowdaptor's development has consumed the last 2 years of my life; I've poured my heart and soul (and bank account) into developing what I believe is the ultimate improvement to an already incredible machine.  I've gone through 7 design iterations and constructed 4 completely different prototypes to arrive at this final design.  It's finally ready, and I want to get it out into the wild.  Your support will be instrumental in making that a reality. 

With my background from the SEAL Teams, it's not a stretch to understand that I've always been focused on human performance.  What isn't obvious is that I suffer with Multiple Sclerosis, and have done so for the past 9 years.  Having MS has taught me that I cannot take mobility and health for granted, and that I need 100% focus on what I refer to as "health span."  Health span is not simply living longer, but it's a focus on living an active, mobile and healthy life so that we are able to truly enjoy life with those that we love for as long as possible.  We need to support one another in developing our strength and mobility at all points in our lives.  I truly believe that Rowdaptor is one of those transformative devices that can safely and effectively aid in increasing our health span.  The low-impact, compound movements and cardiovascular benefits of rowing with the Concept2 rower are irrefutable.  Rowdaptor advances those benefits by leveraging that low-impact resistance for strength and mobility training for specific muscle groups.  The Concept2 rower outfitted with Rowdaptor is simply a magical combination of endurance, mobility and strength training for folks of all ages and abilities.  Supporting this campaign will serve to improve the health span of countless others by providing an easily accessible means to support their continued mobility and strength.  

What Rowdaptor, LLC Needs & What Your Support Will Get:

My funding goal for the campaign is $50,000.  Your support will allow me to design and construct the required production fixtures and tooling; purchase raw materials, hardware, and packaging; and quickly transition to sustained production.  With this accomplished, Rowdaptor, LLC is off and running as a veteran-owned small business and, in my book, that's about as cool as it gets.  

The perks of this campaign are super simple:

  1. You can back us and get a complete Rowdaptor system from the initial production run
  2.  Back us with a generous donation to help get us off the ground  

Or you can select both...then you'd be super awesome!!

Risks & Challenges

To be honest, the risks are extremely low at this point.  The design work and testing are complete.  I am testing a new finish for the foot plate, but that would be the only change from what you see here vs. production, with the exception of a minor cosmetic tweak.  Barring any totally unforeseen issues, and regardless of what happens with funding, everyone who supports us by selecting the Rowdaptor Perk WILL GET A ROWDAPTOR. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please pass the word and share this campaign with your friends, family and co-workers by using the sharing tools and social media.  If your gym uses Concept2 rowers, please provide the owner with a link to the campaign.  I truly appreciate the support, HOOYAH!!!
story_txt:
Unlock the Potential of the Concept2® Rower
We all love the Concept2 rowing machine, it's simply the best in the business for what it does.  But what if it could do more? 

I'm Brad Gresham, inventor and founder of Rowdaptor.  As a former Navy SEAL, I worked hard to squeeze every ounce of capability from my equipment in order to stay at the top of my game.  
My approach to the Concept2 rower was no different.  It's a fantastic machine, but I knew there had to be a way to get more out of it.  Rowdaptor does just that.  Rowdaptor turns the Concept2 rower into a complete home gym, allowing the user to focus that smooth, low-impact resistance and isolate specific muscle groups.  10 new exercises can be performed; no modifications are needed to the machine, and the normal rowing motion is not impeded in any way. 
Rowdaptor's design allows for rapid engagement and disengagement, facilitating quick transitions from normal rowing to any alternate exercise, and back to normal rowing.  This provides for some crazy, high-intensity intervals unlike anything you've ever felt.  The smooth, low-impact resistance of the Concept2 is a serious asset in this context.  With the resistance focused on the concentric contraction of the muscles, blood flow is maximized.  And because the machine's output (felt as resistance) is proportional to the effort you put into it, you get built-in drop sets every time you use it.  You can use it as a simple warm up by going easy on the effort being put into the machine, methodically increasing blood flow to targeted muscle groups.  OR...you can attack it and easily destroy yourself with a soul crushing workout.  Either way, there's no worrying with changing a thing about how the machine is set up; it's all about what you pour into it.  
Here's the list of 10 new exercises that Rowdaptor now allows you to perform on your Concept2 rower:

Bicep curls
Reverse bicep curls
Upright rows/high pulls
Single-arm rows
Cross-body pulls
Front shoulder raises 
Lateral shoulder raises
Goblet squats
Overhead presses
Single-arm overhead presses

Construction: 

Rowdaptor is, and always will be, made in the USA!!  The device is CNC machined from 6061 billet aluminum and uses alloy steel hardware throughout. The foot plate is CNC routed from 3/4" Baltic birch ply and coated with a durable, non-slip coating.  A nylon strap is attached to the foot plate, and includes an ultra-smooth Rollercam buckle.  The foot plate and strap assembly acts as a platform that connects to the rower to keep weight on the machine when the user is standing; that keeps everything on the ground when pulling vertically.  With very few moving parts, and nothing fancy to break off or malfunction, it's purpose-built for daily abuse.  Coming from someone who was paid to destroy things in pursuit of U.S. Government interests around the world, this thing is bomb-proof.  
What Your Support Means: 
Rowdaptor's development has consumed the last 2 years of my life; I've poured my heart and soul (and bank account) into developing what I believe is the ultimate improvement to an already incredible machine.  I've gone through 7 design iterations and constructed 4 completely different prototypes to arrive at this final design.  It's finally ready, and I want to get it out into the wild.  Your support will be instrumental in making that a reality. 
With my background from the SEAL Teams, it's not a stretch to understand that I've always been focused on human performance.  What isn't obvious is that I suffer with Multiple Sclerosis, and have done so for the past 9 years.  Having MS has taught me that I cannot take mobility and health for granted, and that I need 100% focus on what I refer to as "health span."  Health span is not simply living longer, but it's a focus on living an active, mobile and healthy life so that we are able to truly enjoy life with those that we love for as long as possible.  We need to support one another in developing our strength and mobility at all points in our lives.  I truly believe that Rowdaptor is one of those transformative devices that can safely and effectively aid in increasing our health span.  The low-impact, compound movements and cardiovascular benefits of rowing with the Concept2 rower are irrefutable.  Rowdaptor advances those benefits by leveraging that low-impact resistance for strength and mobility training for specific muscle groups.  The Concept2 rower outfitted with Rowdaptor is simply a magical combination of endurance, mobility and strength training for folks of all ages and abilities.  Supporting this campaign will serve to improve the health span of countless others by providing an easily accessible means to support their continued mobility and strength.  
What Rowdaptor, LLC Needs & What Your Support Will Get:
My funding goal for the campaign is $50,000.  Your support will allow me to design and construct the required production fixtures and tooling; purchase raw materials, hardware, and packaging; and quickly transition to sustained production.  With this accomplished, Rowdaptor, LLC is off and running as a veteran-owned small business and, in my book, that's about as cool as it gets.  
The perks of this campaign are super simple:

You can back us and get a complete Rowdaptor system from the initial production run
 Back us with a generous donation to help get us off the ground  

Or you can select both...then you'd be super awesome!!

Risks & Challenges
To be honest, the risks are extremely low at this point.  The design work and testing are complete.  I am testing a new finish for the foot plate, but that would be the only change from what you see here vs. production, with the exception of a minor cosmetic tweak.  Barring any totally unforeseen issues, and regardless of what happens with funding, everyone who supports us by selecting the Rowdaptor Perk WILL GET A ROWDAPTOR. 

Other Ways You Can Help
Please pass the word and share this campaign with your friends, family and co-workers by using the sharing tools and social media.  If your gym uses Concept2 rowers, please provide the owner with a link to the campaign.  I truly appreciate the support, HOOYAH!!!

story:
Introducing degree° - world´s first wearable in-ear thermometer

degree° takes the temperature of your child continuously.

We truly believe there´s already enough stress in life so we put our passion for sensor technologies to the test and created degree°. The world´s first wearable in-ear thermometer. To reduce uncertainty and enable stress-free fever treatment. A relief for parents and children. 

Once your child wears degree° you can see every change of the body temperature on your smartphone. Giving you the confidence in what you are doing! degree° will alarm you if your child´s body temperature is too high or rising too fast.

Let´s make life a bit more easy-going with technology!

How your life is going to be easier using degree°

Using this patent pending and medically recognized technology you will know when your child needs you most. Make the right decisions based on the changes in temperature. Track the effects of your treatment and see if you need to adjust it.

degree° is very useful, especially during the night: You do not have to get up and also wake up your child to take the temperature. With just one glance on your smartphone you immediately know the exact temperature.

Monitor you child´s temperature continuously at night with this wearable thermometer. Do not disturb recovery anymore.

See your child´s temperature on a curve, which is helping you to understand where the temperature is trending.

Parents and their kids can finally be relaxed throughout the night. Receive alarms when the temperature is too high or rising too fast.

 

Our Idea - how degree° works.

Imagine yourself taking the temperature of your child every second using a contact thermometer. That´s what degree° is doing for you, and even more. What you get additionally is an automated documentation of the values in a visual graph, a fever guide with useful information and some ideas for treatment if needed.

Your child has the temperature?

Then your pediatrist will advise you to take the temperature regularly and observe the changes. All right. So why don´t you simply take the temperature continuously with degree°?

Your two major benefits from a continuous temperature measurement are:

  • You will see your child´s temperature in realtime.
  • You can follow the effects of your treatment

degree° is taking your child´s body temperature continuously from inside the ear, and is wearable day and night.

degree° alarms you sending notifications to your smartphone, telling you if the temperature is getting serious. Thanks to the temperature monitoring you will see the effects of a treatment taken and when temperature starts rising again.

degree° is helping you to make confident fever treatment decisions!

 

See what actually happens with your child´s temperature. In realtime or only when you think it´s necessary. You decide.

Inside the degree° app you will find more fever knowledge and treatment orientation. The complete development of your child´s recovery is visible with one glance. 

Let´s reduce uncertainty in our lives with a stress-free fever management for you and your child.

 

degree° is complimenting your instincts showing you the temperature right!

Note your treatments and observations and see how effective they were.

 

Lately featured in:

 

What do people think about degree°?

 
 

The device - a wearable thermometer

 

  • Ergonomic Design & Material: Wearable Day and Night. Field-tested to fit children´s anatomy and skin.
  • Stunning Accuracy: Patent Pending and medically approved measurement technology.
  • Comfortable & Secure Fit: Soft surface feel, no pointy edges and size adjustable.
  • Micro Lightweight Construction: Smart technology hidden inside only 4x4cm and 5,4 g.
  • Low Radiation: On device recording,on demand transmission.
  • Efficient Energy Use: 5+ Days of Battery Life, plus On-the Go charging pod.
  • Continuous Measurement: High-end skin contact thermo sensor inside the ear canal.

World´s first wearable in-ear thermometer for children

Taking the temperature continuously during fever.

   

Stress-free recovery for parents and their children

 

The app - a smart fever guide

  • Temperature Curve: With degree° you can track the development of the body temperature. Is the fever increasing or decreasing right now?
  • Alarms: Set the temperature level at which you want to be alarmed. Also, you will be notified in case of sudden rises in body temperature. Notice when the degree° sensor has slipped out of the ear and when battery level is low.
  • Health Record: Easily add symptoms by using pictures or personal notes. Complete the temperature protocol and help your doctor to personalize his diagnosis.

Have a precise health record of infects to help your pediatrist in finding the reasons for them.

  • Fever Guidance: Get information to fever and typical courses of diseases. See the guidance of pediatrist. Homespun remedies and typical medications you can use to lower fever are listed, too
  • Medical Map: You need to find an open pharmacy or want to know which doctor is on duty? Based on your location a map of medical services near to you is created. Numbers for an emergency call are listed, too.
  • Multiple User Profiles: You are in charge of a big family? Create multiple user profiles for all your loved ones.

The degree° App guides you through treatment options and shows location based medical services

 

Our Story - a turning point for technology

My name is Greta Kreuzer. I am an innovations manager and mother of three. Together with my husband Johannes, who is a PhD medical engineer, we founded cosinuss°. We are developing first-in-class wearable sensors to monitor several relevant vital signs from inside the ear. 

Greta and Johannes Kreuzer, parents of three and founder of degree°

One day our three year old daughter suffered from a viral infect causing high fever that sud­denly led to a febrile convulsion. I sat at her bed, taking the temperature every hour. But still I could not see the seizure coming. Later, I learned why: The reason for a febrile convulsion is not the absolute height of the temperature, but the fast rise of it.

This incident didn´t let us rest. As we recognized that febrile convulsions are quite frequent and not just an incident in our family we put everything on finding a perfect solution for this problem. Parents should be enabled to see the whole temperature curve of their child during fever in order to be able to manage fever more relaxed and without stress. That´s why we created degree°.

Our Kids are our inspiration.

 

Our technology - benefit from our Expertise

 

Continuous Measurement

Benefit from a continuous temperature monitoring by always seeing the temperature development with one glance. Know:

  • If your child´s body temperature is increasing or decreasing at any moment
  • The exact effects of your treatment
  • How long it takes until there is an effect.
  • When temperature is too high or rising too fast possibly indicating a febrile convulsion.

You do not have to estimate a temperature curve by connecting the dots of your one time measurements every one or two hours. You now have a steady and reliable temperature monitoring.

 

In comparison to other temperature taking methods

degree° is a major industry breakthrough giving you the confidence you need in times of fever. With degree° you can make decisions based on reliable data. Accuracy and ease of use are essential to a continuous monitoring of your child´s body temperature. 

With digital thermometers you can only take selective measurements. The results always differ and the procedure can be unpleasant depending on where you take the temperature.

Using infrared thermometers you get various results with various handling depending on where the light hits the skin.

degree° takes the temperature reliable from always the same spot which was validated in empiric studies. degree° is the thermometer giving you the core body temperature with a comfortable and steady quality. You can wear it 24/7 and be sure to be as accurate as ± 0.2°F (±0.1°C).

degree° is a major industry breakthrough

 

Why is degree taking the temperature from inside the ear?

The body´s own temperature sensor, the hypothalamus, is located in the brain region near to the ear drum. Thus, taking the temperature from inside the ear canal will show you the same temperature than your body´s regulation system.

 

Highest accuracy

degree° is taking the temperature in the ear canal with a technical accuracy of ± 0.2°F (±0.1°C.) This measuring place is medically approved and is known to have the following normal temperature ranges: 97.7°F - 99.5°F (36.5°C - 37.5°C).

State of the art components and best sensors on market combined with German quality engineering.

  

Battery Life

Our on-the go charging pod will automatically keep degree° always fully charged and safely stored. A thermometer luckily isn´t in use everyday. But it has to be ready at any time. Once you take degree° out of it´s box it´s battery life is 5+ days. Which means during a common fever you only have to put on the device once, and do not have to worry about runnning out of energy - literally ;)

 

Technical Specifications

degree° is an extreme lightweight but also durable and very cool device. degree° is hiding hardware of highest quality inside an overall size of only 1.6 x 1.6 inches (4x4 cm) and a weight of 0.18 oz. (5,4 grams). The world´s smallest and lightest wearable fever thermometer.

 

Data Transmission with lowest radiation possible

degree° is recording all the data on the device itself without transmitting any data. Values are only sent to your smartphone on demand. 

Setting a certain threshold for getting a temperature alarm, there only will be one single moment where data will be transmitted. 

Using Bluetooth Low Energy and sending small compressed data packages only on demand, degree° is as low on radiation as possible.

 

Prototype Functionality

 

The Team - degree° is nothing without them.

United we deliver to you a design that immerses you in the comforting feeling of being able to know when your child needs you most. The way it should be when it comes to caring and healing. Since nearly all of our team members are parents themselves, we are all passionate making degree° a big success.

10 years of Research and Development

Based on almost 10 years of research & development work in the field of wearable sensors, degree° is a masterpiece of technology and ergonomic design. This is a major industry breakthrough that will make the life of parents easier, reducing uncertainty and stress especially during the nights.

cosinuss° - an award winning company

The Munich based company, cosinuss°, developed the technology that is used in degree°. A technology that is also in use in the medical sector. With degree°, this technology will be available for home use.

Selection of awards of cosinuss° - the company behind degree°.

 

Partner in Science

We’ve spent thousands of hours working with world-class universities, respected medical centers and health-tech designers to develop the very best and most comfortable continuously measuring fever thermometer.

The underlying technology of degree° is a.o. already in use in a preemptive pediatric clinic, during heart surgeries and in an Allied Health Center and Body Temperature and Fluid Lab.

Selection of partners who helped researching and studying body temperature.

Example: German Heart Center, Munich. 

Evaluation study comparing different methods for taking the temperature during heart surgery.

During a heart surgery the human body needs to be cooled down very low. This must be monitored very accurate. degree° is not only staying closest to the gold standard (pulmonalis), but is also the only non-invasive method for continuous monitoring.

 

Our origin - pioneering mobile monitoring

Previous success of cosinuss° came with the cosinuss° One - the predecessor of degree°. A wearable In-ear vital sign monitor used in professional sports like triathlon and Formula One.

Jan Frodeno, two times IRONMAN world champion, is using cosinuss° technology.

 cosinuss° One is our award winning sports wearable. Primary an in-ear heart rate monitor with a patent pending technology to measure very accurate inside the ear canal.

Secondary it tracks body temperature, too. This technology is preventing overheating in sports. Used by IronMan world champion triathlete Jan Frodeno on Hawaii 2016.

cosinuss° One showed us the effect of calf packing during fever for the very first time. For degree° we specialized on design and ergonomics for children especially during their sleep.

The very first version of a prototype for a wearable body temperature device. This was made years ago along with Johannes PhD thesis about mobile vital sign monitoring.

Further developing stages of our first wearable in-ear vital sign monitor followed over the years- and finally the cosinuss° One came to the market.

The process of degree° design stages. First: flattening cosinuss° One. Second: change positioning of processing unit. Third: Minimizing edges and bulkiness. Optimizing ear anchorage.

Finish geometry and making the degree° adjustable. Defining sizes and producing the first cosmetic models testing the actual fitting for real.

 

Our timeline - benefit from our experience

We have come a long way. Now we are here, offering you the best quality and all our expertise in vital sign monitoring and wearable technology. Be part of our journey!

 

Our Origin - cosinuss°

This is where we come from - the cosinuss° timeline

Our cosinuss° patent pending technology is successfully selling in the sports and the medical market. degree° is field-tested to take the best of both worlds by merging together world´s best in-ear measurement technology and a special designed reliable and safe wearable for children.

 

Our Vision - degree°

After Kickstarter, degree° will be made ready for manufacturing - using our 10-year experience in development and production of in-ear wearables. Together with our well known manufacturers in Europe we are set to go. 

 

Indiegogo offered us the great opportunity to keep on rising. Until we have prepared our campaign we will be in demand on Indiegogo, here you keep on preordering degree°.

Your degree° - our production plan

 

This is where we want to go - the future of degree°. Help us to get there!

 

What is missing ?

We are ready for production. Technology is already in House, the Design is finalized and our production line is set up to go. There is only one thing missing:

You - our Backers.

You will make the big difference. Let´s make this happen! You are the most important part of our team. You can make degree°reality! Not only by supporting us crowdfunding degree°, but also with your feedback, suggestions and heartwarming stories from where degree° is needed.

That is why we created degree° customer oriented together with parents and their kids, midwifes and doctors. Everyone´s passion at degree° is to design a really smart thermometer fulfilling your true necessities. degree° is surrounded by community of people who believe in change and are excited about shaping the future. Be part of our community and help us helping others!

Support degree° and, share our page. :-)

  

Perks - home, health, technology.

 

From Munich with Love

We are based in Munich, the capital of German beer and lifestyle. Munich is a city that looks like a small town and is also referred to as the German Italy. Munich also has a.o. two international elite universities (where we also come from :-)) and renamed companies like Siemens, BMW, Giesecke und Devrient and others. Numerous hospitals and other health care centers serve as perfect partners.

 

Risks and challenges

What is to do? In a nutshell told, we only need to transfer our existing technology into a redesigned wearable for children. Sounds easy? Yes, if you know where to pay attention :)

We´ve done it before! cosinuss°, the company behind degree°, is a start-up with experience in R&D, manufacturing and marketing. Our first product, the cosinuss °One, is an award winning wearable to monitor heart rate, heart rate variability and body temperature of athletes.

You can count on us and our trusted manufacturers and strong relationships to our supply chain. 
We learned how to handle timelines and how to prevent delays. However there are some common challenges that we can´t fully control during the manufacturing process:

  • It might happen that tooling is not perfect from the beginning so eventually improvements of it will take some time. 
  • We can´t eliminate all errors that might happen during the production process but we will keep a close eye on it to make sure to prevent the mistakes there. 
  • Manufacturing products in small quantities may lower the priority of our orders on the side of our manufacturers and they put us to the end of their queue. The bigger the order the better.

We are planning with our resources as of today and do not foresee any changes to it. Therefore we offer you now shipping degree° right on time for the next wave of flu, turn of the year 2017. 

Where we really need your help, does not need any stamp to it. 
If you believe in our vision, please spread the word about degree° and motivate other parents to pledge for our project.

Since nearly all of our team members are parents themselves you can count on friendly and capable support.

Thank you, with all the best wishes, 
The degree° team. 
:)

 

FAQ´s

 

Do children accept wearing the degree°?

Yes, we can definitely confirm that from our experience so far! We field tested the prototypes with all children in the team ages ranging from 10 months to 12 years. And we were amazed how good the reaction of the children was! With children from approx. 2 years you can discuss why it needs to be in the ear and that it helps you to help her/him. 
They all forgot about it. Even my youngest daughter who was 10 months back then forgot about the degree° in her ear and did not try to rip it off. :-)

In case it somehow looses contact to your kid´s ear, you will be notified on your smartphone. 
Note: The designs of our stretch goal might even make it more likely 
that kids see a little „spirit animal“ in degree°.

 

Can degree° be used by adults?

Yes. Due to the adjustable size it even can be used by adults. 
The adjustable neck of degree°, in front of your ear, is expandable. 
The in-ear silicon cap will adapt softly with a sleeve for a bigger ear canal. 
Like this you can use degree° as your new family thermometer.

 

Can I switch the display from Fahrenheit to Celsius?

Yes, of course! That is just one tap away in the settings of the degree° app!

 

Is my child supposed to wear degree° every day?

No! degree° is made for the case that you recognize fever in your child and use degree° only as long as your child is sick to help you to manage fever without any stress.

You now have a steady and reliable temperature monitoring. In comparison to other temperature taking methodsdegree° is a major industry breakthrough giving you the confidence you need in times of fever. With degree° you can make decisions based on reliable data. Accuracy and ease of use are essential to a continuous monitoring of your child´s body temperature. With digital thermometers you can only take selective measurements. The results always differ and the procedure can be unpleasant depending on where you take the temperature.Using infrared thermometers you get various results with various handling depending on where the light hits the skin.degree° takes the temperature reliable from always the same spot which was validated in empiric studies. degree° is the thermometer giving you the core body temperature with a comfortable and steady quality. You can wear it 24/7 and be sure to be as accurate as ± 0.2°F (±0.1°C).degree° is a major industry breakthrough Why is degree taking the temperature from inside the ear?The body´s own temperature sensor, the hypothalamus, is located in the brain region near to the ear drum. Thus, taking the temperature from inside the ear canal will show you the same temperature than your body´s regulation system. Highest accuracydegree° is taking the temperature in the ear canal with a technical accuracy of ± 0.2°F (±0.1°C.) This measuring place is medically approved and is known to have the following normal temperature ranges: 97.7°F - 99.5°F (36.5°C - 37.5°C).State of the art components and best sensors on market combined with German quality engineering.  Battery LifeOur on-the go charging pod will automatically keep degree° always fully charged and safely stored. A thermometer luckily isn´t in use everyday. But it has to be ready at any time. Once you take degree° out of it´s box it´s battery life is 5+ days. Which means during a common fever you only have to put on the device once, and do not have to worry about runnning out of energy - literally ;) Technical Specificationsdegree° is an extreme lightweight but also durable and very cool device. degree° is hiding hardware of highest quality inside an overall size of only 1.6 x 1.6 inches (4x4 cm) and a weight of 0.18 oz. (5,4 grams). The world´s smallest and lightest wearable fever thermometer. Data Transmission with lowest radiation possibledegree° is recording all the data on the device itself without transmitting any data. Values are only sent to your smartphone on demand. Setting a certain threshold for getting a temperature alarm, there only will be one single moment where data will be transmitted. Using Bluetooth Low Energy and sending small compressed data packages only on demand, degree° is as low on radiation as possible. Prototype Functionality The Team - degree° is nothing without them.United we deliver to you a design that immerses you in the comforting feeling of being able to know when your child needs you most. The way it should be when it comes to caring and healing. Since nearly all of our team members are parents themselves, we are all passionate making degree° a big success.10 years of Research and DevelopmentBased on almost 10 years of research & development work in the field of wearable sensors, degree° is a masterpiece of technology and ergonomic design. This is a major industry breakthrough that will make the life of parents easier, reducing uncertainty and stress especially during the nights.cosinuss° - an award winning companyThe Munich based company, cosinuss°, developed the technology that is used in degree°. A technology that is also in use in the medical sector. With degree°, this technology will be available for home use.Selection of awards of cosinuss° - the company behind degree°. Partner in ScienceWe’ve spent thousands of hours working with world-class universities, respected medical centers and health-tech designers to develop the very best and most comfortable continuously measuring fever thermometer.The underlying technology of degree° is a.o. already in use in a preemptive pediatric clinic, during heart surgeries and in an Allied Health Center and Body Temperature and Fluid Lab.Selection of partners who helped researching and studying body temperature.Example: German Heart Center, Munich. Evaluation study comparing different methods for taking the temperature during heart surgery.During a heart surgery the human body needs to be cooled down very low. This must be monitored very accurate. degree° is not only staying closest to the gold standard (pulmonalis), but is also the only non-invasive method for continuous monitoring. Our origin - pioneering mobile monitoringPrevious success of cosinuss° came with the cosinuss° One - the predecessor of degree°. A wearable In-ear vital sign monitor used in professional sports like triathlon and Formula One.Jan Frodeno, two times IRONMAN world champion, is using cosinuss° technology. cosinuss° One is our award winning sports wearable. Primary an in-ear heart rate monitor with a patent pending technology to measure very accurate inside the ear canal.Secondary it tracks body temperature, too. This technology is preventing overheating in sports. Used by IronMan world champion triathlete Jan Frodeno on Hawaii 2016.cosinuss° One showed us the effect of calf packing during fever for the very first time. For degree° we specialized on design and ergonomics for children especially during their sleep.The very first version of a prototype for a wearable body temperature device. This was made years ago along with Johannes PhD thesis about mobile vital sign monitoring.Further developing stages of our first wearable in-ear vital sign monitor followed over the years- and finally the cosinuss° One came to the market.The process of degree° design stages. First: flattening cosinuss° One. Second: change positioning of processing unit. Third: Minimizing edges and bulkiness. Optimizing ear anchorage.Finish geometry and making the degree° adjustable. Defining sizes and producing the first cosmetic models testing the actual fitting for real. Our timeline - benefit from our experienceWe have come a long way. Now we are here, offering you the best quality and all our expertise in vital sign monitoring and wearable technology. Be part of our journey! Our Origin - cosinuss°This is where we come from - the cosinuss° timelineOur cosinuss° patent pending technology is successfully selling in the sports and the medical market. degree° is field-tested to take the best of both worlds by merging together world´s best in-ear measurement technology and a special designed reliable and safe wearable for children. Our Vision - degree°After Kickstarter, degree° will be made ready for manufacturing - using our 10-year experience in development and production of in-ear wearables. Together with our well known manufacturers in Europe we are set to go.  Indiegogo offered us the great opportunity to keep on rising. Until we have prepared our campaign we will be in demand on Indiegogo, here you keep on preordering degree°.Your degree° - our production plan This is where we want to go - the future of degree°. Help us to get there! What is missing ?We are ready for production. Technology is already in House, the Design is finalized and our production line is set up to go. There is only one thing missing:You - our Backers.You will make the big difference. Let´s make this happen! You are the most important part of our team. You can make degree°reality! Not only by supporting us crowdfunding degree°, but also with your feedback, suggestions and heartwarming stories from where degree° is needed.That is why we created degree° customer oriented together with parents and their kids, midwifes and doctors. Everyone´s passion at degree° is to design a really smart thermometer fulfilling your true necessities. degree° is surrounded by community of people who believe in change and are excited about shaping the future. Be part of our community and help us helping others!Support degree° and, share our page. :-)  Perks - home, health, technology. From Munich with LoveWe are based in Munich, the capital of German beer and lifestyle. Munich is a city that looks like a small town and is also referred to as the German Italy. Munich also has a.o. two international elite universities (where we also come from :-)) and renamed companies like Siemens, BMW, Giesecke und Devrient and others. Numerous hospitals and other health care centers serve as perfect partners. Risks and challengesWhat is to do? In a nutshell told, we only need to transfer our existing technology into a redesigned wearable for children. Sounds easy? Yes, if you know where to pay attention :)We´ve done it before! cosinuss°, the company behind degree°, is a start-up with experience in R&D, manufacturing and marketing. Our first product, the cosinuss °One, is an award winning wearable to monitor heart rate, heart rate variability and body temperature of athletes.You can count on us and our trusted manufacturers and strong relationships to our supply chain. We learned how to handle timelines and how to prevent delays. However there are some common challenges that we can´t fully control during the manufacturing process:
It might happen that tooling is not perfect from the beginning so eventually improvements of it will take some time. 
We can´t eliminate all errors that might happen during the production process but we will keep a close eye on it to make sure to prevent the mistakes there. 
Manufacturing products in small quantities may lower the priority of our orders on the side of our manufacturers and they put us to the end of their queue. The bigger the order the better.
We are planning with our resources as of today and do not foresee any changes to it. Therefore we offer you now shipping degree° right on time for the next wave of flu, turn of the year 2017. Where we really need your help, does not need any stamp to it. If you believe in our vision, please spread the word about degree° and motivate other parents to pledge for our project.Since nearly all of our team members are parents themselves you can count on friendly and capable support.Thank you, with all the best wishes, The degree° team. :) FAQ´s Do children accept wearing the degree°?Yes, we can definitely confirm that from our experience so far! We field tested the prototypes with all children in the team ages ranging from 10 months to 12 years. And we were amazed how good the reaction of the children was! With children from approx. 2 years you can discuss why it needs to be in the ear and that it helps you to help her/him. They all forgot about it. Even my youngest daughter who was 10 months back then forgot about the degree° in her ear and did not try to rip it off. :-)In case it somehow looses contact to your kid´s ear, you will be notified on your smartphone. Note: The designs of our stretch goal might even make it more likely that kids see a little „spirit animal“ in degree°. Can degree° be used by adults?Yes. Due to the adjustable size it even can be used by adults. The adjustable neck of degree°, in front of your ear, is expandable. The in-ear silicon cap will adapt softly with a sleeve for a bigger ear canal. Like this you can use degree° as your new family thermometer. Can I switch the display from Fahrenheit to Celsius?Yes, of course! That is just one tap away in the settings of the degree° app! Is my child supposed to wear degree° every day?No! degree° is made for the case that you recognize fever in your child and use degree° only as long as your child is sick to help you to manage fever without any stress.

story:
FUNDING ENDS IN

 

 

 

It is a very common posture we see in our current generation where we feel the most relaxed. However, this comfortable position may lead to neck and shoulder problems without being treated properly.

These habits can potentially lead into turtleneck posture. Our habits for this posture can start as early as 10 to the age of 30 and if not maintained properly this can lead to neck disks at the age of 40.

 

 

 

 

 

This is Emma who embodies the evolutionary impact of our current work culture on the human body. William Higham, a behavioral futurist, and other experts predicts that if we don’t change our workplace habits, Emma could resemble most of our colleagues is 20-years time. However, Emma is a ‘worst-case scenario’ intended as a wake up call to office workers.

"Surgeon always perform surgery in a curved position, so there are a lot of people who suffer from turtle neck problems. I've always had a hard time with my bend posture, but when I found out aboutg the Neck Supporter I knew I had to try it out."

 

"I constantly stare at the screen when working and even though I try my best to maintain a great posture, my body tends to focus on the work and gets into a comfortable position. But with the Neck Supporter I am able to on my work while not having to worry about my posture!"

 

"Phone, books, and computers become ad daily routine in my life. And my friends always tell me to keep my chin up because of my posture. Becasue of these bad habbits I was not feeling confient and made me stress even more. But with the Neck Supporter it helped me straighten out my neck and boosted my confidence up right away!"

 

The number of people working with computer is on the rise as the workload we generate becomes higher and higher. We try our best to maintain great posture but when you are drawn in by our work we tend to get into our comfort zone and forget about our posture.

This posture can eventually build up and cause a text-neck also known as the turtle neck posture. It can lead to headaches, insomnia, poor concentration, etc.  There many products and workouts that prevent this form happening but we cannot seem to find time to do it.

The above image is a x-ray of the posture which the human neck should maintain. Through bad habits, this shape is hard to maintain by most people. Due to the excessive use of computers and smartphones, many people's cervical vertebrae are turning into abnormal straight-line forms, not normal C curls.

PUREPLAN's paten 3S Structure (Steadily Straightening Structure) is ergonomically designed system for the human body to maintain posture at a 0 degree angle. When the ears and shoulders reach 0 degrees, the normal C curls of the cervical vertebrae can be maintained, and the pressure on the neck and shoulders can be reduced. 

 

Comparing the X-rays before and after wearing the product, we can see that the cervical vertebrae appears to be an abnormal straight shape. And it is kept in normal- C-curl after wearing it.

 

Can't you just stretch and exercise?

Of course, stretching and exercising help relieve neck strain and strengthen muscles. However, while spending the most time a day on cell phones, computers, watching TV, etc., the posture is naturally disturbed, which can change the cervical vertebrae into an abnormal form of a straight line.

The Neck Supporter supports the neck to prevent the neck from moving forward while you are sitting, maintaining the normal C curl of the cervical vertebrae. This relieves lumps in the neck and shoulders, thereby eliminating pain and naturally preventing turtle neck.

Keep it on for only 15 minutes and you will see and feel the change instantly! That's 3 Youtube videos you can watch while getting better posture!

 

Try it when you work out, too! Exercise efficiency can also be improved when using posture-critical exercises such as squats and deadlift.

 

Make is a habit for you and your family's daily lives, for a better and healthier lifestyle. The fold-able design lets you carry it right in your bag where ever you go! With its adjustable brace and band, it can change its size accordingly to anyone who uses it.

Did you know good posture can boost your height? At first you won’t see a difference but eventually your height can be drastically effected by poor posture. The neck supporter can help you maintain that great posture and boost not just your height but your confidence as well!

1) Made from TPU used for artificial hearts
The Neck Supporter uses premium materials called TPU which is very flexible and the same time shock absorbent, to bring comfort for you chest and chin. The material is also non toxic bring no harm to you and the environment. The durable material will guarantee use for a life time. 

2) Neoprene material band used for wet suits
Neoprene is a premium quality material with incredible flexibility. This material does not wear out easily and is very durable.

PUREPLAN ergonomically designed the Neck Support by taking account the line of the human body.  The soft yet durable TPU material helps rest your head comfortably with a silicon pad to rest on you chest.

 

 

 


Pure Plan is a technology venture company that brings together young people who do not only think about the company's interests but also think about consumers, social issues and all.

Modern people who sit in front of their computers for more than eight hours every day and watch their smartphones for more than two hours. As a result, the health of the neck and shoulders gets worse and it can develop into a neck disc. In fact, a lot of people around me were experiencing it, and I thought we needed to develop a product that could be easily solved. Based on a lot of advice from orthopedics and manual therapists, the product has been produced through research, development, and numerous tests for two years.


Of course, if you see this product for the first time, you might think it strange. But if you don't want to be like "Emma" in the future, you have to learn the right posture from now on.

 

CHECK OUT OUR 
↓     ↓     ↓     ↓

&

 

Have any questions? Give Us a Feedback!

story:
You can self-customize MORECUP by using the provided cutter, allowing you to tailor the product to your own body for a perfect fit. If you use a menstrual cup that fits your body well, it will provide incredible convenience in your daily life!

 

Youtuber's Review!

 

 

 

Menstruation is a considerably large part of a woman's life from her teens to her fifties, occurring approximately once a month for an average of 3 to sometimes even 8 days. This is equivalent to roughly 3,500 days- almost 10 years of a woman’s lifetime!

Women have used various products such as sanitary pads and tampons for a long time. However, there are many problems with these products, such as endocrine-disrupting chemicals. We urgently looked for an alternative and finally stumbled upon a replacement product called a menstrual cup, but it was not easy to find cups to fit our unique bodies.

 

So we thought, “why don’t we design a good product instead of looking for one?”

We endeavor to deliver products that fit women perfectly, removing the discomfort that comes with other products. We hope that MORECUP will alleviate women’s menstrual discomfort worldwide by making our product adjustable to their individual bodies.

It’s economical, eco-friendly, and fits perfectly.

 

 

It's very important that you can customize the product yourself. When you first use a menstrual cup, having a sensation of a foreign object or leakage is likely if you are using a product that does not fit your body accurately. This happens because each person has a different vaginal length (uterus height).

 

 

The vaginal length is the height from the entrance of the vagina to the cervix (the end of the uterus), from which menstrual blood is discharged. The principle of the menstrual cup is to collect blood by placing the cup under the cervix.

 

Buying non-adjustable menstrual cup sizes which come in S, M, or L, is inconvenient and wasteful because you are potentially buying the wrong size. However, MORECUP provides a new concept for menstrual cups without this unnecessary process.

 

MORECUP comes in one standard size that you are able to trim to fit your body using the cutter provided in the package.

 

 

To combat this, we made MORECUP with 100% medical-grade silicone which is completely harmless to humans. Since menstrual cups are inserted into your body, we created our product with a focus on safe material, so you can use MORECUP with confidence, free of worry.

* FDA Registered

 

Menstrual cups are largely divided into bell-types, which have an elongated shape, and sphere-types, which have a spherical shape. Bell-type cups have the advantage of an easier and more comfortable fit, while sphere-type cups have the advantage of collecting larger amounts of menstrual blood.

 

MORECUP’s shape was designed to combine the advantages of both of these two types. The round design not only allows for easy wear and removal, but also adhesion, which is achieved by being neither too hard nor too soft.

The MORECUP case is also made with a harmless platinum-cured silicone material, adding luxury and convenience. The dedicated case is available in many colors, so you can choose whatever color you want.

 

MORECUP is made of silicone and can be washed with water. Washing with water and drying well is all that is needed for its maintenance and storage. The included brush even allows you to thoroughly clean the air hole with a narrow opening.

If you prefer further disinfection for your peace of mind, your semi-permanent silicone MORECUP can also be cleaned using boiling water. Disinfecting in boiling water will eliminate bacteria and viruses that are not fully removed in just running water.

* Recommend disinfection in boiling water on the first use

 

 

MORECUP aims to provide eco-friendly products. By reducing sanitary product waste caused by disposable pads and tampons, and by providing three size options in one cup, we solved the economic and environmental problems associated with purchasing and throwing away used products or ill-fitting menstrual cups. All of MORECUP's components, from the product itself to its packaging materials center around eco-friendliness.

 

 

Because MORECUP is semi-permanent compared to other sanitary products, it also has economic benefits. Until recently, sanitary products for women such as pads and tampons were necessary products with a fixed cost. Considering the nearly forty-year duration of a woman's menstrual journey, you can easily see that MORECUP could save you quite a bit of money.

* Survey data released by Groundswell and SWNS Digital

 

 

MORECUP upgrades your quality of life! It makes various sports activities such as swimming, water sports, and intense exercise possible and enjoyable even during your period, which is something traditional sanitary products cannot provide. With MORECUP, you don’t need to worry at all.

MORECUP also provides extreme convenience for its users in terms of time. The average amount of monthly menstruation blood per woman is around 15 mL. MORECUP can be worn for up to 12 hours, while normal sanitary pads have a recommended usage time of 2-3 hours.

 

 

MORECUP provides a QR code-accessed smart user manual to lower entry barriers for its first-time customers. We noticed that many menstrual cup companies focus only on making and selling their products and lack detailed instructions on how to use, manage, and store their products. MORECUP provides a smart manual to reduce users’ trial and error process.

 

 

 

 

* When funding a single reward, you can only choose between a silicone case and a pouch.

 

 

 

Hello, we're Spark Factory, the producers of MORECUP. We are a specialized company that manufactures health care supplies and aim to "warm product combining technology and ideas for women". MORECUP, which was made with the motto of 'comfort during menstruation' in mind, is the world's first customizable menstrual cup and is designed with consideration to function, performance, design, and economy.

All of this is possible because Spark Factory has excellent professional members. The members are researchers, developers, designers, and marketing managers who boast outstanding expertise in their respective fields and endeavor to create and launch MORECUP.

 

We have partnered with a local warehouse in the U.S. for quick and accurate delivery. Thanks to this, we can deliver MORECUP for a low price on Indiegogo. Our US corporation in New York will deliver on time, and MORECUP is produced and manufactured in Korea to ensure quality. We've seen so many campaigns on Indiegogo. What many backers were concerned about was whether or not the product would really be produced and delivered to them even when crossing long distance. We will continue to send you updates and promise to be responsible throughout the entire process via social media or Indiegogo, even after the products are produced and shipped.

It makes various sports activities such as swimming, water sports, and intense exercise possible and enjoyable even during your period, which is something traditional sanitary products cannot provide. With MORECUP, you don’t need to worry at all.MORECUP also provides extreme convenience for its users in terms of time. The average amount of monthly menstruation blood per woman is around 15 mL. MORECUP can be worn for up to 12 hours, while normal sanitary pads have a recommended usage time of 2-3 hours.  MORECUP provides a QR code-accessed smart user manual to lower entry barriers for its first-time customers. We noticed that many menstrual cup companies focus only on making and selling their products and lack detailed instructions on how to use, manage, and store their products. MORECUP provides a smart manual to reduce users’ trial and error process.    * When funding a single reward, you can only choose between a silicone case and a pouch.   Hello, we're Spark Factory, the producers of MORECUP. We are a specialized company that manufactures health care supplies and aim to "warm product combining technology and ideas for women". MORECUP, which was made with the motto of 'comfort during menstruation' in mind, is the world's first customizable menstrual cup and is designed with consideration to function, performance, design, and economy.All of this is possible because Spark Factory has excellent professional members. The members are researchers, developers, designers, and marketing managers who boast outstanding expertise in their respective fields and endeavor to create and launch MORECUP. We have partnered with a local warehouse in the U.S. for quick and accurate delivery. Thanks to this, we can deliver MORECUP for a low price on Indiegogo. Our US corporation in New York will deliver on time, and MORECUP is produced and manufactured in Korea to ensure quality. We've seen so many campaigns on Indiegogo. What many backers were concerned about was whether or not the product would really be produced and delivered to them even when crossing long distance. We will continue to send you updates and promise to be responsible throughout the entire process via social media or Indiegogo, even after the products are produced and shipped.

story:
What if we could change our Patterns in life?

We all have Patterns in life we would like to change, and new Patterns we would like to create.

Patterning Ltd was founded by mental health campaigner & entrepreneur James Scroggs and serial innovator Matt Hart. 

Together, we believe the challenges of 21st century mental health & wellbeing cannot be addressed by simply offering time out and respite from the heavy stresses of life, but by giving people the tools to change their approach to life itself.  To change old Patterns and create new Patterns.

 

Patterning is a daily practice, facilitated through an app.

Patterning enables us to train to help develop a more intentional way of thinking, doing and being; so that we can become the people we really want to be, living a life that is true to us - for ourselves, with our partners, families or colleagues.

 

We call this Patterning.

Patterning invites us to state our intentions - the things we're really intending for and want to make happen.  It enables us to channel them, intrinsically or extrinsically, within ourselves or out into the world.  And finally, it asks us to reflect upon and share whether those intentions have impacted our daily lives as outputs and outcomes.

Through our practice, we can change the patterns that inhibit us, and create positive new patterns that serve us to lead more intentional lives.  We will find more peace, purpose & performance.

 

But we all know change is harder to achieve on our own.

Much like channeling our intentions around physical fitness, with Patterning we can invite a trusted partner to train with us within a single subscription.  As training pairs, we will offer mutual support, challenge, and hold each other to account for our patterning progress.

Based on 33 years of exploration into quantum science, at the heart of the practice is a sonic experience that helps us transform the possibility of the life we might lead into our genuine potential for impact.  You just have to hold your intentions lightly and sink in.

 

Join our Patterning community.

We invite you to help us build a founding base of 1000 fans, Patterning in pairs, and populate our fledgling community.  But also then pay it forward to those who we think might benefit from re-Patterning their life.

In doing so, we wish to raise £100,000 for a final product development cycle, ahead of our commercial launch this Summer.

 

Try our beta app today.

Our beta app is available for free on Appstore (iOS) and Googleplay (Android).

Our beta programme will help us build the data and insight to inform our final product development.  

  • Install the beta and invite a training partner to practice with you.

 

We are also launching two enterprise pilots, in which Patterning will be a mental health & wellbeing tool for staff, helping maintain enterprise culture and collaborative productivity through our new remote working lives.

  • Contact us today to see how Patterning can help your organisation.

 

But if Patterning is already chiming with you, then continue with our beta ahead of the forthcoming commercial product, before it launches at its full RRP, and join our founding community.  

  • Patterning with your training partner to help build a co-creative community.

 

Or, if you’re not quite ready to join us, you might simply start by thinking about your own Patterns - to explore what you might wish to stop, change or create anew?  Talking about your Patterns with family and friends might ignite deeper thoughts and conversations about Patterning your life.  

  • Think how Patterning can help you find more peace, purpose and performance.

 

Patterning a better life, together.

As founders, we both have a proven track record for helping establish and grow zeitgeist brands & products, like suicide prevention charity CALM (Campaign Against Living Miserably) & fashion workwear brand M.C.Overalls, to building new audiences for BBC Radio 1, American Idol & Spotify. 

And as we've already mentioned, at the heart of the practice is a unique sonic experience exclusive to Patterning, embodying 33 years of exploration of quantum science.  This takes some explaining - something we can do with curious fans in a longer conversation with us on Zoom.

Patterning brings together our wide breadth of experience and progressive science into a practice that can empower us every day. 

  • We have an MVP in Beta  …but we know we can improve it with our product designers and developers. 
  • We have clear routes to market  …but we know we could use more muscle to market and manage those routes effectively.
  • We have a growing fan base of users  …but we know from experience 1000 fans are the tipping point to success.
  • We have a suite of documents ready to share ...so email us on hello@patterning.life if you want to know more.

 

Purchase now to practice Patterning as a life-long beta user - for you, your young, your team or your organisation.

With your help, we can ignite our fan base, refine the final product for scale, and market it effectively at launch this September.

With your help, we can demonstrate how Patterning can galvanise the members of teams and whole organisations to align around shared values, purpose and productivity.

As we have found exploring what Patterning means to our Gen X peers and groups of Millennials & Gen Z , our new practice chimes with many like-minds across generations.

Join us... 

Patterning a better life, together.

Thanks

James & Matt

story:
***
PRODUCTION UPDATE AT THE COMPLETE BOTTOM OF THE PAGE
***


IT ALL STARTED WITH A DREAM TO HELP EVERYONE FEEL BETTER.

Suffering of minor dehydration consequences being so widespread (headaches, lack of concentration, fatigue, etc.), we wanted to find a simple solution to that common problem. 

We asked ourselves, what could we do for people like us who just don't drink enough water every day, even when they strongly intend to ? 

We found ! Check out our video presentation above.

And check this one here where Eric, founder and CEO, explains the mission of BWEV™ and demonstrates functionalities of the BWEV™.
 

 


MEET BWEV™ !

The Smart Bottle conceived to help you hydrate more : drink more water !

 

LCD TOUCH SCREEN

Single Tap : display temperature and colored circle according.

Double Taps : activate and set reminder alarms.

Automatic : Liquid expiry indicator (after 8 hours of sitting, on the first single tap on the screen will display a red circle with a flashing ''X'').

USB Magnetic Charger : 1.5h to complete recharge. Single charge last 30 to 60 days.

SEE FRANÇOIS CHARRON's
(top techno reviewer of Canada)
COLUMN ON BWEV (french only).

Click here.


 

DESIGNED IN EVERY ASPECT
AROUND HELPING YOU STAY HYDRATED. DRINK MORE WATER !
 

- Larger Capacity (600mL/21oz) meaning that when you drink whole content of your BWEV bottle, you have drink more than you would have with most popular bottles on the market. 100 to 200mL more. Do that 4 times in a day, and you have drank 400 to 800mL extra ;
 

- Bottle opening is larger and smoother (inside tread) than other bottles for much better drinking comfort and bigger sips every time ;
 

- Temperature Display to incite you to drink all of the content of your BWEV™ while the beverage is at your preferred temperature ;
 

- Adjustable reminder alarms to support you into drinking more frequently and help develop a strong hydration habit. The ultimate goal being that someday, you will be able to go on your own without having to activate any of the BWEV™ reminder alarms ;
 

- High quality, ergonomic and lightweight bottle. The perfect companion to bring everywhere with you ! You will drink more and more water having your BWEV™ beside you constantly ;
 

- Sleek look. You will be proud of owning a BWEV and it will be a daily conversation starter.

Boom ! Six aspects that will make you hydrate more, drink more water.
 

-Liquid expiry indicator : this one is more for the coffee drinkers out there. After 8 hours of sitting inside the bottle, at the first single tap on the screen will be displayed a red circle marked with an ''X'' in the middle.

 



SMART BOTTLE, SMART CHOICE
 

The BWEV™ will not only have an amazing impact on your well-being, it will have a great environmental impact too. At the moment, Mother Earth has to deal with more than 240M tons of plastic waste... and that's each and every year !
Let's all take a step together towards caring more for our own well-being and our beautiful planet ! 




 

AVAILABLE IN 3 BEAUTIFUL COLORS 

(colors to be selected on the survey that you will receive after the campaign is completed) 



EBONY




 

IVORY



 

COTTON CANDY


 


 

ANY FAVORITE ?

'' Pssst...  Hey there, it's Eric, Founder & CEO at BWEV™.
Wanna know which one is MY personal favorite? 
Well, it's the Ivory !  Read down below to discover why it's my favorite...''


 

The Ivory BWEV™ has been developed as a tribute to our emblem : the elephant 

A majestic animal with a legendary memory (which influenced the choice of our Branding : the BWEV™ reminds you to drink... In case you forget, it remembers for you and lets you know). BWEV™ takes care of your hydration just like the matriarch elephant does with her calves.  

Unfortunately, this splendid animal is endangered because of the human race, who one day, decided to attribute a commercial value to one of its body parts : the tusk of Ivory. Ready to mutilate and kill to appropriate.  

BWEV™ Ivory is my way to pay tribute to elephants : a lot of effort and time have been put into designing it with a precise subtlety...  I have, with some difficulty, managed to design a lid color that is slightly more "whitish" (very subtle) than the bottle itself.  

I did that as a representation of a fresh grown shoot at the lower end of his Ivory tusk. In short, it represents an elephant to which humans have left full freedom and thus allowed to live a normal life. The life it deserves.


(c) David YARROW


 

Eric BOLDUC
Founder & CEO 
BWEV INC.
St.Eustache, Quebec (Canada)


-----------------
 




BWEV™ : TOP PLAYER OF THE LEAGUE

 


CONTRIBUTIONS/PERKS :
($CAD, shipping is extra)
 

LATE BIRD
PRE-ORDERS
JUNE 16TH-30TH:


 


CORPO OFFER : 
 

45x BWEV™ CUSTOMIZED 

with your own Corporate logo + BWEV's logo

 

2700$ (tx inc) *shipping extra

FOR 45 PERSONNALIZED BWEV™.

*You need to supply us with your logo in Ai format (maximum size of your logo on the bottle is 100mm x 25mm). Be aware that BWEV’s logo still appears on each and every bottle. Your logo goes on the same side as ours, 1 inch over it, positioned vertically, towards the neck of the bottle.

N.B. Subject to approbation
(BWEV™ reserves the unique and exclusive right to reject any logo, for aesthetics, ethics or proportion reasons). 


---
 


PREMIUM FACTORY.
PREMIUM BOTTLES.  
  

Since we didn't found any local Canadian factory to manufacture our product, we've teamed up with an amazing one in China. It was a lot of research and efforts for us because we wanted a top factory. And we have found the best there is out there to fabricate the BWEV™ : 

- Production facilities at the edge of technology ;

- Whole factory is clean as a medical lab ;

- Administration and employees form a big family. Well-being of every employee is crucial to them.  All employees are all well taken care of. Treated like beloved human beings.

Our factory is an example to follow in all aspects. But don't take our word for it ! Have a look down at all certifications the BWEV™ factory and the BWEV™ bottle hold together.

 

- REACH CERTIFIED -

---------------------------------------------


GIVING BACK TO COMMUNITY :

BWEV™ ENGAGE TO GIVE BACK 1$ PER BOTTLE DELIVERED.

OFFERING YOU THE CHOICE BETWEEN TWO ADMIRABLE FOUNDATIONS
(selection at same time as the color(s) of bottle(s) you want i.e. survey sent after Campaign). 


David SUZUKI Foundation
 

 



Protect nature’s diversity and the well-being of all life, now and for the future. A vision that we all act every day on the understanding that we are one with nature.



Centre Refuge NYMOUS


Inform, prevent and educate to allow people to better understand and respect Canadian wild animals (Quebec). Too many animals suffer because humans fear what they don't know.


---
 

BWEV™
TIMELINE

























 


Many other collaborators which we thank from the bottom of our hearts but can't identify due to two-way non-disclosure agreement contracts. 

Thanks a million BWEV™ Squad !
You will recognize yourself. :)

--
 

UPDATES
22/06/2021
MASS PRODUCTION COMPLETED:
 











--

23/06/2021 LEAVING FOR AIRPORT:




--

28/06/2021 MERCHANDISE FLEW FROM CHINA TO YUL (MONTREAL AIRPORT).

--

story:
Winston’s is a sustainable, reusable cloth adult undergarment.

You would not believe the range of women who struggle with accidents.

  • Women who have just had a baby
  • Women who have had multiple pregnancies
  • Women in the hospital
  • Women recovering from surgery
  • Women with severe food allergies
  • Women with IBS or Crohn’s disease
  • Senior women

 

Originally, Winston’s was conceived as an adult undergarment for senior women. But early feedback from potential customers made one thing clear: so many people have had to buy disposable adult diapers at one point or another. 

This is a space that is ripe for disruption. Think about how unpleasant it is to buy a plastic pack of disposable adult diapers from a weird corner aisle of CVS. No one wants to be in a position where they need incontinence products… so Winston’s is here to make the experience more private, more upscale, more sustainable, and more comfortable. 

Winston’s could be to the adult undergarment space what Thinx has been to the period products space.

Why do we avoid saying“diaper?” Mainly out of respect for our customers.  No one wants to feel infantilized, so we alter our language slightly and everyone still knows what we’re talking about.

 

 

It's Sort of Insane No One Has Done This Yet, Right?

The adult incontinence space is a $4 billion dollar industry.  We spend a lot of money preventing or soaking up accidents. 

But no one thought to make the experience more comfortable--physically and emotionally--for the people using the products?  Winston's is on a mission to make adult undergarments that people aren't embarrassed to wear.  (In fact, our goal is that people secretly delight in how comfortable Winston's are)

 

Getting Winston's Off the Ground

 

 

I'm Liz Funk.  I'm an entrepreneur in upstate New York. This is my second sustainable fashion company.  My first company, And We Evolve, was a subscription box service for secondhand fashion (2017-2019).  

To manufacture a run of Winston's, I'll need to partner with an ethically-run factory in the United States.  I'll need $10,000 to play serious.

  • For those ready to make a pledge, the signature perk is a pair of Winston's. Pre-order a pair of Winston's for yourself or for someone in your life. Winston's bring dignity and comfort to adult undergarments.
  • Crucially, another meaningful perk is to donate a pair of Winston's.  Your pledge will go towards manufacturing a pair of Winston's that will be donated to an organization that serves populations that need Winston's.

In the event that I don't reach my entire $10,000 goal, the funds will go to fulfilling orders of Winston's with independent stitchers (people who sew professionally are often called "stitchers").
 

 

Risks & Challenges

One hurdle for Winston's is the $59 price point. Winston's web-site copywriting will subtly address this. 

Wearing disposable adult briefs may be slightly less expensive, but at what cost to the environment? 

And what is the value of wearing adult undergarments that are designed with comfort and elegance in mind?

If these arguments don't sway a consumer, perhaps they're simply not a Winston's customer.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

It takes a village, for real.  These are some non-monetary ways you can help!

  • Follow Winston's on Instagram
  • Visit TryWinstons.com and have a look around
  • Sign up for the Winston's newsletter at TryWinstons.com
  • Write an email to someone who you think would be interested in supporting this campaign, and share the URL with them!
  • Post about Winston's and this campaign on your social media!

 

Thank you, friends.
