Winston’s is a sustainable, reusable cloth adult undergarment.
You would not believe the range of women who struggle with accidents.

Women who have just had a baby
Women who have had multiple pregnancies
Women in the hospital
Women recovering from surgery
Women with severe food allergies
Women with IBS or Crohn’s disease
Senior women

 
Originally, Winston’s was conceived as an adult undergarment for senior women. But early feedback from potential customers made one thing clear: so many people have had to buy disposable adult diapers at one point or another. 
This is a space that is ripe for disruption. Think about how unpleasant it is to buy a plastic pack of disposable adult diapers from a weird corner aisle of CVS. No one wants to be in a position where they need incontinence products… so Winston’s is here to make the experience more private, more upscale, more sustainable, and more comfortable. 
Winston’s could be to the adult undergarment space what Thinx has been to the period products space.
Why do we avoid saying“diaper?” Mainly out of respect for our customers.  No one wants to feel infantilized, so we alter our language slightly and everyone still knows what we’re talking about.
 

 
It's Sort of Insane No One Has Done This Yet, Right?
The adult incontinence space is a $4 billion dollar industry.  We spend a lot of money preventing or soaking up accidents. 
But no one thought to make the experience more comfortable--physically and emotionally--for the people using the products?  Winston's is on a mission to make adult undergarments that people aren't embarrassed to wear.  (In fact, our goal is that people secretly delight in how comfortable Winston's are)
 

Getting Winston's Off the Ground
 

 
I'm Liz Funk.  I'm an entrepreneur in upstate New York. This is my second sustainable fashion company.  My first company, And We Evolve, was a subscription box service for secondhand fashion (2017-2019).  
To manufacture a run of Winston's, I'll need to partner with an ethically-run factory in the United States.  I'll need $10,000 to play serious.

For those ready to make a pledge, the signature perk is a pair of Winston's. Pre-order a pair of Winston's for yourself or for someone in your life. Winston's bring dignity and comfort to adult undergarments.
Crucially, another meaningful perk is to donate a pair of Winston's.  Your pledge will go towards manufacturing a pair of Winston's that will be donated to an organization that serves populations that need Winston's.

In the event that I don't reach my entire $10,000 goal, the funds will go to fulfilling orders of Winston's with independent stitchers (people who sew professionally are often called "stitchers"). 


 
Risks & Challenges
One hurdle for Winston's is the $59 price point. Winston's web-site copywriting will subtly address this. 
Wearing disposable adult briefs may be slightly less expensive, but at what cost to the environment?  
And what is the value of wearing adult undergarments that are designed with comfort and elegance in mind?
If these arguments don't sway a consumer, perhaps they're simply not a Winston's customer.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
It takes a village, for real.  These are some non-monetary ways you can help!

Follow Winston's on Instagram

Visit TryWinstons.com and have a look around
Sign up for the Winston's newsletter at TryWinstons.com

Write an email to someone who you think would be interested in supporting this campaign, and share the URL with them!
Post about Winston's and this campaign on your social media!

 
Thank you, friends.

story:
Buy Airdog Today - We Are Now Shipping!

Last chance for our great deal!

 

 

We pushed the bounds of air purification technology to develop a best-in-class air purifier that combats the indoor air pollutants found in every building. Our technology cleans smaller particles than any of the more classic air purifiers (think HEPA purifiers that use disposable paper filters), which means less indoor pollutants will find their way into your lungs.

Plus, the Airdog X5 doesn’t rely on disposable (HEPA) filters that hurt your wallet and the environment. This is a one-of-a-kind air purifier that will improve your health, and set a precedent for eco-friendly air purifiers that protect you and our planet. Not only that, but it also monitors and displays the quality of your air while purifying it, so you can see the pollution level in your home going down in real time.

    • With innovative ionic wind technology, Airdog X5 can clean a 300 square foot room in 20 minutes

     

     

    • An optimized, aerodynamic design that enables high-volume airflow means your air gets cleaner, faster and more quietly.

    • Can clean a 300 square foot room in 20 minutes
    • Offers better filtration than any traditional HEPA air purifiers
    • Cleans out microscopic particles (down to 14.6-nanometers), which means you’ll breathe fewer pollutants each day. For reference, most allergens and viruses are 30-nanometers. Airdog filters particles down to half this size and has been proven to remove 99.99% of bacteria, formaldehyde and other harmful elements from air.

    Airdog X5 rapidly filtering cigarette smoke.

    A prototype of the Airdog filter in action.

      • Initiates with the push of a button, and auto-adjusts to different modes based on your room’s air quality level.

      • A real-time display keeps you updated on your air quality level, so you can turn Airdog on and watch as your pollution drops.

      • Set your Airdog X5 to sleep mode anytime for nearly silent filtration.

      ​​

      • Airdog X5's reusable filter is easy-to-wash in a dishwasher or by hand.

      ​

      • No disposable, paper HEPA filters that need to be replaced.

      ​

      • Consumes less than half the energy of traditional air purifiers with the same clean air delivery rate.

      • Positive ambience in your home or office.

      With the Airdog X5 App, you can:

      • Remotely control your Airdog X5.
      • Turn on, off, set to sleep mode, child lock, and adjust filtration settings.
      • Track air quality in your home or office and see how it stacks up against the air outdoors.

      "This is genius."

      – Christopher J., Satisfied Test User

      "My kids love it because it looks cool. I love it because it's kid safe and cleans the air they breathe." 

      – Jennifer L.

      "I was shocked to see all the dust and dirt when I cleaned [the filter]. I can’t believe this is the air I used to breathe everyday!"

      – Jessica S.

      • Can purify a 300 square foot room in 20 minutes
      • Size: 0.65(H) x 0.316(L) x 0.306(W) m
      • Weight: 10.7kg
      • CADR(PM2.5): 310m^3/h, 185CFM
      • Noise Level: <65dB(A)
      • Max Input Power: 60W
      • Comes with power cable for U.S., Europe, China, and Mexico, depending on your region

      We make NO PROFIT on shipping. We'll work to make shipping costs cheaper and if we can get a really good deal and can save more money when we ship, we'll PayPal that savings back to you. But for now, please know that we are not trying to squeeze extra profit out of you on shipping costs.

      What is the Airdog X5?

      The Airdog X5 is an innovative air purifier developed by a group of technology experts and entrepreneurs in Silicon Valley. It was built using ionic wind technology, which enables a non-consumable (reusable) filter, highly efficient filtration, and lower wind resistance/noise. It cleans the air in your home, so you can breathe clean and live a healthier life. It’s also a green solution to air purification, since it doesn’t use disposable filters and is energy efficient.

      What is ionic wind filtration?

      Ionic wind is wind generated by ions flowing under an electrical field. It’s an amazing technology that’s been recognized by Scientific American and the MIT technology review. Ionic wind filtration has two parts. First is the dust charging and collection stage. Air enters a chamber in the air purifier and gets charged. The charged ions/dust in the air then move under an electrical field, and there is an avalanching effect where more and more ions/dust are charged and moved under the field. Finally, they hit the electrically charged collecting plates, where the dust gets collected, and the ions are neutralized. The now clean air keeps its momentum and then exits the chamber. This process circulates and continues, which is how the Airdog X5’s ionic wind technology can clean the air in your house.

      How big of a room can the Airdog X5 purify?

      The Airdog X5 can be used in a 300 square foot room.

      How long does it take to purify the air in one room?

      Just 20 minutes. (It takes traditional air purifiers one hour.)

      How long does the reusable filter last?

      The collecting plates need to be washed every 1-2 months depending on the pollution level of the room. There's a built-in timer (600 hours) to conveniently remind you. When "C" shows on the display, it's time to clean the filters.

      Silicon Valley Air Expert Inc. is a leading air purifier company founded by a group of technology experts and entrepreneurs from Silicon Valley. We are dedicated to developing innovative air purification solutions based on ionic wind technology. Our Airdog air purifiers are high-performance and eliminate the waste and expense of disposable filter cartridges. Airdog is silent, energy efficient, and easy to use. It offers you clean air and is a green solution to purifying the air in your home.

story:
A simple, functional and beautiful fitness equipment for functional fitness with weights. No clutter. No gimmicks. 

Exerbell is a foldable fitness weight to challenge your entire body anywhere, anytime, without the need for bulky and expensive iron weights. With its minimalist and home-friendly design, the Exerbell is ideal for home workouts in apartments, outdoors or when you're travelling. Improve your mobility, increase your strength and endurance anywhere, anytime.

 

Convenience combined with aesthetics and functionality.

The Exerbell was made for everyone who doesn't have extra space for a home gym but still wants to stay fit from the comfort of their home with a versatile tool that 

  • elegantly blends into your living space
  • is easy to use and store
  • doesn't damage the floor or furniture
  • offers multiple weights in one
  • is pet- and kid-safe
  • can also be used outdoors or on-the-road

 

Travels with you wherever life takes you.

Train with the elements around you.

All you need is water from your home, lake or sea to create a dynamic weight that also trains your core muscles and stability. Or fill it with sand when you’re near a beach or playground for even more weight. Weight markings on the inside help you adjust your weight from 2 kg/4lbs up to 14 kg/30lbs. 

Up to 10 kg/22lbs with water, 14 kg/30lbs with sand. Filling markers are on the inside​.

 

The freedom to stay in shape anywhere, anytime.

 

Minimalist design, high effectiveness.

Comfortable handling: no hard iron that could hurt your wrist or arm, so you can focus on your workout.

Leak-proof construction: extra leak-protection inside for a secure workout indoors with water straight from the tap.   

Train from the comfort of your home, without damaging or cluttering your living space.

 

Features

Foldable for easy storage and travel.

 

Color options

 

Who is the Exerbell for?

1. Fitness enthusiasts and everyone who wants to

  • Integrate weights (up to 14 kg) for functional workouts such as HIIT or Tabata
  • Improve mobility, strength, endurance, and stability
  • stay in shape at home or on the road with more than just burpees
  • connect with oneself instead of another high-tech gadget

all while keeping their apartment neat and tidy. It is NOT meant to replace your heavy weights.

2. Personal Trainers who want to give their clients the opportunity to stay fit while traveling. No more excuses.

3. Bootcamp owners who would like a hassle-free way to include weights into their outdoor classes

 

Approved by professional trainers and fitness enthusiasts. 

 

 

About us

Exerbell was born out of the need to stay fit at home when gyms around the world were closed during a pandemic and heavy fitness equipment was sold out or simply too inconvenient and expensive. We are a team of gear enthusiasts, personal trainers, and crowdfunding fans. Our mission is simple: to make fitness simple, effective, and affordable, without the need for over-connected, fancy devices. Our products are designed with minimalism and simplicity in mind to help you connect with yourself. 

 

Shipping & Taxes

Shipping, taxes (and VAT / GST) will be calculated and paid for before we ship out our product to you.

You will be responsible for paying local taxes and duties when applicable. You will not always be required to pay duties or import tax, but it is important that you make yourself aware of the duties that apply in your country in case you are charged.

We work with a Third-Party Logistics partner. Below you can find the shipping costs estimations. 

After the campaign ends, you will receive an email from #teamexerbell to select your final order choices (colors and add-ons) and pay any additional shipping costs.

Each order will ship to only one location. There will be no split orders even for the largest shipments including multiple Exerbells. 

 

Return Policy

Our intention is to do everything we possibly can to deliver a great, safe, and reliable product to you on time. All the funds will be used towards initiating large-scaled production and the launch of Exerbell. In accordance with Kickstarter Terms of Use, we will not offer refunds or returns. In the event that you receive a faulty item, please report it immediately upon receiving your package and contact us team@exerbell.com. We greatly value our Kickstarter backers and will do everything we can to ensure you have a great Exerbell experience.

story:
With the infrared heat technology (Hot-Stone massage style), acupressure contact points (Shiatsu massage style), and traction techniques (Thai massage style), Alpha Neck takes neck relief in a way that no other single device does, by starting from the upper back and working its way up. 

First, the infrared heat technology kicks in and distributes soothing heat deep into the inner layers of your stiff muscles to gently relax the underlying knots.

Then, the Alpha Neck uses your own body weight to gently press the targeted areas in the neck and back against the device’s acupressure points to begin muscle traction. 

After 10 short minutes, you will feel revitalized and energized to start or finish off the day!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We used carbon composites as the designated material to act as the heat conductor due to the material's low density, high mechanical strength, high thermostability, and high thermal conductivity. We developed our heating technology to mimic these effects so that all that built up tension deep within your body can just melt away. 

 

 

 

 

The areas with the most amount of muscle tension were released by the infrared heating provided by Alpha Neck. This is done comfortably in a non-invasive manner.

 

 

Test institute: Professor Jae-Ho Yoo's team, Department of Physical Therapy, Sunmoon University

 

Test subjects: 20 to 50 years old adult male and female / 20 subjects with neck pain 

1) Those who complain of strong non-specific neck pain 

2) Those who complain of chronic nonspecific neck pain 

3) Those who complain of pain from non-traumatic neck pain 

Test period: 2021.01 - 2021.03 

 

 

 

   * The actual temperature can be differ from the temperature we have stated above. 

  • Turns off automatically after 10 minutes

 

Once you place the Alpha Neck on the neck-bed side and lie down on it, the natural weight of your head will press your neck down onto the acupressure contact lines to provide deep yet gentle stimulation to the cervical spine.

 

 

 

This technique was inspired by the shiatsu massage style, which is well known for using acupressure to target, stretch, and massage the upper back muscles. The contact lines help the thoracic portion of the vertebrae find its correct position to take pressure off of the neck.

 

 

 

 

Check out how the body reacts to the acupressure contact lines around the neck and upper back area. Not only will you feel how loose your muscles get after a ten-minute session with Alpha Neck, but you’ll even see the difference!

 

 

 

This is as close you’ll get to the feeling of being massaged by a top-tier masseuse without ever leaving the comfort of your home!

 

Whether it’s through the use of a smartphone, tablet, or computer, people in today’s world have developed habits that place a lot of burden on the neck. When positioned incorrectly, even gravity can have a negative effect.

This is why practically everyone you know has experienced some or a lot of soreness and stiffness around the neck and upper back area.

 

 

 

In order to reverse the negative effects that gravity can have on a body with poor posture, Alpha Neck uses traction techniques to stretch out the cervical and thoracic vertebrae to release tension and untie knots.

Bytargeting the upper back section along with the neck area, the root problem is taken care of properly so that you can experience full relaxation for considerably longer periods of time.

 

  • Alpha Neck: Gives you a natural c-curve stretching without straining the cervical and thoracic vertebrae.
  • Foam Rollers: Places excess pressure on the spine which prevents it from gently holding the correct c-curve position.

 

 

The cervical and thoracic vertebrae can be quite delicate which means you need specialized skills to properly carry out a traction massage on those areas. Developed jointly by a team consisting of physical therapists, licensed doctors, and pilates/yoga experts, Alpha Neck has been fine-tuned so that you are empowered to take care of your own body.

 

 

We have found that users that fall in the range of 5’0” - 6’6” and weigh no more than 300 lbs have experienced the most benefits from using the Alpha Neck.

 

 

Unlike those bulky turtle neck braces or kneading massagers you see online or in stores, Alpha Neck is drastically more compact and light which makes it convenient to store and take anywhere with you. We’ve also intentionally given it a clean form factor so that it doesn’t look out of place in any setting.

 

  • Can be held with one hand and fits easily in a bag so that you can take it to your home, the office, the gym, your yoga studio, any vehicle, a plane, a train, and any other place you might want to take it to.
  • It can even be used when you’re sitting upright like a travel neck pillow.

story:
Portable Parallel Bars

The Fit! P-Bars are the world's first portable parallel bars made to fit conveniently in your backpack, gym bag, suitcase, etc.  They were built to be sturdy and durable, yet they're also the most lightweight option on the market.

 

Setup is simple.

Each bar has 4 legs that fit perfectly within the main bar. The end caps come off and the legs slide into place. No tools are required and setup should only take you 20-30 seconds per bar.

 

Calisthenics/Gymnastics/Bodyweight

Parallel bars (p-bars) are a vital tool in mastering your bodyweight. They allow you to support your entire bodyweight on your arms, which requires immense strength, body control, and stability. This is why gymnasts are such incredible athletes.

 

P-Bars can be used for a variety of exercises including Handstands, L-Sits. HSPUs (handstand pushups), and more.

 

Out Engineering the Competition

In order to achieve our goal of making portable parallel bars that were convenient for the user, we had to accomplish two things.

 

1) DESIGN

The goal was to make something that would easily fit in a backpack. Since p-bars are an awkward shape, we had to either make them come apart or fold in some way. Yet we had to be careful that this didn't negatively effect the structural stability.

 

2) WEIGHT

The design phase is essential, but if the bars are too heavy it won't be easy to take them with you.

Here's some competing option...

 

We engineered the Fit P-Bars using aerospace grade aluminum so they're ultra lightweight, yet just as durable as the heavier steel options.  In total, they weigh 5 lbs (2.3kg), making them the most lightweight option on the market.

 

 

From Idea to Prototype

At Fit! we really enjoy the creative process of prototyping an idea.  Seeing something that was once a thought, turned to a tangible product is really rewarding. Here's a short glimpse at the lifecycle of the Fit P-Bars.

After the prototype was completed our team spent countless hours testing it and trying to break it.

 

The next step was to refine the design and make it look sleek and cool.

 

After bead blasting the bars for texture (and grip), we then anodized the steel and added our branding.  We love the final product!

 

The Fit! app

If you're not familiar with the Fit! app, we produce online training programs for a variety of different fitness niches and sports.

Some of our programs include:

Project Calisthenics by Simon Ata

30 Days to Handstand by Andrew Sealy

The Shredded Academy by Adam Frater

Mobility for Calisthenics by Dr. Jen Esquer

+ many more

 

Due to Covid and the rise of home workouts, we saw a great opportunity to leverage our strengths and get into the hardware market. In February we launched the Fit Home Gym on Kickstarter. It was our first project and we were extremely successful. 

 

After the successful campaign, our team acquired warehouse space in Los Angeles for packaging and shipping.  However, half of the space is being reserved for future R&D. We call this Fit! Labs.

This is where we're producing the P-Bars.

The team at Fit! is on a mission to revolutionize the world of home fitness and beyond.

We take pride in quality and user experience while focusing on modern functionality and convenience.

We appreciate your support!

story:
Introducing OYeet NEX massage gun, the world's strongest and portable percussion massage gun. With NEX, you can have all the benefits of a professional and high-speed high stoke massage gun. Get your massage therapy whenever and wherever you need it, all thanks to this pocket-size massage gun.

NEX comes in a stylish and elegant shape that’s small, practical, and has a noise level that’s between 45-55 dB (i.e. it’s pretty close to silent). Combined all together, you’re in a complete state of enjoyment, flow and relief when using NEX.

NEX is the perfect partner for any indoor or outdoor activities or sports: such as hiking, cycling, running, ball sports, you name it. You get rapid muscle recovery, maximum delivery and enhanced workout results.

OYeet has completed the NEX production stage and shipping is currently underway.  Thank you to our backers, we cherish the relationship that we have established with you. We hope that you are having a great user experience with your NEX Massage Gun. 

 

 

NEX goes 60% deeper into the skin at precisely 50 times per second and 3,500ppm. It targets sore spots, enhances muscle recovery, releases stress and tension within the body, and also soothes aches and pains.

Our founder and power users team searched for a natural solution for customer's pain. Ten versions later, we birthed NEX-a unique device that addressed our inital objectives. A massage gun that has a 40lbs force that doesn’t stall and, it offers greater tension release.

NEX’s streamlined, cutting-edge build means it’s only the size of an iPhone (6.1 x 3.9 x 1.8 in) and weighs just over a pound. Store it comfortably in your pocket and bag, that’s if the attractive design doesn’t have you showing it off to the world instead.

When the slim, compact NEX is in your hand you’d never know you were holding a powerful engine. One that allows you to massage your entire body with just the one hand. It’ll turn you into a self-massaging master.



Instead of using plastic shafts like other average massage device (which will probably last less than a year), OYeet NEX utilizes two, 100%-metal shafts with a heavy-duty 600 mN.m torque and a 30% longer life usage.

When you have a noise reduction design that’s patented and a motor that’s brushless, you get a powerful massage that’s practically silent. Whether at home or in public, quiet, 45 dB relief is with you.

With 240 minutes of battery life, you can spend 10 minutes every day on muscle recovery for an entire month, uninterrupted.

The Core-less Charging Stand beautifully displays your NEX for hassle-free charging and quick access to your device. Forgot to carry the charging stand? Don’t worry, simply plug the provided, universal USB cable into a wall charger or laptop and you're good to go.

NEX comes with 4 different speed settings controlled by a single button. Treat sensitive areas or use the full power of the device, with a simple click.

NEX is not only 60% smaller than most massage guns, it comes with a travel-friendly pouch. Go anywhere your active urges take you, and you’ll have immediate relief by your side.

NEX comes with four different shapes of massage attachments that are equally portable.




NEX comes with a guide on three sets of health solutions. Explore our step-by-step warm-up, recovery and ailment routines. You can also get a free, downloadable version from the official O’Yeet website.

 


 

We’re as confident as one can be about the quality of our product. However, if you’re still worried about something going wrong, the two-year warranty that comes with NEX gives you peace-of-mind.

 

 
 
 

Thank you so much for your immense support with OYeet NEX so far. To show our gratitude, we’d like to announce our referral program! Any friends purchase through your link, both you and your friends get gifts.

Christmas Bonus:

1.Copy your personal referral link on the top right of the campaign page, and paste the link to anywhere, anyone you want to share with.

2.Refer 1~2 orders successfully, you'll get a OYeet Shaker Bottle (Worth $19.99)!

3.Refer 3~4 orders successfully, you’ll get TWO OYeet Shaker Bottle (Worth $39.98)!

4.Refer 5 or more orders successfully, you’ll get a OYeet Gopower Blander (Worth $79.99)!

Come and win yours!

Change everything you know about speed and power together, with the cutting-edge NEXPower Technology™. The minimalist design, ergonomic comfort, and incredibly portability is a new level of professional performance. And not just for professionals. Reaching a perfect balance of depth, speed and force, the OYeet NEX is your pocket-sized training partner, giving you quality muscle treatment with unparalleled mobility. Compact yet powerful, OYeet Nex is the most agile professional massage device, going wherever you go. It helps you train easily every day and allows you to explore a healthier, more active lifestyle anytime, anywhere.

Speed and power, together, in a comfortable, minimalist design. That's NEX. The cutting-edge NEXPower Technology behind it all provides ergonomic comfort, incredible portability, and a new level of professional performance. But you don't have to be a professional to attain a perfect massage balance of speed, force and depth. NEX is your pocket-sized training partner, giving you quality muscle treatment wherever your active lifestyle takes you. Be healthier and feel better, anywhere, with NEX.

Innovation is in Our DNA

OYeet utilized patient feedback, physical therapists’ advice, and trainers’ standards to set the bar high for efficacy. We worked with them, along with engineers and hundreds of power users, at every stage of our product development. So that, as users’ needs keep evolving, we keep innovating.

Performance is Our Principle

Everybody needs the power of professional-grade treatment in their hands. From advanced ergonomics to continuous battery life, every feature is designed with the performance and convenience of professionals in mind.

Our Mission is Professional Treatment, Anytime, Anywhere.

We adapted our new proprietary brushless motor to our most compact design ever. NEX strikes a never-before-seen balance between power and size, making it a convenient option for getting next-level relief on the go. Cramps, knots, and tension can strike at the most inconvenient times, but even when you are venturing off the beaten path, NEX is right there with you. Slip it into a jacket pocket or stow it in your gear for easy access - and, say, a quick calf or shoulder sweep right when you need it.

We are asking you to take this first step into the future with us. Whether that means repping our brand around town, sharing the campaign across your favorite social media channels, or jumping in with both feet and picking up an early bird deal on our first batch, we can't do this without you.

 

We are experienced health and sports device builders and we’re excited to link arms with you on this NEX adventure. While it is exciting, it is also a big commitment and we understand that. Let us know if you have questions and we will get back to you. Let's do this thing, together.

story:
HELLO! 

I'm Molly Burkett, a 27-year-old professional intuitive artist based in New York City. I use tarot cards, energy healing and do-it-yourself spirituality to help you unlock your inner strength and creativity. I've developed these services with care, passion, and determination, and I'm seeking to bring a new dimension to my practice: YOGA!

I'M REACHING OUT BECAUSE...

I was recently one of 24 students accepted into the dreamiest intensive, a 200-Hr Yoga Teacher Training in Bali, Indonesia, from September 5-30th, 2015. This program embraces the spiritual essence of yoga in addition to rigorous physical discipline. I will be practicing hatha and vinyasa flow, power yoga, yin/restorative, breath, mantra, as well as herbal medicine, Vedic astrology, and energetic anatomy, and more.

...It's going to be AM-A-A-ZING! 

Not only will I earn the credentials needed to teach yoga, but it will dramatically expand my abilities to offer exceptional services to my clients and community in Brooklyn, back home in Indiana, and beyond. Think psychic private yoga lessons, reiki+yoga workshops, and in-depth intuitive readings that acknowledge the whole of you: mind, body and being! 

This also marks a commitment to the next chapter in my personal path towards wellness: fully integrating everything I've learned on my inner journey and embodying it in the material world. I want to share everything I've learned, but in order to officially teach yoga, I have to earn the credentials!

THE HEALING POWERS OF YOGA

Meditation & yoga has been part of my remedy for clinical depression and PMDD over the past two years. (Read more of my story here and here.) I've learned how to transform my hypersensitivity into a superpower, and find balance in a natural and sustainable way. Since beginning a personal spiritual practice, I have:

  • given up smoking after 8+ years of addiction
  • weaned myself off of anti-depressants and therapy
  • no longer suffer from frequent panic attacks and migraines
  • quit my day job to start my own business
  • had countless psychic experiences with clients across the country
My practice has helped me to listen to the natural wisdom and intuition within, and helps me guide others to experiencing their own unique relationship with this inner voice. Yoga has helped me to respect the ever-changing nature of our bodies, and of life itself. 

THE NITTY-GRITTY 

My goal is to raise $3,000*, which is approximately half of my total expenses for three and a half weeks of spiritual study with master teachers. Adding roundtrip travel to Indonesia and various expenses since this will be my first time travelling internationally, *my actual costs will be around $5,000-$6,000. 

I have already submitted the $320 down payment to reserve my spot in the program. I must send an additional $1800 by August 5th, or my spot will be given away and my down payment will be forfeited! An additional installment of $1800 is due by September 5th for a total tuition & room/board cost of $3,920. The program offers no financial aid.

I'm a one-woman independent business, and I support myself entirely from tarot/reiki clients, classes, events, and workshops. Since I am unable to work the month of the training, and either way the costs would exceed my budget, I am humbly opening up to receive from my community!  

YOUR INVESTMENT IS REAL


Intuitives make the best teachers. They know when to motivate and when to comfort, when to be sassy and when to be sacred. With my down-to-earth speaking style and an unshakable dedication to keeping it REAL, you can trust that I will bring a strong new voice to the wellness community.


I am a dedicated supporter, collaborator, and teacher: This year I founded Sister Healing Exchange, a network for female entrepreneurs to trade services & develop their businesses. Through my educational platform Agency of Nu Age Magic, I've produced events for emerging readers and artists, as well as led workshops and moon circles. I'm currently mentoring a brilliant 12-year-old (!) pre-teen witch. Ultimately, your participation is a way to sustain a new wave of intuitive healing artists who are empowering their communities and changing the world.


And, of course, your POWER-PERKS! Ranging from tarot readings to reiki rituals to limited edition magical kits and intimate ceremonies, all the backer rewards are special and come straight from my heart to you. Some are even discounts on services, such as the $100 Deluxe Intuitive Session + Power Kit which is a $135 value. More prizes will be sprinkled in throughout the campaign. Watch this space!


THREE WAYS TO PARTICIPATE


#1: CONTRIBUTE NOW. Don't be shy -- even $5 can make waves! If you've been following my work and want to be a special part of what I do next, click the "CONTRIBUTE NOW" button, and feel awesome immediately.


#2: SHARE, SHARE, SHARE. Link to this page on your Facebook. Throw your a pic on your Instagram and tag me @molly_burkett. Write a message to your dearest witches, yogis, world travelers -- you never know who will resonate with my goal. 


#3: GIFT A REWARD. Are you an artist or maker yourself? Small businesses are invited to contribute by offering store credit, artwork, or a cool experience to be rewarded to backers! Contact me to collaborate and expand your community.


Your contribution is an honor and I will treat it as such. "Flexible Funding" means I receive all contributions, regardless of how much is raised. You still receive your perks no matter what. If the total isn't a big enough boost for me to make this venture happen, the funds will go towards an alternative yoga training or a comparable spiritual/educational opportunity and investment (such as a Reiki Master's training) which I would announce publicly. If I exceed my goal (!!), what is raised OVER $3,000 will go towards the remainder of tuition ($920) and travel expenses ($1200+).

If you have any questions of concerns, do reach out! I will be posting updates throughout the campaign.


THANK YOU!

Molly B

Contact: mollyburkett@gmail.com

Visit me at:

www.mollyburkett.com

www.instagram.com/molly_burkett

story:
Our Need:

As we all know, if a doctor or a lawyer is involved, it's going to be expensive! Well, we at Camp Bethesda need both … doctors and lawyers. As we are starting our organization there are certain legal fees that must be paid, insurance that must be purchased, and medical staff that must be paid (during the camp). 

For every child that will go to camp, it will cost us about $1,000. Our goal for our very first camp in the summer of 2014 is to send 50 kids to camp. As any mathematician, calculator or 3rd grade math will tell you, that's $50,000! So that's why we are here, asking for your help to get Camp Bethesda off the ground. We've laid the ground work and now just need your support. 

So we are here to ask the community to help us raise the funds needed to pay legal fees, insurance  expenses and get us well on our way to sending kids to camp. As you can see, $10,000 is a fraction of what we will truly need to reach our goal of sending 50 kids to camp. So if you, our supporters, are generous and give beyond the $10,000 goal, know that for every additional $1,000 you are helping send one child with congenital heart disease to camp.

Thank you for your generous support. We at Camp Bethesda are eternally grateful. 

Sincerely,

Katie McLemore
Executive Director

About Us:

Camp Bethesda is a camp for children between the ages of 8 and 18 that have congenital heart disease. We offer a safe place for kids to relax, be themselves, talk, cry, laugh, and heal.

We are a Christ-centered organization who believes that camp should be a physical, mental and spiritual experience.

Our summer camp is a 5 day 4 night camp that includes fun activities, chances to relax, socializing with other who have had similar experiences, times of praise and worship as well as biblical instruction time, and more.

Our hope is that a child who comes to Camp Bethesda will leave with a smile on their face, new friends in their life, and peace and healing in their heart.

Our Mission:

Camp Bethesda is dedicated to meeting the emotional, psychosocial, psychological and spiritual needs for children by providing a Christian atmosphere and therapeutic activities.

Other Ways You Can Help

We certainly have other needs outside of financial support. Here are a few other ways you can help us:

  • Prayer - We list this first because we believe it's the most important and impactful thing you can do to help us.
  • Volunteer - We rely on the investment of volunteers to do the work He has given us. Learn More »
  • Join Our Mailing List - We'll send out regular communications about what we are doing at camp and how you can further help. Sign Up!
  • Get the word out and make some noise about our campaign and our cause!

story:
Update (8/4, WE DID IT!):

As of this morning, we have officially reached our goal of $4,000! Thank you all so much for contributing your time and money to this effort; this quickly became a collective effort involving Coach's former players and their families from his entire career.

I'll get together with Coach this week to work on picking out the right new cart, and I'll include a card with the names of all the donors. I'll also be sending out shirts to all of you who are "On the Team".

Thank you all again!

Update (8/1, 4 DAYS LEFT!): Just one long weekend left—and we still need your help!

We're about $700 short of our goal, so please reach out to your former teammates to keep moving us forward. Every little bit counts, and the names of all the players and families who donated (and who wish to be identified) will be on a big group card given to Coach with the cart this fall.

Thank you all for your support! 

Update (7/30, ONE WEEK LEFT!): We're down to the final week of our campaign!

Thank you all so much for your support of Coach. The last few weeks have been an incredible showing from his former players and their parents, and we're very close to reaching our goal. Please share this link with your former teammates—especially those from classes that graduated pre-2004—and let's keep pushing forward down the home stretch.

Thanks again!

Update (7/9): Hey everyone, the show of support for Coach over the last few days has been truly incredible. It’s amazing that we’ve reached over a quarter of our goal already, and the money keeps pouring in.
That being said, we still have a long way to go to get Coach a new cart. But good news—an anonymous donor has offered to match the next $500 we raise!
Please keep passing this along through the football and baseball networks as much as possible. Again, I can’t tell you all how much I appreciate your help in doing this, and please direct any questions to ctcusack@gmail.com.

 

Over the last 30 years, Ben Soto has changed many of our lives through his coaching on the baseball diamond and the football field. At the same time, his mentoring abilities often reach beyond the athletic arena. Coach has left his mark on a network of young people that stretches from California to Saudi Arabia to Korea and everywhere in between, and his impact on the local community is unparalleled.

Coach is a paragon of dedication and commitment to both the game and his players. He has missed just two practices throughout his entire career, and for years he bought the iconic Cate Baseball practice shirts out of his own pocket.

Now is our chance to give back to Coach.

Cate's athletic facilities have expanded drastically over the last few years, and Coach needs a golf cart to help move gear from the gym to the fields and back again. Our fundraising goal is $4,000, which would be enough to buy him a brand new, high quality cart.

A donation of $40 or more gets you a brand new Cate Baseball shirt, but any little bit helps! 

It would be an incredible show of support from his former players, students, and colleagues if we could do this for him. Please help us in getting Coach the wheels he needs before football kicks off in August.

Note: Donations are not tax deductible because this campaign is not affiliated with Cate School. Please make any contribution in addition to your normal donation to Cate.

story:
Short Summary

 

 

Hello, My name is Roy L. Russ, and I am the President/CEO of Seniors Play a 501(c) (3) Non-Profit. Our mission is to increase physical activity among adults 50 and older. Our motto is: "It's Easier To Play Than Exercise."

Seniors Play has more than 50 persons participating in our Men and Women's Basketball, Softball, and Healthy Walking Programs. Our plan is to help reduce the high cost of health care by introducing Seniors to the Fountain of Youth, which is proper diet and exercise.

Seniors Play would like to increase our participants and expand our programming; however a lack of time and space prohibits us from doing so. With the influx of Baby Boomers attaining the age of 65, it is becoming apparent that Seniors are the fastest growing population in our communities.

Currently our programming is scattered throughout the City of Detroit, and we are in need of a facility to house all of our programming at one location. With your help we will start our first entrepreneurial venture, a Non-Emergency Transportation Company.

As President/CEO, I believe that we can begin to finance our mission and move toward our vision of self-sustainability. Your contributions will make it possible for us to purchase a bus to become a Non-Emergency Transportation Company to finance our mission.

I thank you in advance for helping to keep Seniors Moving!!

story:
Hello to all,

My name is Mozes Sandor,Alex to my friends.I am simple man,34 years old, so still young and ambitious to do some good. I have great strength and passion for the things that I believe in. My background is in transportation and mechanics.

The idea was born in Eastern Europe and out of a desire to help. One of the most basic desires of man is to help and this is a way in which I feel that I can provide the most effective help.
I would like to make something useful and permanent. Hopefully my own child will find this an excellent example and something that shows we are all part of the big wide world.

This unit is part of a bigger project, which I would like to call “Freedom”.

Two definitions of freedom spring to mind, the first being “exemption from external control, interference, regulation” and the second being “the power to determine action without restraint”.
In the case of this project I am trying to provide something that will give some measure of independence to an area that has possibly been subject to a disaster or some kind of need for urgent medical, cultural or daycare (social) facilities.
The idea is a Portable Prefabricated Self Running Multifunctional Centre Container Unit.
A portable unit that could be shipped anywhere in the world and then assembled on site in a reasonably short space of time. It would be self running in that it would generate its own electricity and requires only electricity for its power needs. The idea of a multifunctional centre comes from the need for most areas, which are subjected to disasters to have medical supplies and also clean water.
The container unit is built from three shipping containers and thus recycles these and puts them to another use.

Imagine that you are at work,home or in other place,and you see or reed in the news that something wrong happened... your heart for the moment stops,saying to you : IF ONLY I COULD HELP!


The Project
The first step of the bigger project called “Freedom” would be the ability to minimize the risks. With early warning the preparation of the development units could be more easily planned out. The multifunctional units would provide aid and assistance at the time of a disaster and to help with rehabilitation and reconstruction.
The basic building blocks of the unit are 3 used 40-foot containers. They will be remodeled and rebuilt as follows:

The first container will be but on both of the long sides and one side will be replaced with windows and will have a sliding door, rather like a patio door. The other side will be replaced with a slide out room that has a kitchen facility and toilet, dining room and other rooms as needed.

The second container will be built in the same manner but with a slide out bathroom and three bedrooms for the staff.

The containers will be placed on top of each other .

The rest of the space could be for medical equipment and supplies and where patients can be treated for minor injuries and ailments, or if the unit is used for other purposes then it will have other fittings as appropriate.

The last container will be placed lower,underground,have a 15000 litre waste tank and waste treatment unit, it will have a 2 water pumps, electricity storage and a biodiesel or petrol driven generator for electricity.

On the top of the first container there will be two 200 litre water tanks, one for fresh water and the other for recycled water.

The entire project is based upon electricity and water. The electric generation will be mainly accomplished by solar panels on the roof, which goes over the top of the containers; this also will allow rainwater to flow into the water tanks.

The second way in which electricity may be generated is via a wind turbine that will store the electricity in Lithium Ion Batteries that will be placed into the underground container.

The last way that electricity will be generated is using a biodiesel or petrol generator that will be used in the event that the other methods have failed,temporarly.


The self-running multifunctional centre will have underfloor heating and also and A/C cooling system installed.

My Invitation to you
I would like to invite you to be part of something beautiful, important and which will help to keep humanity on the right track.
Starting by donation of a fee that you find appropriate and afterwards to be part of the whole building process.
You may also be part of deciding who would receive the use of the centre and for how long.

 
Together we can,and we will give a sparkle of hope for those who lost everything or have not had at all.

I would like to invite you to send the first SRMC to Oklahoma!

Thank you

story:
Welcome to my donation page. This donation request is for my top surgery in Florida sched Jan2014.  The surgery itself will be $5,900 but I also have about $2,000 in extra fees like local anesthesia&surgeon fees, on top of what I need for flight and stay in a hotel for about a week. I do not expect to raise the entire amount, but when setting up a payment plan with the office I'd like to be able to put down half. Anybody who knows me knows how long I have been waiting for this surgery, and how much I need it. Any contributions at all will be greatly appreciated. Even if I only raise $100, that's $100 less that I have to pay.
Thank you so much for reading.
 
In order to feel at home in my body, I need to have top surgery. Top surgery is a tissue reduction and reforming procedure which removes the majority of the breast tissue and shapes the chest to a more masculine appearance. Unfortunately, it is also very expensive and most insurance plans do not currently cover sexual reassignment surgeries, and I live on a tight budget. I am saving money and considering loans to help me pay for this medically necessary procedure, but it’s still a hefty chunk of change. As such, I am doing something which is very hard for me – asking for help to defray the cost of this surgery. Can you help? No amount is too small (or too large!) and I am thankful for any help you can give. I am more than willing to answer any question or concerns anyone may have about the procedure or my reasons for doing this if you would like to contact me personally.
 

Anything you can do is very appreciated.  Thank you for helping me get this off my chest!

story:
I'm lily. :-) 


For 13 years now I've been on this journey. Between school, taking care of my parents, and providing for myself, I have been unable to truly be happy. I have saved money, worked absurd hours, and have come up short - so I am here asking for help.
I'm a graduate of Smith Colleges Master program, as well as a teacher and trans* advocate with the LGBT Coalition of Western, Massachusetts. 
The funds you donate will save me, literally. Too often, the medical profession denies and demeans trans healthcare, deeming it elective and cosmetic. There is nothing cosmetic or elective about trying to save your own life. 
I am forever in all of your debts. 

lily

story:
Crowd for a Crown. Save My Smile.

  • I hate to ask for help, but I want to keep my tooth more than my pride. As an employee of a nonprofit, this economy has been quite difficult for me.
  • I broke a tooth that had a large filling since childhood. Since that filling lasted for about 40 years, it deserves a crown rather than to be yanked out and tossed away, don't you think?! Besides, I have a lot of years left to enjoy all sorts of foods, and I'd like to be able to chew. :)

What Is Needed

  • The crown is $385, my cost above my insurance, and is due August 11.
  • Without insurance, the crown would cost $1,500! Simply pulling the molar still bears significant cost, leaves a hole in my smile and decreases my ability to chew solid foods. 
  • If I don't reach the entire goal, funds still will go toward the tooth, but I will have to delay the work and risk damaging the tooth further.
  • If we exceed the goal, funds will go toward replacing the badly worn tires I skid to work on each day.

Your generosity is appreciated and needed.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, your prayers for resolution of the shortfall would be great. Feel free to use Indiegogo share tools!

    Healthy Teeth, Healthy Me: Brushy Brush PSA brought to you by Sesame Street, which airs on Maryland Public Television at 10am weekdays.

story:
Your daily cup of... Peppermint

We're coders. And we're love what we're doing.

But we also needed an editor to make coding fun and great. So, we created it! 

InSili.co, our indie coding company, was founded back in 2010, with its main goal being to create beautiful apps for OSX and iOS. And today we are proud to announce the release and immediate availability of Peppermint 1.0, its new code editor developed exclusively for Mac OS X - as fresh as it gets!

Peppermint offers advanced editing features with dozens of extensions, giving developers the ability to create amazing new apps and enjoy a different coding experience like never before. 

 Syntax


Over 60+ different syntaxes supported for all your everyday coding needs. 

 Themes


With more than 10 different built-in dark & bright themes to choose from, adding some colour to your coding life has never been easier.

 Click & Run


Instantly Run/Preview your code, without ever leaving Peppermint, for over 15 different programming languages.


 Plugins


Dozens of plugins/extensions for everything you need: live preview your HTML, convert LESS or Markdown, beautify CSS/JS/HTML, complete FTP/SFTP support, Regex Editor, share your Gists and lots more!

 Customise


Did you know Peppermint features a full-fledged JavaScript-powered console and API? Just fire up the console, tweak your editor to your exact needs or write your own plugins!

 Advanced


Advanced Editing at your fingertips: Snippets, Autocompletion, Multiple cursors, Smart Undo-Redo and More!

------

Peppermint allows developers to make full use of their coding time, with major extensibility features like Plugins, Live JavaScript console and third-party extensions; and introduces a unique one-window no-distractions experience. 

Features:
  • 50+ different syntaxes supported
  • 10+ different themes
  • Lots of different plugins/tools covering everyday coding needs
  • Instantly Run/Preview code, without ever leaving Peppermint
  • Included FTP/SFTP mapping support
  • Live JavaScript console
  • Fully customiseable & scriptable interface
  • Advanced Editing: Snippets, Autocompletion, Multiple cursors + Much more!

Supported Syntaxes:

  • ActionScript
  • Ada
  • AppleScript, Objective-C 
  • Assembly x86
  • Bash 
  • C#
  • C / C++
  • COBOL
  • HTML / CSS / LESS / Sass
  • Clojure
  • JavaScript / JSON / CoffeeScript
  • ColdFusion
  • D
  • Erlang
  • Forth
  • Go
  • Haml
  • Haskell
  • Images
  • Java
  • LaTeX
  • Lisp
  • Lua
  • MATLAB
  • Makefile
  • Markdown
  • OCaml
  • PHP
  • Pascal
  • Perl
  • Plain Text
  • Prolog
  • Python
  • R
  • Ruby
  • SQL
  • Scala
  • Scheme
  • Tcl
  • Textile
  • XML
  • XQuery
  • YAML

Included Plugins/Extensions:

  • AppleScript : Run / Run with Arguments
  • Bash : Run / Run with Arguments
  • C : Run / Run with Arguments
  • C++ : Run / Run with Arguments
  • C# : Run / Run with Arguments
  • CoffeeScript : Compile
  • CSS : Beautify
  • HAML : Compile
  • HTML : Beautify, Preview, Preview in Browser, Strip HTML Tags, Validate
  • Java : Run / Run with Arguments
  • JavaScript : Beautify, JavaScript to CoffeeScript, Pack, Run / Run with Arguments
  • JSON : Beautify, To XML, Validate
  • LESS : Compile
  • Lua : Run / Run with Arguments
  • Markdown : Preview, Convert to HTML
  • Objective-C : Run / Run with Arguments
  • Perl : Run / Run with Arguments
  • PHP : Run / Run with Arguments
  • Python : Run / Run with Arguments
  • XML : To JSON
  • Regex Editor
  • Share Gists on Github
  • Embedded StackOverflow search

System Requirements:

  • OS X 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Intel 64-bit processor
  • 4.8 MB



Do you share our passion?

Our main goal from the very beginning was to create an editor, we - programmers - love to work with and makes the whole experience fun and enjoyable. And we won't quit until we create a developer editor that rocks! And share it with everyone that shares the same passion with us!

However, dealing with such a big project means countless of hours spent. While at the same time, not having any steady source of income to sustain the project and lower the product price as much as possible so that anyone has access to it.

So, this is where you come into play: are you ready to contribute to most fun code editor for mac?


Are you willing to open-source it?

When it comes to open-source code, trust us, there are no greater proponents than us. And we'd definitely consider it. But being a full-time developer, working on an already 3-year-old project, also means someone has to pay the bills. So here you are...

Are you willing to make the leap of... faith and assist us in realizing our dream of creating the most awesome editor for Mac and share it with the world? Then, help us exceed our original goals and give us a push! ;-)
story_txt:
Your daily cup of... Peppermint

We're coders. And we're love what we're doing.
But we also needed an editor to make coding fun and great. So, we created it! 
InSili.co, our indie coding company, was founded back in 2010, with its main goal being to create beautiful apps for OSX and iOS. And today we are proud to announce the release and immediate availability of Peppermint 1.0, its new code editor developed exclusively for Mac OS X - as fresh as it gets!
Peppermint offers advanced editing features with dozens of extensions, giving developers the ability to create amazing new apps and enjoy a different coding experience like never before. 



 Syntax
Over 60+ different syntaxes supported for all your everyday coding needs. 

 Themes
With more than 10 different built-in dark & bright themes to choose from, adding some colour to your coding life has never been easier.

 Click & Run
Instantly Run/Preview your code, without ever leaving Peppermint, for over 15 different programming languages.



 Plugins
Dozens of plugins/extensions for everything you need: live preview your HTML, convert LESS or Markdown, beautify CSS/JS/HTML, complete FTP/SFTP support, Regex Editor, share your Gists and lots more!

 Customise
Did you know Peppermint features a full-fledged JavaScript-powered console and API? Just fire up the console, tweak your editor to your exact needs or write your own plugins!

 Advanced
Advanced Editing at your fingertips: Snippets, Autocompletion, Multiple cursors, Smart Undo-Redo and More!
------Peppermint allows developers to make full use of their coding time, with major extensibility features like Plugins, Live JavaScript console and third-party extensions; and introduces a unique one-window no-distractions experience. 

Features:
50+ different syntaxes supported

10+ different themes

Lots of different plugins/tools covering everyday coding needs

Instantly Run/Preview code, without ever leaving Peppermint

Included FTP/SFTP mapping support

Live JavaScript console

Fully customiseable & scriptable interface

Advanced Editing: Snippets, Autocompletion, Multiple cursors + Much more!

story:
Here is information you can read, and there is background that helps explain why all this is not only important and necessary for our world, for our communities and peoples, but also where the BioTETRAD will be used, and how.  Starting in 2013.  Not a moment too soon, including with the mobile apps that come with it and can be used independently for Emergencies, Health and Wellness.  Read, and see the additional updates and online documents.  Watch the video.  CONTRIBUTE and SHARE THIS.  Who knows whose life or health could benefit in a critical way one day from having a BioTETRAD in your home, office, school or car?

      ==========================================

BioTETRAD is one type of a CyberMOD.  It consists of using several physical mod-cards (“moddies”) and appropriate software apps that each provide specific sensing and diagnostics for infectious disease pathogens and non-invasive testing and monitoring of medical conditions including selected biomarkers.  In future versions there will be therapeutic (e.g., medication release) moddies as well, but the basic BioTetrad CyberMOD does not provide (administer) therapeutics or pharmaceuticals.

BioTETRAD is a package of sensors and diagnostics.  It is not just a smartphone app or gizmo, but it works seamlessly with smartphones and tablets - by design, of course.

BioTETRAD mod-cards work with a wide variety of smartphone, tablet, and conventional computing devices, all  communications including voice and non-voice data transfer are accommodated through different wireless protocols that come either via attachments (e.g., smartphone or tablet) or a comms mod-card.  There are mod-cards for data defense against cyberattacks such as malware intrusion, and for long-performance power.

You do not need the whole "package" all at one time.  You use the components that matter - for biosensing and diagnostics for the disease of concern, and depending upon whether it is all about a person, or a pet, or one's food or water.  It is not only for emergencies and disasters.  It can be used by individuals, and also by healthcare providers and institutions.  Your funding will help it to be "out in the field" in 2013, and specifically in two areas of the world that really need this - some communities we are working with in Africa and also in the Fukushima area of Japan.

BioTETRAD is designed from the outset to adapt to new consumer and institutional products (e.g., next-gen smartphones and tablets), future sensing technologies (e.g., graphene-based), and future requirements for data protection and cyberdefense, the latter being an important dimension for all CyberMOD products given the acceleration in both internet dependencies and cyberattacks.

BioTETRAD’s architecture in both hardware and software adheres to the fundamental CyberMOD architecture and at the same time, it will adhere to the specific requirements of both the Qualcomm Tricorder X Prize and Nokia Sensing X Challenge competitions, starting up right now this fall (2012) and in which we are set to register and compete and win.

Roots of the foundational R&D including human-machine interfaces go back to the early 1990s and include work done at VCU/Medical College of Virginia, some at other universities (USA and Europe). Support and partnership has come from NSF, NIH, DARPA, USAID, Medicine for Humanity and partners such as Univ. of Toronto, Radford Univ., Virginia Tech, ST Microelectronics, Univ. of Costa Rica, Intel, Moscow State University and a few others, over the years.

Associated documents that are being made available in part or in whole include material from the X Prize Foundation competitions in which we intend to register and compete and complete - with BioTETRAD, although these are still in the early stages. 

You may read also:

  • Qualcomm X Prize preliminary guidelines
  • Nokia Sensing X Challenge preliminary guidelines
  • Additional memos pertaining to CUBIT, BioScan, BioProt, NomadEyes research and product/service offerings, some of which are focused upon particular infectious disease outbreaks (e.g., influenza, salmonella, WMD pathogens) See http://biotetrad.tetradyn.com

 My background including in the biomedical, epidemiological and public health areas, as well as on the electrical engr and information technology/computer science side, is at http://martin.instinnovstudy.org

We have: credentials, commendations, references, and also, resources to provide and prove, demonstrable, 100% accurate and proper fiscal accounting and dinancial management.

YOUR FUNDING SUPPORT will be spent only on what is absolutely necessary, for purchase and project completion.  Every dollar given will be properly accounted for.  There may be a lot of people out there asking for money for all sorts of things, but here you can see that it is going to be put to proper good use.  You can rest assured on these points, and find the confirmation that I am speaking the honest truth.

REMEMBER that BioTETRAD includes a group of Mobile APPs which are for emergency/disaster aid, and for health/wellness growth, and these can be used independently.  So there is also this "special new perk" - everyone who contributes at least $20.00 will receive the EmergeSense App as soon as it passes through its beta testing.

For further information contact myself, M. Dudziak (see http://tetradyn.com) at +1 (804) 740-0342, or +1 (202) 415-7295, or via Skype @ "martindudziak"

story:
About Shannon

 

Shannon is 28 years old, living in Minneapolis Mn. Shannon attended Circle in the Square Theatre in NYC where she trained on Broadway. She received a B.A. Degree in Communication Arts from Marymount Manhattan College in NYC. She worked at Abercrombie & Fitch for several years as a manager. Shannon was currently working at Iqor up until her accident.  Shannon is currently involved with the Saint Paul Winter Carnival. Shannon is a caring, giving, and a outgoing individual. She has a passion for theatre, art, badminton, and photography. She is a huge animal lover and her dog Sammers is one of her best friends. Shannon's family and friends are extremely important to her.

The Accident

On January 20th 2012 Shannon was on her way to a doctor appointment when she was involved in a serious car accident. She was t-boned by a semi truck on the driver's side of her car. She was left trapped inside the car and the jaws of life were used to get her out.  Shannon was taken to Regions Hospital in St. Paul Mn. she suffered significant injuries, broken femur, several ribs, shattered pelvis, elbow, clavicle, back, bruised lungs, concussion, nerve damage in her arm, and memory loss.   Shannon had a surgery to repair her leg, they place a rod through her femur bone, a rod through her hip, and two screws in her knee.  She spent several weeks in the hospital recovering...while there she received extensive physical therapy where she learned how to walk again, put on her clothes, shoes, count, read, and write. etc... Recently, Shannon just had another surgery to repair nerve damage in her arm. Shannon still has another surgery ahead of her to remove all the hardware in her leg.  Once, she recovers from that surgery she will again need intensive physical therapy.  Shannon has had a long, difficult, and challenging journey to recovery.

  Due to Shannon's accident she had lost her job and health insurance...with Shannon being without health insurance for four month it made things extremely difficult.  Shannon has been left with a lot of medical bills and continues to need treatments to manage chronic pain and physical therapy to keep her strength up. We're trying to raise money to cover the cost of her medical bills, on going medical bills, future surgery, and living expenses. 


  Throughout this entire process Shannon has kept a smile on her face and continues to have faith that there's a light at the end of the tunnel.  Shannon is so thankful for all the doctors and nurses that helped save her life, as well as, all of her family and friends that have been there for her...she thanks everyone for the well wishes, thoughts, and prayers! Shannon has always said, "great things are truly possible as long as you believe."  Shannon continues to defy odds and works hard every day.

  We are hoping to raise 8,000 dollars...any amount will truly help Shannon. If you are unable to give all we ask is you share this campaign with others. Thank you!

story:
Investieren Sie in das neue innovative Konzept des 

4-Sterne Panorama Feng Shui Energetic Golf & Health Park mit Onlineshop

Basierend auf den Ergebnissen einer Markt- und Wettbewerbsanalyse (Treugast) sowie unter Beachtung der Standortgegebenheiten wird die geplante Erweiterung des Feng Shui Panorama Golfplatzes Fürstenzell in ein Health Energie Erlebnis Resort mit Hotel, Ferienlodges, Health-Restaurant sowie einem Zentrum für Bewegung und Persönlichkeitsbildung und angeschlossenem kreativem Seminar- und Veranstaltungsbereich realisiert.

Der Fokus liegt dabei auf

  • Golfspielern, Gesundheits- und Individualreisenden 
  • Seminar-, Incentive- und Veranstaltungsgästen (Design Thinking)
  • Burn-Out Prävention, Work-Life Balance
  • Asiatischen Bewegungstechniken und TCM Medizin

Die Umsetzung des Resortgedanken sowie die Entwicklung eines ganzheitlichen und auf den Leitthemen Feng Shui und Energie basierten Konzepts ist dabei ein wesentlicher Ansatzpunkt. Durch die erweiterte Angebotspalette mit Golfplatz, Therapie- und Behandlungsmethoden im Zentrum für Bewegung und Persönlichkeitsbildung sowie Seminaren, Veranstaltungen und Incentives mit Fokus auf fernöstliche Lehren bietet das Resort dem Gast einen umfangreichen Mehrwert. 

Die Makrolage in der bayerischen Golf- und Thermenregion, in einer der bekanntesten Ferienregionen Deutschlands, spricht grundsätzlich für ein erhöhtes touristisches Potenzial. Für Urlaubsreisende aus Deutschland und Österreich, aber auch internationale Gäste, Naturliebhaber sowie die Städtetouristen aus Passau gilt die Region als beliebtes Reiseziel.

Profitieren Sie von der modernen Verzahnung eines hochwertigen Online Golfshops mit Clubkonzept und Golfresort. 

Als Unterstützer  des Feng Shui Energetic Golf & Health Park profitieren Sie doppelt: 

  1. an den Wertsteigerungen und den Gewinnausschüttungen der Resortanlage und des Onlineshops (voraussichtlich 5% pro Jahr)
  2. an den günstigen Einkaufskonditionen und bevorzugten VIP-Buchungs-konditionen im Golfclub und im Energetik Health Resort und bei den angebotenen Golfreisen (ca. -20% Ermäßigung im Vergleich zu normalen Preisen)


>> Werden Sie jetzt Unterstützer des Feng Shui Energetic Golf & Health Park
>> Investieren schon zum Preis eines Greefees

story:
While it will take a year for Care for Peace to build the first Mini-Medical Center in rural Myanmar we are going to provide care NOW! by installing a Mobile Health Van and a Modular Health Clinic.

Here’s where we need your help:
Contribute what you can...
even if it is only One Dollar!

After four years and many visits by the Care for Peace team we have government approval and the land to build the first Mini-Medical Center that will be completely funded by people like you and me who care... for peace.

While it will take time to build the first Mini-Medical Center, we aren't waiting to start providing high-touch and high-tech healthcare to the people... so we're starting NOW!

With your help we will purchase and install a Mobile Health Van and a Modular Health Clinic so that we can start providing preventive health and basic medical services to people in great need.  Cost: $28,300


              Mothers and babies                                                    Typical rural village

The current reality in Myanmar

Peace hangs in the balance.  Ancient tribal and ethnic animosities threaten the determination of a nation struggling to become a free market economy. 

Health care is almost non-existent for the 50-million-plus people who live in squalor in barely-accessible rural Myanmar. 

And while we know we are powerless to affect age-old hostilities, what we can do is help the government show the governed that they care... to provide a place, a healing place, a meeting place, a birthing place in rural townships and villages, where basic health services are available to all, regardless of their tribal and ethnic origins. So maybe by providing health care we might positively affect peace. 

Our name and our mission
are one in the same:
Care... for Peace!


                    Government nurse                                                    Mom and HIV/AIDS baby

The Mini-Medical Center Vision

The Mini-Medical Center is a village-based preventive health, health education, illness and injury, testing and treatment, birthing, tele-communication and community meeting center that is self-sufficient, environmentally and operationally sustainable.  The Mini's are connected via computers, tablets and mobile units via wi-fi to the regional, national and international medical education, staff training and 24/7 medical consultation support system for Mini-Medical Center staff and villagers.

But First:
a Mobile Health Van
and a Modular Health Clinic!

What you can do

You can help buy the Mobile Health Van and the Modular Health Clinic for the 50,000 people who live in Kyauk Phyu by:

  • Donating what you can… Anything will help!

  • Sending this site (copy the address line) to your friends as soon as possible!

A few of the Perks:

      Embossed Gold on Blue                                                            Gold Embroidered
  "I Care for Peace" Lapel Pin                                                      "Care for Peace" Cap

                   Certificate of Appreciation                                 Gourmet Burmese Dinner
                       Suitable for framing!                                                       for four!
                                                                                            (San Francisco Bay Area only)

The Care for Peace team

The core Care for Peace team consists of key executives in health and project management related fields who are determined to provide planning and development of the Myanmar National Health System at no cost to the Myanmar government.  The Care for Peace team consists of:

  • Jeff Hardy, Care for Peace Founder and Executive Director
    President, System Healthcare International
    www.SystemHealthcare.com
    Executive Director, International Sister Hospital Institute
    www.SisterHospitals.com  

  • Hla Kyi, Founder, Care for Peace - Myanmar
    Regional Director, Care for Peace - MYanmar
    Project Management International Co., Ltd.
    www.PMIWorld.com 

  • Tyler Darland, Founder, Care for Peace - Myanmar
    Project Director
    President, PMI Project Management International
    www.PMIWorld.com

       
                            Hla Kyi                            Jeff Hardy                     Tyler Darland

What is Care for Peace?

Care for Peace is an international charity that has a signed Cooperative Agreement with the Myanmar Ministry of Health to build a prototype Mini-Medical Center in a "deep rural: Area of Western Myanmar

                            The Care for Peace Mission in Myanmar

Legal Notices

Care for Peace is a registered non-profit corporation in the State of California, USA.  The Articles of Incorporation were filed with the California Secretary of State in April, 2013.   Application for IRS approval of Care for Peace as a 501(c)(3) tax-exempt organization was completed and submitted in November, 2013, with the professional assistance of the University of California Berkeley School of Law, New Business Practicum helmed by Mr. Bill Kell, Esq.  While we await approval, purportedly any day now, Care for Peace has been operating under the legal umbrella of System Healthcare International, dba. Marin County California.

Important note:  We are in compliance with the requirements set forth by the federal Office of Foreign Assets Control (OFAC). 

For more information please contact Jeff@CareforPeace.org
story_txt:
While it will take a year for Care for Peace to build the first Mini-Medical Center in rural Myanmar we are going to provide care NOW! by installing a Mobile Health Van and a Modular Health Clinic.
Here’s where we need your help:Contribute what you can...even if it is only One Dollar!
After four years and many visits by the Care for Peace team we have government approval and the land to build the first Mini-Medical Center that will be completely funded by people like you and me who care... for peace.While it will take time to build the first Mini-Medical Center, we aren't waiting to start providing high-touch and high-tech healthcare to the people... so we're starting NOW!
With your help we will purchase and install a Mobile Health Van and a Modular Health Clinic so that we can start providing preventive health and basic medical services to people in great need.  Cost: $28,300
              Mothers and babies                                                    Typical rural villageThe current reality in MyanmarPeace hangs in the balance.  Ancient tribal and ethnic animosities threaten the determination of a nation struggling to become a free market economy.  Health care is almost non-existent for the 50-million-plus people who live in squalor in barely-accessible rural Myanmar.  And while we know we are powerless to affect age-old hostilities, what we can do is help the government show the governed that they care... to provide a place, a healing place, a meeting place, a birthing place in rural townships and villages, where basic health services are available to all, regardless of their tribal and ethnic origins. So maybe by providing health care we might positively affect peace.  Our name and our mission are one in the same:Care... for Peace!
                    Government nurse                                                    Mom and HIV/AIDS babyThe Mini-Medical Center VisionThe Mini-Medical Center is a village-based preventive health, health education, illness and injury, testing and treatment, birthing, tele-communication and community meeting center that is self-sufficient, environmentally and operationally sustainable.  The Mini's are connected via computers, tablets and mobile units via wi-fi to the regional, national and international medical education, staff training and 24/7 medical consultation support system for Mini-Medical Center staff and villagers. 


 But First: a Mobile Health Vanand a Modular Health Clinic!What you can do

You
can help buy the Mobile Health Van and the Modular Health Clinic for the 50,000 people who live in Kyauk Phyu by:

Donating what you can…
     Anything will help!
Sending this site (copy the
     address line) to your friends as soon as possible! A few of the Perks:      Embossed Gold on Blue                                                            Gold Embroidered  "I Care for Peace" Lapel Pin                                                      "Care for Peace" Cap                   Certificate of Appreciation                                 Gourmet Burmese Dinner                       Suitable for framing!                                                       for four!                                                                                            (San Francisco Bay Area only)
 The Care for Peace team 

The
core Care for Peace team consists of key executives in health and project
management related fields who are determined to provide planning and development
of the Myanmar National Health System at no cost to the Myanmar
government.  The Care for Peace team consists of:
